Theory CFG

theory CFG
imports Main
begin

typedecl symbol

type_synonym rule = "symbol Ã— symbol list"

type_synonym sentence = "symbol list"

locale CFG =
  fixes ğ”‘ :: "symbol set"
  fixes ğ”— :: "symbol set"
  fixes â„œ :: "rule set"
  fixes ğ”– :: "symbol"
  assumes disjunct_symbols: "ğ”‘ âˆ© ğ”— = {}"
  assumes startsymbol_dom: "ğ”– âˆˆ ğ”‘"
  assumes validRules: "âˆ€ (N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ. N âˆˆ ğ”‘ âˆ§ (âˆ€ s âˆˆ set Î±. s âˆˆ ğ”‘ âˆª ğ”—)"
begin

definition is_terminal :: "symbol â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_terminal s = (s âˆˆ ğ”—)"

definition is_nonterminal :: "symbol â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_nonterminal s = (s âˆˆ ğ”‘)"

lemma is_nonterminal_startsymbol:"is_nonterminal ğ”–"
  by (simp add: is_nonterminal_def startsymbol_dom)

definition is_symbol :: "symbol â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_symbol s = (is_terminal s âˆ¨ is_nonterminal s)"

definition is_sentence :: "sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_sentence s = list_all is_symbol s"

definition is_word :: "sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_word s = list_all is_terminal s"
   
definition derives1 :: "sentence â‡’ sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "derives1 u v = 
     (âˆƒ x y N Î±. 
          u = x @ [N] @ y
        âˆ§ v = x @ Î± @ y
        âˆ§ is_sentence x
        âˆ§ is_sentence y
        âˆ§ (N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ)"  

definition derivations1 :: "(sentence Ã— sentence) set"
where
  "derivations1 = { (u,v) | u v. derives1 u v }"

definition derivations :: "(sentence Ã— sentence) set"
where 
  "derivations = derivations1^*"

definition derives :: "sentence â‡’ sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "derives u v = ((u, v) âˆˆ derivations)"

definition is_derivation :: "sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_derivation u = derives [ğ”–] u"

definition â„’ :: "sentence set"
where
  "â„’ = { v | v. is_word v âˆ§ is_derivation v}"

definition "â„’â‡©P"  :: "sentence set"
where
  "â„’â‡©P = { u | u v. is_word u âˆ§ is_derivation (u@v) }"

end

end

Theory LocalLexing

theory LocalLexing
imports CFG
begin

typedecl character

type_synonym lexer = "character list â‡’ nat â‡’ nat set"  

type_synonym token = "symbol Ã— character list" 

type_synonym tokens = "token list"

definition terminal_of_token :: "token â‡’ symbol"
where
  "terminal_of_token t = fst t"

definition terminals :: "tokens â‡’ sentence"
where
  "terminals ts = map terminal_of_token ts"

definition chars_of_token :: "token â‡’ character list"
where
  "chars_of_token t = snd t"

fun chars :: "tokens â‡’ character list"
where
  "chars [] = []"
| "chars (t#ts) = (chars_of_token t) @ (chars ts)"

fun charslength :: "tokens â‡’ nat"
where
  "charslength cs = length (chars cs)"

definition is_lexer :: "lexer â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_lexer lexer = 
    (âˆ€ D p l. (p â‰¤ length D âˆ§ l âˆˆ lexer D p âŸ¶ p + l â‰¤ length D) âˆ§
              (p > length D âŸ¶ lexer D p = {}))"

type_synonym selector = "token set â‡’ token set â‡’ token set"

definition is_selector :: "selector â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_selector sel = (âˆ€ A B. A âŠ† B âŸ¶ (A âŠ† sel A B âˆ§ sel A B âŠ† B))" 

fun by_length :: "nat â‡’ tokens set â‡’ tokens set"
where
  "by_length l tss = { ts . ts âˆˆ tss âˆ§ length (chars ts) = l }" 

fun funpower :: "('a â‡’ 'a) â‡’ nat â‡’ ('a â‡’ 'a)"
where
  "funpower f 0 x = x"
| "funpower f (Suc n) x = f (funpower f n x)"

definition natUnion :: "(nat â‡’ 'a set) â‡’ 'a set"
where
  "natUnion f = â‹ƒ { f n | n. True }"

definition limit  :: "('a set â‡’ 'a set) â‡’ 'a set â‡’ 'a set"
where
  "limit f x = natUnion (Î» n. funpower f n x)"

locale LocalLexing = CFG +
  fixes Lex :: "symbol â‡’ lexer"
  fixes Sel :: "selector"
  assumes Lex_is_lexer: "âˆ€ t âˆˆ ğ”—. is_lexer (Lex t)"
  assumes Sel_is_selector: "is_selector Sel"
  fixes Doc :: "character list"
begin

definition admissible :: "tokens â‡’ bool"
where
  "admissible ts = (terminals ts âˆˆ â„’â‡©P)" 

definition Append :: "token set â‡’ nat â‡’ tokens set â‡’ tokens set"
where
  "Append Z k P = P âˆª 
    { p @ [t] | p t. p âˆˆ by_length k P âˆ§ t âˆˆ Z âˆ§ admissible (p @ [t])}"

definition ğ’³ :: "nat â‡’ token set"
where
  "ğ’³ k = {(t, Ï‰) | t l Ï‰. t âˆˆ ğ”— âˆ§ l âˆˆ Lex t Doc k âˆ§ Ï‰ = take l (drop k Doc)}"

definition ğ’² :: "tokens set â‡’ nat â‡’ token set"
where
  "ğ’² P k =  { u. u âˆˆ ğ’³ k âˆ§ (âˆƒ p âˆˆ by_length k P. admissible (p@[u])) }"

definition ğ’´ :: "token set â‡’ tokens set â‡’ nat â‡’ token set"
where
  "ğ’´ T P k = Sel T (ğ’² P k)" 

fun ğ’« :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ tokens set"
and ğ’¬ :: "nat â‡’ tokens set"
and ğ’µ :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ token set"
where
  "ğ’« 0 0 = {[]}"
| "ğ’« k (Suc u) = limit (Append (ğ’µ k (Suc u)) k) (ğ’« k u)"
| "ğ’« (Suc k) 0 = ğ’¬ k"
| "ğ’µ k 0 = {}"
| "ğ’µ k (Suc u) = ğ’´ (ğ’µ k u) (ğ’« k u) k"
| "ğ’¬ k = natUnion (ğ’« k)"

definition ğ”“ :: "tokens set"
where
  "ğ”“ = ğ’¬ (length Doc)"

definition ll :: "tokens set"
where 
  "ll = { p . p âˆˆ ğ”“ âˆ§ charslength p = length Doc âˆ§ terminals p âˆˆ â„’ }"

end

end

Theory LLEarleyParsing

theory LLEarleyParsing 
imports LocalLexing
begin

datatype item = 
  Item 
    (item_rule: rule) 
    (item_dot : nat) 
    (item_origin : nat)
    (item_end : nat)

type_synonym items = "item set"

definition item_nonterminal :: "item â‡’ symbol"
where
  "item_nonterminal x = fst (item_rule x)"

definition item_rhs :: "item â‡’ sentence"
where
  "item_rhs x = snd (item_rule x)"

definition item_Î± :: "item â‡’ sentence"
where
  "item_Î± x = take (item_dot x) (item_rhs x)"

definition item_Î² :: "item â‡’ sentence"
where 
  "item_Î² x = drop (item_dot x) (item_rhs x)"

definition init_item :: "rule â‡’ nat â‡’ item"
where
  "init_item r k = Item r 0 k k"

definition is_complete :: "item â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_complete x = (item_dot x â‰¥ length (item_rhs x))"

definition next_symbol :: "item â‡’ symbol option"
where
  "next_symbol x = (if is_complete x then None else Some ((item_rhs x) ! (item_dot x)))"

definition inc_item :: "item â‡’ nat â‡’ item"
where
  "inc_item x k = Item (item_rule x) (item_dot x + 1) (item_origin x) k"

definition bin :: "items â‡’ nat â‡’ items"
where
  "bin I k = { x . x âˆˆ I âˆ§ item_end x = k }"

context LocalLexing begin

definition Init :: "items"
where
  "Init = { init_item r 0 | r. r âˆˆ â„œ âˆ§ fst r = ğ”– }"

definition Predict :: "nat â‡’ items â‡’ items"
where
  "Predict k I = I âˆª  
     { init_item r k | r x. r âˆˆ â„œ âˆ§ x âˆˆ bin I k âˆ§ 
       next_symbol x = Some(fst r) }"

definition Complete :: "nat â‡’ items â‡’ items"
where
  "Complete k I = I âˆª { inc_item x k | x y. 
     x âˆˆ bin I (item_origin y) âˆ§ y âˆˆ bin I k âˆ§ is_complete y âˆ§ 
     next_symbol x = Some (item_nonterminal y) }"

definition TokensAt :: "nat â‡’ items â‡’ token set"
where
  "TokensAt k I = { (t, s) | t s x l. x âˆˆ bin I k âˆ§ 
     next_symbol x = Some t âˆ§ is_terminal t âˆ§ 
     l âˆˆ Lex t Doc k âˆ§ s = take l (drop k Doc) }"

definition Tokens :: "nat â‡’ token set â‡’ items â‡’ token set"
where
  "Tokens k T I = Sel T (TokensAt k I)"

definition Scan :: "token set â‡’ nat â‡’ items â‡’ items"
where
  "Scan T k I = I âˆª
     { inc_item x (k + length c) | x t c. x âˆˆ bin I k âˆ§ (t, c) âˆˆ T âˆ§
       next_symbol x = Some t }"
      
definition Ï€ :: "nat â‡’ token set â‡’ items â‡’ items"
where
  "Ï€ k T I = 
     limit (Î» I. Scan T k (Complete k (Predict k I))) I"

fun ğ’¥ :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ items"
and â„ :: "nat â‡’ items"
and ğ’¯ :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ token set"
where
  "ğ’¥ 0 0 = Ï€ 0 {} Init"
| "ğ’¥ k (Suc u) = Ï€ k (ğ’¯ k (Suc u)) (ğ’¥ k u)"
| "ğ’¥ (Suc k) 0 = Ï€ (Suc k) {} (â„ k)"
| "ğ’¯ k 0 = {}"
| "ğ’¯ k (Suc u) = Tokens k (ğ’¯ k u) (ğ’¥ k u)"
| "â„ k = natUnion (ğ’¥ k)"

definition â„‘ :: "items"
where
  "â„‘ = â„ (length Doc)"

definition is_finished :: "item â‡’ bool" where
  "is_finished x = (item_nonterminal x = ğ”– âˆ§ item_origin x = 0 âˆ§ item_end x = length Doc âˆ§ 
    is_complete x)"

definition earley_recognised :: "bool"
where
  "earley_recognised = (âˆƒ x âˆˆ â„‘. is_finished x)"

end

end

Theory Limit

theory Limit
imports LocalLexing
begin

definition setmonotone :: "('a set â‡’ 'a set) â‡’ bool"
where
  "setmonotone f = (âˆ€ X. X âŠ† f X)"

lemma setmonotone_funpower: "setmonotone f âŸ¹ setmonotone (funpower f n)"
  by (induct n, auto simp add: setmonotone_def)

lemma subset_setmonotone: "setmonotone f âŸ¹ X âŠ† f X"
  by (simp add: setmonotone_def)

lemma elem_setmonotone: "setmonotone f âŸ¹ x âˆˆ X âŸ¹ x âˆˆ f X"
  by (auto simp add: setmonotone_def)

lemma elem_natUnion: "(âˆ€ n. x âˆˆ f n) âŸ¹ x âˆˆ natUnion f"
  by (auto simp add: natUnion_def)

lemma subset_natUnion: "(âˆ€ n. X âŠ† f n) âŸ¹ X âŠ† natUnion f"
  by (auto simp add: natUnion_def)
  
lemma setmonotone_limit:
  assumes fmono: "setmonotone f"
  shows "setmonotone (limit f)"
proof -
  show "setmonotone (limit f)" 
    apply (auto simp add: setmonotone_def limit_def)
    apply (rule elem_natUnion, auto)
    apply (rule elem_setmonotone[OF setmonotone_funpower])
    by (auto simp add: fmono)
qed

lemma[simp]: "funpower id n = id"
  by (rule ext, induct n, simp_all)

lemma[simp]: "limit id = id"
  by (rule ext, auto simp add: limit_def natUnion_def)

lemma natUnion_decompose[consumes 1, case_names Decompose]:
  assumes p: "p âˆˆ natUnion S"
  assumes decompose: "â‹€ n p. p âˆˆ S n âŸ¹ P p" 
  shows "P p" 
proof -
  from p have "âˆƒ n. p âˆˆ S n" 
    by (auto simp add: natUnion_def)
  then obtain n where "p âˆˆ S n" by blast
  from decompose[OF this] show ?thesis .
qed

lemma limit_induct[consumes 1, case_names Init Iterate]:
  assumes p: "(p :: 'a) âˆˆ limit f X"
  assumes init: "â‹€ p. p âˆˆ X âŸ¹ P p"
  assumes iterate: "â‹€ p Y. (â‹€ q . q âˆˆ Y âŸ¹ P q) âŸ¹ p âˆˆ f Y âŸ¹ P p"
  shows "P p"
proof -
  from p have p_in_natUnion: "p âˆˆ natUnion (Î» n. funpower f n X)"    
    by (simp add: limit_def)
  {
    fix p :: 'a
    fix n :: nat
    have "p âˆˆ funpower f n X âŸ¹ P p"
    proof (induct n arbitrary: p) 
      case 0 thus ?case using init[OF 0[simplified]] by simp
    next
      case (Suc n) show ?case 
        using iterate[OF Suc(1) Suc(2)[simplified], simplified] by simp
    qed
  }
  with p_in_natUnion show ?thesis
    by (induct rule: natUnion_decompose)
qed

definition chain :: "(nat â‡’ 'a set) â‡’ bool"
where
  "chain C = (âˆ€ i. C i âŠ† C (i + 1))"

definition continuous :: "('a set â‡’ 'b set) â‡’ bool"
where
  "continuous f = (âˆ€ C. chain C âŸ¶ (chain (f o C) âˆ§ f (natUnion C) = natUnion (f o C)))"

lemma continuous_apply:
  "continuous f âŸ¹ chain C âŸ¹ f (natUnion C) = natUnion (f o C)"
by (simp add: continuous_def)

lemma continuous_imp_mono:
  assumes continuous: "continuous f"
  shows "mono f"
proof -
  { 
    fix A :: "'a set"
    fix B :: "'a set"
    assume sub: "A âŠ† B"
    let ?C = "Î» (i::nat). if (i = 0) then A else B"
    have "chain ?C" by (simp add: chain_def sub) 
    then have fC: "chain (f o ?C)" using continuous continuous_def by blast
    then have "f (?C 0) âŠ† f (?C (0 + 1))"
    proof -
      have "â‹€f n. Â¬ chain f âˆ¨ (f n::'b set) âŠ† f (Suc n)"
        by (metis Suc_eq_plus1 chain_def)
      then show ?thesis using fC by fastforce
    qed
    then have "f A âŠ† f B" by auto
  }
  then show "mono f" by (simp add: monoI)
qed 
      
lemma mono_maps_chain_to_chain: 
  assumes f: "mono f"
  assumes C: "chain C"
  shows "chain (f o C)"
by (metis C comp_def f chain_def mono_def)

lemma natUnion_upperbound: 
  "(â‹€ n. f n âŠ† G) âŸ¹ (natUnion f) âŠ† G"
by (auto simp add: natUnion_def)

lemma funpower_upperbound:
  "(â‹€ I. I âŠ† G âŸ¹ f I âŠ† G) âŸ¹ I âŠ† G âŸ¹ funpower f n I âŠ† G"
proof (induct n)
  case 0 thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Suc n) thus ?case by simp
qed

lemma limit_upperbound:
  "(â‹€ I. I âŠ† G âŸ¹ f I âŠ† G) âŸ¹ I âŠ† G âŸ¹ limit f I âŠ† G"
by (simp add: funpower_upperbound limit_def natUnion_upperbound)

lemma elem_limit_simp: "x âˆˆ limit f X = (âˆƒ n. x âˆˆ funpower f n X)"
by (auto simp add: limit_def natUnion_def)

definition pointwise :: "('a set â‡’ 'b set) â‡’ bool" where
  "pointwise f = (âˆ€ X. f X = â‹ƒ { f {x} | x. x âˆˆ X})" 

lemma pointwise_simp: 
  assumes f: "pointwise f"
  shows "f X =  â‹ƒ { f {x} | x. x âˆˆ X}"
proof -
  from f have "âˆ€ X. f X = â‹ƒ { f {x} | x. x âˆˆ X}"
    by (rule iffD1[OF pointwise_def[where f=f]])
  then show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma natUnion_elem: "x âˆˆ f n âŸ¹ x âˆˆ natUnion f"
using natUnion_def by fastforce
  
lemma limit_elem: "x âˆˆ funpower f n X âŸ¹ x âˆˆ limit f X"
by (simp add: limit_def natUnion_elem)

lemma limit_step_pointwise:
  assumes x: "x âˆˆ limit f X"
  assumes f: "pointwise f"
  assumes y: "y âˆˆ f {x}"
  shows "y âˆˆ limit f X"
proof - 
  from x have "âˆƒ n. x âˆˆ funpower f n X" 
    by (simp add: elem_limit_simp)
  then obtain n where n: "x âˆˆ funpower f n X" by blast
  have "y âˆˆ funpower f (Suc n) X"
    apply simp 
    apply (subst pointwise_simp[OF f])
    using y n by auto
  then show "y âˆˆ limit f X" by (meson limit_elem)
qed

definition pointbase :: "('a set â‡’ 'b set) â‡’ 'a set â‡’ 'b set" where
  "pointbase F I = â‹ƒ { F X | X. finite X âˆ§ X âŠ† I }"

definition pointbased :: "('a set â‡’ 'b set) â‡’ bool" where
  "pointbased f = (âˆƒ F. f = pointbase F)"

lemma pointwise_implies_pointbased:
  assumes pointwise: "pointwise f"
  shows "pointbased f"
proof -
  let ?F = "Î» X. f X"
  {
    fix I :: "'a set"
    fix x :: "'b"
    have lr: "x âˆˆ pointbase ?F I âŸ¹ x âˆˆ f I"
    proof -
      assume x: "x âˆˆ pointbase ?F I"
      have "âˆƒ X. x âˆˆ f X âˆ§ X âŠ† I"
        proof -
          have "x âˆˆ â‹ƒ{f A |A. finite A âˆ§ A âŠ† I}"
            by (metis pointbase_def x)
          then show ?thesis
            by blast
        qed
      then obtain X where X:"x âˆˆ f X âˆ§ X âŠ† I" by blast
      have "âˆƒ y. y âˆˆ I âˆ§ x âˆˆ f {y}"
        using X apply (simp add: pointwise_simp[OF pointwise, where X=X])
        by blast
      then show "x âˆˆ f I"
        apply (simp add: pointwise_simp[OF pointwise, where X=I])
        by blast
    qed
    have rl: "x âˆˆ f I âŸ¹ x âˆˆ pointbase ?F I"
    proof -
      assume x: "x âˆˆ f I"
      have "âˆƒ y. y âˆˆ I âˆ§ x âˆˆ f {y}"
        using x apply (simp add: pointwise_simp[OF pointwise, where X=I])
        by blast
      then obtain y where "y âˆˆ I âˆ§ x âˆˆ f {y}" by blast
      then have "âˆƒ X. x âˆˆ f X âˆ§ finite X âˆ§ X âŠ† I" by blast
      then show "x âˆˆ pointbase f I"
        apply (simp add: pointbase_def)
        by blast
    qed
    note lr rl
  }
  then have "â‹€ I. pointbase f I = f I" by blast
  then have "pointbase f = f" by blast
  then show ?thesis by (metis pointbased_def) 
qed  
   
lemma pointbase_is_mono:
  "mono (pointbase f)"
proof -
  {
    fix A :: "'a set"
    fix B :: "'a set"
    assume subset: "A âŠ† B"
    have "(pointbase f) A âŠ† (pointbase f) B" 
      apply (simp add: pointbase_def)
      using subset by fastforce
  }
  then show ?thesis by (simp add: mono_def)
qed

lemma chain_implies_mono: "chain C âŸ¹ mono C"
by (simp add: chain_def mono_iff_le_Suc)

lemma chain_cover_witness: "finite X âŸ¹ chain C âŸ¹ X âŠ† natUnion C âŸ¹ âˆƒ n. X âŠ† C n"
proof (induct rule: finite.induct)
  case emptyI thus ?case by blast
next
  case (insertI X x) 
  then have "X âŠ† natUnion C" by simp
  with insertI have "âˆƒ n. X âŠ† C n" by blast
  then obtain n where n: "X âŠ† C n" by blast
  have x: "x âˆˆ natUnion C" using insertI.prems(2) by blast
  then have "âˆƒ m. x âˆˆ C m"
  proof -
    have "x âˆˆ â‹ƒ{A. âˆƒn. A = C n}" by (metis x natUnion_def)
    then show ?thesis by blast
  qed
  then obtain m where m: "x âˆˆ C m" by blast
  have mono_C: "â‹€ i j. i â‰¤ j âŸ¹ C i âŠ† C j"
    using chain_implies_mono insertI(3) mono_def by blast 
  show ?case
    apply (rule_tac x="max n m" in exI)
    apply auto
    apply (meson contra_subsetD m max.cobounded2 mono_C)
    by (metis max_def mono_C n subsetCE)
qed
    
lemma pointbase_is_continuous:
  "continuous (pointbase f)"
proof -
  {
    fix C :: "nat â‡’ 'a set"
    assume C: "chain C"
    have mono: "chain ((pointbase f) o C)"
      by (simp add: C mono_maps_chain_to_chain pointbase_is_mono)
    have subset1: "natUnion ((pointbase f) o C) âŠ† (pointbase f) (natUnion C)"
    proof (auto)
      fix y :: "'b"
      assume "y âˆˆ natUnion ((pointbase f) o C)"
      then show "y âˆˆ (pointbase f) (natUnion C)"
      proof (induct rule: natUnion_decompose)
        case (Decompose n p)
          thus ?case by (metis comp_apply contra_subsetD mono_def natUnion_elem 
            pointbase_is_mono subsetI) 
      qed
    qed
    have subset2: "(pointbase f) (natUnion C) âŠ† natUnion ((pointbase f) o C)"
    proof (auto)
      fix y :: "'b"
      assume y: "y âˆˆ (pointbase f) (natUnion C)"
      have "âˆƒ X. finite X âˆ§ X âŠ† natUnion C âˆ§ y âˆˆ f X"
      proof -
        have "y âˆˆ â‹ƒ{f A |A. finite A âˆ§ A âŠ† natUnion C}"
          by (metis y pointbase_def)
        then show ?thesis by blast
      qed
      then obtain X where X: "finite X âˆ§ X âŠ† natUnion C âˆ§ y âˆˆ f X" by blast
      then have "âˆƒ n. X âŠ† C n" using chain_cover_witness C by blast
      then obtain n where X_sub_C: "X âŠ† C n" by blast
      show "y âˆˆ natUnion ((pointbase f) o C)" 
        apply (rule_tac natUnion_elem[where n=n])
        proof -
          have "y âˆˆ â‹ƒ{f A |A. finite A âˆ§ A âŠ† C n}"
          using X X_sub_C by blast
          then show "y âˆˆ (pointbase f âˆ˜ C) n" by (simp add: pointbase_def)
      qed
    qed
    note mono subset1 subset2
  }  
  then show ?thesis by (simp add: continuous_def subset_antisym)   
qed
 
lemma pointbased_implies_continuous:
  "pointbased f âŸ¹ continuous f"
  using pointbase_is_continuous pointbased_def by force

lemma setmonotone_implies_chain_funpower:
  assumes setmonotone: "setmonotone f"
  shows "chain (Î» n. funpower f n I)"
by (simp add: chain_def setmonotone subset_setmonotone)  

lemma natUnion_subset: "(â‹€ n. âˆƒ m. f n âŠ† g m) âŸ¹ natUnion f âŠ† natUnion g"
  by (meson natUnion_elem natUnion_upperbound subset_iff)

lemma natUnion_eq[case_names Subset Superset]: 
  "(â‹€ n. âˆƒ m. f n âŠ† g m) âŸ¹ (â‹€ n. âˆƒ m. g n âŠ† f m) âŸ¹ natUnion f = natUnion g"
by (simp add: natUnion_subset subset_antisym)
  
lemma natUnion_shift[symmetric]: 
  assumes chain: "chain C"
  shows "natUnion C = natUnion (Î» n. C (n + m))"
proof (induct rule: natUnion_eq)
  case (Subset n)
    show ?case using chain chain_implies_mono le_add1 mono_def by blast 
next
  case (Superset n)
    show ?case by blast 
qed

definition regular :: "('a set â‡’ 'a set) â‡’ bool"
where
  "regular f = (setmonotone f âˆ§ continuous f)"

lemma regular_fixpoint:
  assumes regular: "regular f"
  shows "f (limit f I) = limit f I"
proof -
  have setmonotone: "setmonotone f" using regular regular_def by blast
  have continuous: "continuous f" using regular regular_def by blast

  let ?C = "Î» n. funpower f n I"
  have chain: "chain ?C"
    by (simp add: setmonotone setmonotone_implies_chain_funpower)
  have "f (limit f I) = f (natUnion ?C)"
    using limit_def by metis
  also have "f (natUnion ?C) = natUnion (f o ?C)"
    by (metis continuous continuous_def chain)
  also have "natUnion (f o ?C) = natUnion (Î» n. f(funpower f n I))"
    by (meson comp_apply)
  also have "natUnion (Î» n. f(funpower f n I)) = natUnion (Î» n. ?C (n + 1))"
    by simp
  also have "natUnion (Î» n. ?C(n + 1)) = natUnion ?C"
    apply (subst natUnion_shift)
    using chain by (blast+)
  finally show ?thesis by (simp add: limit_def)
qed  
    
lemma fix_is_fix_of_limit:
  assumes fixpoint: "f I = I"   
  shows "limit f I = I"
proof -
  have funpower: "â‹€ n. funpower f n I = I" 
  proof -  
    fix n :: nat
    from fixpoint show "funpower f n I = I"
      by (induct n, auto)
  qed
  show ?thesis by (simp add: limit_def funpower natUnion_def)
qed     

lemma limit_is_idempotent: "regular f âŸ¹ limit f (limit f I) = limit f I"
by (simp add: fix_is_fix_of_limit regular_fixpoint)

definition mk_regular1 :: "('b â‡’ 'a â‡’ bool) â‡’ ('b â‡’ 'a â‡’ 'a) â‡’ 'a set â‡’ 'a set" where
  "mk_regular1 P F I = I âˆª { F q x | q x. x âˆˆ I âˆ§ P q x }"

definition mk_regular2 :: "('b â‡’ 'a â‡’ 'a â‡’ bool) â‡’ ('b â‡’ 'a â‡’ 'a â‡’ 'a) â‡’ 'a set â‡’ 'a set" where
  "mk_regular2 P F I = I âˆª { F q x y | q x y. x âˆˆ I âˆ§ y âˆˆ I âˆ§ P q x y }"

lemma setmonotone_mk_regular1: "setmonotone (mk_regular1 P F)"
by (simp add: mk_regular1_def setmonotone_def)

lemma setmonotone_mk_regular2: "setmonotone (mk_regular2 P F)"
by (simp add: mk_regular2_def setmonotone_def)

lemma pointbased_mk_regular1: "pointbased (mk_regular1 P F)"
proof -
  let ?f = "Î» X. X âˆª { F q x | q x. x âˆˆ X âˆ§ P q x }"
  {
    fix I :: "'a set"
    have 1: "pointbase ?f I âŠ† mk_regular1 P F I"
      by (auto simp add: pointbase_def mk_regular1_def)
    have 2: "mk_regular1 P F I âŠ† pointbase ?f I"
      apply (simp add: pointbase_def mk_regular1_def)
      apply blast
      done
    from 1 2 have "pointbase ?f I = mk_regular1 P F I" by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    apply (subst pointbased_def)
    apply (rule_tac x="?f" in exI)
    by blast
qed

lemma pointbased_mk_regular2: "pointbased (mk_regular2 P F)"
proof -
  let ?f = "Î» X. X âˆª { F q x y | q x y. x âˆˆ X âˆ§ y âˆˆ X âˆ§ P q x y }"
  {
    fix I :: "'a set"
    have 1: "pointbase ?f I âŠ† mk_regular2 P F I"
      by (auto simp add: pointbase_def mk_regular2_def)
    have 2: "mk_regular2 P F I âŠ† pointbase ?f I"
      apply (auto simp add: pointbase_def mk_regular2_def)
      apply blast
      proof -
        fix q x y
        assume x: "x âˆˆ I"
        assume y: "y âˆˆ I"
        assume P: "P q x y"
        let ?X = "{x, y}"
        let ?A = "?X âˆª {F q x y |q x y. x âˆˆ ?X âˆ§ y âˆˆ ?X âˆ§ P q x y}"
        show "âˆƒA. (âˆƒX. A = X âˆª {F q x y |q x y. x âˆˆ X âˆ§ y âˆˆ X âˆ§ P q x y} âˆ§ 
          finite X âˆ§ X âŠ† I) âˆ§ F q x y âˆˆ A"
          apply (rule_tac x="?A" in exI)
          apply (rule conjI)
          apply (rule_tac x="?X" in exI)
          apply (auto simp add: x y)[1]
          using x y P by blast
      qed  
    from 1 2 have "pointbase ?f I = mk_regular2 P F I" by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    apply (subst pointbased_def)
    apply (rule_tac x="?f" in exI)
    by blast
qed

lemma regular1:"regular (mk_regular1 P F)"
by (simp add: pointbased_implies_continuous pointbased_mk_regular1 regular_def 
  setmonotone_mk_regular1)
  
lemma regular2: "regular (mk_regular2 P F)"
by (simp add: pointbased_implies_continuous pointbased_mk_regular2 regular_def 
  setmonotone_mk_regular2)

lemma continuous_comp: 
  assumes f: "continuous f"
  assumes g: "continuous g"
  shows "continuous (g o f)"
by (metis (no_types, lifting) comp_assoc comp_def continuous_def f g)

lemma setmonotone_comp:
  assumes f: "setmonotone f"
  assumes g: "setmonotone g"
  shows "setmonotone (g o f)"
by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) comp_def f g rev_subsetD setmonotone_def subsetI)

lemma regular_comp:
  assumes f: "regular f"
  assumes g: "regular g"
  shows "regular (g o f)"
using continuous_comp f g regular_def setmonotone_comp by blast

lemma setmonotone_id[simp]: "setmonotone id"
  by (simp add: id_def setmonotone_def)

lemma continuous_id[simp]: "continuous id"
  by (simp add: continuous_def)

lemma regular_id[simp]: "regular id"
  by (simp add: regular_def)

lemma regular_funpower: "regular f âŸ¹ regular (funpower f n)"
proof (induct n)
  case 0 thus ?case by (simp add: id_def[symmetric])
next
  case (Suc n) 
  have funpower: "funpower f (Suc n) = f o (funpower f n)"
    apply (rule ext)
    by simp
  with Suc show ?case
    by (auto simp only: funpower regular_comp)
qed

lemma mono_id[simp]: "mono id"
  by (simp add: mono_def id_def)

lemma mono_funpower:
  assumes mono: "mono f"
  shows "mono (funpower f n)"
proof (induct n)
  case 0 thus ?case by (simp add: id_def[symmetric])
next
  case (Suc n) 
  show ?case by (simp add: Suc.hyps mono monoD monoI)
qed    

lemma mono_limit:
  assumes mono: "mono f"
  shows "mono (limit f)"
proof(auto simp add: mono_def limit_def)
  fix A :: "'a set" 
  fix B :: "'a set"
  fix x
  assume subset: "A âŠ† B"
  assume "x âˆˆ natUnion (Î»n. funpower f n A)"
  then have "âˆƒ n. x âˆˆ funpower f n A" using elem_limit_simp limit_def by fastforce 
  then obtain n where n: "x âˆˆ funpower f n A" by blast
  then have mono: "mono (funpower f n)" by (simp add: mono mono_funpower)
  then have "x âˆˆ funpower f n B" by (meson contra_subsetD monoD n subset)  
  then show "x âˆˆ natUnion (Î»n. funpower f n B)" by (simp add: natUnion_elem) 
qed

lemma continuous_funpower:
  assumes continuous: "continuous f"
  shows "continuous (funpower f n)"
proof (induct n)
  case 0 thus ?case by (simp add: id_def[symmetric])
next
  case (Suc n)
  have mono: "mono (funpower f (Suc n))" 
    by (simp add: continuous continuous_imp_mono mono_funpower) 
  have chain: "âˆ€ C. chain C âŸ¶ chain ((funpower f (Suc n)) o C)"
    by (simp del: funpower.simps add: mono mono_maps_chain_to_chain) 
  have limit: "â‹€ C. chain C âŸ¹ (funpower f (Suc n)) (natUnion C) = 
      natUnion ((funpower f (Suc n)) o C)"
      apply simp
      apply (subst continuous_apply[OF Suc])
      apply simp
      apply (subst continuous_apply[OF continuous])
      apply (simp add: Suc.hyps continuous_imp_mono mono_maps_chain_to_chain)
      apply (rule arg_cong[where f="natUnion"])
      apply (rule ext)
      by simp
  from chain limit show ?case using continuous_def by blast
qed      

lemma natUnion_swap:
  "natUnion (Î» i. natUnion (Î» j. f i j)) = natUnion (Î» j. natUnion (Î» i. f i j))"
by (metis (no_types, lifting) natUnion_elem natUnion_upperbound subsetI subset_antisym)
      
lemma continuous_limit:
  assumes continuous: "continuous f"
  shows "continuous (limit f)"
proof -
  have mono: "mono (limit f)"
    by (simp add: continuous continuous_imp_mono mono_limit) 
  have chain: "â‹€ C. chain C âŸ¹ chain ((limit f) o C)"
    by (simp add: mono mono_maps_chain_to_chain)
  have "â‹€ C. chain C âŸ¹ (limit f) (natUnion C) = natUnion ((limit f) o C)"
  proof -
    fix C :: "nat â‡’ 'a set"
    assume chain_C: "chain C"
    have contpower: "â‹€ n. continuous (funpower f n)"
      by (simp add: continuous continuous_funpower) 
    have comp: "â‹€ n F. F o C = (Î» i. F (C i))"
      by auto    
    have "(limit f) (natUnion C) = natUnion (Î» n. funpower f n (natUnion C))"
      by (simp add: limit_def)
    also have "natUnion (Î» n. funpower f n (natUnion C)) = 
          natUnion (Î» n. natUnion ((funpower f n) o C))"
      apply (subst continuous_apply[OF contpower])
      apply (simp add: chain_C)+
      done
    also have "natUnion (Î» n. natUnion ((funpower f n) o C)) = 
      natUnion (Î» n. natUnion (Î» i. funpower f n (C i)))" 
      apply (subst comp)
      apply blast
      done
    also have "natUnion (Î» n. natUnion (Î» i. funpower f n (C i))) =
      natUnion (Î» i. natUnion (Î» n. funpower f n (C i)))"
      apply (subst natUnion_swap)
      apply blast
      done
    also have "natUnion (Î» i. natUnion (Î» n. funpower f n (C i))) = 
      (natUnion (Î» i. limit f (C i)))"
      apply (simp add: limit_def)
      done
    also have "natUnion (Î» i. limit f (C i)) = natUnion ((limit f) o C)"
      apply (subst comp)
      apply simp
      done
    finally show "(limit f) (natUnion C) = natUnion ((limit f) o C)" by blast
  qed
  with chain show ?thesis by (simp add: continuous_def)
qed   
      
lemma regular_limit: "regular f âŸ¹ regular (limit f)"
by (simp add: continuous_limit regular_def setmonotone_limit)

lemma regular_implies_mono: "regular f âŸ¹ mono f"
by (simp add: continuous_imp_mono regular_def)

lemma regular_implies_setmonotone: "regular f âŸ¹ setmonotone f"
by (simp add: regular_def)
  
lemma regular_implies_continuous: "regular f âŸ¹ continuous f"
by (simp add: regular_def)

end

Theory LocalLexingLemmas

theory LocalLexingLemmas
imports LocalLexing Limit
begin

context LocalLexing begin

lemma[simp]: "setmonotone (Append Z k)" by (auto simp add: Append_def setmonotone_def)

lemma subset_ğ’«Suc: "ğ’« k u âŠ† ğ’« k (Suc u)"
  by (simp add: subset_setmonotone[OF setmonotone_limit])

lemma subset_fSuc_strict:
  assumes f: "â‹€ u. f u âŠ† f (Suc u)"
  shows "u < v âŸ¹ f u âŠ† f v"
proof (induct v)
  show "u < 0 âŸ¹ f u âŠ† f 0"
    by auto
next
  fix v
  assume a:"(u < v âŸ¹ f u âŠ† f v)"
  assume b:"u < Suc v"
  from b have c: "f u âŠ† f v"
    apply (case_tac "u < v")
    apply (simp add: a)
    apply (case_tac "u = v")
    apply simp
    by auto
  show "f u âŠ† f (Suc v)"
    apply (rule subset_trans[OF c])
    by (rule f)
qed

lemma subset_fSuc:
  assumes f: "â‹€ u. f u âŠ† f (Suc u)"
  shows "u â‰¤ v âŸ¹ f u âŠ† f v"
  apply (case_tac "u < v")
  apply (rule subset_fSuc_strict[where f=f, OF f])
  by auto

lemma subset_ğ’«k: "u â‰¤ v âŸ¹ ğ’« k u âŠ† ğ’« k v"
  by (rule subset_fSuc, rule subset_ğ’«Suc) 
  
lemma subset_ğ’«ğ’¬k: "ğ’« k u âŠ† ğ’¬ k" by (auto simp add: natUnion_def)

lemma subset_ğ’¬ğ’«Suc: "ğ’¬ k âŠ† ğ’« (Suc k) u" 
proof -
  have a: "ğ’¬ k âŠ† ğ’« (Suc k) 0" by simp
  show ?thesis 
    apply (case_tac "u = 0")
    apply (simp add: a)
    apply (rule subset_trans[OF a subset_ğ’«k])
    by auto
qed

lemma subset_ğ’¬Suc: "ğ’¬ k âŠ† ğ’¬ (Suc k)"
  by (rule subset_trans[OF subset_ğ’¬ğ’«Suc subset_ğ’«ğ’¬k])

lemma subset_ğ’¬: "i â‰¤ j âŸ¹ ğ’¬ i âŠ† ğ’¬ j"
  by (rule subset_fSuc[where u=i and v=j and f = ğ’¬, OF subset_ğ’¬Suc])

lemma empty_ğ’³[simp]: "k > length Doc âŸ¹ ğ’³ k = {}"
  apply (simp add: ğ’³_def)
  apply (insert Lex_is_lexer)
  by (simp add: is_lexer_def)

lemma Sel_empty[simp]: "Sel {} {} = {}"
  apply (insert Sel_is_selector)
  by (auto simp add: is_selector_def)

lemma empty_ğ’µ[simp]: "k > length Doc âŸ¹ ğ’µ k u = {}"
  apply (induct u)
  by (simp_all add: ğ’´_def ğ’²_def)

lemma[simp]: "Append {} k = id" by (auto simp add: Append_def)

lemma[simp]: "k > length Doc âŸ¹ ğ’« k v = ğ’« k 0"
  by (induct v, simp_all add: ğ’´_def ğ’²_def)

lemma ğ’¬SucEq: "k â‰¥ length Doc âŸ¹ ğ’¬ (Suc k) = ğ’¬ k"
  by (simp add: natUnion_def) 

lemma ğ’¬_converges:
  assumes k: "k â‰¥ length Doc"
  shows "ğ’¬ k = ğ”“"
proof -
  { 
    fix n
    have "ğ’¬ (length Doc + n) = ğ”“"
    proof (induct n)
      show "ğ’¬ (length Doc + 0) = ğ”“" by (simp add: ğ”“_def)
    next
      fix n
      assume hyp: "ğ’¬ (length Doc + n) = ğ”“"
      have "ğ’¬ (Suc (length Doc + n)) = ğ”“"
        by (rule trans[OF ğ’¬SucEq hyp], auto)
      then show "ğ’¬ (length Doc + Suc n) = ğ”“"
        by auto
    qed
  }
  note helper = this
  from k have "âˆƒ n. k = length Doc + n" by presburger
  then obtain "n" where n: "k = length Doc + n" by blast
  then show ?thesis
    apply (simp only: n)
    by (rule helper)
qed

lemma ğ”“_covers_ğ’¬: "ğ’¬ k âŠ† ğ”“"
proof (case_tac "k â‰¥ length Doc")
  assume "k â‰¥ length Doc"
  then have ğ’¬: "ğ’¬ k = ğ”“" by (rule ğ’¬_converges)
  then show "ğ’¬ k âŠ† ğ”“" by (simp only: ğ’¬)
next
  assume "Â¬ length Doc â‰¤ k"
  then have "k < length Doc" by auto
  then show ?thesis
    apply (simp only: ğ”“_def)
    apply (rule subset_ğ’¬)
    by auto
qed

lemma Sel_upper_bound: "A âŠ† B âŸ¹ Sel A B âŠ† B"
  by (metis Sel_is_selector is_selector_def)

lemma Sel_lower_bound: "A âŠ† B âŸ¹ A âŠ† Sel A B"
  by (metis Sel_is_selector is_selector_def)  

lemma ğ”“_covers_ğ’«: "ğ’« k u âŠ† ğ”“"
  by (rule subset_trans[OF subset_ğ’«ğ’¬k ğ”“_covers_ğ’¬])

lemma ğ’²_montone: "P âŠ† Q âŸ¹ ğ’² P k âŠ† ğ’² Q k"
  by (auto simp add: ğ’²_def)

lemma Sel_precondition: 
  "ğ’µ k u âŠ† ğ’² (ğ’« k u) k"
proof (induct u)
  case 0 thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Suc u)
  have 1: "ğ’´ (ğ’µ k u) (ğ’« k u) k âŠ† ğ’² (ğ’« k u) k"
    apply (simp add: ğ’´_def)
    apply (rule_tac Sel_upper_bound)
    using Suc by simp
  have 2: "ğ’² (ğ’« k u) k âŠ† ğ’² (ğ’« k (Suc u)) k"
    by (metis ğ’²_montone subset_ğ’«Suc)    
  show ?case
    apply (rule_tac subset_trans[where B="ğ’² (ğ’« k u) k"])
    apply (simp add: 1)
    apply (simp only: 2)
    done
qed    

lemma ğ’²_bounded_by_ğ’³: "ğ’² P k âŠ† ğ’³ k"
  by (metis (no_types, lifting) ğ’²_def mem_Collect_eq subsetI)

lemma ğ’µ_subset_ğ’³: "ğ’µ k n âŠ† ğ’³ k"
  by (metis Sel_precondition ğ’²_bounded_by_ğ’³ rev_subsetD subsetI)

lemma ğ’µ_subset_Suc: "ğ’µ k n âŠ† ğ’µ k (Suc n)"
apply (induct n)
apply simp
by (metis Sel_lower_bound Sel_precondition ğ’´_def ğ’µ.simps(2))

lemma ğ’´_upper_bound: "ğ’´ (ğ’µ k u) (ğ’« k u) k âŠ† ğ’²  (ğ’« k u) k"
  apply (simp add: ğ’´_def)
  by (metis Sel_precondition Sel_upper_bound)

lemma ğ”“_induct[consumes 1, case_names Base Induct]:
  assumes p: "p âˆˆ ğ”“"
  assumes base: "P []"
  assumes induct: "â‹€ p k u. (â‹€ q. q âˆˆ ğ’« k u âŸ¹ P q) âŸ¹ p âˆˆ ğ’« k (Suc u) âŸ¹ P p"
  shows "P p"
proof -
  {
    fix p :: "tokens"
    fix k :: nat
    fix u :: nat
    have "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u âŸ¹ P p"
    proof (induct k arbitrary: p u)
      case 0
        have "p âˆˆ ğ’« 0 u âŸ¹ P p"
        proof (induct u arbitrary: p)
          case 0 thus ?case using base by simp
        next
          case (Suc u) show ?case
            apply (rule induct[OF _ Suc(2)])
            apply (rule Suc(1))
            by simp
        qed
        with 0 show ?case by simp
    next
      case (Suc k)
        have "p âˆˆ ğ’« (Suc k) u âŸ¹ P p"
        proof (induct u arbitrary: p)
          case 0 thus ?case
            apply simp
            apply (induct rule: natUnion_decompose) 
            using Suc by simp
        next
          case (Suc u) show ?case
            apply (rule induct[OF _ Suc(2)])
            apply (rule Suc(1))
            by simp
        qed
        with Suc show ?case by simp
    qed 
  }
  note all = this
  from p show ?thesis
    apply (simp add: ğ”“_def)
    apply (induct rule: natUnion_decompose)
    using all by simp
qed 
    
lemma Append_mono: "U âŠ† V âŸ¹ P âŠ† Q âŸ¹ Append U k P âŠ† Append V k Q"
  by (auto simp add: Append_def)

lemma pointwise_Append: "pointwise (Append T k)"
by (auto simp add: pointwise_def Append_def)

lemma regular_Append: "regular (Append T k)"
proof -
  have "pointwise (Append T k)" using pointwise_Append by blast
  then have "pointbased (Append T k)" using pointwise_implies_pointbased by blast
  then have "continuous (Append T k)" using pointbased_implies_continuous by blast 
  moreover have "setmonotone (Append T k)" by (simp add: setmonotone_def Append_def)
  ultimately show ?thesis using regular_def by blast
qed

end

end

Theory InductRules

theory InductRules
imports Main
begin

lemma disjCases2[consumes 1, case_names 1 2]:
  assumes AB: "A âˆ¨ B"
  and AP: "A âŸ¹ P"
  and BP: "B âŸ¹ P"
  shows "P"
proof -
  from AB AP BP show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma disjCases3[consumes 1, case_names 1 2 3]:
  assumes AB: "A âˆ¨ B âˆ¨ C"
  and AP: "A âŸ¹ P"
  and BP: "B âŸ¹ P"
  and CP: "C âŸ¹ P"
  shows "P"
proof -
  from AB AP BP CP show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma disjCases4[consumes 1, case_names 1 2 3 4]:
  assumes AB: "A âˆ¨ B âˆ¨ C âˆ¨ D"
  and AP: "A âŸ¹ P"
  and BP: "B âŸ¹ P"
  and CP: "C âŸ¹ P"
  and DP: "D âŸ¹ P"
  shows "P"
proof -
  from AB AP BP CP DP show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma disjCases5[consumes 1, case_names 1 2 3 4 5]:
  assumes AB: "A âˆ¨ B âˆ¨ C âˆ¨ D âˆ¨ E"
  and AP: "A âŸ¹ P"
  and BP: "B âŸ¹ P"
  and CP: "C âŸ¹ P"
  and DP: "D âŸ¹ P"
  and EP: "E âŸ¹ P"
  shows "P"
proof -
  from AB AP BP CP DP EP show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma minimal_witness_ex:
  assumes k: "P (k::nat)"
  shows "âˆƒ k0. k0 â‰¤ k âˆ§ P k0 âˆ§ (âˆ€ k. k < k0 âŸ¶ Â¬ (P k))" 
proof -
  let ?K = "{ h. h â‰¤ k âˆ§ P h }" 
  have finite_K: "finite ?K" by auto
  have "k âˆˆ ?K" by (simp add: k)
  then have nonempty_K: "?K â‰  {}" by auto
  let ?k = "Min ?K"
  have witness: "?k â‰¤ k âˆ§ P ?k"
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) Min_in finite_K mem_Collect_eq nonempty_K)
  have minimal: "âˆ€ h. h < ?k âŸ¶ Â¬ (P h)" 
    by (metis Min_le witness dual_order.strict_implies_order 
        dual_order.trans finite_K leD mem_Collect_eq)
  from witness minimal show ?thesis by metis 
qed

lemma minimal_witness[consumes 1, case_names Minimal]:
  assumes "P (k::nat)"
  and "â‹€ K. K â‰¤ k âŸ¹ P K âŸ¹ (â‹€ k. k < K âŸ¹ Â¬ (P k)) âŸ¹ Q"
  shows "Q"
proof -
  from assms minimal_witness_ex show ?thesis by metis
qed

lemma ex_minimal_witness[consumes 1, case_names Minimal]:
  assumes "âˆƒ k. P (k::nat)"
  and "â‹€ K. P K âŸ¹ (â‹€ k. k < K âŸ¹ Â¬ (P k)) âŸ¹ Q"
  shows "Q"
proof -
  from assms minimal_witness_ex show ?thesis by metis
qed

end

Theory ListTools

theory ListTools
imports Main
begin

definition is_first :: "'a â‡’ 'a list â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_first x u = (âˆƒ v. u = [x]@v)"

definition is_last :: "'a â‡’ 'a list â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_last x u = (âˆƒ v. u = v@[x])"

definition is_prefix :: "'a list â‡’ 'a list â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_prefix u v = (âˆƒ w. u@w = v)"

definition is_proper_prefix :: "'a list â‡’ 'a list â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_proper_prefix u v = (âˆƒ w. w â‰  [] âˆ§ u@w = v)"

lemma is_prefix_eq_proper_prefix: "is_prefix a b = (a = b âˆ¨ is_proper_prefix a b)"
by (metis append_Nil2 is_prefix_def is_proper_prefix_def)

lemma is_proper_prefix_eq_prefix: "is_proper_prefix a b = (a â‰  b âˆ§ is_prefix a b)"
by (metis append_self_conv is_prefix_eq_proper_prefix is_proper_prefix_def)

definition is_suffix :: "'a list â‡’ 'a list â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_suffix u v = (âˆƒ w. w@u = v)"

definition is_proper_suffix :: "'a list â‡’ 'a list â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_proper_suffix u v = (âˆƒ w. w â‰  [] âˆ§ w@u = v)"

lemma is_suffix_eq_proper_suffix: "is_suffix a b = (a = b âˆ¨ is_proper_suffix a b)"
by (metis append_Nil is_proper_suffix_def is_suffix_def)

lemma is_proper_suffix_eq_suffix: "is_proper_suffix a b = (a â‰  b âˆ§ is_suffix a b)"
by (metis is_proper_suffix_def is_suffix_eq_proper_suffix self_append_conv2)

lemma is_prefix_unsplit: "is_prefix u a âŸ¹ u @ (drop (length u) a) = a"
  by (metis append_eq_conv_conj is_prefix_def)

lemma le_take_same: "i â‰¤ j âŸ¹ take j a = take j b âŸ¹ take i a = take i b"
 by (metis min.absorb1 take_take)

lemma is_first_drop_length: 
  assumes "k â‰¤ length a" 
  and "k > length u"
  and "v = X#w" 
  and "take k a = take k (u@v)"
  shows "is_first X (drop (length u) a)"
proof -
  let ?d = "k - length u"
  from assms have pos_d': "?d > 0" by auto
  from assms have take_d'_v: "take ?d (drop (length u) a) = take ?d v"
    by (metis append_eq_conv_conj drop_take)
  then have "take 1 (drop (length u) a) = take 1 v"
    by (metis One_nat_def Suc_leI le_take_same pos_d')
  then have "take 1 (drop (length u) a) = [X]"
    by (simp add: assms)
  then show ?thesis
    by (metis append_take_drop_id is_first_def)
qed

lemma is_first_cons: "is_first x (y#ys) = (x = y)"
  by (auto simp add: is_first_def)

lemma list_all_pos_neg_ex: "list_all P D âŸ¹ Â¬ (list_all Q D) âŸ¹ 
       âˆƒ k. k < length D âˆ§ P(D ! k) âˆ§ Â¬(Q(D ! k))"
using list_all_length by blast

lemma split_list_at: "k < length D âŸ¹ D = (take k D)@[D ! k]@(drop (Suc k) D)"
  by (metis append_Cons append_Nil id_take_nth_drop)

lemma take_eq_take_append: "i â‰¤ j âŸ¹ j â‰¤ length a âŸ¹ âˆƒ u. take j a = take i a @ u"
  by (metis le_Suc_ex take_add)

lemma is_proper_suffix_length_cmp: "is_proper_suffix a b âŸ¹ length a < length b"
by (metis add_diff_cancel_right' append_Nil append_eq_append_conv 
  diff_is_0_eq is_proper_suffix_def leI length_append list.size(3))


end

Theory Derivations

theory Derivations
imports CFG ListTools InductRules
begin

(* leftderives and leftderives1 *)
context CFG begin

lemma [simp]: "is_terminal t âŸ¹ is_symbol t"
  by (auto simp add: is_terminal_def is_symbol_def)

lemma [simp]: "is_sentence []" by (auto simp add: is_sentence_def)

lemma [simp]: "is_word []" by (auto simp add: is_word_def)

lemma [simp]: "is_word u âŸ¹ is_sentence u"
  by (induct u, auto simp add: is_word_def is_sentence_def)

definition leftderives1 :: "sentence â‡’ sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "leftderives1 u v = 
     (âˆƒ x y N Î±. 
          u = x @ [N] @ y
        âˆ§ v = x @ Î± @ y
        âˆ§ is_word x
        âˆ§ is_sentence y
        âˆ§ (N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ)"  

lemma leftderives1_implies_derives1[simp]: "leftderives1 u v âŸ¹ derives1 u v"
  apply (auto simp add: leftderives1_def derives1_def)
  apply (rule_tac x="x" in exI)
  apply (rule_tac x="y" in exI)
  apply (rule_tac x="N" in exI)
  by auto

definition leftderivations1 :: "(sentence Ã— sentence) set"
where
  "leftderivations1 = { (u,v) | u v. leftderives1 u v }"

lemma [simp]: "leftderivations1 âŠ† derivations1"
  by (auto simp add: leftderivations1_def derivations1_def)

definition leftderivations :: "(sentence Ã— sentence) set"
where 
  "leftderivations = leftderivations1^*"

lemma rtrancl_subset_implies: "a âŠ† b âŸ¹ a âŠ† b^*" by blast

lemma leftderivations_subset_derivations[simp]: "leftderivations âŠ† derivations"
  apply (simp add: leftderivations_def derivations_def)
  apply (rule rtrancl_subset_rtrancl)
  apply (rule rtrancl_subset_implies)
  by simp

definition leftderives :: "sentence â‡’ sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "leftderives u v = ((u, v) âˆˆ leftderivations)"

lemma leftderives_implies_derives[simp]: "leftderives u v âŸ¹ derives u v"
  apply (auto simp add: leftderives_def derives_def)
  by (rule subsetD[OF leftderivations_subset_derivations])

definition is_leftderivation :: "sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "is_leftderivation u = leftderives [ğ”–] u"

lemma leftderivation_implies_derivation[simp]: 
  "is_leftderivation u âŸ¹ is_derivation u"
  by (simp add: is_leftderivation_def is_derivation_def)

lemma leftderives_refl[simp]: "leftderives u u"
  by (auto simp add: leftderives_def leftderivations_def)

lemma leftderives1_implies_leftderives[simp]:"leftderives1 a b âŸ¹ leftderives a b"
  by (auto simp add: leftderives_def leftderivations_def leftderivations1_def)

lemma leftderives_trans: "leftderives a b âŸ¹ leftderives b c âŸ¹ leftderives a c"
  by (auto simp add: leftderives_def leftderivations_def)

lemma leftderives1_eq_leftderivations1: "leftderives1 x y = ((x, y) âˆˆ leftderivations1)"
  by (simp add: leftderivations1_def)

lemma leftderives_induct[consumes 1, case_names Base Step]:
  assumes derives: "leftderives a b"
  assumes Pa: "P a"
  assumes induct: "â‹€y z. leftderives a y âŸ¹ leftderives1 y z âŸ¹ P y âŸ¹ P z"
  shows "P b"
proof -
  note rtrancl_lemma = rtrancl_induct[where a = a and b = b and r = leftderivations1 and P=P]
  from derives Pa induct rtrancl_lemma show "P b"
    by (metis leftderives_def leftderivations_def leftderives1_eq_leftderivations1)
qed

end

(* Basic lemmas about derives1 and derives *)
context CFG begin

lemma derives1_implies_derives[simp]:"derives1 a b âŸ¹ derives a b"
  by (auto simp add: derives_def derivations_def derivations1_def)

lemma derives_trans: "derives a b âŸ¹ derives b c âŸ¹ derives a c"
  by (auto simp add: derives_def derivations_def)

lemma derives1_eq_derivations1: "derives1 x y = ((x, y) âˆˆ derivations1)"
  by (simp add: derivations1_def)

lemma derives_induct[consumes 1, case_names Base Step]:
  assumes derives: "derives a b"
  assumes Pa: "P a"
  assumes induct: "â‹€y z. derives a y âŸ¹ derives1 y z âŸ¹ P y âŸ¹ P z"
  shows "P b"
proof -
  note rtrancl_lemma = rtrancl_induct[where a = a and b = b and r = derivations1 and P=P]
  from derives Pa induct rtrancl_lemma show "P b"
    by (metis derives_def derivations_def derives1_eq_derivations1)
qed

end

(* Derives1 and Derivation, LDerives1 and LDerivation *)
context CFG begin

definition Derives1 :: "sentence â‡’ nat â‡’ rule â‡’ sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "Derives1 u i r v = 
     (âˆƒ x y N Î±. 
          u = x @ [N] @ y
        âˆ§ v = x @ Î± @ y
        âˆ§ is_sentence x
        âˆ§ is_sentence y
        âˆ§ (N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ
        âˆ§ r = (N, Î±) âˆ§ i = length x)"  

lemma Derives1_split:
  "Derives1 u i r v âŸ¹ âˆƒ x y. u = x @ [fst r] @ y âˆ§ v = x @ (snd r) @ y âˆ§ length x = i"
by (metis Derives1_def fst_conv snd_conv)

lemma Derives1_implies_derives1: "Derives1 u i r v âŸ¹ derives1 u v"
  by (auto simp add: Derives1_def derives1_def)

lemma derives1_implies_Derives1: "derives1 u v âŸ¹ âˆƒ i r. Derives1 u i r v"
  by (auto simp add: Derives1_def derives1_def)

lemma Derives1_unique_dest: "Derives1 u i r v âŸ¹ Derives1 u i r w âŸ¹ v = w"
  by (auto simp add: Derives1_def derives1_def)

lemma Derives1_unique_src: "Derives1 u i r w âŸ¹ Derives1 v i r w âŸ¹ u = v"
  by (auto simp add: Derives1_def derives1_def)

type_synonym derivation = "(nat Ã— rule) list"

fun Derivation :: "sentence â‡’ derivation â‡’ sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "Derivation a [] b = (a = b)"
| "Derivation a (d#D) b = (âˆƒ x. Derives1 a (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ Derivation x D b)"

lemma Derivation_implies_derives: "Derivation a D b âŸ¹ derives a b"
proof (induct D arbitrary: a b)
  case Nil thus ?case 
    by (simp add: derives_def derivations_def)
next
  case (Cons d D)
    note ihyps = this
    from ihyps have "âˆƒ x. Derives1 a (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ Derivation x D b" by auto
    then obtain x where "Derives1 a (fst d) (snd d) x" and xb: "Derivation x D b" by blast
    with Derives1_implies_derives1 have d1: "derives a x" by auto
    from ihyps xb have d2:"derives x b" by simp
    show "derives a b" by (rule derives_trans[OF d1 d2])
qed 

lemma Derivation_Derives1: "Derivation a S y âŸ¹ Derives1 y i r z âŸ¹ Derivation a (S@[(i,r)]) z"
proof (induct S arbitrary: a y z i r)
  case Nil thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Cons s S) thus ?case 
    by (metis Derivation.simps(2) append_Cons) 
qed

lemma derives_implies_Derivation: "derives a b âŸ¹ âˆƒ D. Derivation a D b"
proof (induct rule: derives_induct)
  case Base
  show ?case by (rule exI[where x="[]"], simp)
next
  case (Step y z)
  note ihyps = this
  from ihyps obtain D where ay: "Derivation a D y" by blast
  from ihyps derives1_implies_Derives1 obtain i r where yz: "Derives1 y i r z" by blast
  from Derivation_Derives1[OF ay yz] show ?case by auto
qed
    
lemma Derives1_take: "Derives1 a i r b âŸ¹ take i a = take i b"
  by (auto simp add: Derives1_def)

lemma Derives1_drop: "Derives1 a i r b âŸ¹ drop (Suc i) a = drop (i + length (snd r)) b"
  by (auto simp add: Derives1_def)

lemma Derives1_bound: "Derives1 a i r b âŸ¹ i < length a"
  by (auto simp add: Derives1_def)

lemma Derives1_length: "Derives1 a i r b âŸ¹ length b = length a + length (snd r) - 1"
  by (auto simp add: Derives1_def)

definition leftmost :: "nat â‡’ sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "leftmost i s = (i < length s âˆ§ is_word (take i s) âˆ§ is_nonterminal (s ! i))" 

lemma set_take: "set (take n s) = { s ! i | i. i < n âˆ§ i < length s}"
proof (cases "n â‰¤ length s")
  case True thus ?thesis
  by (subst List.nth_image[symmetric], auto)
next
  case False thus ?thesis
    apply (subst set_conv_nth)
    by (metis less_trans linear not_le take_all)
qed
  
lemma list_all_take: "list_all P (take n s) = (âˆ€ i. i < n âˆ§ i < length s âŸ¶ P (s ! i))"
  by (auto simp add: set_take list_all_iff)

lemma is_sentence_concat: "is_sentence (x@y) = (is_sentence x âˆ§ is_sentence y)"
  by (auto simp add: is_sentence_def)

lemma is_sentence_cons: "is_sentence (x#xs) = (is_symbol x âˆ§ is_sentence xs)"
  by (auto simp add: is_sentence_def)

lemma rule_nonterminal_type[simp]: "(N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ âŸ¹ is_nonterminal N"
  apply (insert validRules)
  by (auto simp add: is_nonterminal_def)

lemma rule_Î±_type[simp]: "(N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ âŸ¹ is_sentence Î±"
  apply (insert validRules)
  by (auto simp add: is_sentence_def is_symbol_def list_all_iff is_terminal_def is_nonterminal_def)

lemma [simp]: "is_nonterminal N âŸ¹ is_symbol N"
  by (simp add: is_symbol_def)

lemma Derives1_sentence1[elim]: "Derives1 a i r b âŸ¹ is_sentence a"
  by (auto simp add: Derives1_def is_sentence_cons is_sentence_concat)

lemma Derives1_sentence2[elim]: "Derives1 a i r b âŸ¹ is_sentence b"
  by (auto simp add: Derives1_def is_sentence_cons is_sentence_concat)

lemma [elim]: "Derives1 a i r b âŸ¹ r âˆˆ â„œ"
  using Derives1_def by auto

lemma is_sentence_symbol: "is_sentence a âŸ¹ i < length a âŸ¹ is_symbol (a ! i)"
  by (simp add: is_sentence_def list_all_iff)

lemma is_symbol_distinct: "is_symbol x âŸ¹ is_terminal x â‰  is_nonterminal x"
  apply (insert disjunct_symbols)
  apply (auto simp add: is_symbol_def is_terminal_def is_nonterminal_def)
  done

lemma is_terminal_nonterminal: "is_terminal x âŸ¹ is_nonterminal x âŸ¹ False"
  by (metis is_symbol_def is_symbol_distinct)

lemma Derives1_leftmost:
  assumes "Derives1 a i r b"
  shows "âˆƒ j. leftmost j a âˆ§ j â‰¤ i"
proof -
  let ?J = "{j . j < length a âˆ§ is_nonterminal (a ! j)}"
  let ?M = "Min ?J"
  from assms have J1:"i âˆˆ ?J"
    apply (auto simp add: Derives1_def is_nonterminal_def)
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) prod.simps(2) validRules)
  have J2:"finite ?J" by auto
  note J = J1 J2
  from J have M1: "?M âˆˆ ?J" by (rule_tac Min_in, auto) 
  {
    fix j
    assume "j âˆˆ ?J"
    with J have "?M â‰¤ j" by auto
  }
  note M3 = this[OF J1]
  from assms have a_sentence: "is_sentence a" by (simp add: Derives1_sentence1)
  have is_word: "is_word (take ?M a)"
    apply (auto simp add: is_word_def list_all_take)
    proof -
      fix i
      assume i_less_M: "i < ?M"
      assume i_inbounds: "i < length a"
      show "is_terminal (a ! i)"
      proof(cases "is_terminal (a ! i)")
        case True thus ?thesis by auto
      next
        case False
        then have "is_nonterminal (a ! i)"
        using i_inbounds a_sentence is_sentence_symbol is_symbol_distinct by blast
        then have "i âˆˆ ?J" by (metis i_inbounds mem_Collect_eq) 
        then have "?M < i" by (metis J2 Min_le i_less_M leD) 
        then have "False" by (metis i_less_M less_asym') 
        then show ?thesis by auto
      qed
    qed  
  show ?thesis 
    apply (rule_tac exI[where x="?M"])
    apply (simp add: leftmost_def)
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) M1 M3 is_word mem_Collect_eq)
qed

lemma Derivation_leftmost: "D â‰  [] âŸ¹ Derivation a D b âŸ¹ âˆƒ i. leftmost i a"
  apply (case_tac "D")
  apply (auto)
  apply (metis Derives1_leftmost)
  done

lemma nonword_has_nonterminal:
  "is_sentence a âŸ¹  Â¬ (is_word a) âŸ¹ âˆƒ k. k < length a âˆ§ is_nonterminal (a ! k)"
  apply (auto simp add: is_sentence_def list_all_iff is_word_def)
  by (metis in_set_conv_nth is_symbol_distinct)

lemma leftmost_cons_nonterminal: 
  "is_nonterminal x âŸ¹ leftmost 0 (x#xs)"
by (metis CFG.is_word_def CFG_axioms leftmost_def length_greater_0_conv list.distinct(1) 
    list_all_simps(2) nth_Cons_0 take_Cons')

lemma leftmost_cons_terminal: 
  "is_terminal x âŸ¹ leftmost i (x#xs) = (i > 0 âˆ§ leftmost (i - 1) xs)"
by (metis Suc_diff_1 Suc_less_eq is_terminal_nonterminal is_word_def leftmost_def length_Cons 
    list_all_simps(1) not_gr0 nth_Cons' take_Cons')

lemma is_nonterminal_cons_terminal: 
  "is_terminal x âŸ¹ k < length (x # a) âŸ¹ is_nonterminal ((x # a) ! k) âŸ¹
   k > 0 âˆ§ k - 1 < length a âˆ§ is_nonterminal (a ! (k - 1))"
by (metis One_nat_def Suc_leI is_terminal_nonterminal less_diff_conv2 
    list.size(4) nth_non_equal_first_eq)

lemma leftmost_exists:
  "is_sentence a âŸ¹ k < length a âŸ¹ is_nonterminal (a ! k) âŸ¹ 
   âˆƒ i. leftmost i a âˆ§ i â‰¤ k" 
proof (induct a arbitrary: k)
  case Nil thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons x a) 
  show ?case
  proof(cases "is_nonterminal x")
    case True thus ?thesis
      apply(rule_tac exI[where x="0"])
      apply (simp add: leftmost_cons_nonterminal)
      done
  next
    case False
    then have x: "is_terminal x"
      by (metis Cons.prems(1) is_sentence_cons is_symbol_distinct)
    note k = is_nonterminal_cons_terminal[OF x Cons(3) Cons(4)]
    with Cons have "âˆƒi. leftmost i a âˆ§ i â‰¤ k - 1" by (metis is_sentence_cons)
    then show ?thesis
      apply (auto simp add: leftmost_cons_terminal[OF x])
      by (metis le_diff_conv2 Suc_leI add_Suc_right add_diff_cancel_right' k 
          le_0_eq le_imp_less_Suc nat_le_linear)
  qed
qed

lemma nonword_leftmost_exists: 
  "is_sentence a âŸ¹ Â¬ (is_word a) âŸ¹ âˆƒ i. leftmost i a"
  by (metis leftmost_exists nonword_has_nonterminal)
  
lemma leftmost_unaffected_Derives1: "leftmost j a âŸ¹ j < i âŸ¹ Derives1 a i r b âŸ¹ leftmost j b"
apply (simp add: leftmost_def)
proof -
  assume a1: "j < length a âˆ§ is_word (take j a) âˆ§ is_nonterminal (a ! j)"
  assume a2: "j < i"
  assume "Derives1 a i r b"
  then have f3: "take i a = take i b"
    by (metis Derives1_take)
  have f4: "â‹€n ss ssa. take (length (take n (ss::symbol list))) (ssa::symbol list) = take (length ss) (take n ssa)"
    by (metis length_take take_take)
  have f5: "â‹€ss. take j (ss::symbol list) = take i (take j ss)"
    using a2 by (metis dual_order.strict_implies_order min.absorb2 take_take)
  have f6: "length (take j a) = j"
    using a1 by (metis dual_order.strict_implies_order length_take min.absorb2)
  then have f7: "â‹€n. min j n = length (take n (take j a))"
    by (metis length_take)
  have f8: "â‹€n ss. n = length (take n (ss::symbol list)) âˆ¨ length ss < n"
    by (metis leI length_take min.absorb2)
  have f9: "â‹€ss. take j (ss::symbol list) = take j (take i ss)"
    using f7 f6 f5 by (metis take_take)
  have f10: "â‹€ss n. length (ss::symbol list) â‰¤ n âˆ¨ length (take n ss) = n"
    using f8 by (metis dual_order.strict_implies_order)
  then have f11: "â‹€ss ssa. length (ss::symbol list) = length (take (length ss) (ssa::symbol list)) âˆ¨ length (take (length ssa) ss) = length ssa"
    by (metis length_take min.absorb2)
  have f12: "â‹€ss ssa n. take (length (ss::symbol list)) (ssa::symbol list) = take n (take (length ss) ssa) âˆ¨ length (take n ss) = n"
    using f10 by (metis min.absorb2 take_take)
  { assume "Â¬ j < j"
    { assume "Â¬ j < j âˆ§ i â‰  j"
      moreover
      { assume "length a â‰  j âˆ§ length (take i a) â‰  i"
        then have "âˆƒss. length (take (length (take i (take (length a) (ss::symbol list)))) (take j ss)) â‰  length (take i (take (length a) ss))"
          using f12 f11 f6 f5 f4 by metis
        then have "âˆƒss ssa. take (length (ss::symbol list)) (take j (ssa::symbol list)) â‰  take (length ss) (take i (take (length a) ssa))"
          using f11 by metis
        then have "length b â‰  j"
          using f9 f4 f3 by metis }
      ultimately have "length b â‰  j"
        using f7 f6 f5 f3 a1 by (metis length_take) }
    then have "length b = j âŸ¶ j < j"
      using a2 by metis }
  then have "j < length b"
    using f9 f8 f7 f6 f4 f3 by metis
  then show "j < length b âˆ§ is_word (take j b) âˆ§ is_nonterminal (b ! j)"
    using f9 f3 a2 a1 by (metis nth_take)
qed

definition derivation_ge :: "derivation â‡’ nat â‡’ bool"
where
  "derivation_ge D i = (âˆ€ d âˆˆ set D. fst d â‰¥ i)"

lemma derivation_ge_cons: "derivation_ge (d#D) i = (fst d â‰¥ i âˆ§ derivation_ge D i)"
  by (auto simp add: derivation_ge_def)

lemma derivation_ge_append: 
  "derivation_ge (D@E) i = (derivation_ge D i âˆ§ derivation_ge E i)"
  by (auto simp add: derivation_ge_def)

lemma leftmost_unaffected_Derivation: 
  "derivation_ge D (Suc i) âŸ¹ leftmost i a âŸ¹ Derivation a D b âŸ¹ leftmost i b"
proof (induct D arbitrary: a)
  case Nil thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons d D) 
  then have "âˆƒ x. Derives1 a (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ Derivation x D b" by simp
  then obtain x where x1: "Derives1 a (fst d) (snd d) x" and x2: "Derivation x D b" by blast  
  with Cons have leftmost_x: "leftmost i x"
    apply (rule_tac leftmost_unaffected_Derives1[
           where a=a and j=i and b="x" and i="fst d" and r="snd d"])
    by (auto simp add: derivation_ge_def)
  with Cons x2 show ?case by (auto simp add: derivation_ge_def)
qed

lemma le_Derives1_take: 
  assumes le: "i â‰¤ j" 
  and D: "Derives1 a j r b"
  shows "take i a = take i b"
proof -
  note Derives1_take[where a=a and i=j and r=r and b=b]
  with le D show ?thesis by (rule_tac le_take_same[where i=i and j=j], auto)
qed  

lemma Derivation_take: "derivation_ge D i âŸ¹ Derivation a D b âŸ¹ take i a = take i b"
proof(induct D arbitrary: a b)
  case Nil thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons d D)
  then have "âˆƒ x. Derives1 a (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ Derivation x D b"
    by simp
  then obtain x where ax: "Derives1 a (fst d) (snd d) x" and xb: "Derivation x D b" by blast  
  from derivation_ge_cons Cons(2) have d: "i â‰¤ fst d" and D: "derivation_ge D i" by auto
  note take_i_xb = Cons(1)[OF D xb]
  note take_i_ax = le_Derives1_take[OF d ax]
  from take_i_xb take_i_ax show ?case by auto
qed

lemma leftmost_cons_less: "i < length u âŸ¹ leftmost i (u@v) = leftmost i u"
  by (auto simp add: leftmost_def nth_append)

lemma leftmost_is_nonterminal: "leftmost i u âŸ¹ is_nonterminal (u ! i)"
  by (metis leftmost_def)

lemma is_word_is_terminal: "i < length u âŸ¹ is_word u âŸ¹ is_terminal (u ! i)"
  by (metis is_word_def list_all_length)
  
lemma leftmost_append: 
  assumes leftmost: "leftmost i (u@v)"
  and is_word: "is_word u"
  shows "length u â‰¤ i"
proof (cases "i < length u")
  case False thus ?thesis by auto
next
  case True 
  with leftmost have "leftmost i u" using leftmost_cons_less[OF True] by simp
  then have is_nonterminal: "is_nonterminal (u ! i)" by (rule leftmost_is_nonterminal)
  note is_terminal = is_word_is_terminal[OF True is_word]
  note is_terminal_nonterminal[OF is_terminal is_nonterminal]
  then show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma derivation_ge_empty[simp]: "derivation_ge [] i" 
by (simp add: derivation_ge_def)

lemma leftmost_notword: "leftmost i a âŸ¹ j > i âŸ¹ Â¬ (is_word (take j a))"
by (metis is_terminal_nonterminal is_word_def leftmost_def list_all_take)

lemma leftmost_unique: "leftmost i a âŸ¹ leftmost j a âŸ¹ i = j" 
by (metis leftmost_def leftmost_notword linorder_neqE_nat)

lemma leftmost_Derives1: "leftmost i a âŸ¹ Derives1 a j r b âŸ¹ i â‰¤ j"
by (metis Derives1_leftmost leftmost_unique)

lemma leftmost_Derives1_propagate: 
  assumes leftmost: "leftmost i a"
      and Derives1: "Derives1 a j r b"
    shows "(is_word b âˆ§ i = j) âˆ¨ (âˆƒ k. leftmost k b âˆ§ i â‰¤ k)"
proof -
  from leftmost_Derives1[OF leftmost Derives1] have ij: "i â‰¤ j" by auto
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "is_word b")
    case True show ?thesis
      by (metis Derives1 True ij le_neq_implies_less leftmost 
          leftmost_unaffected_Derives1 order_refl)
  next
    case False show ?thesis
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) Derives1 Derives1_bound Derives1_sentence2 
          Derives1_take append_take_drop_id ij le_neq_implies_less leftmost 
          leftmost_append leftmost_cons_less leftmost_def length_take 
          min.absorb2 nat_le_linear nonword_leftmost_exists not_le)
  qed
qed

lemma is_word_Derives1[elim]: "is_word a âŸ¹ Derives1 a i r b âŸ¹ False"
by (metis Derives1_leftmost is_terminal_nonterminal is_word_is_terminal leftmost_def)
  
lemma is_word_Derivation[elim]: "is_word a âŸ¹ Derivation a D b âŸ¹ D = []"
by (metis Derivation_leftmost is_terminal_nonterminal is_word_def 
    leftmost_def list_all_length)
 
lemma leftmost_Derivation: 
  "leftmost i a âŸ¹ Derivation a D b âŸ¹ j â‰¤ i âŸ¹ derivation_ge D j"
proof (induct D arbitrary: a b i j)
  case Nil thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons d D)
  then have "âˆƒ x. Derives1 a (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ Derivation x D b" by auto
  then obtain x where ax:"Derives1 a (fst d) (snd d) x" and xb:"Derivation x D b" by blast
  note ji = Cons(4)
  note i_fstd = leftmost_Derives1[OF Cons(2) ax]
  note disj = leftmost_Derives1_propagate[OF Cons(2) ax]
  thus ?case
  proof(induct rule: disjCases2)
    case 1 
    with xb have "D = []" by auto
    with 1 ji show ?case by (simp add: derivation_ge_def)
  next
    case 2 
    then obtain k where k: "leftmost k x" and ik: "i â‰¤ k" by blast
    note ge = Cons(1)[OF k xb, where j=j]
    from ji ik i_fstd ge show ?case
      by (simp add: derivation_ge_cons)
  qed
qed

lemma derivation_ge_list_all: "derivation_ge D i = list_all (Î» d. fst d â‰¥ i) D"
by (simp add: Ball_set derivation_ge_def)

lemma split_derivation_leftmost:
  assumes "derivation_ge D i"
  and "Â¬ (derivation_ge D (Suc i))"
  shows "âˆƒ E F r. D = E@[(i, r)]@F âˆ§ derivation_ge E (Suc i)"
proof -
  from assms have "âˆƒ k. k < length D âˆ§ fst(D ! k) â‰¥ i âˆ§ Â¬(fst(D ! k) â‰¥ Suc i)"
    by (metis derivation_ge_def in_set_conv_nth)
  then have "âˆƒ k. k < length D âˆ§ fst(D ! k) = i" by auto
  then show ?thesis
  proof(induct rule: ex_minimal_witness)
    case (Minimal k)
      then have k_len: "k < length D" and k_i: "fst (D ! k) = i" by auto
      let ?E = "take k D"
      let ?r = "snd (D ! k)"
      let ?F = "drop (Suc k) D"
      note split = split_list_at[OF k_len]
      from k_i have D_k: "D ! k = (i, ?r)" by auto
      show ?case
        apply (rule exI[where x="?E"])
        apply (rule exI[where x="?F"])
        apply (rule exI[where x="?r"])
        apply (subst D_k[symmetric])
        apply (rule conjI)
        apply (rule split)
        by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) Minimal.hyps(2) Suc_leI assms(1) 
            derivation_ge_list_all le_neq_implies_less list_all_length list_all_take)
  qed
qed

lemma Derives1_Derives1_swap:
  assumes "i < j"
  and "Derives1 a j p b"
  and "Derives1 b i q c"
  shows "âˆƒ b'. Derives1 a i q b' âˆ§ Derives1 b' (j - 1 + length (snd q)) p c"
proof -
  from Derives1_split[OF assms(2)] obtain a1 a2 where
    a_src: "a = a1 @ [fst p] @ a2" and a_dest: "b = a1 @ snd p @ a2" 
    and a1_len: "length a1 = j" by blast
  note a = this
  from a have is_sentence_a1: "is_sentence a1"
    using Derives1_sentence2 assms(2) is_sentence_concat by blast
  from a have is_sentence_a2: "is_sentence a2"
    using Derives1_sentence2 assms(2) is_sentence_concat by blast
  from a have is_symbol_fst_p:  "is_symbol (fst p)"
    by (metis Derives1_sentence1 assms(2) is_sentence_concat is_sentence_cons)
  from Derives1_split[OF assms(3)] obtain b1 b2 where
    b_src: "b = b1 @ [fst q] @ b2" and b_dest: "c = b1 @ snd q @ b2" 
    and b1_len: "length b1 = i" by blast
  have a_take_j: "a1 = take j a" by (metis a1_len a_src append_eq_conv_conj) 
  have b_take_i: "b1 @ [fst q] = take (Suc i) b"
    by (metis append_assoc append_eq_conv_conj b1_len b_src length_append_singleton) 
  from a_take_j b_take_i  take_eq_take_append[where j=j and i="Suc i" and a=a]
  have "âˆƒ u. a1 = (b1 @ [fst q]) @ u"
    by (metis le_iff_add Suc_leI a1_len a_dest append_eq_conv_conj assms(1) take_add) 
  then obtain u where u1: "a1 = (b1 @ [fst q]) @ u" by blast
  then have j_i_u: "j = i + 1 + length u"
    using Suc_eq_plus1 a1_len b1_len length_append length_append_singleton by auto
  from u1 is_sentence_a1 have is_sentence_b1_u: "is_sentence b1 âˆ§ is_sentence u"
    using is_sentence_concat by blast    
  have u2: "b2 = u @ snd p @ a2" by (metis a_dest append_assoc b_src same_append_eq u1) 
  let ?b = "b1 @ (snd q) @ u @ [fst p] @ a2"
  from assms have q_dom: "q âˆˆ â„œ" by auto
  have a_b': "Derives1 a i q ?b"
    apply (subst Derives1_def)
    apply (rule exI[where x="b1"])
    apply (rule exI[where x="u@[fst p]@a2"])
    apply (rule exI[where x="fst q"])
    apply (rule exI[where x="snd q"])
    apply (auto simp add: b1_len is_sentence_cons is_sentence_concat
           is_sentence_a2 is_symbol_fst_p is_sentence_b1_u a_src u1 q_dom)
    done
  from assms have p_dom: "p âˆˆ â„œ" by auto
  have is_sentence_snd_q: "is_sentence (snd q)" 
    using Derives1_sentence2 a_b' is_sentence_concat by blast
  have b'_c: "Derives1 ?b (j - 1 + length (snd q)) p c"
    apply (subst Derives1_def)
    apply (rule exI[where x="b1 @ (snd q) @ u"])
    apply (rule exI[where x="a2"])
    apply (rule exI[where x="fst p"])
    apply (rule exI[where x="snd p"])
    apply (auto simp add: is_sentence_concat is_sentence_b1_u is_sentence_a2 p_dom
           is_sentence_snd_q b_dest u2 b1_len j_i_u)
    done
  show ?thesis
    apply (rule exI[where x="?b"])
    apply (rule conjI)
    apply (rule a_b')
    apply (rule b'_c)
    done
qed

definition derivation_shift :: "derivation â‡’ nat â‡’ nat â‡’ derivation"
where
  "derivation_shift D left right = map (Î» d. (fst d - left + right, snd d)) D"

lemma derivation_shift_empty[simp]: "derivation_shift [] left right = []" 
  by (auto simp add: derivation_shift_def)

lemma derivation_shift_cons[simp]:
  "derivation_shift (d#D) left right = ((fst d - left + right, snd d)#(derivation_shift D left right))"
by (simp add: derivation_shift_def)

lemma Derivation_append: "Derivation a (D@E) c = (âˆƒ b. Derivation a D b âˆ§ Derivation b E c)"
proof(induct D arbitrary: a c E)
  case Nil thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons d D) thus ?case by auto
qed

lemma Derivation_implies_append: 
  "Derivation a D b âŸ¹ Derivation b E c âŸ¹ Derivation a (D@E) c"
using Derivation_append by blast

lemma Derivation_swap_single_end_to_front: 
  "i < j âŸ¹ derivation_ge D j âŸ¹ Derivation a (D@[(i,r)]) b âŸ¹
   Derivation a ((i,r)#(derivation_shift D 1 (length (snd r)))) b"
proof(induct D arbitrary: a)
  case Nil thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons d D) 
  from Cons have "âˆƒ c. Derives1 a (fst d) (snd d) c âˆ§ Derivation c (D @ [(i, r)]) b"
    by simp
  then obtain c where ac: "Derives1 a (fst d) (snd d) c"
    and cb: "Derivation c (D @ [(i, r)]) b" by blast
  from Cons(3) have D_j: "derivation_ge D j" by (simp add: derivation_ge_cons)
  from Cons(1)[OF Cons(2) D_j cb, simplified]
  obtain x where cx: "Derives1 c i r x" and  
    xb: "Derivation x (derivation_shift D 1 (length (snd r))) b" by auto
  have i_fst_d: "i < fst d" using Cons derivation_ge_cons by auto
  from Derives1_Derives1_swap[OF i_fst_d ac cx]
  obtain b' where ab': "Derives1 a i r b'" and 
    b'x: "Derives1 b' (fst d - 1 + length (snd r)) (snd d) x" by blast
  show ?case using ab' b'x xb by auto
qed    

lemma Derivation_swap_single_mid_to_front: 
  assumes "i < j"
  and "derivation_ge D j" 
  and "Derivation a (D@[(i,r)]@E) b"
  shows "Derivation a ((i,r)#((derivation_shift D 1 (length (snd r)))@E)) b"
proof -
  from assms have "âˆƒ x. Derivation a (D@[(i, r)]) x âˆ§ Derivation x E b"
    using Derivation_append by auto
  then obtain x where ax: "Derivation a (D@[(i, r)]) x" and xb: "Derivation x E b"
    by blast
  with assms have "Derivation a ((i, r)#(derivation_shift D 1 (length (snd r)))) x"
    using Derivation_swap_single_end_to_front by blast
  then show ?thesis using Derivation_append xb by auto
qed

lemma length_derivation_shift[simp]: 
  "length(derivation_shift D left right) = length D"
  by (simp add: derivation_shift_def)

definition LeftDerives1 :: "sentence â‡’ nat â‡’ rule â‡’ sentence â‡’ bool"
where 
  "LeftDerives1 u i r v = (leftmost i u âˆ§ Derives1 u i r v)"

lemma LeftDerives1_implies_leftderives1: "LeftDerives1 u i r v âŸ¹ leftderives1 u v"
by (metis Derives1_def LeftDerives1_def append_eq_conv_conj leftderives1_def 
    leftmost_def)
    
lemma leftmost_Derives1_leftderives: 
  "leftmost i a âŸ¹ Derives1 a i r b âŸ¹ leftderives b c âŸ¹ leftderives a c"
using LeftDerives1_def LeftDerives1_implies_leftderives1 
  leftderives1_implies_leftderives leftderives_trans by blast

theorem Derivation_implies_leftderives_gen:
  "Derivation a D (u@v) âŸ¹ is_word u âŸ¹ (âˆƒ w. 
          leftderives a (u@w) âˆ§ 
          (v = [] âŸ¶ w = []) âˆ§ 
          (âˆ€ X. is_first X v âŸ¶ is_first X w))"
proof (induct "length D" arbitrary: D a u v)
  case 0
    then have "a = u@v" by auto
    thus ?case by (rule_tac x = v in exI, auto)
next
  case (Suc n)
    from Suc have "D â‰  []" by auto
    with Suc Derivation_leftmost have "âˆƒ i. leftmost i a" by auto
    then obtain i where i: "leftmost i a" by blast
    show "?case"
    proof (cases "derivation_ge D (Suc i)")
      case True
        with Suc have leftmost: "leftmost i (u@v)" 
          by (rule_tac leftmost_unaffected_Derivation[OF True i], auto)
        have length_u: "length u â‰¤ i" 
          using leftmost_append[OF leftmost Suc(4)] .
        have take_Suc: "take (Suc i) a = take (Suc i) (u@v)" 
          using  Derivation_take[OF True Suc(3)] .
        with length_u have is_prefix_u: "is_prefix u a"
          by (metis append_assoc append_take_drop_id dual_order.strict_implies_order 
              is_prefix_def le_imp_less_Suc take_all take_append)  
        have a: "u @ drop (length u) a = a" 
          using is_prefix_unsplit[OF is_prefix_u] .
        from take_Suc have length_take_Suc: "length (take (Suc i) a) = Suc i"
          by (metis Suc_leI i leftmost_def length_take min.absorb2)
        have v: "v â‰  []"
        proof(cases "v = []")
          case False thus ?thesis by auto
        next
          case True
          with length_u have right: "length(take (Suc i) (u@v)) = length u" by simp
          note left = length_take_Suc
          from left right take_Suc have "Suc i = length u" by auto
          with length_u show ?thesis by auto
        qed
        then have "âˆƒ X w. v = X#w" by (cases v, auto)
        then obtain X w where v: "v = X#w" by blast
        have is_first_X: "is_first X (drop (length u) a)"
          apply (rule_tac is_first_drop_length[where v=v and w=w and k="Suc i"])
          apply (simp_all add: take_Suc v)
          apply (metis Suc_leI i leftmost_def)
          apply (insert length_u)
          apply arith
          done
        show ?thesis
          apply (rule exI[where x="drop (length u) a"])
          by (simp add: a v is_first_cons is_first_X)
    next
      case False
      have Di: "derivation_ge D i" 
      using leftmost_Derivation[OF i Suc(3), where j=i, simplified] .
      from split_derivation_leftmost[OF Di False]
      obtain E F r where D_split: "D = E @ [(i, r)] @ F" 
        and E_Suc: "derivation_ge E (Suc i)" by auto
      let ?D = "(derivation_shift E 1 (length (snd r)))@F"
      from D_split 
      have "Derivation a ((i,r) # ?D) (u @ v)"
        using Derivation_swap_single_mid_to_front E_Suc Suc.prems(1) lessI by blast
      then have "âˆƒ y. Derives1 a i r y âˆ§ Derivation y ?D (u @ v)" by simp
      then obtain y where ay:"Derives1 a i r y" 
        and yuv: "Derivation y ?D (u @ v)" by blast
      have length_D': "length ?D = n" using D_split Suc.hyps(2) by auto
      from Suc(1)[OF length_D'[symmetric] yuv Suc(4)] 
      obtain w where "leftderives y (u @ w)" and "(v = [] âŸ¶ w = [])" 
        and "âˆ€X. is_first X v âŸ¶ is_first X w" by blast 
      then show ?thesis using ay i leftmost_Derives1_leftderives by blast
    qed    
qed   

lemma derives_implies_leftderives_gen: "derives a (u@v) âŸ¹ is_word u âŸ¹ (âˆƒ w. 
          leftderives a (u@w) âˆ§ 
          (v = [] âŸ¶ w = []) âˆ§ 
          (âˆ€ X. is_first X v âŸ¶ is_first X w))"
using Derivation_implies_leftderives_gen derives_implies_Derivation by blast

lemma derives_implies_leftderives: "derives a b âŸ¹ is_word b âŸ¹ leftderives a b"
using derives_implies_leftderives_gen by force

fun LeftDerivation :: "sentence â‡’ derivation â‡’ sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "LeftDerivation a [] b = (a = b)"
| "LeftDerivation a (d#D) b = (âˆƒ x. LeftDerives1 a (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ LeftDerivation x D b)"
  
lemma LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1: "LeftDerives1 a i r b âŸ¹ Derives1 a i r b"
by (metis LeftDerives1_def)

lemma LeftDerivation_implies_Derivation:
  "LeftDerivation a D b âŸ¹ Derivation a D b"
proof (induct D arbitrary: a)
  case (Nil) thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Cons d D)
  thus ?case
  using CFG.LeftDerivation.simps(2) CFG_axioms Derivation.simps(2) 
    LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 by blast 
qed

lemma LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives: "LeftDerivation a D b âŸ¹ leftderives a b"
proof (induct D arbitrary: a b)
  case Nil thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Cons d D)
    note ihyps = this
    from ihyps have "âˆƒ x. LeftDerives1 a (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ LeftDerivation x D b" by auto
    then obtain x where "LeftDerives1 a (fst d) (snd d) x" and xb: "LeftDerivation x D b" by blast
    with LeftDerives1_implies_leftderives1 have d1: "leftderives a x" by auto
    from ihyps xb have d2:"leftderives x b" by simp
    show "leftderives a b" by (rule leftderives_trans[OF d1 d2])
qed 

lemma leftmost_witness[simp]: "leftmost (length x) (x@(N#y)) = (is_word x âˆ§ is_nonterminal N)"
  by (auto simp add: leftmost_def)

lemma leftderives1_implies_LeftDerives1: 
  assumes leftderives1: "leftderives1 u v"
  shows "âˆƒ i r. LeftDerives1 u i r v"
proof -
  from leftderives1 have 
    "âˆƒx y N Î±. u = x @ [N] @ y âˆ§ v = x @ Î± @ y âˆ§ is_word x âˆ§ is_sentence y âˆ§ (N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ"
    by (simp add: leftderives1_def)
  then obtain x y N Î± where 
    u:"u = x @ [N] @ y" and
    v:"v = x @ Î± @ y" and
    x:"is_word x" and  
    y:"is_sentence y" and 
    r:"(N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ"
    by blast
  show ?thesis
    apply (rule_tac x="length x" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="(N, Î±)" in exI)
    apply (auto simp add: LeftDerives1_def)
    apply (simp add: leftmost_def x u rule_nonterminal_type[OF r])
    apply (simp add: Derives1_def u v)
    apply (rule_tac x=x in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x=y in exI)
    apply (auto simp add: x y r)
    done
qed    

lemma LeftDerivation_LeftDerives1: 
  "LeftDerivation a S y âŸ¹ LeftDerives1 y i r z âŸ¹ LeftDerivation a (S@[(i,r)]) z"
proof (induct S arbitrary: a y z i r)
  case Nil thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Cons s S) thus ?case 
    by (metis LeftDerivation.simps(2) append_Cons) 
qed

lemma leftderives_implies_LeftDerivation: "leftderives a b âŸ¹ âˆƒ D. LeftDerivation a D b"
proof (induct rule: leftderives_induct)
  case Base
  show ?case by (rule exI[where x="[]"], simp)
next
  case (Step y z)
  note ihyps = this
  from ihyps obtain D where ay: "LeftDerivation a D y" by blast
  from ihyps leftderives1_implies_LeftDerives1 obtain i r where yz: "LeftDerives1 y i r z" by blast
  from LeftDerivation_LeftDerives1[OF ay yz] show ?case by auto
qed

lemma LeftDerivation_append: 
  "LeftDerivation a (D@E) c = (âˆƒ b. LeftDerivation a D b âˆ§ LeftDerivation b E c)"
proof(induct D arbitrary: a c E)
  case Nil thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons d D) thus ?case by auto
qed

lemma LeftDerivation_implies_append: 
  "LeftDerivation a D b âŸ¹ LeftDerivation b E c âŸ¹ LeftDerivation a (D@E) c"
using LeftDerivation_append by blast

lemma Derivation_unique_dest: "Derivation a D b âŸ¹ Derivation a D c âŸ¹ b = c"
  apply (induct D arbitrary: a b c)
  apply auto
  using Derives1_unique_dest by blast

lemma Derivation_unique_src: "Derivation a D c âŸ¹ Derivation b D c âŸ¹ a = b"
  apply (induct D arbitrary: a b c)
  apply auto
  using Derives1_unique_src by blast

lemma LeftDerives1_unique: "LeftDerives1 a i r b âŸ¹ LeftDerives1 a j s b âŸ¹ i = j âˆ§ r = s"
using Derives1_def LeftDerives1_def leftmost_unique by auto
 
lemma leftlang: "â„’ = { v | v. is_word v âˆ§ is_leftderivation v }"
by (metis (no_types, lifting) CFG.is_derivation_def CFG.is_leftderivation_def 
    CFG.leftderivation_implies_derivation CFG_axioms Collect_cong 
    â„’_def derives_implies_leftderives)
  
lemma leftprefixlang:  "â„’â‡©P = { u | u v. is_word u âˆ§ is_leftderivation (u@v) }"
apply (auto simp add: â„’â‡©P_def)
using derives_implies_leftderives_gen is_derivation_def is_leftderivation_def apply blast
using leftderivation_implies_derivation by blast

lemma derives_implies_leftderives_cons:
  "is_word a âŸ¹ derives u (a@X#b) âŸ¹ âˆƒ c. leftderives u  (a@X#c)"
by (metis append_Cons append_Nil derives_implies_leftderives_gen is_first_def) 

lemma is_word_append[simp]: "is_word (a@b) = (is_word a âˆ§ is_word b)"
  by (auto simp add: is_word_def)

lemma â„’â‡©P_split: "a@b âˆˆ â„’â‡©P âŸ¹ a âˆˆ â„’â‡©P"
  by (auto simp add: â„’â‡©P_def)

lemma â„’â‡©P_is_word: "a âˆˆ â„’â‡©P âŸ¹ is_word a"
  by (metis (no_types, lifting) leftprefixlang mem_Collect_eq)

definition Derive :: "sentence â‡’ derivation â‡’ sentence"
where 
  "Derive a D = (THE b. Derivation a D b)"

lemma Derivation_dest_ex_unique: "Derivation a D b âŸ¹ âˆƒ! x. Derivation a D x"
using CFG.Derivation_unique_dest CFG_axioms by blast

lemma Derive:
  assumes ab: "Derivation a D b"
  shows "Derive a D = b"
proof -
  note the1_equality[OF Derivation_dest_ex_unique[OF ab] ab]
  thus ?thesis by (simp add: Derive_def)
qed

end

end

Theory Validity

theory Validity 
imports LLEarleyParsing Derivations
begin

context LocalLexing begin

definition wellformed_token :: "token â‡’ bool"
where
  "wellformed_token t = is_terminal (terminal_of_token t)"

definition wellformed_tokens :: "tokens â‡’ bool"
where
  "wellformed_tokens ts = list_all wellformed_token ts"

definition doc_tokens :: "tokens â‡’ bool"
where
  "doc_tokens p = (wellformed_tokens p âˆ§ is_prefix (chars p) Doc)"

definition wellformed_item :: "item â‡’ bool"
where 
  "wellformed_item x = (
    item_rule x âˆˆ â„œ âˆ§ 
    item_origin x â‰¤ item_end x âˆ§ 
    item_end x â‰¤ length Doc âˆ§
    item_dot x â‰¤ length (item_rhs x))"

definition wellformed_items :: "items â‡’ bool"
where
  "wellformed_items X = (âˆ€ x âˆˆ X. wellformed_item x)"

lemma is_word_terminals: "wellformed_tokens p âŸ¹ is_word (terminals p)"
by (simp add: is_word_def list_all_length terminals_def wellformed_token_def wellformed_tokens_def)

lemma is_word_subset: "is_word x âŸ¹ set y âŠ† set x âŸ¹ is_word y"
by (metis (mono_tags, hide_lams) in_set_conv_nth is_word_def list_all_length subsetCE)
 
lemma is_word_terminals_take: "wellformed_tokens p âŸ¹ is_word(terminals (take n p))"
by (metis append_take_drop_id is_word_terminals list_all_append wellformed_tokens_def)

lemma is_word_terminals_drop: "wellformed_tokens p âŸ¹ is_word(terminals (drop n p))"
by (metis append_take_drop_id is_word_terminals list_all_append wellformed_tokens_def)

definition pvalid :: "tokens â‡’ item â‡’ bool"
where
  "pvalid p x = (âˆƒ u Î³.
     wellformed_tokens p âˆ§
     wellformed_item x âˆ§
     u â‰¤ length p âˆ§
     charslength p = item_end x âˆ§
     charslength (take u p) = item_origin x âˆ§
     is_derivation (terminals (take u p) @ [item_nonterminal x] @ Î³) âˆ§
     derives (item_Î± x) (terminals (drop u p)))"

definition Gen :: "tokens set â‡’ items"
where
  "Gen P = { x | x p. p âˆˆ P âˆ§ pvalid p x }"

lemma "wellformed_items (Gen P)"
  by (auto simp add: Gen_def pvalid_def wellformed_items_def)

lemma "wellformed_items (Init)"
  by (auto simp add: wellformed_items_def Init_def init_item_def wellformed_item_def)

definition pvalid_left :: "tokens â‡’ item â‡’ bool"
where
  "pvalid_left p x = (âˆƒ u Î³.
     wellformed_tokens p âˆ§
     wellformed_item x âˆ§
     u â‰¤ length p âˆ§
     charslength p = item_end x âˆ§
     charslength (take u p) = item_origin x âˆ§
     is_leftderivation (terminals (take u p) @ [item_nonterminal x] @ Î³) âˆ§
     leftderives (item_Î± x) (terminals (drop u p)))"

lemma pvalid_left: "pvalid p x = pvalid_left p x"
proof -
  have right_imp_left: "pvalid_left p x âŸ¹ pvalid p x"
    by (meson CFG.leftderives_implies_derives CFG_axioms LocalLexing.pvalid_def 
        LocalLexing.pvalid_left_def LocalLexing_axioms leftderivation_implies_derivation)
  have left_imp_right: "pvalid p x âŸ¹ pvalid_left p x"
  proof -
    assume "pvalid p x"
    then obtain u Î³ where 
      "wellformed_tokens p âˆ§
       wellformed_item x âˆ§
       u â‰¤ length p âˆ§
       charslength p = item_end x âˆ§
       charslength (take u p) = item_origin x âˆ§
       is_derivation (terminals (take u p) @ [item_nonterminal x] @ Î³) âˆ§
       derives (item_Î± x) (terminals (drop u p))" by (simp add: pvalid_def, blast)
    thus ?thesis
      apply (auto simp add: pvalid_left_def)
      apply (rule_tac x=u in exI)
      apply auto
      apply (simp add: is_leftderivation_def)
      apply (rule_tac derives_implies_leftderives_cons[where b=Î³])
      apply (erule is_word_terminals_take)
      apply (simp add: is_derivation_def)
      by (metis derives_implies_leftderives is_word_terminals_drop)
  qed
  show ?thesis by (metis left_imp_right right_imp_left)
qed
  
lemma â„’â‡©P_wellformed_tokens: "terminals p âˆˆ â„’â‡©P âŸ¹ wellformed_tokens p"
by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) â„’â‡©P_is_word is_word_def length_map list_all_length 
    nth_map terminals_def wellformed_token_def wellformed_tokens_def)

end

end

Theory TheoremD2

theory TheoremD2
imports LocalLexingLemmas Validity Derivations
begin

context LocalLexing begin

definition splits_at :: "sentence â‡’ nat â‡’ sentence â‡’ symbol â‡’ sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î² = (i < length Î´ âˆ§ Î± = take i Î´ âˆ§ N = Î´ ! i âˆ§ Î² = drop (Suc i) Î´)"
