lemma splits_at_combine: "splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î² âŸ¹ Î´ = Î± @ [N] @ Î²"
  by (simp add: id_take_nth_drop splits_at_def)

lemma splits_at_combine_dest: "Derives1 a i r b âŸ¹ splits_at a i Î± N Î² âŸ¹ b = Î± @ (snd r) @ Î²"
  by (metis (no_types, lifting) Derives1_drop Derives1_split append_assoc append_eq_conv_conj 
      length_append splits_at_def)

lemma Derives1_nonterminal: 
  assumes "Derives1 a i r b"
  assumes "splits_at a i Î± N Î²"
  shows "fst r = N âˆ§ is_nonterminal N"
proof - 
  from assms have fst: "fst r = N"
    by (metis Derives1_split append_Cons nth_append_length splits_at_def)
  then have "is_nonterminal N"
    by (metis Derives1_def assms(1) prod.collapse rule_nonterminal_type)
  with fst show ?thesis by auto
qed

  
lemma splits_at_ex: "Derives1 Î´ i r s âŸ¹ âˆƒ Î± N Î². splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î²"
by (simp add: Derives1_bound splits_at_def)

lemma splits_at_Î±: "Derives1 Î´ i r s âŸ¹ splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î² âŸ¹ 
  Î± = take i Î´ âˆ§ Î± = take i s âˆ§ length Î± = i"
by (metis Derives1_split append_eq_conv_conj splits_at_def)

lemma LeftDerives1_splits_at_is_word: "LeftDerives1 Î´ i r s âŸ¹ splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î² âŸ¹ is_word Î±"
by (metis LeftDerives1_def leftmost_def splits_at_def)
  
lemma splits_at_Î²: "Derives1 Î´ i r s âŸ¹ splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î² âŸ¹ 
  Î² = drop (Suc i) Î´ âˆ§ Î² = drop (i + length (snd r)) s âˆ§ length Î² = length Î´ - i - 1"
by (metis Derives1_drop Suc_eq_plus1 diff_diff_left length_drop splits_at_def)

lemma Derives1_prefix:
  assumes ab: "Derives1 Î´ i r (a@b)"
  assumes split: "splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î²"
  shows "is_prefix Î± a âˆ¨ is_prefix a Î±" 
proof -
  have take: "Î± = take i (a@b)" using ab split splits_at_Î± by blast
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "i â‰¤ length a")
    case True
    then have "Î± = take i a" by (simp add: take)
    then have "is_prefix Î± a" 
      by (metis append_take_drop_id is_prefix_def) 
    with True show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case False
    then have "is_prefix a Î±"
      by (simp add: is_prefix_def nat_le_linear take) 
    with False show ?thesis by auto
  qed
qed

lemma Derives1_suffix:
  assumes ab: "Derives1 Î´ i r (a@b)"
  assumes split: "splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î²"
  shows "is_suffix Î² b âˆ¨ is_suffix b Î²" 
proof -
  have drop1: "Î² = drop (i + length (snd r)) (a@b)" using ab split splits_at_Î² by blast
  have drop2: "b = drop (length a) (a@b)" by simp
  show ?thesis
  proof (cases "(i + length (snd r)) â‰¤ length a")
    case True
    with drop1 drop2 have "is_suffix b Î²" by (simp add: is_suffix_def)
    then show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case False
    then have "length a â‰¤ (i + length (snd r))" by arith
    with drop1 drop2 have "is_suffix Î² b"
      by (metis append_Nil append_take_drop_id drop_append drop_eq_Nil is_suffix_def)
    then show ?thesis by auto
  qed
qed

lemma Derives1_skip_prefix:
  "length a â‰¤ i âŸ¹ Derives1 (a@b) i r (a@c) âŸ¹ Derives1 b (i - length a) r c"
apply (auto simp add: Derives1_def)
by (metis append_eq_append_conv_if is_sentence_concat is_sentence_cons is_symbol_def 
    length_drop rule_nonterminal_type)

lemma cancel_suffix:
  assumes "a @ c = b @ d"
  assumes "length c â‰¤ length d"
  shows "a = b @ (take (length d - length c) d)"
proof -
  have "a @ c = (b @ take (length d - length c) d) @ drop (length d - length c) d"
    by (metis append_assoc append_take_drop_id assms(1))
  then show ?thesis
    by (metis append_eq_append_conv assms(2) diff_diff_cancel length_drop)
qed

lemma is_sentence_take:
  "is_sentence y âŸ¹ is_sentence (take n y)"
by (metis append_take_drop_id is_sentence_concat)

lemma Derives1_skip_suffix:
  assumes i: "i < length a"
  assumes D: "Derives1 (a@c) i r (b@c)"
  shows "Derives1 a i r b"
proof -
  note Derives1_def[where u="a@c" and v="b@c" and i=i and r=r]
  then have "âˆƒx y N Î±.
    a @ c = x @ [N] @ y âˆ§
    b @ c = x @ Î± @ y âˆ§ is_sentence x âˆ§ is_sentence y âˆ§ (N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ âˆ§ r = (N, Î±) âˆ§ i = length x"
    using D by blast
  then obtain x y N Î± where split:
    "a @ c = x @ [N] @ y âˆ§
     b @ c = x @ Î± @ y âˆ§ is_sentence x âˆ§ is_sentence y âˆ§ (N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ âˆ§ r = (N, Î±) âˆ§ i = length x"
     by blast
  from split have "length (a@c) = length (x @ [N] @ y)" by auto
  then have "length a + length c = length x + length y + 1" by simp
  with split have "length a + length c = i + length y + 1" by simp
  with i have len_c_y: "length c â‰¤ length y" by arith
  let ?y = "take (length y - length c) y"
  from split have ac: "a @ c = (x @ [N]) @ y" by auto
  note cancel_suffix[where a=a and c = c and b = "x@[N]" and d = "y", OF ac len_c_y]
  then have a: "a = x @ [N] @ ?y" by auto
  from split have bc: "b @ c = (x @ Î±) @ y" by auto
  note cancel_suffix[where a=b and c = c and b = "x@Î±" and d = "y", OF bc len_c_y]
  then have b: "b = x @ Î± @ ?y" by auto
  from split len_c_y a b show ?thesis
    apply (simp only: Derives1_def)
    apply (rule_tac x=x in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="?y" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="N" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="Î±" in exI)
    apply auto
    by (rule is_sentence_take)
qed
  
lemma drop_cancel_suffix: "a@c = drop n (b@c) âŸ¹ a = drop n b"
proof -
  assume a1: "a @ c = drop n (b @ c)"
  have "length (drop n b) = length b + length c - n - length c"
    by (metis add_diff_cancel_right' diff_commute length_drop)
  then show ?thesis
    using a1 by (metis add_diff_cancel_right' append_eq_append_conv drop_append 
      length_append length_drop)
qed

lemma drop_keep_last: "u â‰  [] âŸ¹ u = drop n (a@[X]) âŸ¹ u = drop n a @ [X]"
by (metis append_take_drop_id drop_butlast last_appendR snoc_eq_iff_butlast)
  
lemma Derives1_X_is_part_of_rule[consumes 2, case_names Suffix Prefix]:
  assumes aXb: "Derives1 Î´ i r (a@[X]@b)"
  assumes split: "splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î²"
  assumes prefix: "â‹€ Î². Î´ = a @ [X] @ Î² âŸ¹ length a < i âŸ¹ 
                     Derives1 Î² (i - length a - 1) r b âŸ¹ False"
  assumes suffix: "â‹€ Î±. Î´ = Î± @ [X] @ b âŸ¹ Derives1 Î± i r a âŸ¹ False" 
  shows "âˆƒ u v. a = Î± @ u âˆ§ b = v @ Î² âˆ§ (snd r) = u@[X]@v"
proof -
  have prefix_or: "is_prefix Î± a âˆ¨ is_proper_prefix a Î±"
    by (metis Derives1_prefix split aXb is_prefix_eq_proper_prefix)
  have "is_proper_prefix a Î± âŸ¹ False"
  proof -
    assume proper:"is_proper_prefix a Î±"
    then have "âˆƒ u. u â‰  [] âˆ§ Î± = a@u" by (metis is_proper_prefix_def)
    then obtain u where u: "u â‰  [] âˆ§ Î± = a@u" by blast
    note splits_at = splits_at_Î±[OF aXb split] splits_at_combine[OF split]
    from splits_at have Î±1: "Î± = take i Î´" by blast
    from splits_at have Î±2: "Î± = take i (a@[X]@b)" by blast
    from splits_at have lenÎ±: "length Î± = i" by blast
    with proper have lena: "length a < i"
      using append_eq_conv_conj drop_eq_Nil leI u by auto 
    from u Î±2 have "a@u = take i (a@[X]@b)" by auto
    with lena have "u = take (i - length a) ([X]@b)" by (simp add: less_or_eq_imp_le) 
    with lena have uX: "u = [X]@(take (i - length a - 1) b)" by (simp add: not_less take_Cons')
    let ?Î² = "(take (i - length a - 1) b) @ [N] @ Î²"
    from splits_at have f1: "Î´ = Î± @ [N] @ Î²" by blast
    with u uX have f2: "Î´ = a @ [X] @ ?Î²" by simp
    note skip = Derives1_skip_prefix[where a = "a @ [X]" and b = "?Î²" and 
      r = r and i = i and c = b]
    then have D: "Derives1 ?Î² (i - length a - 1) r b"
      using One_nat_def Suc_leI aXb append_assoc diff_diff_left f2 lena length_Cons 
        length_append length_append_singleton list.size(3) by fastforce
    note prefix[OF f2 lena D]
    then show "False" .
  qed
  with prefix_or have is_prefix: "is_prefix Î± a" by blast

  from aXb have aXb': "Derives1 Î´ i r ((a@[X])@b)" by auto
  note  Derives1_suffix[OF aXb' split]
  then have suffix_or: "is_suffix Î² b âˆ¨ is_proper_suffix b Î²"
    by (metis is_suffix_eq_proper_suffix)
  have "is_proper_suffix b Î² âŸ¹ False"
  proof -
    assume proper: "is_proper_suffix b Î²"
    then have "âˆƒ u. u â‰  [] âˆ§ Î² = u@b" by (metis is_proper_suffix_def)
    then obtain u where u: "u â‰  [] âˆ§ Î² = u@b" by blast
    note splits_at = splits_at_Î²[OF aXb split] splits_at_combine[OF split]
    from splits_at have Î²1: "Î² = drop (Suc i) Î´" by blast
    from splits_at have Î²2: "Î² = drop (i + length (snd r)) (a @ [X] @ b)" by blast
    from splits_at have lenÎ²: "length Î² = length Î´ - i - 1" by blast
    with proper have lenb: "length b < length Î²" by (metis is_proper_suffix_length_cmp) 
    from u Î²2 have "u@b = drop (i + length (snd r)) ((a @ [X]) @ b)" by auto
    hence "u = drop (i + length (snd r)) (a @ [X])" 
      by (metis drop_cancel_suffix)
    hence uX: "u = drop (i + length (snd r)) a @ [X]" by (metis drop_keep_last u)
    let ?Î± = "Î± @ [N] @ (drop (i + length (snd r)) a)"
    from splits_at have f1: "Î´ = Î± @ [N] @ Î²" by blast
    with u uX have f2: "Î´ = ?Î± @ [X] @ b" by simp
    note skip = Derives1_skip_suffix[where a = "?Î±" and c = "[X]@b" and b="a" and
      r = r and i = i]
    have f3: "i < length (Î± @ [N] @ drop (i + length (snd r)) a)"
    proof -
      have f1: "1 + i + length b = length [X] + length b + i"
        by (metis Groups.add_ac(2) Suc_eq_plus1_left length_Cons list.size(3) list.size(4) semiring_normalization_rules(22))
      have f2: "length Î´ - i - 1 = length ((Î± @ [N] @ drop (i + length (snd r)) a) @ [X] @ b) - Suc i"
        by (metis f2 length_drop splits_at(1))
      have "length ([]::symbol list) â‰  length Î´ - i - 1 - length b"
        by (metis add_diff_cancel_right' append_Nil2 append_eq_append_conv lenÎ² length_append u)
      then have "length ([]::symbol list) â‰  length Î± + length ([N] @ drop (i + length (snd r)) a) - i"
        using f2 f1 by (metis Suc_eq_plus1_left add_diff_cancel_right' diff_diff_left length_append)
      then show ?thesis
        by auto
    qed
    from aXb f2 have D: "Derives1 (?Î± @ [X] @ b) i r (a@[X]@b)" by auto
    note skip[OF f3 D]
    note suffix[OF f2  skip[OF f3 D]]
    then show "False" .
  qed
  with suffix_or have is_suffix: "is_suffix Î² b" by blast

  from is_prefix have "âˆƒ u. a = Î± @ u" by (auto simp add: is_prefix_def)
  then obtain u where u: "a = Î± @ u" by blast
  from is_suffix have "âˆƒ v. b = v @ Î²" by (auto simp add: is_suffix_def)
  then obtain v where v: "b = v @ Î²" by blast
  
  from u v splits_at_combine[OF split] aXb have D:"Derives1 (Î±@[N]@Î²) i r (Î±@(u@[X]@v)@Î²)"
    by simp
  from splits_at_Î±[OF aXb split] have i: "length Î± = i" by blast
  from i have i1: "length Î± â‰¤ i" and i2: "i â‰¤ length Î±" by auto
  note Derives1_skip_suffix[OF _ Derives1_skip_prefix[OF i1 D], simplified, OF i2]
  then have "Derives1 [N] 0 r (u @ [X] @ v)" by auto
  then have r: "snd r = u @ [X] @ v"
    by (metis Derives1_split append_Cons append_Nil length_0_conv list.inject self_append_conv) 

  show ?thesis using u v r by auto
qed   

lemma â„’â‡©P_derives: "a âˆˆ â„’â‡©P âŸ¹ âˆƒ b. derives [ğ”–] (a@b)"
by (simp add: â„’â‡©P_def is_derivation_def)

lemma â„’â‡©P_leftderives: "a âˆˆ â„’â‡©P âŸ¹ âˆƒ b. leftderives [ğ”–] (a@b)"
by (metis â„’â‡©P_derives â„’â‡©P_is_word derives_implies_leftderives_gen)

lemma Derives1_rule: "Derives1 a i r b âŸ¹ r âˆˆ â„œ"
  by (auto simp add: Derives1_def)

lemma is_prefix_empty[simp]: "is_prefix [] a"
  by (simp add: is_prefix_def)

lemma is_prefix_cons: "is_prefix (x # a) b = (âˆƒ c. b = x # c âˆ§ is_prefix a c)"
  by (metis append_Cons is_prefix_def)

lemma is_prefix_cancel[simp]: "is_prefix (a@b) (a@c) = is_prefix b c"
  by (metis append_assoc is_prefix_def same_append_eq)

lemma is_prefix_chars: "is_prefix a b âŸ¹ is_prefix (chars a) (chars b)"
proof (induct a arbitrary: b)
  case Nil thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Cons x a)
  from Cons(2) have "âˆƒ c. b = x # c âˆ§ is_prefix a c" 
    by (simp add: is_prefix_cons)
  then obtain c where c: "b = x # c âˆ§ is_prefix a c" by blast
  from c Cons(1) show ?case by simp
qed

lemma is_prefix_length: "is_prefix a b âŸ¹ length a â‰¤ length b"
by (auto simp add: is_prefix_def)

lemma is_prefix_take[simp]: "is_prefix (take n a) a"
apply (auto simp add: is_prefix_def)
apply (rule_tac x="drop n a" in exI)
by simp

lemma doc_tokens_length: "doc_tokens p âŸ¹ length (chars p) â‰¤ length Doc"
by (metis doc_tokens_def is_prefix_length)

fun count_terminals :: "sentence â‡’ nat" where
  "count_terminals [] = 0"
| "count_terminals (x#xs) = (if (is_terminal x) then Suc (count_terminals xs) else (count_terminals xs))"

lemma count_terminals_upper_bound: "count_terminals p â‰¤ length p"
  by (induct p, auto)

lemma count_terminals_append[simp]: "count_terminals (a@b) = count_terminals a + count_terminals b"
  by (induct a arbitrary: b, auto)

lemma Derives1_count_terminals:
  assumes D: "Derives1 a i r b"
  shows "count_terminals b = count_terminals a + count_terminals (snd r)"
proof -
  have "âˆƒ Î± N Î². splits_at a i Î± N Î²" using D splits_at_ex by simp
  then obtain Î± N Î² where split: "splits_at a i Î± N Î²" by blast
  from D split have N: "is_nonterminal N" by (simp add: Derives1_nonterminal)
  have a: "a = Î± @ [N] @ Î²" by (metis split splits_at_combine)
  from D split have b: "b = Î± @ (snd r) @ Î²" using splits_at_combine_dest by simp
  show ?thesis
    apply (simp add: a b)
    using N by (metis is_terminal_nonterminal) 
qed

lemma Derives1_count_terminals_leq:
  assumes D: "Derives1 a i r b"
  shows "count_terminals a â‰¤ count_terminals b"
by (metis Derives1_count_terminals assms le_less_linear not_add_less1)

lemma Derivation_count_terminals_leq:
  "Derivation a E b âŸ¹ count_terminals a â‰¤ count_terminals b"
proof (induct E arbitrary: a)
  case Nil thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons e E)
  then have "âˆƒ x i r. Derives1 a i r x âˆ§ Derivation x E b" using Derivation.simps(2) by blast 
  then obtain x i r where axb: "Derives1 a i r x âˆ§ Derivation x E b" by blast
  from axb have ax: "count_terminals a â‰¤ count_terminals x"
    using Derives1_count_terminals_leq by blast 
  from axb have xb: "count_terminals x â‰¤ count_terminals b" using Cons by simp
  show ?case using ax xb by arith
qed

lemma derives_count_terminals_leq: "derives a b âŸ¹ count_terminals a â‰¤ count_terminals b"
using Derivation_count_terminals_leq derives_implies_Derivation by force

lemma is_word_cons[simp]: "is_word (x#xs) = (is_terminal x âˆ§ is_word xs)"
  by (simp add: is_word_def)  

lemma count_terminals_of_word: "is_word w âŸ¹ count_terminals w = length w"
  by (induct w, auto)

lemma length_terminals[simp]: "length (terminals p) = length p"
  by (auto simp add: terminals_def)

lemma path_length_is_upper_bound:
  assumes p: "wellformed_tokens p"
  assumes Î±: "is_word Î±"
  assumes derives: "derives (Î±@u) (terminals p)"
  shows "length Î± â‰¤ length p"
proof -
  have counts: "count_terminals Î± â‰¤ count_terminals (terminals p)"
    using derives derives_count_terminals_leq by fastforce
  have len1: "length Î± = count_terminals Î±" by (simp add: Î± count_terminals_of_word)
  have len2: "length (terminals p) = count_terminals (terminals p)"
    by (simp add: count_terminals_of_word is_word_terminals p)
  show ?thesis using counts len1 len2 by auto
qed   
 
lemma is_word_Derives1_index:
  assumes w: "is_word w"
  assumes derives1: "Derives1 (w@a) i r b"
  shows "i â‰¥ length w"
proof -
  from derives1 have n: "is_nonterminal ((w@a) ! i)"
    using Derives1_nonterminal splits_at_def splits_at_ex by auto
  from w have t: "i < length w âŸ¹ is_terminal ((w@a) ! i)"
    by (simp add: is_word_is_terminal nth_append)
  show ?thesis
    by (metis t n is_terminal_nonterminal less_le_not_le nat_le_linear)
qed   
    
lemma is_word_Derivation_derivation_ge:
  assumes w: "is_word w"
  assumes D: "Derivation (w@a) D b"
  shows "derivation_ge D (length w)"
by (metis D Derivation_leftmost derivation_ge_empty leftmost_Derivation leftmost_append w)

lemma derives_word_is_prefix:
  assumes w: "is_word w"
  assumes derives: "derives (w@a) b"
  shows "is_prefix w b"
by (metis Derivation_take append_eq_conv_conj derives derives_implies_Derivation 
    is_prefix_take is_word_Derivation_derivation_ge w) 

lemma terminals_take[simp]: "terminals (take n p) = take n (terminals p)"
by (simp add: take_map terminals_def)

lemma terminals_drop[simp]: "terminals (drop n p) = drop n (terminals p)"
by (simp add: drop_map terminals_def)

lemma take_prefix[simp]: "is_prefix a b âŸ¹ take (length a) b = a"
by (metis append_eq_conv_conj is_prefix_unsplit)
    
lemma Derives1_drop_prefixword: 
  assumes w: "is_word w"
  assumes wa_b: "Derives1 (w@a) i r b"
  shows "Derives1 a (i - length w) r (drop (length w) b)"
proof -
  have i: "length w â‰¤ i" using wa_b is_word_Derives1_index w by blast 
  have "is_prefix w b" by (metis append_eq_conv_conj i is_prefix_take le_Derives1_take wa_b)
  then have b: "b = w @ (drop (length w) b)" by (simp add: is_prefix_unsplit) 
  show ?thesis
    apply (rule_tac Derives1_skip_prefix[OF i])
    by (simp add: b[symmetric] wa_b)
qed

lemma derives1_drop_prefixword: 
  assumes w: "is_word w"
  assumes wa_b: "derives1 (w@a) b"
  shows "derives1 a (drop (length w) b)"
by (metis Derives1_drop_prefixword Derives1_implies_derives1 derives1_implies_Derives1 w wa_b)

lemma derives1_is_word_is_prefix_drop: 
  assumes w: "is_word w"
  assumes w_a: "is_prefix w a"
  assumes ab: "derives1 a b"
  shows "derives1 (drop (length w) a) (drop (length w) b)"
by (metis ab append_take_drop_id derives1_drop_prefixword take_prefix w w_a)
    
lemma derives_drop_prefixword_helper: 
  "derives a b âŸ¹ is_word w âŸ¹ is_prefix w a âŸ¹ derives (drop (length w) a) (drop (length w) b)"
proof (induct rule: derives_induct)
  case Base thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Step y z) 
  have is_prefix_w_y: "is_prefix w y"
    by (metis Step.hyps(1) Step.prems(1) Step.prems(2) derives_word_is_prefix is_prefix_def) 
  thus ?case
    by (metis Step.hyps(2) Step.hyps(3) Step.prems(1) Step.prems(2) derives1_implies_derives 
        derives1_is_word_is_prefix_drop derives_trans) 
qed

lemma derive_drop_prefixword:
  "is_word w âŸ¹ derives (w@a) b âŸ¹ derives a (drop (length w) b)"
by (metis append_eq_conv_conj derives_drop_prefixword_helper is_prefix_take)

lemma thmD2':
  assumes X: "is_terminal X"
  assumes p: "doc_tokens p"
  assumes pX: "(terminals p)@[X] âˆˆ â„’â‡©P"
  shows "âˆƒ x. pvalid p x âˆ§ next_symbol x = Some X"
proof -
  from p have wellformed_p: "wellformed_tokens p" by (simp add: doc_tokens_def)
  have "âˆƒ Ï‰. leftderives [ğ”–] (((terminals p)@[X]) @ Ï‰)" using â„’â‡©P_leftderives pX by blast
  then obtain Ï‰ where "leftderives [ğ”–] (((terminals p)@[X]) @ Ï‰)" by blast
  then have "âˆƒ D. LeftDerivation [ğ”–] D (((terminals p)@[X]) @ Ï‰)"
    using leftderives_implies_LeftDerivation by blast
  then obtain D where D: "LeftDerivation [ğ”–] D (((terminals p)@[X]) @ Ï‰)" by blast
  let ?P = "Î» k. (âˆƒ a b. LeftDerivation [ğ”–] (take k D) (a@[X]@b) âˆ§ derives a (terminals p))"  
  have "?P (length D)"
    apply (rule_tac x="terminals p" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="Ï‰" in exI)
    using D by simp
  then show ?thesis
  proof (induct rule: minimal_witness[where P="?P"])
    case (Minimal K)
    from Minimal(2) obtain a b where
       aXb: "LeftDerivation [ğ”–] (take K D) (a @ [X] @ b)" and
       a: "derives a (terminals p)" by blast
    have KD: "K > 0 âˆ§ length D > 0"
    proof (cases "K = 0 âˆ¨ length D = 0")
      case True
        hence "take K D = []" by auto
        with True aXb have "[ğ”–] = a @ [X] @ b" by simp
        hence "ğ”– = X"
          by (metis Nil_is_append_conv append_self_conv2 butlast.simps(2) 
              butlast_append hd_append2 list.sel(1) not_Cons_self2) 
        then have "False"
          using X is_nonterminal_startsymbol is_terminal_nonterminal by auto  
        then show ?thesis by blast
    next
      case False thus ?thesis by arith
    qed
    then have "take K D = take (K - 1) D @ [D ! (K - 1)]"
      by (metis Minimal.hyps(1) One_nat_def Suc_less_eq Suc_pred hd_drop_conv_nth 
          le_imp_less_Suc take_hd_drop)
    then have "âˆƒ Î´. LeftDerivation [ğ”–] (take (K - 1) D) Î´ âˆ§ LeftDerivation Î´ [D ! (K - 1)] (a@[X]@b)"
      by (metis LeftDerivation_append aXb)
    then obtain Î´ where 
      Î´1: "LeftDerivation [ğ”–] (take (K - 1) D) Î´"  
      and Î´2: "LeftDerivation Î´ [D ! (K - 1)] (a@[X]@b)" 
      by blast
    from Î´2 have "âˆƒ i r. LeftDerives1 Î´ i r (a@[X]@b)" by fastforce
    then obtain i r where LeftDerives1_Î´: "LeftDerives1 Î´ i r (a@[X]@b)" by blast
    then have Derives1_Î´: "Derives1 Î´ i r (a@[X]@b)" 
      by (metis LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1) 
    then have "âˆƒ Î± N Î² . splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î²" by (simp add: splits_at_ex)
    then obtain Î± N Î² where split_Î´: "splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î²" by blast
    have is_word_Î±: "is_word Î±" by (metis LeftDerives1_Î´ LeftDerives1_splits_at_is_word split_Î´) 
    have "Â¬ (?P (K - 1))" using KD Minimal(3) by auto
    with Î´1 have min_Î´: "Â¬ (âˆƒ a b. Î´ = a@[X]@b âˆ§ derives a (terminals p))" by blast
    from Derives1_Î´ split_Î´ have "âˆƒ u v. a = Î± @ u âˆ§ b = v @ Î² âˆ§ (snd r) = u@[X]@v"
    proof (induction rule: Derives1_X_is_part_of_rule)
      case (Suffix Î³)
        from min_Î´ Suffix(1) a show ?case by auto
    next
      case (Prefix Î³)
        have "derives Î³ (terminals p)"
          by (metis Derives1_implies_derives1 Prefix(2) a 
              derives1_implies_derives derives_trans)
        with min_Î´ Prefix(1) show ?case by auto 
    qed
    then obtain u v where uXv: "a = Î± @ u âˆ§ b = v @ Î² âˆ§ (snd r) = u@[X]@v" by blast 
    let ?l = "length Î±"
    let ?q = "take ?l p"
    let ?x = "Item r (length u) (charslength ?q) (charslength p)"  
    have "item_rhs ?x = snd r" by (simp add: item_rhs_def)
    then have item_rhs_x: "item_rhs ?x = u@[X]@v" using uXv by simp
    have wellformed_x: "wellformed_item ?x" 
      apply (auto simp add: wellformed_item_def)
      apply (metis Derives1_Î´ Derives1_rule)
      apply (rule is_prefix_length)
      apply (rule is_prefix_chars)
      apply simp
      apply (simp add: doc_tokens_length[OF p])
      using item_rhs_x by simp
    from item_rhs_x have next_symbol_x: "next_symbol ?x = Some X"
      by (auto simp add: next_symbol_def is_complete_def)
    have len_Î±_p: "length Î± â‰¤ length p"
      apply (rule_tac path_length_is_upper_bound[where u=u])
      apply (simp add: wellformed_p)
      apply (simp add: is_word_Î±)
      using a uXv by blast
    have item_nonterminal_x: "item_nonterminal ?x = N"
      apply (simp add: item_nonterminal_def)
      using Derives1_Î´ Derives1_nonterminal split_Î´ by blast
    have take_terminals: "take (length Î±) (terminals p) = Î±"
      apply (rule_tac take_prefix)
      using a derives_word_is_prefix is_word_Î± uXv by blast
    have item_Î±_x: "item_Î± ?x = u" using item_Î±_def item_rhs_x by auto    
    from wellformed_x next_symbol_x len_Î±_p show ?thesis
      apply (rule_tac x="?x" in exI)
      apply (auto simp add: pvalid_def wellformed_p)
      apply (rule_tac x="length Î±" in exI)
      apply (auto)
      using item_nonterminal_x apply (simp)
      apply (simp add: take_terminals)
      apply (rule_tac x="Î²" in exI)
      using LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives Î´1 is_leftderivation_def split_Î´ splits_at_combine 
      apply auto[1]
      using item_Î±_x apply simp
      by (metis a derive_drop_prefixword is_word_Î± uXv)
  qed
qed    
        
lemma admissible_wellformed_tokens: "admissible p âŸ¹ wellformed_tokens p"
  by (auto simp add: admissible_def â„’â‡©P_wellformed_tokens)

lemma chars_append[simp]: "chars (a@b) = (chars a)@(chars b)"
  by (induct a arbitrary: b, auto)

lemma chars_of_token_simp[simp]: "chars_of_token (a, b) = b"
  by (simp add: chars_of_token_def)

lemma ğ’³_is_prefix: "t âˆˆ ğ’³ k âŸ¹ is_prefix (snd t) (drop k Doc)"
  by (auto simp add: ğ’³_def)

lemma is_prefix_append: "is_prefix (a@b) D = (is_prefix a D âˆ§ is_prefix b (drop (length a) D))"
  by (metis append_assoc is_prefix_cancel is_prefix_def is_prefix_unsplit)
  
lemma ğ”“_are_doc_tokens: "p âˆˆ ğ”“ âŸ¹ doc_tokens p"
proof (induct rule: ğ”“_induct)
  case Base thus ?case
    by (simp add: doc_tokens_def wellformed_tokens_def)
next
  case (Induct p k u)
  from Induct(2)[simplified] show ?case
  proof (induct rule: limit_induct)
    case (Init p) from Induct(1)[OF Init] show ?case .
  next
    case (Iterate p Y) 
    have Y_is_prefix: "â‹€ p. p âˆˆ Y âŸ¹ is_prefix (chars p) Doc"
      apply (drule Iterate(1))
      by (simp add: doc_tokens_def)
    have "ğ’´ (ğ’µ k u) (ğ’« k u) k âŠ† ğ’³ k" by (metis ğ’µ.simps(2) ğ’µ_subset_ğ’³)
    then have 1: "Append (ğ’´ (ğ’µ k u) (ğ’« k u) k) k Y âŠ† Append (ğ’³ k) k Y"
      by (rule Append_mono, simp) 
    have 2: "p âˆˆ Append (ğ’³ k) k Y âŸ¹ doc_tokens p"
      apply (auto simp add: Append_def)
      apply (simp add: Iterate)
      apply (auto simp add: doc_tokens_def admissible_wellformed_tokens 
             is_prefix_append Y_is_prefix)
      by (metis ğ’³_is_prefix snd_conv)
    show ?case 
      apply (rule 2)
      by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) "1" Iterate(2) subsetCE)
  qed  
qed
    
theorem thmD2:
  assumes X: "is_terminal X"
  assumes p: "p âˆˆ ğ”“"
  assumes pX: "(terminals p)@[X] âˆˆ â„’â‡©P"
  shows "âˆƒ x. pvalid p x âˆ§ next_symbol x = Some X"
by (metis X ğ”“_are_doc_tokens p pX thmD2')

end

end

Theory TheoremD4

theory TheoremD4
imports TheoremD2
begin

context LocalLexing begin

lemma ğ’³_are_terminals: "u âˆˆ ğ’³ k âŸ¹ is_terminal (terminal_of_token u)"
  by (auto simp add: ğ’³_def is_terminal_def terminal_of_token_def)

lemma terminals_append[simp]: "terminals (a@b) = ((terminals a) @ (terminals b))"
  by (auto simp add: terminals_def)

lemma terminals_singleton[simp]: "terminals [u] = [terminal_of_token u]"
  by (simp add: terminals_def)

lemma terminal_of_token_simp[simp]: "terminal_of_token (a, b) = a"
  by (simp add: terminal_of_token_def)

lemma pvalid_item_end: "pvalid p x âŸ¹ item_end x = charslength p"
  by (metis pvalid_def)

lemma ğ’²_elem_in_TokensAt: 
  assumes P: "P âŠ† ğ”“"
  assumes u_in_ğ’²: "u âˆˆ ğ’² P k"
  shows "u âˆˆ TokensAt k (Gen P)"
proof -
  have u: "u âˆˆ ğ’³ k âˆ§ (âˆƒpâˆˆby_length k P. admissible (p @ [u]))" using u_in_ğ’²
    by (auto simp add: ğ’²_def)
  then obtain p where p: "p âˆˆ by_length k P âˆ§ admissible (p @ [u])" by blast 
  then have charslength_p: "charslength p = k"
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) by_length.simps charslength.simps mem_Collect_eq)   
  from u have u: "u âˆˆ ğ’³ k" by blast
  from p have p_in_ğ”“: "p âˆˆ ğ”“"
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) P by_length.simps mem_Collect_eq subsetCE)
  then have doc_tokens_p: "doc_tokens p" by (metis ğ”“_are_doc_tokens)
  let ?X = "terminal_of_token u"
  have X_is_terminal: "is_terminal ?X" by (metis ğ’³_are_terminals u) 
  from p have "terminals p @ [terminal_of_token u] âˆˆ â„’â‡©P"
    by (auto simp add: admissible_def)
  from thmD2[OF X_is_terminal p_in_ğ”“ this] obtain x where
    x: "pvalid p x âˆ§ next_symbol x = Some (terminal_of_token u)" by blast
  have x_is_in_Gen_P: "x âˆˆ Gen P"
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) Gen_def by_length.simps mem_Collect_eq p x)
  have u_split[dest!]: "â‹€ t s. u = (t, s) âŸ¹ t = terminal_of_token u âˆ§ s = chars_of_token u"
    by (metis chars_of_token_simp fst_conv terminal_of_token_def)
  show ?thesis
    apply (auto simp add: TokensAt_def bin_def)
    apply (rule_tac x=x in exI)
    apply (auto simp add: x_is_in_Gen_P x X_is_terminal)
    using x charslength_p pvalid_item_end apply (simp, blast)
    using u by (auto simp add: ğ’³_def)
qed

lemma is_derivation_is_sentence: "is_derivation s âŸ¹ is_sentence s"
by (metis (no_types, lifting) Derives1_sentence2 derives1_implies_Derives1 
    derives_induct is_derivation_def is_nonterminal_startsymbol is_sentence_cons 
    is_sentence_def is_symbol_def list.pred_inject(1))
  
lemma is_sentence_cons: "is_sentence (N#s) = (is_symbol N âˆ§ is_sentence s)"
  by (auto simp add: is_sentence_def)

lemma is_derivation_step:
  assumes uNv: "is_derivation (u@[N]@v)"
  assumes NÎ±: "(N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ"
  shows "is_derivation (u@Î±@v)"
proof -
  from uNv have "is_sentence (u@[N]@v)" by (metis is_derivation_is_sentence) 
  with is_sentence_concat is_sentence_cons 
  have u_is_sentence: "is_sentence u" and v_is_sentence: "is_sentence v"
    by auto
  from NÎ± have "derives1 (u@[N]@v) (u@Î±@v)"
    apply (auto simp add: derives1_def)
    apply (rule_tac x=u in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x=v in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x=N in exI)
    by (auto simp add: u_is_sentence v_is_sentence)
  then show ?thesis
    by (metis derives1_implies_derives derives_trans is_derivation_def uNv)
qed  

lemma is_derivation_derives:
  "derives Î± Î² âŸ¹ is_derivation (u@Î±@v) âŸ¹ is_derivation (u@Î²@v)"
proof (induct rule: derives_induct)
  case Base thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Step y z)
    from Step have 1: "is_derivation (u @ y @ v)" by auto
    from Step have 2: "derives1 y z" by auto
    from 1 2 show ?case by (metis append_assoc derives1_def is_derivation_step)
qed  

lemma item_rhs_split: "item_rhs x = (item_Î± x)@(item_Î² x)"
  by (metis append_take_drop_id item_Î±_def item_Î²_def)

lemma pvalid_is_derivation_terminals_item_Î²:
  assumes pvalid: "pvalid p x"
  shows "âˆƒ Î´. is_derivation ((terminals p)@(item_Î² x)@Î´)"
proof -
  from pvalid have "âˆƒ u Î³. is_derivation (terminals (take u p) @ [item_nonterminal x] @ Î³) âˆ§
    derives (item_Î± x) (terminals (drop u p))"
    by (auto simp add: pvalid_def)  
  then obtain u Î³ where 1: "is_derivation (terminals (take u p) @ [item_nonterminal x] @ Î³) âˆ§
    derives (item_Î± x) (terminals (drop u p))" by blast
  have x_rule: "(item_nonterminal x, item_rhs x) âˆˆ â„œ"
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) LocalLexing.pvalid_def LocalLexing_axioms assms case_prodE item_nonterminal_def item_rhs_def prod.sel(1) snd_conv validRules wellformed_item_def)
  from 1 x_rule is_derivation_step have 
    "is_derivation ((take u (terminals p)) @ (item_rhs x) @ Î³)"
    by auto
  then have "is_derivation ((take u (terminals p)) @ ((item_Î± x)@(item_Î² x)) @ Î³)" 
    by (simp add: item_rhs_split)
  then have "is_derivation ((take u (terminals p)) @ (item_Î± x) @ ((item_Î² x) @ Î³))"
    by simp
  then have "is_derivation ((take u (terminals p)) @ (drop u (terminals p)) @ ((item_Î² x) @ Î³))"
    by (metis 1 is_derivation_derives terminals_drop)
  then have "is_derivation ((terminals p) @ ((item_Î² x) @ Î³))"
    by (metis append_assoc append_take_drop_id)
  then show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma next_symbol_not_complete: "next_symbol x = Some t âŸ¹ Â¬ (is_complete x)"
  by (metis next_symbol_def option.discI)

lemma next_symbol_starts_item_Î²:
  assumes wf: "wellformed_item x"
  assumes next_symbol: "next_symbol x = Some t"
  shows "âˆƒ Î´. item_Î² x = t#Î´"
proof -
  from next_symbol have nc: "Â¬ (is_complete x)" using next_symbol_not_complete by auto
  from next_symbol have atdot: "item_rhs x ! item_dot x = t" by (simp add: next_symbol_def nc)
  from nc have inrange: "item_dot x < length (item_rhs x)" 
    by (simp add: is_complete_def)
  from inrange atdot show ?thesis
    apply (simp add: item_Î²_def)
    by (metis Cons_nth_drop_Suc)
qed   

lemma pvalid_prefixlang:
  assumes pvalid: "pvalid p x"
  assumes is_terminal: "is_terminal t"
  assumes next_symbol: "next_symbol x = Some t"
  shows "(terminals p) @ [t] âˆˆ â„’â‡©P"
proof -
  have "âˆƒ Î´. item_Î² x = t#Î´"
    by (metis next_symbol next_symbol_starts_item_Î² pvalid pvalid_def)
  then obtain Î´ where Î´:"item_Î² x = t#Î´" by blast
  have "âˆƒ Ï‰. is_derivation ((terminals p)@(item_Î² x)@Ï‰)"
    by (metis pvalid pvalid_is_derivation_terminals_item_Î²) 
  then obtain Ï‰ where "is_derivation ((terminals p)@(item_Î² x)@Ï‰)" by blast
  then have "is_derivation ((terminals p)@(t#Î´)@Ï‰)" by (metis Î´)
  then have "is_derivation (((terminals p)@[t])@(Î´@Ï‰))" by simp
  then show ?thesis
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) CFG.â„’â‡©P_def CFG_axioms  
      append_Nil2 is_terminal is_word_append is_word_cons 
      is_word_terminals mem_Collect_eq pvalid pvalid_def) 
qed 

lemma TokensAt_elem_in_ğ’²: 
  assumes P: "P âŠ† ğ”“"
  assumes u_in_Tokens_at: "u âˆˆ TokensAt k (Gen P)"
  shows "u âˆˆ ğ’² P k"
proof -
  have "âˆƒt s x l.
         u = (t, s) âˆ§
         x âˆˆ bin (Gen P) k âˆ§
         next_symbol x = Some t âˆ§ is_terminal t âˆ§ l âˆˆ Lex t Doc k âˆ§ s = take l (drop k Doc)"
  using u_in_Tokens_at by (auto simp add: TokensAt_def)
  then obtain t s x l where
     u: "u = (t, s) âˆ§
         x âˆˆ bin (Gen P) k âˆ§
         next_symbol x = Some t âˆ§ is_terminal t âˆ§ l âˆˆ Lex t Doc k âˆ§ s = take l (drop k Doc)"
        by blast
  from u have t: "t = terminal_of_token u" by (metis terminal_of_token_simp)
  from u have s: "s = chars_of_token u" by (metis chars_of_token_simp) 
  from u have item_end_x: "item_end x = k" by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) bin_def mem_Collect_eq) 
  from u have "âˆƒ p âˆˆ P. pvalid p x" by (auto simp add: bin_def Gen_def)
  then obtain p where p: "p âˆˆ P" and pvalid: "pvalid p x" by blast
  have p_len: "length (chars p) = k"
    by (metis charslength.simps item_end_x pvalid pvalid_item_end) 
  have u_in_ğ’³: "u âˆˆ ğ’³ k"
    apply (simp add: ğ’³_def)
    apply (rule_tac x=t in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x=l in exI)
    using u by (simp add: is_terminal_def)
  show ?thesis
    apply (auto simp add: ğ’²_def)
    apply (simp add: u_in_ğ’³)
    apply (rule_tac x=p in exI)
    apply (simp add: p p_len)
    apply (simp add: admissible_def t[symmetric])
    apply (rule pvalid_prefixlang[where x=x])
    apply (simp add: pvalid)
    apply (simp add: u)
    apply (simp add: u)
    done
qed

theorem thmD4:
  assumes P: "P âŠ† ğ”“"
  shows "ğ’² P k = TokensAt k (Gen P)"
using ğ’²_elem_in_TokensAt TokensAt_elem_in_ğ’²
by (metis Collect_cong Collect_mem_eq assms)

end

end

Theory TheoremD5

theory TheoremD5
imports TheoremD4
begin

context LocalLexing begin

lemma Scan_empty: "Scan {} k I = I"
  by (simp add: Scan_def)

lemma Ï€_no_tokens: "Ï€ k {} I =  limit (Î» I. Complete k (Predict k I)) I"
  by (simp add: Ï€_def Scan_empty)

lemma bin_elem: "x âˆˆ bin I k âŸ¹ x âˆˆ I"
  by (auto simp add: bin_def)

lemma Gen_implies_pvalid: "x âˆˆ Gen P âŸ¹ âˆƒ p âˆˆ P. pvalid p x"
  by (auto simp add: Gen_def)

lemma wellformed_init_item[simp]: "r âˆˆ â„œ âŸ¹ k â‰¤ length Doc âŸ¹ wellformed_item (init_item r k)"
  by (simp add: init_item_def wellformed_item_def)

lemma init_item_origin[simp]: "item_origin (init_item r k) = k"
  by (auto simp add: item_origin_def init_item_def)

lemma init_item_end[simp]: "item_end (init_item r k) = k"
  by (auto simp add: item_end_def init_item_def)

lemma init_item_nonterminal[simp]: "item_nonterminal (init_item r k) = fst r"
  by (auto simp add: init_item_def item_nonterminal_def)

lemma init_item_Î±[simp]: "item_Î± (init_item r k) = []"
  by (auto simp add: init_item_def item_Î±_def)

lemma Predict_elem_in_Gen:
  assumes I_in_Gen_P: "I âŠ† Gen P"
  assumes k: "k â‰¤ length Doc"
  assumes x_in_Predict: "x âˆˆ Predict k I"
  shows "x âˆˆ Gen P"
proof -
  have "x âˆˆ I âˆ¨ (âˆƒ r y. r âˆˆ â„œ âˆ§ x = init_item r k âˆ§ y âˆˆ bin I k âˆ§ next_symbol y = Some(fst r))"
    using x_in_Predict by (auto simp add: Predict_def)
  then show ?thesis
  proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
    case 1 thus ?case using I_in_Gen_P by blast
  next
    case 2 
    then obtain r y where ry: "r âˆˆ â„œ âˆ§ x = init_item r k âˆ§ y âˆˆ bin I k âˆ§ 
      next_symbol y = Some (fst r)" by blast
    then have "âˆƒ p âˆˆ P. pvalid p y"
      using Gen_implies_pvalid I_in_Gen_P bin_elem subsetCE by blast 
    then obtain p where p: "p âˆˆ P âˆ§ pvalid p y" by blast
    have wellformed_p: "wellformed_tokens p" using p by (auto simp add: pvalid_def)
    have wellformed_x: "wellformed_item x"
      by (simp add: ry k)
    from ry have "item_end y = k" by (auto simp add: bin_def)
    with p have charslength_p[simplified]: "charslength p = k" by (auto simp add: pvalid_def)
    have item_end_x: "item_end x = k" by (simp add: ry)
    have pvalid_x: "pvalid p x"
      apply (auto simp add: pvalid_def)
      apply (simp add: wellformed_p)
      apply (simp add: wellformed_x)
      apply (rule_tac x="length p" in exI)
      apply (auto simp add: charslength_p ry)
      by (metis append_Cons next_symbol_starts_item_Î² p pvalid_def 
        pvalid_is_derivation_terminals_item_Î² ry)
    then show ?case using Gen_def mem_Collect_eq p by blast
 qed
qed

lemma Predict_subset_Gen:
  assumes "I âŠ† Gen P"
  assumes "k â‰¤ length Doc"
  shows "Predict k I âŠ† Gen P"
using Predict_elem_in_Gen assms by blast

lemma nth_superfluous_append[simp]: "i < length a âŸ¹ (a@b)!i = a!i"
by (simp add: nth_append)

lemma tokens_nth_in_ğ’µ: 
  "p âˆˆ ğ”“ âŸ¹ âˆ€ i. i < length p âŸ¶ (âˆƒ u. p ! i âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take i p)) u)"
proof (induct rule: ğ”“_induct)
  case Base thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Induct p k u)
  then have "p âˆˆ limit (Append (ğ’µ k (Suc u)) k) (ğ’« k u)" by simp
  then show ?case
  proof (induct rule: limit_induct)
    case (Init p) thus ?case using Induct by auto
  next
    case (Iterate p Y)
    from Iterate(2) have "p âˆˆ Y âˆ¨ (âˆƒ q t. p = q@[t] âˆ§ q âˆˆ by_length k Y âˆ§ t âˆˆ ğ’µ k (Suc u) âˆ§ 
      admissible (q @ [t]))"
      by (auto simp add: Append_def)
    then show ?case
    proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
      case 1 thus ?case using Iterate(1) by auto
    next
      case 2 
      then obtain q t where 
        qt: "p = q @ [t] âˆ§ q âˆˆ by_length k Y âˆ§ t âˆˆ ğ’µ k (Suc u) âˆ§ admissible (q @ [t])" by blast
      then have q_in_Y: "q âˆˆ Y" by auto
      with qt have k: "k = charslength q" by auto
      with qt have t: "t âˆˆ ğ’µ k (Suc u)" by auto
      show ?case
      proof(auto simp add: qt)
        fix i
        assume i: "i < Suc (length q)"
        then have "i < length q âˆ¨ i = length q" by arith
        then show "âˆƒu. (q @ [t]) ! i âˆˆ ğ’µ (length (chars (take i q))) u"
        proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
          case 1
            from Iterate(1)[OF q_in_Y]
            show ?case by (simp add: 1)
        next
          case 2
            show ?case 
              apply (auto simp add: 2)
              apply (rule_tac x="Suc u" in exI)
              using k t by auto 
        qed
      qed
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma path_append_token:
  assumes p: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
  assumes t: "t âˆˆ ğ’µ k (Suc u)"
  assumes pt: "admissible (p@[t])"
  assumes k: "charslength p = k"
  shows "p@[t] âˆˆ ğ’« k (Suc u)"
apply (simp only: ğ’«.simps)
apply (rule_tac n="Suc 0" in limit_elem)
using p t pt k apply (auto simp only: Append_def funpower.simps)
by fastforce

definition indexlt_rel :: "((nat Ã— nat) Ã— (nat Ã— nat)) set" where
  "indexlt_rel = less_than <*lex*> less_than"

definition indexlt :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ nat â‡’ nat â‡’ bool" where
  "indexlt k' u' k u = (((k', u'), (k, u)) âˆˆ indexlt_rel)"

lemma indexlt_simp: "indexlt k' u' k u = (k' < k âˆ¨ (k' = k âˆ§ u' < u))"
  by (auto simp add: indexlt_def indexlt_rel_def)

lemma wf_indexlt_rel: "wf indexlt_rel"
  using indexlt_rel_def pair_less_def by auto

lemma ğ’«_induct[consumes 1, case_names Induct]:
  assumes "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
  assumes induct: "â‹€ p k u . (â‹€ p' k' u'. p' âˆˆ ğ’« k' u' âŸ¹ indexlt k' u' k u âŸ¹ P p' k' u') 
                     âŸ¹ p âˆˆ ğ’« k u âŸ¹ P p k u"
  shows "P p k u"
proof -
  let ?R = "indexlt_rel <*lex*> {}"
  have wf_R: "wf ?R" by (auto simp add: wf_indexlt_rel)
  let ?P = "Î» a. snd a âˆˆ ğ’« (fst (fst a)) (snd (fst a)) âŸ¶ P (snd a) (fst (fst a)) (snd (fst a))"
  have "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u âŸ¶ P p k u"
    apply (rule wf_induct[OF wf_R, where P = ?P and a = "((k, u), p)", simplified])
    apply (auto simp add: indexlt_def[symmetric])
    apply (rule_tac p=ba and k=a and u=b in induct)
    by auto
  thus ?thesis using assms by auto 
qed

lemma nonempty_path_indices: 
  assumes p: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
  assumes nonempty: "p â‰  []"
  shows "k > 0 âˆ¨ u > 0"
proof (cases "u = 0")
  case True
  note u = True
  have "k > 0"
  proof (cases "k = 0")
    case True
    with p u have "p = []" by simp
    with nonempty have "False" by auto
    then show ?thesis by auto
  next
    case False
    then show ?thesis by arith
  qed
  then show ?thesis by blast
next
  case False
  then show ?thesis by arith
qed

lemma base_paths:
  assumes p: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k 0"
  assumes k: "k > 0"
  shows "âˆƒ u. p âˆˆ ğ’« (k - 1) u"
proof -
  from k have "âˆƒ i. k = Suc i" by arith
  then obtain i where i: "k = Suc i" by blast
  from p show ?thesis
    by (auto simp add: i natUnion_def)
qed

lemma indexlt_trans: "indexlt k'' u'' k' u' âŸ¹ indexlt k' u' k u âŸ¹ indexlt k'' u'' k u"
using dual_order.strict_trans indexlt_simp by auto

definition is_continuation :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ tokens â‡’ tokens â‡’ bool" where
  "is_continuation k u q ts = (q âˆˆ ğ’« k u âˆ§ charslength q = k âˆ§ admissible (q@ts) âˆ§ 
     (âˆ€ t âˆˆ set ts. t âˆˆ ğ’µ k (Suc u)) âˆ§ (âˆ€ t âˆˆ set (butlast ts). chars_of_token t = []))"

lemma limit_Append_path_nonelem_split: "p âˆˆ limit (Append T k) (ğ’« k u) âŸ¹ p âˆ‰ ğ’« k u âŸ¹
  âˆƒ q ts. p = q@ts âˆ§ q âˆˆ ğ’« k u âˆ§ charslength q = k âˆ§ admissible (q@ts) âˆ§ (âˆ€ t âˆˆ set ts. t âˆˆ T) âˆ§ 
    (âˆ€ t âˆˆ set (butlast ts). chars_of_token t = [])"
proof (induct rule: limit_induct)
  case (Init p) thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Iterate p Y)
  show ?case
  proof (cases "p âˆˆ Y")
    case True
    from Iterate(1)[OF True Iterate(3)] show ?thesis by blast
  next
    case False
    with Append_def Iterate(2) 
    have "âˆƒ q t. p = q@[t] âˆ§ q âˆˆ by_length k Y âˆ§ t âˆˆ T âˆ§ admissible (q @ [t])" by auto
    then obtain q t where qt: "p = q@[t] âˆ§ q âˆˆ by_length k Y âˆ§ t âˆˆ T âˆ§ admissible (q @ [t])" 
      by blast
    from qt have qlen: "charslength q = k" by auto
    have "q âˆˆ ğ’« k u âˆ¨ q âˆ‰ ğ’« k u" by blast
    then show ?thesis
    proof(induct rule: disjCases2)
      case 1
      show ?case
        apply (rule_tac x=q in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="[t]" in exI)
        using qlen by (simp add: qt 1)
    next
      case 2
      have q_in_Y: "q âˆˆ Y" using qt by auto
      from Iterate(1)[OF q_in_Y 2] 
      obtain q' ts where 
        q'ts: "q = q' @ ts âˆ§ q' âˆˆ ğ’« k u âˆ§ charslength q' = k âˆ§ (âˆ€tâˆˆset ts. t âˆˆ T) âˆ§
               (âˆ€tâˆˆset(butlast ts). chars_of_token t = [])"
        by blast
      with qlen have "charslength ts = 0" by auto
      hence empty: "âˆ€ t âˆˆ set(ts). chars_of_token t = []" 
        apply (induct ts)
        by auto
      show ?case
        apply (rule_tac x=q' in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="ts@[t]" in exI)
        using qt q'ts empty by auto
    qed
  qed
qed

lemma limit_Append_path_nonelem_split': 
  "p âˆˆ limit (Append (ğ’µ k (Suc u)) k) (ğ’« k u) âŸ¹ p âˆ‰ ğ’« k u âŸ¹
   âˆƒ q ts. p = q@ts âˆ§ is_continuation k u q ts"
apply (simp only: is_continuation_def)
apply (rule_tac limit_Append_path_nonelem_split)
by auto

lemma final_step_of_path: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u âŸ¹ p â‰  [] âŸ¹ (âˆƒ q ts k' u'. p = q@ts âˆ§ indexlt k' u' k u 
  âˆ§ is_continuation k' u' q ts)"
proof (induct rule: ğ’«_induct)
  case (Induct p k u)
  from Induct(2) Induct(3) have ku_0: "k > 0 âˆ¨ u > 0"
    using nonempty_path_indices by blast
  show ?case  
  proof (cases "u = 0")
    case True
    with ku_0 have k_0: "k > 0" by arith
    with True Induct(2) base_paths have "âˆƒ u'. p âˆˆ ğ’« (k - 1) u'" by auto
    then obtain u' where u': "p âˆˆ ğ’« (k - 1) u'" by blast
    have indexlt: "indexlt (k - 1) u' k u" by (simp add: indexlt_simp k_0)
    from Induct(1)[OF u' indexlt Induct(3)] show ?thesis
      using indexlt indexlt_trans by blast
  next
    case False 
    then have "âˆƒ u'. u = Suc u'" by arith
    then obtain u' where u': "u = Suc u'" by blast
    with Induct(2) have p_limit: "p âˆˆ limit (Append (ğ’µ k (Suc u')) k) (ğ’« k u')"
      using ğ’«.simps(2) by blast
    from u' have indexlt: "indexlt k u' k u" by (simp add: indexlt_simp)
    have "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u' âˆ¨ p âˆ‰ ğ’« k u'" by blast
    then show ?thesis
    proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
      case 1
      from Induct(1)[OF 1 indexlt Induct(3)] show ?case
        using indexlt indexlt_trans by blast
    next
      case 2
      from limit_Append_path_nonelem_split'[OF p_limit 2]
      show ?case using indexlt u' by auto
    qed
  qed
qed      

lemma terminals_empty[simp]: "terminals [] = []"
  by (auto simp add: terminals_def)

lemma empty_in_â„’â‡©P[simp]: "[] âˆˆ â„’â‡©P"
  apply (simp add: â„’â‡©P_def is_derivation_def)
  apply (rule_tac x="[ğ”–]" in exI)
  by simp 
     
lemma admissible_empty[simp]: "admissible []"
  by (auto simp add: admissible_def)

lemma ğ”“_are_admissible: "p âˆˆ ğ”“ âŸ¹ admissible p"
proof (induct rule: ğ”“_induct)
  case Base thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Induct p k u)
  from Induct(2)[simplified] show ?case
  proof (induct rule: limit_induct)
    case (Init p) from Induct(1)[OF Init] show ?case .
  next
    case (Iterate p Y) 
    have "ğ’´ (ğ’µ k u) (ğ’« k u) k âŠ† ğ’³ k" by (metis ğ’µ.simps(2) ğ’µ_subset_ğ’³)
    then have 1: "Append (ğ’´ (ğ’µ k u) (ğ’« k u) k) k Y âŠ† Append (ğ’³ k) k Y"
      by (rule Append_mono, simp) 
    have 2: "p âˆˆ Append (ğ’³ k) k Y âŸ¹ admissible p"
      apply (auto simp add: Append_def)
      by (simp add: Iterate)
    show ?case 
      apply (rule 2)
      using "1" Iterate(2) by blast
  qed  
qed

lemma prefix_of_empty_is_empty: "is_prefix q [] âŸ¹ q = []"
by (metis  is_prefix_cons neq_Nil_conv)

lemma subset_ğ’« :
  assumes leq: "k' < k âˆ¨ (k' = k âˆ§ u' â‰¤ u)"
  shows "ğ’« k' u' âŠ† ğ’« k u"
proof -
  from leq show ?thesis
  proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
    case 1
    have s1: "ğ’« k' u' âŠ† ğ’¬ k'" by (rule_tac subset_ğ’«ğ’¬k) 
    have s2: "ğ’¬ k' âŠ† ğ’¬ (k - 1)" 
      apply (rule_tac subset_ğ’¬)
      using 1 by arith
    from subset_ğ’¬ğ’«Suc[where k="k - 1"] 1 have s3: "ğ’¬ (k - 1) âŠ† ğ’« k 0"
      by simp
    have s4: "ğ’« k 0 âŠ† ğ’« k u" by (rule_tac subset_ğ’«k, simp)
    from s1 s2 s3 s4 subset_trans show ?case by blast
  next
    case 2 thus ?case by (simp add : subset_ğ’«k)
  qed
qed  

lemma empty_path_is_elem[simp]: "[] âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
proof -
  have "[] âˆˆ ğ’« 0 0" by simp
  then show "[] âˆˆ ğ’« k u" by (metis le0 not_gr0 subsetCE subset_ğ’«) 
qed

lemma is_prefix_of_append:
  assumes "is_prefix p (a@b)"
  shows "is_prefix p a âˆ¨ (âˆƒ b'. b' â‰  [] âˆ§ is_prefix b' b âˆ§ p = a@b')"
apply (auto simp add: is_prefix_def) 
by (metis append_Nil2 append_eq_append_conv2 assms is_prefix_cancel is_prefix_def)

lemma prefix_is_continuation: "is_continuation k u p ts âŸ¹ is_prefix ts' ts âŸ¹ 
  is_continuation k u p ts'"
apply (auto simp add: is_continuation_def is_prefix_def)
apply (metis â„’â‡©P_split admissible_def append_assoc terminals_append)
using in_set_butlast_appendI by fastforce 

lemma charslength_0: "(âˆ€ t âˆˆ set ts. chars_of_token t = []) = (charslength ts = 0)"
by (induct ts, auto)
    
lemma is_continuation_in_ğ’«: "is_continuation k u p ts âŸ¹ p@ts âˆˆ ğ’« k (Suc u)"
proof(induct ts rule: rev_induct)
  case Nil thus ?case 
    apply (auto simp add: is_continuation_def)
    using subset_ğ’«Suc by fastforce
next
  case (snoc t ts)
  from snoc(2) have "is_continuation k u p ts"
    by (metis append_Nil2 is_prefix_cancel is_prefix_empty prefix_is_continuation)
  note induct = snoc(1)[OF this]
  then have pts: "p@ts âˆˆ limit (Append (ğ’µ k (Suc u)) k) (ğ’« k u)" by simp
  note is_cont = snoc(2)
  then have admissible: "admissible (p@ts@[t])" by (simp add: is_continuation_def)
  from is_cont have t: "t âˆˆ ğ’µ k (Suc u)" by (simp add: is_continuation_def)
  from is_cont have "âˆ€ t âˆˆ set ts. chars_of_token t = []" by (simp add: is_continuation_def)
  then have charslength_ts: "charslength ts = 0" by (simp only: charslength_0)
  from is_cont have plen: "charslength p = k" by (simp add: is_continuation_def)
  show ?case
    apply (simp only: ğ’«.simps)
    apply (rule_tac limit_step_pointwise[OF pts])
    apply (simp add: pointwise_Append)
    apply (auto simp add: Append_def)
    apply (rule_tac x="fst t" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="snd t" in exI)
    apply (auto simp add: admissible)
    using charslength_ts apply simp
    using plen apply simp
    using t by simp
qed    

lemma indexlt_subset_ğ’«: "indexlt k' u' k u âŸ¹ ğ’« k' (Suc u') âŠ† ğ’« k u"
apply (rule_tac subset_ğ’«)
apply (simp add: indexlt_simp)
apply arith
done

lemma prefixes_are_paths: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u âŸ¹ is_prefix x p âŸ¹ x âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
proof (induct arbitrary: x rule: ğ’«_induct)
  case (Induct p k u)
  show ?case
  proof (cases "p = []")
    case True
    then have "x = []"
      using Induct.prems prefix_of_empty_is_empty by blast 
    then show "x âˆˆ ğ’« k u" by simp
  next
    case False
    from final_step_of_path[OF Induct(2) False]
    obtain q ts k' u' where step: "p = q@ts âˆ§ indexlt k' u' k u âˆ§ is_continuation k' u' q ts"
      by blast
    have subset: "ğ’« k' u' âŠ† ğ’« k u"
      by (metis indexlt_simp less_or_eq_imp_le step subset_ğ’«)
    have "is_prefix x q âˆ¨ (âˆƒ ts'. ts' â‰  [] âˆ§ is_prefix ts' ts âˆ§ x = q@ts')"
      apply (rule_tac is_prefix_of_append)
      using Induct(3) step by auto
    then show ?thesis
    proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
      case 1
        have x: "x âˆˆ ğ’« k' u'"
        using 1 Induct step by (auto simp add: is_continuation_def)
        then show "x âˆˆ ğ’« k u" using subset subsetCE by blast
    next
      case 2
      then obtain ts' where ts': "is_prefix ts' ts âˆ§ x = q@ts'" by blast
      have "is_continuation k' u' q ts'" using step prefix_is_continuation ts' by blast 
      with ts' have "x âˆˆ ğ’« k' (Suc u')"
        apply (simp only: ts')
        apply (rule_tac is_continuation_in_ğ’«)
        by simp
      with subset show "x âˆˆ ğ’« k u" using indexlt_subset_ğ’« step by blast
    qed
  qed
qed  

lemma empty_or_last_of_suffix:
  assumes "q = q' @ [t]"
  assumes "q = p @ ts"
  shows "ts = [] âˆ¨ (âˆƒ ts'. q' = p @ ts' âˆ§ ts'@[t] = ts)"
by (metis assms(1) assms(2) butlast_append last_appendR snoc_eq_iff_butlast)

lemma is_prefix_butlast: "is_prefix q (butlast p) âŸ¹ is_prefix q p"
by (metis butlast_conv_take is_prefix_append is_prefix_def is_prefix_take)
        
lemma last_step_of_path:
  "q âˆˆ ğ’« k u âŸ¹ q = q'@[t] âŸ¹
   âˆƒ k' u'. indexlt k' u' k u âˆ§ q âˆˆ ğ’« k' (Suc u') âˆ§ charslength q' = k' âˆ§ t âˆˆ ğ’µ k' (Suc u')"
proof (induct arbitrary: q' t rule: ğ’«_induct)
  case (Induct q k u)
    have "âˆƒ p ts k' u'. q = p@ts âˆ§ indexlt k' u' k u âˆ§ is_continuation k' u' p ts"
      apply (rule_tac final_step_of_path)
      apply (simp add: Induct(2))
      apply (simp add: Induct(3))
      done
    then obtain p ts k' u' where pts: "q = p@ts âˆ§ indexlt k' u' k u âˆ§ is_continuation k' u' p ts"
      by blast
    then have indexlt: "indexlt k' u' k u" by auto
    from pts have "ts = [] âˆ¨ (âˆƒ ts'. q' = p @ ts' âˆ§ ts'@[t] = ts)"
      by (metis empty_or_last_of_suffix Induct(3))
    then show ?case
    proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
      case 1
        with pts have q: "q âˆˆ ğ’« k' u'" by (auto simp add: is_continuation_def)
        from Induct(1)[OF this indexlt Induct(3)] show ?case
          using indexlt indexlt_trans by blast
    next
      case 2
        then obtain ts' where ts': "q' = p @ ts' âˆ§ ts'@[t] = ts" by blast
        then have "is_prefix ts' ts" using is_prefix_def by blast 
        then have "is_continuation k' u' p ts'" by (metis prefix_is_continuation pts)
        have "charslength ts' = 0" using charslength_0 is_continuation_def pts ts' by auto 
        then have q'len: "charslength q' = k'" using is_continuation_def pts ts' by auto 
        have "t âˆˆ set ts" using ts' by auto
        with pts have t_in_ğ’µ: "t âˆˆ ğ’µ k' (Suc u')" using is_continuation_def by blast 
        have q_dom: "q âˆˆ ğ’« k' (Suc u')" using pts is_continuation_in_ğ’« by blast
        show ?case  
          apply (rule_tac x=k' in exI)
          apply (rule_tac x=u' in exI)
          by (simp only: indexlt q'len t_in_ğ’µ q_dom)
    qed
qed
      
lemma charslength_of_butlast_0: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k 0 âŸ¹ p = q@[t] âŸ¹ charslength q < k"
using last_step_of_path LocalLexing_axioms indexlt_simp by blast

lemma charslength_of_butlast: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u âŸ¹ p = q@[t] âŸ¹ charslength q â‰¤ k"
by (metis indexlt_simp last_step_of_path eq_imp_le less_imp_le_nat)

lemma last_token_of_path:
  assumes "q âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
  assumes "q = q'@[t]"
  assumes "charslength q' = k"
  shows "t âˆˆ ğ’µ k u"
proof -
  from assms have "âˆƒ k' u'. indexlt k' u' k u âˆ§ q âˆˆ ğ’« k' (Suc u') âˆ§ charslength q' = k' âˆ§ 
    t âˆˆ ğ’µ k' (Suc u')" using last_step_of_path by blast
  then obtain k' u' where th: "indexlt k' u' k u âˆ§ q âˆˆ ğ’« k' (Suc u') âˆ§ charslength q' = k' âˆ§ 
    t âˆˆ ğ’µ k' (Suc u')" by blast
  with assms(3) have k': "k' = k" by blast
  with th have "t âˆˆ ğ’µ k' (Suc u') âˆ§ u' < u" using indexlt_simp by auto
  then show ?thesis
    by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) ğ’µ_subset_Suc k' linorder_neqE_nat not_less_eq 
      subsetCE subset_fSuc_strict)
qed

lemma final_step_of_path': "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u âŸ¹ p âˆ‰ ğ’« k (u - 1) âŸ¹ 
  âˆƒ q ts. u > 0 âˆ§ p = q@ts âˆ§ is_continuation k (u - 1) q ts"
by (metis Suc_diff_1 ğ’«.simps(2) diff_0_eq_0 limit_Append_path_nonelem_split' not_gr0)

lemma is_continuation_continue:
  assumes "is_continuation k u q ts"
  assumes "charslength ts = 0"
  assumes "t âˆˆ ğ’µ k (Suc u)"
  assumes "admissible (q @ ts @ [t])"
  shows "is_continuation k u q (ts@[t])"
proof -
  from assms show ?thesis
    by (simp add: is_continuation_def charslength_0)
qed

(* In an older version of local lexing, compatibility was an assumption we had to make, 
   but now it is a theorem *)

theorem compatibility_def:
  assumes p_in_dom: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
  assumes q_in_dom: "q âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
  assumes p_charslength: "charslength p = k"
  assumes q_split: "q = q'@[t]"
  assumes q'len: "charslength q' = k"
  assumes admissible: "admissible (p @ [t])" 
  shows "p @ [t] âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
proof - 
  have u: "u > 0"
  proof (cases "u = 0")
    case True
      then have "charslength q' < k" 
        using charslength_of_butlast_0 q_in_dom q_split by blast       
      with q'len have "False" by arith
      then show ?thesis by blast
  next
    case False
      then show ?thesis by arith
  qed
  have t_dom: "t âˆˆ ğ’µ k u" using last_token_of_path q'len q_in_dom q_split by blast  
  have "p âˆˆ ğ’« k (u - 1) âˆ¨ p âˆ‰ ğ’« k (u - 1)" by blast
  then show ?thesis
  proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
    case 1
      with t_dom p_charslength admissible u have "is_continuation k (u - 1) p [t]"
        by (auto simp add: is_continuation_def)
      with u show "p@[t] âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
        by (metis One_nat_def Suc_pred is_continuation_in_ğ’«)
  next
    case 2
      from final_step_of_path'[OF p_in_dom 2] 
      obtain p' ts where p': "p = p' @ ts âˆ§ is_continuation k (u - 1) p' ts"
        by blast
      from p' p_charslength is_continuation_def have charslength_ts: "charslength ts = 0"
        by auto
      from u have u': "Suc (u - 1) = u" by arith
      have "is_continuation k (u - 1) p' (ts@[t])"
        apply (rule_tac is_continuation_continue)
        using p' apply blast
        using charslength_ts apply blast
        apply (simp only: u' t_dom)
        using admissible p' apply auto
        done
      from is_continuation_in_ğ’«[OF this] show ?case by (simp only: p' u', simp)
  qed
qed    

lemma is_prefix_admissible:
  assumes "is_prefix a b"
  assumes "admissible b"
  shows "admissible a"
proof -
  from assms show ?thesis
    by (auto simp add: is_prefix_def admissible_def â„’â‡©P_def)
qed  

lemma butlast_split: "n < length q âŸ¹ butlast q = (take n q)@(drop n (butlast q))"
by (metis append_take_drop_id take_butlast)

lemma in_ğ’«_charslength:
  assumes p_dom: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
  shows "âˆƒ v. p âˆˆ ğ’« (charslength p) v"
proof (cases "charslength p â‰¥ k")
  case True
    show ?thesis
      apply (rule_tac x=u in exI)
      by (metis True le_neq_implies_less p_dom subsetCE subset_ğ’«)
next
  case False
    then have charslength: "charslength p < k" by arith
    have "p = [] âˆ¨ p â‰  []" by blast
    thus ?thesis
    proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
      case 1 thus ?case by simp
    next
      case 2
        from final_step_of_path[OF p_dom 2] obtain q ts k' u' where
          step: "p = q @ ts âˆ§ indexlt k' u' k u âˆ§ is_continuation k' u' q ts" by blast
        from step have k': "charslength q = k'" using is_continuation_def by blast  
        from step have "charslength q â‰¤ charslength p"  by simp       
        with k' have k': "k' â‰¤ charslength p" by simp
        from step have "p âˆˆ ğ’« k' (Suc u')" using is_continuation_in_ğ’« by blast 
        with k' have "p âˆˆ ğ’« (charslength p) (Suc u')"
          by (metis le_neq_implies_less subsetCE subset_ğ’«) 
        then show ?case by blast
    qed
qed

theorem general_compatibility:
  "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u âŸ¹ q âˆˆ ğ’« k u âŸ¹ charslength p = charslength (take n q) 
    âŸ¹ charslength p â‰¤ k âŸ¹ admissible (p @ (drop n q)) âŸ¹ p @ (drop n q) âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
proof (induct "length q - n" arbitrary: p q n k u)
  case 0
    from 0 have "0 = length q - n" by auto
    then have n: "n â‰¥ length q" by arith
    then have "drop n q = []" by auto
    then show ?case by (simp add: "0.prems"(1)) 
next
  case (Suc l)
    have "n â‰¥ length q âˆ¨ n < length q" by arith
    then show ?case
    proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
      case 1
        then have "drop n q = []" by auto
        then show ?case by (simp add: Suc.prems(1))
    next
      case 2
        then have "length q > 0" by auto
        then have q_nonempty: "q â‰  []" by auto
        let ?q' = "butlast q"
        from q_nonempty Suc(2) have h1: "l = length ?q' - n" by auto
        have h2: "?q' âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
          by (metis Suc.prems(2) butlast_conv_take is_prefix_take prefixes_are_paths)
        have h3: "charslength p = charslength (take n ?q')"
          using "2.hyps" Suc.prems(3) take_butlast by force
        have "is_prefix (p @ drop n ?q') (p @ drop n q)"
          by (simp add: butlast_conv_take drop_take)
        note h4 = is_prefix_admissible[OF this Suc.prems(5)] 
        note induct = Suc(1)[OF h1 Suc(3) h2 h3 Suc.prems(4) h4] 
        let ?p' = "p @ (drop n (butlast q))"
        from induct have "?p' âˆˆ ğ’« k u" .
        let ?i = "charslength ?p'"
        have charslength_i[symmetric]: "charslength ?q' = ?i"
          using Suc.prems(3) apply simp
          apply (subst butlast_split[OF 2])
          by simp
        have q_split: "q = ?q'@[last q]" by (simp add: q_nonempty)
        with Suc.prems(2) charslength_of_butlast have charslength_q': "charslength ?q' â‰¤ k" 
          by blast 
        from q_nonempty have p'last: "?p'@[last q] = p@(drop n q)"
          by (metis "2.hyps" append_assoc drop_eq_Nil drop_keep_last not_le q_split)
        have "?i â‰¤ k" by (simp only: charslength_i charslength_q')
        then have "?i = k âˆ¨ ?i < k" by auto
        then show ?case
        proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
          case 1
            have charslength_q': "charslength ?q' = k" using charslength_i[symmetric] 1 by blast
            from compatibility_def[OF induct Suc.prems(2) 1 q_split charslength_q']
            show ?case by (simp only: p'last Suc.prems(5))
        next
          case 2
            from in_ğ’«_charslength[OF induct]
            obtain v1 where v1: "?p' âˆˆ ğ’« ?i v1" by blast 
            from last_step_of_path[OF Suc.prems(2) q_split] 
            have "âˆƒ u. q âˆˆ ğ’« ?i u" by (metis charslength_i)
            then obtain v2 where v2: "q âˆˆ ğ’« ?i v2" by blast
            let ?v = "max v1 v2"
            have "v1 â‰¤ ?v" by auto
            with v1 have dom1: "?p' âˆˆ ğ’« ?i ?v" by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) subsetCE subset_ğ’«k) 
            have "v2 â‰¤ ?v" by auto
            with v2 have dom2: "q âˆˆ ğ’« ?i ?v" by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) subsetCE subset_ğ’«k) 
            from compatibility_def[OF dom1 dom2 _ q_split] 
            have "p @ drop n q âˆˆ ğ’« ?i ?v"
              by (simp only: p'last charslength_i[symmetric] Suc.prems(5))
            then show "p @ drop n q âˆˆ ğ’« k u" by (meson "2.hyps" subsetCE subset_ğ’«) 
        qed                                                          
    qed        
qed

lemma wellformed_item_derives:
  assumes wellformed: "wellformed_item x"
  shows "derives [item_nonterminal x] (item_rhs x)"
proof -
  from wellformed have "(item_nonterminal x, item_rhs x) âˆˆ â„œ"
    by (simp add: item_nonterminal_def item_rhs_def wellformed_item_def)
  then show ?thesis
    by (metis append_Nil2 derives1_def derives1_implies_derives is_sentence_concat 
        rule_Î±_type self_append_conv2)
qed      

lemma wellformed_complete_item_Î²:
  assumes wellformed: "wellformed_item x"
  assumes complete: "is_complete x" 
  shows "item_Î² x = []"
using complete is_complete_def item_Î²_def by auto

lemma wellformed_complete_item_derives:
  assumes wellformed: "wellformed_item x"
  assumes complete: "is_complete x" 
  shows "derives [item_nonterminal x] (item_Î± x)"
using complete is_complete_def item_Î±_def wellformed wellformed_item_derives by auto 

lemma is_derivation_implies_admissible:
  "is_derivation (terminals p @ Î´) âŸ¹ is_word (terminals p) âŸ¹ admissible p"
using â„’â‡©P_def admissible_def by blast

lemma item_rhs_of_inc_item[simp]: "item_rhs (inc_item x k) = item_rhs x"
  by (auto simp add: inc_item_def item_rhs_def)

lemma item_rule_of_inc_item[simp]: "item_rule (inc_item x k) = item_rule x"
  by (simp add: inc_item_def)

lemma item_origin_of_inc_item[simp]: "item_origin (inc_item x k) = item_origin x"
  by (simp add: inc_item_def)

lemma item_end_of_inc_item[simp]: "item_end (inc_item x k) = k"
  by (simp add: inc_item_def)

lemma item_dot_of_inc_item[simp]: "item_dot (inc_item x k) = (item_dot x) + 1"
  by (simp add: inc_item_def)

lemma item_nonterminal_of_inc_item[simp]: "item_nonterminal (inc_item x k) = item_nonterminal x"
  by (simp add: inc_item_def item_nonterminal_def)

lemma wellformed_inc_item:
  assumes wellformed: "wellformed_item x"
  assumes next_symbol: "next_symbol x = Some s"
  assumes k_upper_bound: "k â‰¤ length Doc"
  assumes k_lower_bound: "k â‰¥ item_end x"
  shows "wellformed_item (inc_item x k)"
proof -
  have k_lower_bound': "k â‰¥ item_origin x"
    using k_lower_bound wellformed wellformed_item_def by auto  
  show ?thesis
    apply (auto simp add: wellformed_item_def k_upper_bound k_lower_bound')
    using wellformed wellformed_item_def apply blast
    using is_complete_def next_symbol next_symbol_not_complete not_less_eq_eq by blast
qed    

lemma item_Î±_of_inc_item:
  assumes wellformed: "wellformed_item x"
  assumes next_symbol: "next_symbol x = Some s"
  shows "item_Î± (inc_item x k) = item_Î± x @ [s]"
by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) item_dot_of_inc_item item_rhs_of_inc_item 
  One_nat_def add.right_neutral add_Suc_right is_complete_def item_Î±_def item_Î²_def 
  le_neq_implies_less list.sel(1) next_symbol next_symbol_not_complete next_symbol_starts_item_Î² 
  take_hd_drop wellformed wellformed_item_def)

lemma derives1_pad: 
  assumes derives1: "derives1 Î± Î²"
  assumes u: "is_sentence u"
  assumes v: "is_sentence v"
  shows "derives1 (u@Î±@v) (u@Î²@v)"
proof -
  from derives1 have 
   "âˆƒx y N Î´. Î± = x @ [N] @ y âˆ§ Î² = x @ Î´ @ y âˆ§ is_sentence x âˆ§ is_sentence y âˆ§ (N, Î´) âˆˆ â„œ"
   by (auto simp add: derives1_def)
  then obtain x y N Î´ where 
   1: "Î± = x @ [N] @ y âˆ§ Î² = x @ Î´ @ y âˆ§ is_sentence x âˆ§ is_sentence y âˆ§ (N, Î´) âˆˆ â„œ" by blast
  show ?thesis
    apply (simp only: derives1_def)
    apply (rule_tac x="u@x" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="y@v" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x=N in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x=Î´ in exI)
    using 1 u v is_sentence_concat by auto
qed

lemma derives_pad:
  "derives Î± Î² âŸ¹ is_sentence u âŸ¹ is_sentence v âŸ¹ derives (u@Î±@v) (u@Î²@v)"
proof (induct rule: derives_induct)
  case Base thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Step y z) 
    from Step have 1: "derives (u@Î±@v) (u@y@v)" by auto
    from Step have 2: "derives1 y z" by auto
    then have "derives1 (u@y@v) (u@z@v)" by (simp add: Step.prems derives1_pad)    
    then show ?case
      using "1" derives1_implies_derives derives_trans by blast
qed  

lemma derives1_is_sentence: "derives1 Î± Î² âŸ¹ is_sentence Î± âˆ§ is_sentence Î²"
using Derives1_sentence1 Derives1_sentence2 derives1_implies_Derives1 by blast

lemma derives_is_sentence: "derives Î± Î² âŸ¹ (Î± = Î²) âˆ¨ (is_sentence Î± âˆ§ is_sentence Î²)"
proof (induct rule: derives_induct)
  case Base thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Step y z) 
    show ?case using Step.hyps(2) Step.hyps(3) derives1_is_sentence by blast
qed

lemma derives_append: 
  assumes au: "derives a u"
  assumes bv: "derives b v"
  assumes is_sentence_a: "is_sentence a"
  assumes is_sentence_b: "is_sentence b"
  shows "derives (a@b) (u@v)"
proof -
  from au have "a = u âˆ¨ (is_sentence a âˆ§ is_sentence u)"
    using derives_is_sentence by blast
  then have au_sentences: "is_sentence a âˆ§ is_sentence u" using is_sentence_a by blast 
  from bv have "b = v âˆ¨ (is_sentence b âˆ§ is_sentence v)"
    using derives_is_sentence by blast
  then have bv_sentences: "is_sentence b âˆ§ is_sentence v" using is_sentence_b by blast 
  have 1: "derives (a@b) (u@b)"
    apply (rule_tac derives_pad[OF au, where u="[]", simplified])
    using is_sentence_b by auto
  have 2: "derives (u@b) (u@v)"
    apply (rule_tac derives_pad[OF bv, where v="[]", simplified])
    apply (simp add: au_sentences)
    done
  from 1 2 derives_trans show ?thesis by blast
qed  

lemma is_sentence_item_Î±: "wellformed_item x âŸ¹ is_sentence (item_Î± x)"
  by (metis is_sentence_take item_Î±_def item_rhs_def prod.collapse rule_Î±_type wellformed_item_def)

lemma is_nonterminal_item_nonterminal:  "wellformed_item x âŸ¹ is_nonterminal (item_nonterminal x)"
  by (metis item_nonterminal_def prod.collapse rule_nonterminal_type wellformed_item_def)
  
lemma Complete_elem_in_Gen:
  assumes I_in_Gen: "I âŠ† Gen (ğ’« k u)"
  assumes k: "k â‰¤ length Doc"
  assumes x_in_Complete: "x âˆˆ Complete k I"
  shows "x âˆˆ Gen (ğ’« k u)"
proof -
  let ?P = "ğ’« k u"
  from x_in_Complete have "x âˆˆ I âˆ¨ (âˆƒ x1 x2. x = inc_item x1 k âˆ§ 
     x1 âˆˆ bin I (item_origin x2) âˆ§ x2 âˆˆ bin I k âˆ§ is_complete x2 âˆ§ 
     next_symbol x1 = Some (item_nonterminal x2))"
     by (auto simp add: Complete_def)
  then show ?thesis
  proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
    case 1 thus ?case using I_in_Gen subsetCE by blast 
  next
    case 2 
    then obtain x1 x2 where x12: "x = inc_item x1 k âˆ§ 
      x1 âˆˆ bin I (item_origin x2) âˆ§ x2 âˆˆ bin I k âˆ§ is_complete x2 âˆ§ 
      next_symbol x1 = Some (item_nonterminal x2)" by blast
    from x12 have "âˆƒ p1 p2. p1 âˆˆ ?P âˆ§ pvalid p1 x1 âˆ§ p2 âˆˆ ?P âˆ§ pvalid p2 x2"
      by (meson Gen_implies_pvalid I_in_Gen bin_elem subsetCE)
    then obtain p1 p2 where p1: "p1 âˆˆ ?P âˆ§ pvalid p1 x1" and p2: "p2 âˆˆ ?P âˆ§ pvalid p2 x2"
      by blast
    from p1 obtain w Î´ where p1valid:
      "wellformed_tokens p1 âˆ§
       wellformed_item x1 âˆ§
       w â‰¤ length p1 âˆ§
       charslength p1 = item_end x1 âˆ§
       charslength (take w p1) = item_origin x1 âˆ§
       is_derivation (terminals (take w p1) @ [item_nonterminal x1] @ Î´) âˆ§
       derives (item_Î± x1) (terminals (drop w p1))"
       using pvalid_def by blast
    from p2 obtain y Î³ where p2valid:
      "wellformed_tokens p2 âˆ§
       wellformed_item x2 âˆ§
       y â‰¤ length p2 âˆ§
       charslength p2 = item_end x2 âˆ§
       charslength (take y p2) = item_origin x2 âˆ§
       is_derivation (terminals (take y p2) @ [item_nonterminal x2] @ Î³) âˆ§
       derives (item_Î± x2) (terminals (drop y p2))"
       using pvalid_def by blast
    let ?r = "p1 @ (drop y p2)"
    have charslength_p1_eq: "charslength p1 = item_end x1" by (simp only: p1valid)
    from x12 have item_end_x1: "item_end x1 = item_origin x2" 
      using bin_def mem_Collect_eq by blast
    have item_end_x2: "item_end x2 = k" using bin_def x12 by blast 
    then have charslength_p1_leq: "charslength p1 â‰¤ k"
      using charslength_p1_eq item_end_x1 p2valid wellformed_item_def by auto 
    have "âˆƒÎ´'. item_Î² x1 = [item_nonterminal x2] @ Î´'"
      by (simp add: next_symbol_starts_item_Î² p1valid x12)  
    then obtain Î´' where Î´': "item_Î² x1 = [item_nonterminal x2] @ Î´'" by blast
    have "is_derivation ((terminals (take w p1))@(item_rhs x1)@Î´)"
      using is_derivation_derives p1valid wellformed_item_derives by blast
    then have "is_derivation ((terminals (take w p1))@(item_Î± x1 @ item_Î² x1)@Î´)"
       by (simp add: item_rhs_split)
    then have "is_derivation ((terminals (take w p1))@((terminals (drop w p1)) @ item_Î² x1)@Î´)"
      using is_derivation_derives p1valid by auto
    then have "is_derivation ((terminals p1)@(item_Î² x1)@Î´)"
      by (metis append_assoc append_take_drop_id terminals_append)
    then have "is_derivation ((terminals p1)@([item_nonterminal x2] @ Î´')@Î´)"
      using is_derivation_derives Î´' by auto
    then have "is_derivation ((terminals p1)@(terminals (drop y p2)) @ Î´' @Î´)"
      using is_complete_def is_derivation_derives is_derivation_step item_Î±_def 
        item_nonterminal_def item_rhs_def p2valid wellformed_item_def x12 by auto
    then have "is_derivation (terminals (p1 @ (drop y p2)) @ (Î´' @ Î´))" by simp
    then have admissible_r: "admissible (p1 @ (drop y p2))"
      apply (rule_tac is_derivation_implies_admissible)
      apply auto
      apply (rule is_word_terminals)
      apply (simp add: p1valid)
      using p2valid using is_word_terminals_drop terminals_drop by auto 
    have r_in_dom: "?r âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
      apply (rule_tac general_compatibility)
      apply (simp add: p1)
      apply (simp add: p2)
      apply (simp only: p2valid charslength_p1_eq item_end_x1)
      apply (simp only: charslength_p1_leq)
      by (simp add: admissible_r)
    have wellformed_r: "wellformed_tokens ?r" 
      using admissible_r admissible_wellformed_tokens by blast 
    have wellformed_x: "wellformed_item x"
      apply (simp add: x12)
      apply (rule_tac wellformed_inc_item)
      apply (simp add: p1valid)
      apply (simp add: x12)
      apply (simp add: k)
      using charslength_p1_eq charslength_p1_leq by auto
    have charslength_p1_as_p2: "charslength p1 = charslength (take y p2)"
      using charslength_p1_eq item_end_x1 p2valid by linarith     
    then have charslength_r: "charslength ?r = item_end x"
      apply (simp add: x12)
      apply (subst length_append[symmetric])
      apply (subst chars_append[symmetric])
      apply (subst append_take_drop_id)
      using item_end_x2 p2valid by auto
    have item_Î±_x: "item_Î± x = item_Î± x1 @ [item_nonterminal x2]"
      using x12 p1valid by (simp add: item_Î±_of_inc_item)
    from p2valid have derives_item_nonterminal_x2:
      "derives [item_nonterminal x2] (terminals (drop y p2))"
      using derives_trans wellformed_complete_item_derives x12 by blast
    have "pvalid ?r x"
      apply (auto simp only: pvalid_def)
      apply (rule_tac x=w in exI)
      apply (rule_tac x=Î´ in exI)
      apply (auto simp only:)
      apply (simp add: wellformed_r)
      apply (simp add: wellformed_x)
      using p1valid apply simp
      apply (simp only: charslength_r)
      using x12 p1valid apply simp
      using x12 p1valid apply simp
      apply (simp add:  item_Î±_x)
      apply (rule_tac derives_append)
      using p1valid apply simp
      using derives_item_nonterminal_x2 p1valid apply auto[1]
      using is_sentence_item_Î± p1valid apply blast
      using is_derivation_is_sentence is_sentence_concat p2valid by blast
    with r_in_dom show ?case using Gen_def mem_Collect_eq by blast
  qed
qed

lemma Complete_subset_Gen:
  assumes I_in_Gen_P: "I âŠ† Gen (ğ’« k u)"
  assumes k: "k â‰¤ length Doc"
  shows "Complete k I âŠ† Gen (ğ’« k u)"
using Complete_elem_in_Gen I_in_Gen_P k by blast

lemma ğ’«_are_admissible: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u âŸ¹ admissible p"
apply (rule_tac ğ”“_are_admissible)
using ğ”“_covers_ğ’« subsetCE by blast

lemma is_continuation_base:
  assumes p_dom: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
  assumes charslength_p: "charslength p = k"
  shows "is_continuation k u p []"
apply (auto simp add: is_continuation_def)
apply (simp add: p_dom)
using charslength_p apply simp
using ğ’«_are_admissible p_dom by blast

lemma is_continuation_empty_chars: 
  "is_continuation k u q ts âŸ¹ charslength (q@ts) = k âŸ¹ chars ts = []"
by (simp add: is_continuation_def)

lemma ğ’µ_subset: "u â‰¤ v âŸ¹ ğ’µ k u âŠ† ğ’µ k v"
using ğ’µ_subset_Suc subset_fSuc by blast

lemma is_continuation_increase_u:
  assumes cont: "is_continuation k u q ts"
  assumes uv: "u â‰¤ v"
  shows "is_continuation k v q ts"
proof -
  have "q âˆˆ ğ’« k u" using cont is_continuation_def by blast
  with uv have q_dom: "q âˆˆ ğ’« k v" by (meson subsetCE subset_ğ’«k) 
  from uv have ğ’µ: "â‹€ t. t âˆˆ ğ’µ k (Suc u) âŸ¹ t âˆˆ ğ’µ k (Suc v)"
    using ğ’µ_subset le_neq_implies_less less_imp_le_nat not_less_eq subsetCE by blast  
  show ?thesis
    apply (auto simp only: is_continuation_def)
    apply (simp add: q_dom)
    using cont is_continuation_def apply simp
    using cont is_continuation_def apply simp
    using cont is_continuation_def ğ’µ apply simp
    using cont is_continuation_def apply (simp only:)
    done
qed

lemma pvalid_next_symbol_derivable:
  assumes pvalid: "pvalid p x" 
  assumes next_symbol: "next_symbol x = Some s"
  shows "âˆƒ Î´. is_derivation((terminals p)@[s]@Î´)"
proof -
  from pvalid pvalid_def have wellformed_x: "wellformed_item x" by auto
  from next_symbol_starts_item_Î²[OF wellformed_x next_symbol]
  obtain Ï‰ where Ï‰: "item_Î² x = [s] @ Ï‰" by auto
  from pvalid have "âˆƒ Î³. is_derivation((terminals p)@(item_Î² x)@Î³)"
    using pvalid_is_derivation_terminals_item_Î² by blast
  then obtain Î³ where "is_derivation((terminals p)@(item_Î² x)@Î³)" by blast
  with Ï‰ have "is_derivation((terminals p)@[s]@Ï‰@Î³)" by auto
  then show ?thesis by blast
qed

lemma pvalid_admissible: 
  assumes pvalid: "pvalid p x" 
  shows "admissible p"
proof -
  have "âˆƒ Î´. is_derivation((terminals p)@(item_Î² x)@Î´)"
    by (simp add: pvalid pvalid_is_derivation_terminals_item_Î²)
  then obtain Î´ where Î´: "is_derivation((terminals p)@(item_Î² x)@Î´)" by blast
  have is_word: "is_word (terminals p)"
    using pvalid_def is_word_terminals pvalid by blast 
  show ?thesis using Î´ is_derivation_implies_admissible is_word by blast
qed 

lemma pvalid_next_terminal_admissible:
  assumes pvalid: "pvalid p x" 
  assumes next_symbol: "next_symbol x = Some t"
  assumes terminal: "is_terminal t"
  shows "admissible (p@[(t, c)])"
proof -
  have "is_word (terminals p)"
    using is_word_terminals pvalid pvalid_def by blast
  then show ?thesis
    using is_derivation_implies_admissible next_symbol pvalid pvalid_next_symbol_derivable 
      terminal by fastforce
qed

lemma ğ’³_wellformed: "t âˆˆ ğ’³ k âŸ¹ wellformed_token t"
  by (simp add: ğ’³_are_terminals wellformed_token_def)

lemma ğ’µ_wellformed: "t âˆˆ ğ’µ k u âŸ¹ wellformed_token t"
  using ğ’³_wellformed ğ’µ_subset_ğ’³ by blast
 
lemma Scan_elem_in_Gen:
  assumes I_in_Gen: "I âŠ† Gen (ğ’« k u)"
  assumes k: "k â‰¤ length Doc"
  assumes T: "T âŠ† ğ’µ k u"
  assumes x_in_Scan: "x âˆˆ Scan T k I"
  shows "x âˆˆ Gen (ğ’« k u)"
proof -
  have "u = 0 âŸ¹ x âˆˆ I" 
  proof -
    assume "u = 0"
    then have "ğ’µ k u = {}" by simp
    then have "T = {}" using T by blast
    then have "Scan T k I = I" by (simp add: Scan_empty)
    then show "x âˆˆ I" using x_in_Scan by simp
  qed
  then have "x âˆˆ I âˆ¨ (u > 0 âˆ§ (âˆƒ y t c. x = inc_item y (k + length c) âˆ§ y âˆˆ bin I k âˆ§ 
    (t, c) âˆˆ T âˆ§ next_symbol y = Some t))" using x_in_Scan Scan_def by auto
  then show ?thesis
  proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
    case 1 thus ?case using I_in_Gen by blast
  next
    case 2 
    then obtain y t c where x_is_scan: "x = inc_item y (k + length c) âˆ§ y âˆˆ bin I k âˆ§ 
       (t, c) âˆˆ T âˆ§ next_symbol y = Some t" by blast
    have u_gt_0: "0 < u" using 2 by blast
    have "âˆƒ p âˆˆ ğ’« k u. pvalid p y" using Gen_implies_pvalid I_in_Gen bin_elem x_is_scan by blast 
    then obtain p where p: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u âˆ§ pvalid p y" by blast
    have p_dom: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u" using p by blast
    from p pvalid_def x_is_scan have charslength_p: "charslength p = k"
      using bin_def mem_Collect_eq by auto 
    obtain tok where tok: "tok = (t, c)" using x_is_scan by blast
    have tok_dom: "tok âˆˆ ğ’µ k u" using tok x_is_scan T by blast
    have "p = [] âˆ¨ p â‰  []" by blast
    then have "âˆƒ q ts u'. p = q@ts âˆ§ u' < u âˆ§ charslength ts = 0 âˆ§ is_continuation k u' q ts"
    proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
      case 1 thus ?case
        apply (rule_tac x=p in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="[]" in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="0" in exI)
        apply (simp add: 2 is_continuation_def)
        using charslength_p by simp
    next
      case 2
      from final_step_of_path[OF p_dom 2] obtain q ts k' u'
        where final_step: "p = q @ ts âˆ§ indexlt k' u' k u âˆ§ is_continuation k' u' q ts" by blast
      then have "k' â‰¤ k" using indexlt_simp by auto 
      then have "k' < k âˆ¨ k' = k" by arith
      then show ?case
      proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
        case 1 
        have "p âˆˆ ğ’« k' (Suc u')" using final_step is_continuation_in_ğ’« by blast 
        then have p_dom: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k 0" by (meson 1 subsetCE subset_ğ’«) 
        with charslength_p have "is_continuation k 0 p []" using is_continuation_base by blast 
        then show ?case
          apply (rule_tac x=p in exI)
          apply (rule_tac x="[]" in exI)
          apply (rule_tac x="0" in exI)
          apply (simp add: u_gt_0)
          done
      next
        case 2
        with final_step indexlt_simp have "u' < u" by auto
        then show ?case
          apply (rule_tac x=q in exI)
          apply (rule_tac x=ts in exI)
          apply (rule_tac x=u' in exI)
          using final_step 2 apply auto
          using charslength_p is_continuation_empty_chars by blast
      qed
    qed
    then obtain q ts u' where 
      p_split: "p = q@ts âˆ§ u' < u âˆ§ charslength ts = 0 âˆ§ is_continuation k u' q ts" by blast
    then have "âˆƒ u''. u' â‰¤ u'' âˆ§ Suc u'' = u" by (auto, arith)
    then obtain u'' where u'': " u' â‰¤ u'' âˆ§ Suc u'' = u" by blast
    with p_split have cont_u'': "is_continuation k u'' q ts" 
      using is_continuation_increase_u by blast 
    have admissible: "admissible (p@[tok])"
      apply (simp add: tok)
      apply (rule_tac pvalid_next_terminal_admissible[where x=y])
      apply (simp add: p)
      apply (simp add: x_is_scan)
      using ğ’µ_wellformed tok tok_dom wellformed_token_def by auto 
    have "is_continuation k u'' q (ts@[tok])"
      apply (rule is_continuation_continue)
      apply (simp add: cont_u'')
      using p_split apply simp
      using u'' tok_dom apply simp
      using admissible p_split by auto
    with p_split u'' have ptok_dom: "p@[tok] âˆˆ ğ’« k u" 
      using append_assoc is_continuation_in_ğ’« by auto 
    from p obtain i Î³ where valid:
      "wellformed_tokens p âˆ§
       wellformed_item y âˆ§
       i â‰¤ length p âˆ§
       charslength p = item_end y âˆ§
       charslength (take i p) = item_origin y âˆ§
       is_derivation (terminals (take i p) @ [item_nonterminal y] @ Î³) âˆ§
       derives (item_Î± y) (terminals (drop i p))" using pvalid_def by blast 
    have clen_ptok: "k + length c = charslength (p@[tok])"
      using charslength_p tok by simp
    from ptok_dom have ptok_doc_tokens: "doc_tokens (p@[tok])"
      using ğ”“_are_doc_tokens ğ”“_covers_ğ’« rev_subsetD by blast
    have wellformed_x: "wellformed_item x"
      apply (simp add: x_is_scan)
      apply (rule_tac wellformed_inc_item)
      apply (simp add: valid)
      apply (simp add: x_is_scan)
      apply (simp only: clen_ptok) 
      using ptok_doc_tokens charslength.simps doc_tokens_length apply presburger 
      apply (simp only: clen_ptok)
      using valid by auto
