    have "pvalid (p@[tok]) x"
      apply (auto simp only: pvalid_def)
      apply (rule_tac x=i in exI)
      apply (rule_tac x=Î³ in exI)
      apply (auto simp only:)
      using ptok_dom admissible admissible_wellformed_tokens apply blast 
      apply (simp add: wellformed_x)
      using valid apply simp
      apply (simp add: x_is_scan clen_ptok)
      using valid apply (simp add: x_is_scan)
      using valid apply (simp add: x_is_scan)
      using valid apply (simp add: x_is_scan)
      apply (subst item_Î±_of_inc_item)
      using valid apply simp
      using x_is_scan apply simp
      apply (rule_tac derives_append)
      apply simp
      apply (simp add: tok)
      using is_sentence_item_Î± apply blast
      by (meson pvalid_next_symbol_derivable LocalLexing_axioms is_derivation_is_sentence 
          is_sentence_concat p x_is_scan)
    with ptok_dom show ?thesis
      using Gen_def mem_Collect_eq by blast
  qed
qed

lemma Scan_subset_Gen:
  assumes I_in_Gen: "I âŠ† Gen (ğ’« k u)"
  assumes k: "k â‰¤ length Doc"
  assumes T: "T âŠ† ğ’µ k u"
  shows "Scan T k I âŠ† Gen (ğ’« k u)"
using I_in_Gen Scan_elem_in_Gen T k by blast

theorem thmD5:
  assumes I: "I âŠ† Gen (ğ’« k u)"
  assumes k: "k â‰¤ length Doc"
  assumes T: "T âŠ† ğ’µ k u"
  shows "Ï€ k T I âŠ† Gen (ğ’« k u)"
apply (simp add: Ï€_def)
apply (rule_tac limit_upperbound)
using I k T Predict_subset_Gen Complete_subset_Gen Scan_subset_Gen apply metis
by (simp add: I)

end

end

Theory TheoremD6

theory TheoremD6
imports TheoremD5
begin

context LocalLexing begin

definition inc_dot :: "nat â‡’ item â‡’ item"
where
  "inc_dot d x = Item (item_rule x) (item_dot x + d) (item_origin x) (item_end x)"

lemma inc_dot_0[simp]: "inc_dot 0 x = x"
  by (simp add: inc_dot_def)

lemma Predict_mk_regular1: 
  "âˆƒ (P :: rule â‡’ item â‡’ bool) F. Predict k = mk_regular1 P F"
proof -
  let ?P = "Î» r x::item. r âˆˆ â„œ âˆ§ item_end x = k âˆ§ next_symbol x = Some(fst r)"
  let ?F = "Î» r (x::item). init_item r k"
  show ?thesis
    apply (rule_tac x="?P" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="?F" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac ext)
    by (auto simp add: mk_regular1_def bin_def Predict_def)
qed

lemma Complete_mk_regular2: 
  "âˆƒ (P :: dummy â‡’ item â‡’ item â‡’ bool) F. Complete k = mk_regular2 P F"
proof -
  let ?P = "Î» (r::dummy) x y. item_end x = item_origin y âˆ§ item_end y = k âˆ§ is_complete y âˆ§ 
     next_symbol x = Some (item_nonterminal y)"
  let ?F = "Î» (r::dummy) x y. inc_item x k"
  show ?thesis
    apply (rule_tac x="?P" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="?F" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac ext)
    by (auto simp add: mk_regular2_def bin_def Complete_def)
qed

lemma Scan_mk_regular1:
  "âˆƒ (P :: token â‡’ item â‡’ bool) F. Scan T k = mk_regular1 P F"
proof -
  let ?P = "Î» (tok::token) (x::item). item_end x = k âˆ§ tok âˆˆ T âˆ§ next_symbol x = Some (fst tok)"
  let ?F = "Î» (tok::token) (x::item). inc_item x (k + length (snd tok))"
  show ?thesis
    apply (rule_tac x="?P" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="?F" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac ext)
    by (auto simp add: mk_regular1_def bin_def Scan_def)
qed

lemma Predict_regular: "regular (Predict k)" 
  by (metis Predict_mk_regular1 regular1)
  
lemma Complete_regular: "regular (Complete k)" 
  by (metis Complete_mk_regular2 regular2) 

lemma Scan_regular: "regular (Scan T k)"
  by (metis Scan_mk_regular1 regular1)

lemma Ï€_functional: "Ï€ k T = limit ((Scan T k) o (Complete k) o (Predict k))"
proof -
  have "Ï€ k T = limit (Î» I. Scan T k (Complete k (Predict k I)))"
    using Ï€_def by blast
  moreover have "(Î» I. Scan T k (Complete k (Predict k I))) = 
     (Scan T k) o (Complete k) o (Predict k)" 
     apply (rule ext)
     by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis by simp
qed

lemma Ï€_step_regular: "regular ((Scan T k) o (Complete k) o (Predict k))"
  by (simp add: Complete_regular Predict_regular Scan_regular regular_comp)
  
lemma Ï€_regular: "regular (Ï€ k T)"
  by (simp add: Ï€_functional Ï€_step_regular regular_limit)

lemma Ï€_fix: "Scan T k (Complete k (Predict k (Ï€ k T I))) = Ï€ k T I"
  using Ï€_functional Ï€_step_regular regular_fixpoint by fastforce

lemma Ï€_fix': "((Scan T k) o (Complete k) o (Predict k)) (Ï€ k T I) = Ï€ k T I"
  using Ï€_functional Ï€_step_regular regular_fixpoint by fastforce

lemma setmonotone_cases:
  assumes "setmonotone f"
  shows "f X = X âˆ¨ X âŠ‚ f X"
using assms elem_setmonotone by fastforce

lemma distribute_fixpoint_over_setmonotone_comp:
  assumes f: "setmonotone f"
  assumes g: "setmonotone g"
  assumes fixpoint: "(f o g) I = I"
  shows "f I = I âˆ§ g I = I"
proof -
  from setmonotone_cases[OF g, where X=I] show ?thesis
  proof(induct rule: disjCases2)
    case 1
      thus ?case using fixpoint by simp
  next
    case 2
      with f have "I âŠ‚ (f o g) I"
        by (metis comp_apply fixpoint less_asym' setmonotone_cases)
      with fixpoint have "False" by simp
      then show ?case by blast
  qed
qed

lemma distribute_fixpoint_over_setmonotone_comp_3:
  assumes f: "setmonotone f"
  assumes g: "setmonotone g"
  assumes h: "setmonotone h"
  assumes fixpoint: "(f o g o h) I = I"
  shows "f I = I âˆ§ g I = I âˆ§ h I = I"
by (meson distribute_fixpoint_over_setmonotone_comp f fixpoint g h setmonotone_comp)

lemma Predict_Ï€_fix: "Predict k (Ï€ k T I) = Ï€ k T I"
by (meson Complete_regular Predict_regular Scan_regular Ï€_fix' 
  distribute_fixpoint_over_setmonotone_comp_3 regular_implies_setmonotone)

lemma Scan_Ï€_fix: "Scan T k (Ï€ k T I) = Ï€ k T I"
by (meson Complete_regular Predict_regular Scan_regular Ï€_fix' 
  distribute_fixpoint_over_setmonotone_comp_3 regular_implies_setmonotone)

lemma Complete_Ï€_fix: "Complete k (Ï€ k T I) = Ï€ k T I"
by (meson Complete_regular Predict_regular Scan_regular Ï€_fix' 
  distribute_fixpoint_over_setmonotone_comp_3 regular_implies_setmonotone)

lemma Ï€_idempotent: "Ï€ k T (Ï€ k T I) = Ï€ k T I"
  by (simp add: Ï€_functional Ï€_step_regular limit_is_idempotent)

lemma derivation_shift_identity[simp]: "derivation_shift D 0 0 = D"
  by (simp add: derivation_shift_def)

lemma Derivation_skip_prefix: "Derivation (u@v) D w âŸ¹ derivation_ge D (length u) âŸ¹ 
  Derivation v (derivation_shift D (length u) 0) (drop (length u) w)"
proof (induct D arbitrary: u v w)
  case Nil
    thus ?case by (simp add: append_eq_conv_conj) 
next
  case (Cons d D)
    from Cons have "âˆƒx. Derives1 (u@v) (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ Derivation x D w" by auto
    then obtain x where x: "Derives1 (u@v) (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ Derivation x D w" by blast
    from Cons have d: "fst d â‰¥ length u" and D: "derivation_ge D (length u)"
      using derivation_ge_cons apply blast
      using Cons.prems(2) derivation_ge_cons by blast
    have "âˆƒ x'. x = u@x'" by (metis append_eq_conv_conj d le_Derives1_take x)   
    then obtain x' where x': "x = u@x'" by blast
    show ?case
      apply simp
      apply (rule_tac x="x'" in exI)
      using Cons.hyps D Derives1_skip_prefix d x x' by blast
qed

lemma leftmost_skip_prefix: "leftmost i (u@v) âŸ¹ i â‰¥ length u âŸ¹ leftmost (i - length u) v"
by (simp add: leftmost_def less_diff_conv2 nth_append)
 
lemma LeftDerivation_skip_prefix: "LeftDerivation (u@v) D w âŸ¹ derivation_ge D (length u) âŸ¹ 
  LeftDerivation v (derivation_shift D (length u) 0) (drop (length u) w)"
proof (induct D arbitrary: u v w)
  case Nil
    thus ?case by (simp add: append_eq_conv_conj) 
next
  case (Cons d D)
    from Cons have "âˆƒx. LeftDerives1 (u@v) (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ LeftDerivation x D w" by auto
    then obtain x where x: "LeftDerives1 (u@v) (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ LeftDerivation x D w" by blast
    from Cons have d: "fst d â‰¥ length u" and D: "derivation_ge D (length u)"
      using derivation_ge_cons apply blast
      using Cons.prems(2) derivation_ge_cons by blast
    have "âˆƒ x'. x = u@x'"
      by (metis LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 append_eq_conv_conj d le_Derives1_take x) 
    then obtain x' where x': "x = u@x'" by blast
    have leftmost: "leftmost (fst d) (u@v)" using LeftDerives1_def x by blast 
    have 1: "LeftDerives1 v (fst d - length u) (snd d) x'"
      apply (auto simp add: LeftDerives1_def)
      apply (simp add: leftmost d leftmost_skip_prefix)
      using Derives1_skip_prefix LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 d x x' by blast
    have 2: "LeftDerivation x' (derivation_shift D (length u) 0) (drop (length u) w)"
      using Cons.hyps D x x' by blast      
    show ?case
      apply simp
      apply (rule_tac x="x'" in exI)
      using 1 2 by blast
qed

lemma splits_at_append: "splits_at u i u1 N u2 âŸ¹ splits_at (u@v) i u1 N (u2@v)"
by (auto simp add: splits_at_def)

lemma LeftDerives1_append_leftmost_unique: "LeftDerives1 (a@b) i r c âŸ¹ leftmost j a âŸ¹ i = j"
  by (meson LeftDerives1_def leftmost_cons_less leftmost_def leftmost_unique)
  
lemma drop_derivation_shift: 
  "drop n (derivation_shift D left right) = derivation_shift (drop n D) left right"
by (auto simp add: derivation_shift_def drop_map)

lemma take_derivation_shift: 
  "take n (derivation_shift D left right) = derivation_shift (take n D) left right"
by (auto simp add: derivation_shift_def take_map)

lemma derivation_shift_0_shift: "derivation_shift (derivation_shift D left1 0) left2 right2 = 
  derivation_shift D (left1 + left2) right2"
by (auto simp add: derivation_shift_def)

lemma splits_at_append_prefix:
  "splits_at v i Î± N Î² âŸ¹ splits_at (u@v) (i + length u) (u@Î±) N Î²"
  apply (auto simp add: splits_at_def)
  by (simp add: nth_append)
  
lemma splits_at_implies_Derives1: "splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î² âŸ¹ is_sentence Î´ âŸ¹ râˆˆ â„œ âŸ¹ fst r = N 
 âŸ¹ Derives1 Î´ i r (Î±@(snd r)@Î²)"
by (metis (no_types, lifting) Derives1_def is_sentence_concat length_take 
  less_or_eq_imp_le min.absorb2 prod.collapse splits_at_combine splits_at_def)

lemma Derives1_append_prefix: 
  assumes Derives1: "Derives1 v i r w"
  assumes u: "is_sentence u"
  shows "Derives1 (u@v) (i + length u) r (u@w)"
proof -
  have "âˆƒ Î± N Î². splits_at v i Î± N Î²" using assms splits_at_ex by auto
  then obtain Î± N Î² where split_v: "splits_at v i Î± N Î²" by blast
  have split_w: "w = Î±@(snd r)@Î²" using assms split_v splits_at_combine_dest by blast 
  have split_uv: "splits_at (u@v) (i + length u) (u@Î±) N Î²"
    by (simp add: split_v splits_at_append_prefix)
  have is_sentence_uv: "is_sentence (u@v)"
    using Derives1 Derives1_sentence1 is_sentence_concat u by blast 
  show ?thesis
    by (metis Derives1 Derives1_nonterminal Derives1_rule append_assoc is_sentence_uv 
        split_uv split_v split_w splits_at_implies_Derives1)
qed

lemma leftmost_prepend_word: "leftmost i v âŸ¹ is_word u âŸ¹ leftmost (i + length u) (u@v)"
by (simp add: leftmost_def nth_append)

lemma LeftDerives1_append_prefix: 
  assumes Derives1: "LeftDerives1 v i r w"
  assumes u: "is_word u"
  shows "LeftDerives1 (u@v) (i + length u) r (u@w)"
proof -
  have 1: "Derives1 v i r w"
    by (simp add: Derives1 LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1) 
  have 2: "leftmost i v"
    using Derives1 LeftDerives1_def by blast  
  have 3: "is_sentence u" using u by fastforce 
  have 4: "Derives1 (u@v) (i + length u) r (u@w)"
    by (simp add: "1" "3" Derives1_append_prefix) 
  have 5: "leftmost (i + length u) (u@v)"
    by (simp add: "2" leftmost_prepend_word u) 
  show ?thesis
    by (simp add: "4" "5" LeftDerives1_def)
qed     

lemma Derivation_append_prefix: "Derivation v D w âŸ¹ is_sentence u âŸ¹
  Derivation (u@v) (derivation_shift D 0 (length u)) (u@w)"
proof (induct D arbitrary: u v w)
  case Nil thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons d D)
    then have "âˆƒ x. Derives1 v (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ Derivation x D w" by auto
    then obtain x where x: "Derives1 v (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ Derivation x D w" by blast
    with Cons have induct: "Derivation (u@x) (derivation_shift D 0 (length u)) (u@w)" by auto
    have Derives1: "Derives1 (u@v) ((fst d) + length u) (snd d) (u@x)"
      by (simp add: Cons.prems(2) Derives1_append_prefix x) 
    show ?case 
      apply simp
      apply (rule_tac x="u@x" in exI)
      by (simp add: Cons.hyps Cons.prems(2) Derives1 x)
qed     

lemma LeftDerivation_append_prefix: "LeftDerivation v D w âŸ¹ is_word u âŸ¹ 
  LeftDerivation (u@v) (derivation_shift D 0 (length u)) (u@w)"
proof (induct D arbitrary: u v w)
  case Nil thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons d D)
    then have "âˆƒ x. LeftDerives1 v (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ LeftDerivation x D w" by auto
    then obtain x where x: "LeftDerives1 v (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ LeftDerivation x D w" by blast
    with Cons have induct: "LeftDerivation (u@x) (derivation_shift D 0 (length u)) (u@w)" by auto
    have Derives1: "LeftDerives1 (u@v) ((fst d) + length u) (snd d) (u@x)"
      by (simp add: Cons.prems(2) LeftDerives1_append_prefix x) 
    show ?case 
      apply simp
      apply (rule_tac x="u@x" in exI)
      by (simp add: Cons.hyps Cons.prems(2) Derives1 x)
qed     

lemma derivation_ge_shift_simp: "derivation_ge D i âŸ¹ i â‰¥ l âŸ¹ r â‰¥ l âŸ¹ 
   derivation_shift D l r = derivation_shift D 0 (r - l)"
proof (induct D)
  case Nil thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons d D) 
  have fst_d: "fst d â‰¥ l"
    using Cons.prems(1) Cons.prems(2) derivation_ge_cons le_trans by blast 
  show ?case
    apply auto
    using Cons fst_d apply arith 
    using Cons derivation_ge_cons apply auto
    done
qed

lemma append_dropped_prefix: "is_prefix u v âŸ¹ drop (length u) v = w âŸ¹ u@w = v"
using is_prefix_unsplit by blast 

lemma derivation_ge_shift_plus:
  assumes "derivation_ge D u"
  assumes "derivation_ge (derivation_shift D u 0) v"
  shows "derivation_ge D (u + v)"
proof -
  from assms show ?thesis
    apply (auto simp add: derivation_ge_def derivation_shift_def)
    by fastforce
qed    

lemma LeftDerivation_breakdown: 
  "LeftDerivation (u@v) D w âŸ¹ âˆƒ n w1 w2. w = w1 @ w2 âˆ§ 
     LeftDerivation u (take n D) w1 âˆ§
     derivation_ge (drop n D) (length w1) âˆ§
     LeftDerivation v (derivation_shift (drop n D) (length w1) 0) w2"
proof (induct "length D" arbitrary: u v D w)
  case 0
    then have D: "D = []" by auto
    with 0 have "u@v = w" by auto
    with D show ?case
      apply (rule_tac x=0 in exI)
      apply (rule_tac x="u" in exI)
      apply (rule_tac x="v" in exI)
      by auto
next
  case (Suc l)
    then have "âˆƒ d D'. D = d#D'"
      by (metis LeftDerivation.elims(2) length_0_conv nat.simps(3)) 
    then obtain d D' where D_split: "D = d#D'" by blast
    from Suc have is_sentence_uv: "is_sentence (u@v)"
      by (metis D_split Derives1_sentence1 LeftDerivation.simps(2) LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1)
    then have is_sentence_u: "is_sentence u" and is_sentence_v: "is_sentence v"
      by (simp add: is_sentence_concat)+   
    have "is_word u âˆ¨ (Â¬ is_word u)" by blast 
    then show ?case 
      proof(induct rule: disjCases2)
        case 1
          then have derivation_ge_u: "derivation_ge D (length u)"
            using LeftDerivation_implies_Derivation Suc.prems is_word_Derivation_derivation_ge by blast
          have is_prefix: "is_prefix u w"
            using "1.hyps" LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives Suc.prems 
              derives_word_is_prefix leftderives_implies_derives by blast          
          have u_w: "w = u @ (drop (length u) w)"
            by (metis "1.hyps" LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives Suc.prems 
              derives_word_is_prefix is_prefix_unsplit leftderives_implies_derives)  
          show ?case
            apply (rule_tac x="0" in exI)
            apply (rule_tac x="u" in exI)
            apply (rule_tac x="drop (length u) w" in exI)
            apply (auto)
            apply (rule u_w)
            apply (rule derivation_ge_u)
            by (simp add: LeftDerivation_skip_prefix Suc.prems derivation_ge_u)
      next
        case 2
          with is_sentence_u have "âˆƒ i u1 N u2. splits_at u i u1 N u2 âˆ§ leftmost i u"
            using leftmost_def nonword_leftmost_exists splits_at_def by auto
          then obtain i u1 N u2 where split_u: "splits_at u i u1 N u2 âˆ§ leftmost i u" by blast
          have is_word_u1: "is_word u1" by (metis leftmost_def split_u splits_at_def) 
          have "LeftDerivation (u@v) (d#D') w"  using D_split Suc.prems by blast 
          then have "âˆƒ x. LeftDerives1 (u@v) (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ LeftDerivation x D' w"
            by simp  
          then obtain x where x: "LeftDerives1 (u@v) (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ LeftDerivation x D' w"
            by blast
          then have fst_d_eq_i: "fst d = i" using 
            splits_at_combine LeftDerives1_append_leftmost_unique split_u
            by metis
          have split_uv: "splits_at (u@v) i u1 N (u2@v)" by (simp add: split_u splits_at_append) 
          have split_x: "x = u1 @ ((snd (snd d)) @ u2 @ v)"
            using LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 fst_d_eq_i split_uv 
              splits_at_combine_dest x by blast 
          have derivation_ge_D': "derivation_ge D' (length u1)"
            using LeftDerivation_implies_Derivation is_word_Derivation_derivation_ge 
              leftmost_def split_u split_x splits_at_def x by fastforce
          have D1: "LeftDerivation ((snd (snd d)) @ u2 @ v) (derivation_shift D' (length u1) 0) 
            (drop (length u1) w)"
            using LeftDerivation_skip_prefix derivation_ge_D' split_x x by blast 
          then have D2: "LeftDerivation (((snd (snd d)) @ u2) @ v) (derivation_shift D' (length u1) 0) 
            (drop (length u1) w)" by auto
          have "l = length (derivation_shift D' (length u1) 0)"
            using D_split Suc.hyps(2) by auto
          from Suc(1)[OF this D2] obtain n w1 w2 where induct:
            "drop (length u1) w = w1 @ w2 âˆ§ 
             LeftDerivation (snd (snd d) @ u2) 
               (take n (derivation_shift D' (length u1) 0)) w1 âˆ§ 
             derivation_ge (drop n (derivation_shift D' (length u1) 0)) (length w1) âˆ§
             LeftDerivation v (derivation_shift (drop n (derivation_shift D' (length u1) 0)) 
               (length w1) 0) w2" by blast
          have derivation_ge_D'_u1_w1: "derivation_ge (drop n D') (length u1 + length w1)"
          proof -
            from induct have 1: "derivation_ge (derivation_shift (drop n D') (length u1) 0) (length w1)"
              apply (subst drop_derivation_shift[symmetric])
              by blast
            have 2: "derivation_ge (drop n D') (length u1)"
              by (metis append_take_drop_id derivation_ge_D' derivation_ge_append)
            show ?thesis using 1 2 derivation_ge_shift_plus by blast
          qed
          have "LeftDerivation (u1@(snd (snd d) @ u2)) (derivation_shift 
                (take n (derivation_shift D' (length u1) 0)) 0 (length u1)) (u1@w1)"
          using induct LeftDerivation_append_prefix is_word_u1 by blast  
          then have der1: "LeftDerivation (u1@(snd (snd d) @ u2)) 
              (derivation_shift (take n D') (length u1) (length u1)) (u1@w1)"
            using take_derivation_shift derivation_shift_0_shift by auto 
          have eq1: "derivation_shift (take n D') (length u1) (length u1) = take n D'"
            apply (subst derivation_ge_shift_simp[where i = "length u1"])
            apply auto
            by (metis append_take_drop_id derivation_ge_D' derivation_ge_append)
          from der1 eq1 have der2: "LeftDerivation (u1@(snd (snd d) @ u2)) (take n D') (u1@w1)" 
            by auto
          have eq2: "take (Suc n) D = d#(take n D')"
            by (simp add: D_split)  
          have der3: "LeftDerivation u (take (Suc n) D) (u1@w1)"
            apply (simp add: eq2)
            apply (rule_tac x="u1@(snd (snd d) @ u2)" in exI)
            by (metis Derives1_skip_suffix LeftDerives1_def append_assoc der2 fst_d_eq_i 
              split_u split_x splits_at_def x)
          have "is_prefix u1 w"
            using LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives derives_word_is_prefix is_word_u1 
              leftderives_implies_derives split_x x by blast 
          then have eq3: "u1 @ (w1@w2) = w"  
            apply (rule_tac append_dropped_prefix)
            apply (auto simp add: induct)
            done
          show ?case
            apply (rule_tac x="Suc n" in exI)
            apply (rule_tac x="u1@w1" in exI)
            apply (rule_tac x="w2" in exI)
            apply auto
            apply (simp add: eq3)
            apply (simp add: der3)
            apply (simp add: D_split)
            apply (rule derivation_ge_D'_u1_w1)
            apply (simp add: D_split)
            using induct derivation_shift_0_shift drop_derivation_shift apply auto
            done
      qed
qed
                  
lemma Derives1_terminals_stay:
  assumes Derives1: "Derives1 u i r v"
  assumes t_dom: "t âˆˆ set u"
  assumes terminal: "is_terminal t"
  shows "t âˆˆ set v"
proof -
  have "âˆƒ Î± Î² N. splits_at u i Î± N Î²" using Derives1 splits_at_ex by blast 
  then obtain Î± Î² N where split_u: "splits_at u i Î± N Î²" by blast
  then have "t âˆˆ set (Î± @ [N] @ Î²)" using splits_at_combine t_dom by auto
  then have t_possible_locations: "t âˆˆ set Î± âˆ¨ t = N âˆ¨ t âˆˆ set Î²" by auto
  have is_nonterminal: "is_nonterminal N" using Derives1 Derives1_nonterminal split_u by auto 
  with t_possible_locations terminal have t_locations: "t âˆˆ set Î± âˆ¨ t âˆˆ set Î²"
    using is_terminal_nonterminal by blast 
  from Derives1 split_u have "v = Î± @ (snd r) @ Î²" by (simp add: splits_at_combine_dest) 
  with t_locations show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma Derivation_terminals_stay: "Derivation u D v âŸ¹ t âˆˆ set u âŸ¹ is_terminal t âŸ¹ t âˆˆ set v"
proof (induct D arbitrary: u v)
  case Nil thus ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons d D)
  then have "âˆƒ x. Derives1 u (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ Derivation x D v" by auto
  then obtain x where x: "Derives1 u (fst d) (snd d) x âˆ§ Derivation x D v" by auto
  show ?case using Cons Derives1_terminals_stay x by blast
qed
    
lemma Derivation_empty_no_terminals: "Derivation u D [] âŸ¹ t âˆˆ set u âŸ¹ is_nonterminal t"
  by (metis Ball_set Derivation_implies_derives Derivation_terminals_stay 
    derives_is_sentence is_sentence_def is_symbol_distinct list.pred_inject(1))

lemma mono_subset_elem: "mono f âŸ¹ A âŠ† B âŸ¹ x âˆˆ f A âŸ¹ x âˆˆ f B" using mono_def by blast

lemma wellformed_inc_dot: "wellformed_item x âŸ¹ item_dot x + d â‰¤ length (item_rhs x) âŸ¹
  wellformed_item(inc_dot d x)"
by (simp add: inc_dot_def item_rhs_def wellformed_item_def)

lemma init_item_dot[simp]: "item_dot (init_item r k) = 0"
  by (simp add: init_item_def)

lemma init_item_rhs[simp]: "item_rhs (init_item r k) = snd r"
  by (simp add: init_item_def item_rhs_def)

lemma init_item_Î²[simp]: "item_Î² (init_item r k) = snd r"
  by (simp add: item_Î²_def)

lemma mono_Ï€: "mono (Ï€ k T)"
  by (simp add: Ï€_regular regular_implies_mono)

lemma Ï€_subset_elem_trans: 
  assumes Y: "Y âŠ† Ï€ k T X"
  assumes z: "z âˆˆ Ï€ k T Y"
  shows "z âˆˆ  Ï€ k T X"
proof -
  from Y have "Ï€ k T Y âŠ† Ï€ k T (Ï€ k T X)" by (simp add: monoD mono_Ï€) 
  then have "Ï€ k T Y âŠ† Ï€ k T X" using Ï€_idempotent by blast 
  with z show ?thesis using contra_subsetD by blast 
qed

lemma inc_dot_origin[simp]: "item_origin (inc_dot d x) = item_origin x"
  by (simp add: inc_dot_def)

lemma inc_dot_end[simp]: "item_end (inc_dot d x) = item_end x"
  by (simp add: inc_dot_def)

lemma inc_dot_rhs[simp]: "item_rhs (inc_dot d x) = item_rhs x"
  by (simp add: inc_dot_def item_rhs_def)

lemma inc_dot_dot[simp]: "item_dot (inc_dot d x) = item_dot x + d"
  by (simp add: inc_dot_def)

lemma inc_dot_nonterminal[simp]: "item_nonterminal (inc_dot d x) = item_nonterminal x"
  by (simp add: inc_dot_def item_nonterminal_def)
  
lemma Predict_subset_Ï€: "Predict k X âŠ† Ï€ k T X"
proof -
  have "setmonotone (Ï€ k T)"
    by (simp add: Ï€_regular regular_implies_setmonotone) 
  then have s: "X âŠ† Ï€ k T X" by (simp add: subset_setmonotone) 
  have "mono (Predict k)" by (simp add: Predict_regular regular_implies_mono) 
  with s have "Predict k X âŠ† Predict k (Ï€ k T X)" by (simp add: monoD) 
  then show "Predict k X âŠ† Ï€ k T X" by (simp add: Predict_Ï€_fix)
qed 

lemma Complete_subset_Ï€: "Complete k X âŠ† Ï€ k T X"
proof -
  have "setmonotone (Ï€ k T)"
    by (simp add: Ï€_regular regular_implies_setmonotone) 
  then have s: "X âŠ† Ï€ k T X" by (simp add: subset_setmonotone) 
  have "mono (Complete k)" by (simp add: Complete_regular regular_implies_mono) 
  with s have "Complete k X âŠ† Complete k (Ï€ k T X)" by (simp add: monoD) 
  then show "Complete k X âŠ† Ï€ k T X" by (simp add: Complete_Ï€_fix)
qed 

lemma inc_inc_dot[simp]: "inc_dot a (inc_dot b x) = inc_dot (a + b) x"
  by (simp add: inc_dot_def)

lemma thmD6_Left: "wellformed_item x âŸ¹ item_Î² x = Î´ @ Ï‰ âŸ¹ item_end x = k âŸ¹ 
  LeftDerivation Î´ D [] âŸ¹ inc_dot (length Î´) x âˆˆ Ï€ k {} {x}"
proof (induct "length D" arbitrary: x Î´ Ï‰ D rule: less_induct)
  case less
    have "length Î´ = 0 âˆ¨ length Î´ = 1 âˆ¨ length Î´ â‰¥ 2" by arith
    then show ?case
    proof (induct rule: disjCases3)
      case 1
        then have "Î´ = []" by auto
        then show ?case by (simp add: Ï€_regular elem_setmonotone regular_implies_setmonotone)
    next
      case 2
        then have "âˆƒ N. Î´ = [N]" 
          by (metis One_nat_def append_self_conv2 drop_all id_take_nth_drop 
            le_numeral_extra(4) lessI take_0) 
        then obtain N where N: "Î´ = [N]" by blast
        then have "N âˆˆ set Î´" by auto
        then have is_nonterminal_N: "is_nonterminal N" using Derivation_empty_no_terminals 
          LeftDerivation_implies_Derivation less.prems(4) by blast 
        have "D â‰  []" using LeftDerivation.elims(2) N less.prems(4) by blast 
        then have "âˆƒ e E. D = e#E" using LeftDerivation.elims(2) less.prems(4) by blast 
        then obtain e E where eE: "D = e#E" by blast
        then have "âˆƒ Î³. LeftDerives1 Î´ (fst e) (snd e) Î³ âˆ§ 
          LeftDerivation Î³ E []" using LeftDerivation.simps(2) less.prems(4) by blast 
        then obtain Î³ where Î³: "LeftDerives1 Î´ (fst e) (snd e) Î³ âˆ§ LeftDerivation Î³ E []" by blast
        with N have Î³_def: "Î³ = snd (snd e)"
          by (metis "2.hyps" Derives1_split LeftDerives1_def One_nat_def append_Cons 
            append_Nil append_Nil2 leftmost_def length_0_conv less_nat_zero_code linorder_neqE_nat 
            list.inject not_less_eq) 
        have next_symbol_x: "next_symbol x = Some N"
          using N less.prems(1) less.prems(2) next_symbol_def next_symbol_starts_item_Î² 
            wellformed_complete_item_Î² by fastforce  
        have x_subset: "{x} âŠ† Ï€ k {} {x}"
          using Ï€_regular regular_implies_setmonotone subset_setmonotone by blast 
        let ?y = "init_item (snd e) k"
        have "?y âˆˆ Predict k {x}" 
          apply (simp add: Predict_def)
          apply (rule disjI2)
          apply (rule_tac x="fst (snd e)" in exI)
          apply (rule_tac x="snd (snd e)" in exI)
          apply auto
          using Derives1_rule LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 Î³ apply blast
          apply (rule_tac x=x in exI)
          by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) Derives1_split LeftDerives1_def N Î³ 
              append.simps(1) append.simps(2) bin_def is_nonterminal_N leftmost_cons_nonterminal 
              leftmost_unique length_greater_0_conv less.prems(3) less_nat_zero_code 
              list.inject mem_Collect_eq next_symbol_x singletonI)
       then have y_dom: "?y âˆˆ Ï€ k {} {x}" using Predict_subset_Ï€ by blast 
       let ?z = "inc_dot (length Î³) ?y"
       have "item_dot ?y = 0" and "item_rhs ?y = Î³" by (auto simp add: Î³_def)
       note y_props = this
       then have wellformed_y: "wellformed_item ?y"
        using Derives1_rule LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 Î³ less.prems(1) less.prems(3) 
          wellformed_init_item wellformed_item_def by blast 
       with y_props have wellformed_z: "wellformed_item ?z" by (simp add: wellformed_inc_dot)
       have item_Î²_y: "item_Î² ?y = Î³ @ []" using item_rhs_split y_props(2) by auto
       have is_complete_z: "is_complete ?z" by (simp add: is_complete_def Î³_def)
       have "?z âˆˆ Ï€ k {} {?y}" 
         apply (rule less(1)[where D="E"])
         apply (auto simp add: eE wellformed_y Î³)
         apply (simp add: Î³_def)
         done
       with y_dom have z_dom: "?z âˆˆ Ï€ k {} {x}"
         using Ï€_subset_elem_trans empty_subsetI insert_subset by blast 
       let ?w = "inc_dot (length Î´) x" 
       have "?w âˆˆ Complete k {x, ?z}"
        apply (simp add: Complete_def)
        apply (rule_tac disjI2)+
        apply (rule_tac x=x in exI)
        apply (auto simp add: 2)
        apply (simp add: inc_dot_def inc_item_def less)
        apply (rule_tac x="?z" in exI)
        apply (auto simp add: bin_def less is_complete_z next_symbol_x)
        by (metis Derives1_split LeftDerives1_def N Î³ append_Cons append_self_conv2 
          is_nonterminal_N leftmost_cons_nonterminal leftmost_unique length_0_conv list.inject)
       then have "?w âˆˆ Ï€ k {} {x, ?z}" using Complete_subset_Ï€ by blast  
       then show ?case by (meson Ï€_subset_elem_trans insert_subset x_subset z_dom) 
    next
      case 3
       then have "âˆƒ N Î±. Î´ = [N] @ Î±" 
         by (metis append_Cons append_Nil count_terminals.cases le0 le_0_eq list.size(3) 
           numeral_le_iff semiring_norm(69))
       then obtain N Î± where Î´_split: "Î´ = [N] @ Î±" by blast
       with 3 have Î±_nonempty: "Î± â‰  []"
         by (metis (full_types) One_nat_def Suc_eq_plus1 append_Nil2 impossible_Cons length_Cons 
          list.size(3) nat_1_add_1) 
       have "LeftDerivation ([N] @ Î±) D []" using Î´_split less.prems(4) by blast 
       from LeftDerivation_breakdown[OF this, simplified] 
       obtain n where n: "LeftDerivation [N] (take n D) [] âˆ§ LeftDerivation Î± (drop n D) []" by blast
       let ?E = "take n D"
       from n have E: "LeftDerivation [N] ?E []" by auto
       let ?F = "drop n D"
       from n have F: "LeftDerivation Î± ?F []" by auto
       have length_add: "length ?E + length ?F = length D" by simp 
       have "?E â‰  []" using E by force
       then have length_E_0: "length ?E > 0" by auto
       have "?F â‰  []" using F Î±_nonempty by force
       then have length_F_0: "length ?F > 0" by auto
       from length_add length_E_0 length_F_0 
       have "length ?E < length D âˆ§ length ?F < length D"
         using add.commute nat_add_left_cancel_less nat_neq_iff not_add_less2 by linarith
       then have length_E: "length ?E < length D" and length_F: "length ?F < length D" by auto 
       let ?y = "inc_dot (length [N]) x"
       have y_dom: "?y âˆˆ Ï€ k {} {x}"
        apply (rule_tac less(1)[where D="?E" and Ï‰="Î±@Ï‰"])
        apply (rule length_E)
        by (auto simp add: less Î´_split E)
      let ?z = "inc_dot (length Î±) ?y"
      have wellformed_y: "wellformed_item ?y"
        using Î´_split is_complete_def less.prems(1) less.prems(2) wellformed_complete_item_Î² 
          wellformed_inc_dot by fastforce 
      have "?z âˆˆ Ï€ k {} {?y}"
        apply (rule_tac less(1)[where D="?F" and Ï‰="Ï‰"])
        apply (rule length_F)
        apply (rule wellformed_y)
        apply (auto simp add: F less)
        by (metis Î´_split add.commute append_assoc append_eq_conv_conj drop_drop inc_dot_dot 
          inc_dot_rhs item_Î²_def length_Cons less.prems(2) list.size(3))
      then have z_dom: "?z âˆˆ Ï€ k {} {x}" using Ï€_subset_elem_trans y_dom by blast 
      have "?z = inc_dot (length Î´) x" by (simp add: Î´_split)
      with z_dom show ?case by auto
    qed
qed  

lemma derives_empty_implies_LeftDerivation: "derives Î´ [] âŸ¹ âˆƒ D. LeftDerivation Î´ D []"
  using derives_implies_leftderives is_word_def leftderives_implies_LeftDerivation 
    list.pred_inject(1) by blast
  
lemma thmD6: "wellformed_item x âŸ¹ item_Î² x = Î´ @ Ï‰ âŸ¹ item_end x = k âŸ¹ 
  derives Î´ [] âŸ¹ inc_dot (length Î´) x âˆˆ Ï€ k {} {x}"
using derives_empty_implies_LeftDerivation thmD6_Left by blast

end

end

Theory TheoremD7

theory TheoremD7
imports TheoremD6
begin

context LocalLexing begin

lemma Derives1_keep_first_terminal: "Derives1 (x#u) i r (y#v) âŸ¹ is_terminal x âŸ¹ x = y"
  by (metis Derives1_leftmost Derives1_take leftmost_cons_terminal list.sel(1) not_le take_Cons')
  
lemma Derives1_nonterminal_head:
  assumes "Derives1 u i r (N#v)"
  assumes "is_nonterminal N"
  shows "âˆƒ u' M. u = M#u' âˆ§ is_nonterminal M"
proof - 
  from assms have nonempty_u: "u â‰  []"
    by (metis Derives1_bound less_nat_zero_code list.size(3)) 
  have "âˆƒ u' M. u = M#u'"
    using count_terminals.cases nonempty_u by blast 
  then obtain u' M where split_u: "u = M#u'" by blast
  have is_sentence_u: "is_sentence u" using assms
    using Derives1_sentence1 by blast 
  then have "is_terminal M âˆ¨ is_nonterminal M"
    using is_sentence_cons is_symbol_distinct split_u by blast
  then show ?thesis
  proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
    case 1
      have "is_terminal N"
        using "1.hyps" Derives1_keep_first_terminal 
        assms(1) split_u by blast
      with assms have "False" using is_terminal_nonterminal by blast 
      then show ?case by blast
  next
    case 2 with split_u show ?case by blast
  qed
qed

lemma sentence_starts_with_nonterminal:
  assumes "is_nonterminal N"
  assumes "derives u []"
  shows "âˆƒ X r. u@[N] = X#r âˆ§ is_nonterminal X"
proof (cases "u = []")
  case True thus ?thesis using assms(1) by blast
next
  case False 
  then have "âˆƒ X r. u = X#r" using count_terminals.cases by blast 
  then obtain X r where Xr: "u = X#r" by blast
  then have "is_nonterminal X"
    by (metis False assms(2) count_terminals.simps derives_count_terminals_leq 
      derives_is_sentence is_sentence_cons is_symbol_distinct not_le zero_less_Suc) 
  with Xr show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma Derives1_nonterminal_head':
  assumes "Derives1 u i r (v1@[N]@v2)"
  assumes "is_nonterminal N"
  assumes "derives v1 []"
  shows "âˆƒ u' M. u = M#u' âˆ§ is_nonterminal M"
proof -
  from sentence_starts_with_nonterminal[OF assms(2,3)]
  obtain X r where "v1 @ [N] = X # r âˆ§ is_nonterminal X" by blast
  then show ?thesis
    by (metis Derives1_nonterminal_head append_Cons append_assoc assms(1))   
qed

lemma thmD7_helper: 
  assumes "LeftDerivation [ğ”–] D (N#v)"
  assumes "is_nonterminal N"
  assumes "ğ”– â‰  N"  
  shows "âˆƒ n M a a1 a2 w. n < length D âˆ§ (M, a) âˆˆ â„œ âˆ§ LeftDerivation [ğ”–] (take n D) (M#w) âˆ§ 
    a = a1 @ [N] @ a2 âˆ§ derives a1 []"
proof -
  have "âˆƒ n u v. LeftDerivation [ğ”–] (take n D) (u@[N]@v) âˆ§ derives u []"
    apply (rule_tac x="length D" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="[]" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="v" in exI)
    using assms by simp
  then show ?thesis
  proof (induct rule: ex_minimal_witness)
    case (Minimal K)
      have nonzero_K: "K â‰  0"
      proof (cases "K = 0")
        case True
          with Minimal have "âˆƒ u v. [ğ”–] = u@[N]@v"
            using LeftDerivation.simps(1) take_0 by auto
          with assms have "False" by (simp add: Cons_eq_append_conv) 
          then show ?thesis by simp
      next
        case False
          then show ?thesis by arith
      qed
      from Minimal(1)
      obtain u v where uv: "LeftDerivation [ğ”–] (take K D) (u @ [N] @ v) âˆ§ derives u []" by blast
      from nonzero_K have "take K D â‰  []"
        using Minimal.hyps(2) less_nat_zero_code nat_neq_iff take_eq_Nil uv by force 
      then have "âˆƒ E e. (take K D) = E@[e]" using rev_exhaust by blast 
      then obtain E e where Ee: "take K D = E@[e]" by blast
      with uv have "âˆƒ x. LeftDerivation [ğ”–] E x âˆ§ LeftDerives1 x (fst e) (snd e) (u @ [N] @ v)"
        by (simp add: LeftDerivation_append) 
      then obtain x where x: "LeftDerivation [ğ”–] E x âˆ§ LeftDerives1 x (fst e) (snd e) (u @ [N] @ v)"  
        by blast
      then have "âˆƒ w M. x = M#w âˆ§ is_nonterminal M"
        using Derives1_nonterminal_head' LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 assms(2) uv by blast 
      then obtain w M where split_x: "x = M#w" and is_nonterminal_M: "is_nonterminal M" by blast
      from Ee nonzero_K have E: "E = take (K - 1) D"
        by (metis Minimal.hyps(2) butlast_snoc butlast_take dual_order.strict_implies_order 
          le_less_linear take_all uv) 
      have "leftmost (fst e) (M#w)" using x LeftDerives1_def split_x by blast 
      with is_nonterminal_M have fst_e: "fst e = 0" 
        by (simp add: leftmost_cons_nonterminal leftmost_unique) 
      have Derives1: "Derives1 x 0 (snd e) (u @ [N] @ v)"
        using LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 fst_e x by auto 
      have x_splits_at: "splits_at x 0 [] M w"
        by (simp add: split_x splits_at_def)       
      from Derives1 x_splits_at 
      have pq: "âˆƒp q. u = [] @ p âˆ§ v = q @ w âˆ§ snd (snd e) = p @ [N] @ q"
      proof (induct rule: Derives1_X_is_part_of_rule)
        case (Suffix Î±) thus ?case by blast
      next
        case (Prefix Î²)
          then have derives_Î²: "derives Î² []"
            using Derives1_implies_derives1 derives1_implies_derives derives_trans uv by blast 
          with Prefix(1) x Minimal E nonzero_K show "False"
            by (meson diff_less less_nat_zero_code less_one nat_neq_iff)
      qed
      from this[simplified] obtain q where q: "v = q @ w âˆ§ snd (snd e) = u @ N # q" by blast
      have M_def: "fst (snd e) = M"
        using Derives1 Derives1_nonterminal x_splits_at by blast 
      show ?case
        apply (rule_tac x="K-1" in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="M" in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="snd (snd e)" in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="u" in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="q" in exI)
        apply (rule_tac x="w" in exI)
        by (metis Derives1 Derives1_rule E Ee M_def One_nat_def Suc_pred pq append_Nil 
          append_same_eq dual_order.strict_implies_order le_less_linear nonzero_K not_Cons_self2 
          not_gr0 not_less_eq prod.collapse q self_append_conv split_x take_all uv x)
  qed
qed      

lemma head_of_item_Î²_is_next_symbol: 
  "wellformed_item x âŸ¹ item_Î² x = t#Î´ âŸ¹ next_symbol x = Some t"
  using next_symbol_def next_symbol_starts_item_Î² wellformed_complete_item_Î² by fastforce
 
lemma next_symbol_predicts: "next_symbol x = Some N âŸ¹ (N, a) âˆˆ â„œ âŸ¹ k = item_end x âŸ¹ 
  init_item (N, a) k âˆˆ Predict k {x}"
using Predict_def bin_def by auto

lemma thmD7_LeftDerivation: "LeftDerivation [ğ”–] D (N#Î³) âŸ¹ is_nonterminal N âŸ¹ (N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ âŸ¹ 
  init_item (N, Î±) 0 âˆˆ Ï€ 0 {} Init"
proof (induct "length D" arbitrary: D N Î³ Î± rule: less_induct)
  case less
    let ?trivial = "ğ”– = N"
    have "?trivial âˆ¨ Â¬ ?trivial" by blast
    then show ?case 
    proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
      case 1
        then have "init_item (N, Î±) 0 âˆˆ Init"
          apply (subst Init_def) 
          by (auto simp add: less)
        then show ?case
          by (meson Ï€_regular contra_subsetD regular_implies_setmonotone subset_setmonotone)
    next
      case 2
        from thmD7_helper[OF less(2) less(3) 2]
        obtain n M a a1 a2 w where "n < length D" and  "(M, a) âˆˆ â„œ" and  
          "LeftDerivation [ğ”–] (take n D) (M # w)" and "a = a1 @ [N] @ a2" and "derives a1 []" 
          by blast
        note M = this
        let ?x = "init_item (M, a) 0"
        have x_dom: "?x âˆˆ Ï€ 0 {} Init"
          apply (rule less(1)[OF _ M(3) _ M(2)])
          using M(1) apply simp
          using M(2) by simp
        have wellformed_x: "wellformed_item ?x" by (simp add: M(2))
        let ?y = "inc_dot (length a1) ?x"
        have "?y âˆˆ Ï€ 0 {} {?x}"
          apply (rule thmD6[where Ï‰="[N] @ a2"])
          using wellformed_x by (auto simp add: M)
        with x_dom have y_dom: "?y âˆˆ Ï€ 0 {} Init"
          using Ï€_subset_elem_trans empty_subsetI insert_subset by blast
        have wellformed_y: "wellformed_item ?y"
          using M(4) wellformed_inc_dot wellformed_x by auto          
        have "item_Î² ?y = N#a2" by (simp add: M(4) item_Î²_def) 
        then have next_symbol_y: "next_symbol ?y = Some N"
          by (simp add: head_of_item_Î²_is_next_symbol wellformed_y)
        let ?z = "init_item (N, Î±) 0"
        have "?z âˆˆ Predict 0 {?y}"
          by (simp add: less.prems(3) next_symbol_predicts next_symbol_y)
        then have "?z âˆˆ Ï€ 0 {} {?y}" using Predict_subset_Ï€ by auto
        with y_dom show "?z âˆˆ Ï€ 0 {} Init"
          using Ï€_subset_elem_trans empty_subsetI insert_subset by blast 
    qed
qed      
 
theorem thmD7: "is_derivation (N#Î³) âŸ¹ is_nonterminal N âŸ¹ (N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ âŸ¹ 
  init_item (N, Î±) 0 âˆˆ Ï€ 0 {} Init"
by (metis â„’â‡©P_is_word derives_implies_leftderives_cons empty_in_â„’â‡©P is_derivation_def 
  leftderives_implies_LeftDerivation self_append_conv2 thmD7_LeftDerivation)
         
end

end

Theory TheoremD8

theory TheoremD8
imports TheoremD7
begin

context LocalLexing begin

lemma wellformed_tokens_empty_path[simp]: "wellformed_tokens []"
  by (simp add: wellformed_tokens_def)

lemma ğ’«_0_0_Gen: "Gen (ğ’« 0 0) = { x . wellformed_item x âˆ§ item_origin x = 0 âˆ§ item_end x = 0 âˆ§
  derives (item_Î± x) [] âˆ§ (âˆƒ Î³. is_derivation ([item_nonterminal x] @ Î³)) }"
by (auto simp add: Gen_def pvalid_def)

lemma Init_subset_Gen: "Init âŠ† Gen (ğ’« 0 0)"
  apply (subst ğ’«_0_0_Gen)
  apply (auto simp add: Init_def)
  apply (rule_tac x="[]" in exI)
  apply (simp add: is_derivation_def)
  done

lemma ğ’¥_0_0_subset_Gen: "ğ’¥ 0 0 âŠ† Gen (ğ’« 0 0)"
  apply (simp only: ğ’¥.simps)
  apply (rule_tac thmD5)
  apply (rule Init_subset_Gen)
  by auto

lemma inc_dot_rule[simp]: "item_rule (inc_dot d x) = item_rule x"
  by (simp add: inc_dot_def)

lemma init_item_rule[simp]: "item_rule (init_item r k) = r"
  by (simp add: init_item_def)  

lemma item_dot_is_Î±_length: "wellformed_item x âŸ¹ item_dot x = length (item_Î± x)"
  apply (simp add: item_Î±_def)
  by (simp add: min_absorb2 wellformed_item_def) 
  
lemma Gen_subset_ğ’¥_0_0_helper:
  assumes "wellformed_item x"
  assumes "item_origin x = 0"
  assumes "item_end x = 0"
  assumes "derives (item_Î± x) []"
  assumes "is_derivation (item_nonterminal x # Î³)"
  shows "x âˆˆ Ï€ 0 {} Init"
proof - 
  let ?y = "init_item (item_nonterminal x, item_rhs x) 0"
  have y_dom: "?y âˆˆ Ï€ 0 {} Init" 
    apply (rule_tac thmD7)
    using assms apply auto
    using is_nonterminal_item_nonterminal apply blast
    by (simp add: item_nonterminal_def item_rhs_def wellformed_item_def)
  let ?x = "inc_dot (length (item_Î± x)) ?y"
  have x1: "item_rule x = item_rule ?x"
    apply (simp)
    by (simp add: item_nonterminal_def item_rhs_def)
  have x2: "item_dot x = item_dot ?x"
    apply simp
    by (simp add: assms(1) item_dot_is_Î±_length)
  have x3: "item_origin x = item_origin ?x"
    using assms by auto
  have x4: "item_end x = item_end ?x"
    using assms by auto
  from x1 x2 x3 x4 have x_is_inc: "x = ?x" using item.expand by blast
  have wellformed_item_y: "wellformed_item ?y"
    using assms(1) item_nonterminal_def item_rhs_def wellformed_item_def by auto
  have "x âˆˆ Ï€ 0 {} {?y}"
    apply (subst x_is_inc)
    apply (rule_tac thmD6) 
    apply (simp add: wellformed_item_y)
    apply (simp add: item_rhs_split)
    apply simp
    using assms apply simp
    done
  with y_dom show ?thesis
    using Ï€_subset_elem_trans empty_subsetI insert_subset by blast
qed        

lemma Gen_subset_ğ’¥_0_0: "Gen (ğ’« 0 0) âŠ† ğ’¥ 0 0"
  apply (subst ğ’«_0_0_Gen)
  apply auto
  using Gen_subset_ğ’¥_0_0_helper by blast
  
theorem thmD8: "ğ’¥ 0 0 = Gen (ğ’« 0 0)"
  using Gen_subset_ğ’¥_0_0 ğ’¥_0_0_subset_Gen by blast

end

end

Theory TheoremD9

theory TheoremD9
imports TheoremD8
begin

context LocalLexing begin

definition items_le :: "nat â‡’ items â‡’ items"
where
  "items_le k I = { x . x âˆˆ I âˆ§ item_end x â‰¤ k }"

definition items_eq :: "nat â‡’ items â‡’ items"
where
  "items_eq k I = { x . x âˆˆ I âˆ§ item_end x = k }"

definition paths_le :: "nat â‡’ tokens set â‡’ tokens set"
where 
  "paths_le k P = { p . p âˆˆ P âˆ§ charslength p â‰¤ k }"

definition paths_eq :: "nat â‡’ tokens set â‡’ tokens set"
where
  "paths_eq k P = { p . p âˆˆ P âˆ§ charslength p = k }"

lemma items_le_pointwise: "pointwise (items_le k)"
  by (auto simp add: pointwise_def items_le_def)

lemma items_le_is_filter: "items_le k I âŠ† I"
  by (auto simp add: items_le_def)

lemma items_eq_pointwise: "pointwise (items_eq k)"
  by (auto simp add: pointwise_def items_eq_def)

lemma items_eq_is_filter: "items_eq k I âŠ† I"
  by (auto simp add: items_eq_def)

lemma paths_le_pointwise: "pointwise (paths_le k)"
  by (auto simp add: pointwise_def paths_le_def)

lemma paths_le_continuous: "continuous (paths_le k)"
  by (simp add: paths_le_pointwise pointbased_implies_continuous pointwise_implies_pointbased)

lemma paths_le_mono: "mono (paths_le k)"
  by (simp add: continuous_imp_mono paths_le_continuous)
   
lemma paths_le_is_filter: "paths_le k P âŠ† P"
  by (auto simp add: paths_le_def)

lemma paths_eq_pointwise: "pointwise (paths_eq k)"
  by (auto simp add: pointwise_def paths_eq_def)

lemma paths_eq_is_filter: "paths_eq k P âŠ† P"
  by (auto simp add: paths_eq_def)

lemma Predict_item_end: "x âˆˆ Predict k Y âŸ¹ item_end x = k âˆ¨ x âˆˆ Y"
  using Predict_def by auto
  
lemma Complete_item_end: "x âˆˆ Complete k Y âŸ¹ item_end x = k âˆ¨ x âˆˆ Y"
  using Complete_def by auto

lemma ğ’¥_0_0_item_end: "x âˆˆ ğ’¥ 0 0 âŸ¹ item_end x = 0"
  apply (simp add: Ï€_def)
  proof (induct rule: limit_induct)
    case (Init x) thus ?case by (auto simp add: Init_def)
  next
    case (Iterate x Y) 
    then have "x âˆˆ Complete 0 (Predict 0 Y)" by (simp add: Scan_empty)
    then have "item_end x = 0 âˆ¨ x âˆˆ Predict 0 Y" using Complete_item_end by blast
    then have "item_end x = 0 âˆ¨ x âˆˆ Y" using Predict_item_end by blast 
    then show ?case using Iterate by blast
  qed

lemma items_le_ğ’¥_0_0: "items_le 0 (ğ’¥ 0 0) = ğ’¥ 0 0"
  using LocalLexing.ğ’¥_0_0_item_end LocalLexing.items_le_def LocalLexing_axioms by blast

lemma paths_le_ğ’«_0_0: "paths_le 0 (ğ’« 0 0) = ğ’« 0 0"
  by (auto simp add: paths_le_def)

definition empty_tokens :: "token set â‡’ token set"
where
  "empty_tokens T = { t . t âˆˆ T âˆ§ chars_of_token t = [] }"

lemma items_le_Predict: "items_le k (Predict k I) = Predict k (items_le k I)"
  by (auto simp add: items_le_def Predict_def bin_def)

lemma items_le_Complete: 
  "wellformed_items I âŸ¹ items_le k (Complete k I) = Complete k (items_le k I)"
  by (auto simp add: items_le_def Complete_def bin_def is_complete_def wellformed_items_def 
    wellformed_item_def)

lemma items_le_Scan:
  "items_le k (Scan T k I) = Scan (empty_tokens T) k (items_le k I)"
  by (auto simp add: items_le_def Scan_def bin_def empty_tokens_def)

lemma wellformed_items_Gen: "wellformed_items (Gen P)"
  using Gen_implies_pvalid pvalid_def wellformed_items_def by blast
  
lemma wellformed_ğ’¥_0_0: "wellformed_items (ğ’¥ 0 0)"
  using thmD8 wellformed_items_Gen by auto

lemma wellformed_items_Predict: 
  "wellformed_items I âŸ¹ wellformed_items (Predict k I)"
  by (auto simp add: wellformed_items_def wellformed_item_def Predict_def bin_def)

lemma wellformed_items_Complete:
  "wellformed_items I âŸ¹ wellformed_items (Complete k I)"
  apply (auto simp add: wellformed_items_def wellformed_item_def Complete_def bin_def)
  apply (metis dual_order.trans)
  using is_complete_def next_symbol_not_complete not_less_eq_eq by blast

lemma ğ’³_length_bound: "(t, c) âˆˆ ğ’³ k âŸ¹ k + length c â‰¤ length Doc"
  using ğ’³_is_prefix is_prefix_length not_le by fastforce

lemma wellformed_items_Scan:
  "wellformed_items I âŸ¹ T âŠ† ğ’³ k âŸ¹ wellformed_items (Scan T k I)"
  apply (auto simp add: wellformed_items_def wellformed_item_def Scan_def bin_def ğ’³_length_bound)
  using is_complete_def next_symbol_not_complete not_less_eq_eq by blast

lemma wellformed_items_Ï€:
  assumes "wellformed_items I"
  assumes "T âŠ† ğ’³ k"
  shows "wellformed_items (Ï€ k T I)"
proof -
  {
    fix x :: item
    have "x âˆˆ Ï€ k T I âŸ¹ wellformed_item x"
    proof (simp add: Ï€_def, induct rule: limit_induct)
      case (Init x) thus ?case using assms(1) by (simp add: wellformed_items_def) 
    next
      case (Iterate x Y)
      have "wellformed_items Y" by (simp add: Iterate.hyps(1) wellformed_items_def)
      then have "wellformed_items (Scan T k (Complete k (Predict k Y)))"
        by (simp add: assms(2) wellformed_items_Complete wellformed_items_Predict 
          wellformed_items_Scan)
      then show ?case by (simp add: Iterate.hyps(2) wellformed_items_def) 
    qed
  }
  then show ?thesis using wellformed_items_def by auto  
qed   

lemma ğ’¥_subset_Suc_u: "ğ’¥ k u âŠ† ğ’¥ k (Suc u)"
  by (metis Complete_Ï€_fix Complete_subset_Ï€ ğ’¥.simps(1) ğ’¥.simps(2) ğ’¥.simps(3) not0_implies_Suc)

lemma mono_TokensAt: "mono (TokensAt k)"
  by (auto simp add: mono_def TokensAt_def bin_def)
    
lemma ğ’¯_subset_TokensAt: "ğ’¯ k u âŠ† TokensAt k (ğ’¥ k u)"
proof (induct u)
  case 0 thus ?case by simp
next
  case (Suc u)
    have 1: "Tokens k (ğ’¯ k u) (ğ’¥ k u) = Sel (ğ’¯ k u) (TokensAt k (ğ’¥ k u))"
      by (simp add: Tokens_def)
    have 2: "Sel (ğ’¯ k u) (TokensAt k (ğ’¥ k u)) âŠ† TokensAt k (ğ’¥ k u)"
      by (simp add: Sel_upper_bound Suc.hyps)
    have "ğ’¯ k (Suc u) âŠ† TokensAt k (ğ’¥ k u)"
      by (simp add: 1 2)
    then show ?case
      by (meson ğ’¥_subset_Suc_u mono_TokensAt mono_subset_elem subset_iff)
qed      

lemma TokensAt_subset_ğ’³: "TokensAt k I âŠ† ğ’³ k"
  using TokensAt_def ğ’³_def is_terminal_def by auto
  
lemma wellformed_items_ğ’¥_induct_u: 
  assumes "wellformed_items (ğ’¥ k u)"
  shows "wellformed_items (ğ’¥ k (Suc u))"
proof -
  {
    fix x :: item
    have "x âˆˆ ğ’¥ k (Suc u) âŸ¹ wellformed_item x"
    proof (simp add: Ï€_def, induct rule: limit_induct)
      case (Init x)
        with assms show ?case by (auto simp add: wellformed_items_def)
    next
      case (Iterate p Y)
        from Iterate(1) have wellformed_Y: "wellformed_items Y"
          by (auto simp add: wellformed_items_def)
        then have "wellformed_items (Complete k (Predict k Y))"
          by (simp add: wellformed_items_Complete wellformed_items_Predict)
        then have "wellformed_items (Scan (Tokens k (ğ’¯ k u) (ğ’¥ k u)) k (Complete k (Predict k Y)))"
          apply (rule_tac wellformed_items_Scan)
          apply simp
          apply (simp add: Tokens_def)
          by (meson Sel_upper_bound TokensAt_subset_ğ’³ ğ’¯_subset_TokensAt subset_trans)
        then show ?case
          using Iterate.hyps(2) wellformed_items_def by blast
    qed
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using wellformed_items_def by blast 
qed      

lemma wellformed_items_ğ’¥_k_u_if_0: "wellformed_items (ğ’¥ k 0) âŸ¹ wellformed_items (ğ’¥ k u)"
  apply (induct u)
  apply (simp)
  using wellformed_items_ğ’¥_induct_u by blast

lemma wellformed_items_natUnion: "(â‹€ k. wellformed_items (I k)) âŸ¹ wellformed_items (natUnion I)"
  by (auto simp add: natUnion_def wellformed_items_def) 

lemma wellformed_items_â„_k_if_0: "wellformed_items (ğ’¥ k 0) âŸ¹ wellformed_items (â„ k)" 
  apply (simp)
  apply (rule wellformed_items_natUnion)
  using wellformed_items_ğ’¥_k_u_if_0 by blast
 
lemma wellformed_items_ğ’¥_â„: "wellformed_items (ğ’¥ k u) âˆ§ wellformed_items (â„ k)"
proof (induct k arbitrary: u)
  case 0
    show ?case
      using wellformed_ğ’¥_0_0 wellformed_items_â„_k_if_0 wellformed_items_ğ’¥_k_u_if_0 by blast 
next
  case (Suc k)
    have 0: "wellformed_items (ğ’¥ (Suc k) 0)"
      apply simp
      using Suc.hyps wellformed_items_Ï€ by auto      
    then show ?case
      using wellformed_items_â„_k_if_0 wellformed_items_ğ’¥_k_u_if_0 by blast
qed

lemma wellformed_items_ğ’¥: "wellformed_items (ğ’¥ k u)"
by (simp add: wellformed_items_ğ’¥_â„)

lemma wellformed_items_â„: "wellformed_items (â„ k)"
using wellformed_items_ğ’¥_â„ by blast

lemma funpower_consume_function:
  assumes law: "â‹€ X. P X âŸ¹ f (g X) = h (f X) âˆ§ P (g X)"
  shows "P I âŸ¹ P (funpower g n I) âˆ§ f (funpower g n I) = funpower h n (f I)"
proof (induct n)
  case 0
  then show ?case by simp
next
  case (Suc n)
  then have S1: "P (funpower g n I)" and S2: "f (funpower g n I) = funpower h n (f I)"
    by auto
  have law1: "â‹€ X. P X âŸ¹ f (g X) = h (f X)" using law by auto
  have law2: "â‹€ X. P X âŸ¹ P (g X)" using law by auto
  show ?case
    apply simp
    apply (subst law1[where X="funpower g n I"])
    apply (simp add: S1)
    apply (subst S2) 
    apply auto
    apply (rule law2)
    apply (simp add: S1)
    done
qed
    
lemma limit_consume_function:
  assumes continuous: "continuous f"
  assumes law: "â‹€ X. P X âŸ¹ f (g X) = h (f X) âˆ§ P (g X)"
  assumes setmonotone: "setmonotone g"
  shows "P I âŸ¹ f (limit g I) = limit h (f I)"
proof -
  have 1: "f (limit g I) = f (natUnion (Î»n. funpower g n I))"
    by (simp add: limit_def)
  have "chain (Î»n. funpower g n I)" by (simp add: setmonotone setmonotone_implies_chain_funpower)
  from continuous_apply[OF continuous this]
  have swap: "f (natUnion (Î»n. funpower g n I)) = natUnion (f âˆ˜ (Î»n. funpower g n I))" by blast
  have "f o (Î»n. funpower g n I) = (Î» n. f (funpower g n I))" by auto
  also have "P I âŸ¹ (Î» n. f (funpower g n I)) = (Î» n. funpower h n (f I))"
    by (metis funpower_consume_function[where P=P and f=f and g=g and h=h, OF law, simplified])
  ultimately have "P I âŸ¹ f o (Î»n. funpower g n I) = (Î» n. funpower h n (f I))" by auto
  with swap have 2: "P I âŸ¹ f (natUnion (Î»n. funpower g n I)) = natUnion (Î» n. funpower h n (f I))"
    by auto
  have 3: "natUnion (Î» n. funpower h n (f I)) = limit h (f I)"
    by (simp add: limit_def)
  assume "P I"
  with 1 2 3 show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma items_le_Ï€_swap: 
  assumes wellformed_I: "wellformed_items I"
  assumes T: "T âŠ† ğ’³ k"
  shows "items_le k (Ï€ k T I) = Ï€ k (empty_tokens T) (items_le k I)"
proof -
  let ?g = "(Scan T k) o (Complete k) o (Predict k)"
  let ?h = "(Scan (empty_tokens T) k) o (Complete k) o (Predict k)" 
  have law1: "â‹€ I. wellformed_items I âŸ¹ items_le k (?g I) = ?h (items_le k I)"
    using LocalLexing.wellformed_items_Predict LocalLexing_axioms items_le_Complete 
      items_le_Predict items_le_Scan by auto
  have law2: "â‹€ I. wellformed_items I âŸ¹ wellformed_items (?g I)"
    by (simp add: T wellformed_items_Complete wellformed_items_Predict wellformed_items_Scan)
  show ?thesis
    apply (subst Ï€_functional)
    apply (subst limit_consume_function[where P="wellformed_items" and h="?h"])
    apply (simp add: items_le_pointwise pointbased_implies_continuous pointwise_implies_pointbased)
    using law1 law2 apply blast
    apply (simp add: Ï€_step_regular regular_implies_setmonotone)
    apply (rule wellformed_I)
    apply (subst Ï€_functional)
    apply blast
    done
qed
    
lemma items_le_idempotent: "items_le k (items_le k I) = items_le k I"
  using items_le_def by auto 

lemma paths_le_idempotent: "paths_le k (paths_le k P) = paths_le k P"
  using paths_le_def by auto

lemma items_le_fix_D:
  assumes items_le_fix: "items_le k I = I"
  assumes x_dom: "x âˆˆ I" 
  shows "item_end x â‰¤ k"
using items_le_def items_le_fix x_dom by blast

lemma remove_paths_le_in_subset_Gen:
  assumes "items_le k I = I"
  assumes "I âŠ† Gen P"
  shows "I âŠ† Gen (paths_le k P)"
proof -
  {
    fix x :: item
    assume x_dom: "x âˆˆ I"
    then have x_item_end:  "item_end x â‰¤ k" using assms items_le_fix_D by auto 
    have "x âˆˆ Gen P" using assms x_dom by auto 
    then obtain p where p: "p âˆˆ P âˆ§ pvalid p x" using Gen_implies_pvalid by blast 
    have charslength_p: "charslength p â‰¤ k" using p pvalid_item_end x_item_end by auto 
    then have "p âˆˆ paths_le k P" by (simp add: p paths_le_def) 
    then have "x âˆˆ Gen (paths_le k P)" using Gen_def p by blast 
  }
  then show ?thesis by blast 
qed

lemma mono_Gen: "mono Gen"
  by (auto simp add: mono_def Gen_def)

lemma empty_tokens_idempotent: "empty_tokens (empty_tokens T) = empty_tokens T"
  by (auto simp add: empty_tokens_def)

lemma empty_tokens_is_filter: "empty_tokens T âŠ† T"
  by (auto simp add: empty_tokens_def)

lemma items_le_paths_le: "items_le k (Gen P) = Gen (paths_le k P)"
  using LocalLexing.Gen_def LocalLexing.items_le_def LocalLexing_axioms paths_le_def 
  pvalid_item_end by auto      

lemma bin_items_le[symmetric]: "bin I k = bin (items_le k I) k"
  by (auto simp add: bin_def items_le_def)

lemma TokensAt_items_le[symmetric]: "TokensAt k I = TokensAt k (items_le k I)"
  using TokensAt_def bin_items_le by blast

lemma by_length_paths_le[symmetric]: "by_length k P = by_length k (paths_le k P)"
  using by_length.simps paths_le_def by auto

lemma ğ’²_paths_le[symmetric]: "ğ’² P k = ğ’² (paths_le k P) k"
  using ğ’²_def by_length_paths_le by blast

theorem ğ’¯_equals_ğ’µ_induct_step: 
  assumes induct: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k u) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u))"
  assumes induct_tokens: "ğ’¯ k u = ğ’µ k u"
  shows "ğ’¯ k (Suc u) = ğ’µ k (Suc u)"
proof -
  have "TokensAt k (ğ’¥ k u) = TokensAt k (items_le k (ğ’¥ k u))"
    using TokensAt_items_le by blast
  also have "TokensAt k (items_le k (ğ’¥ k u)) = TokensAt k (Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u)))"
    using induct by auto
  ultimately have TokensAt_le: "TokensAt k (ğ’¥ k u) = TokensAt k (Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u)))"
    by auto
  have "TokensAt k (ğ’¥ k u) = ğ’² (ğ’« k u) k"
    apply (subst TokensAt_le)
    apply (subst ğ’²_paths_le[symmetric])
    apply (rule_tac thmD4[symmetric])
    using ğ”“_covers_ğ’« paths_le_is_filter by blast
  then show ?thesis
    by (simp add: induct_tokens Tokens_def ğ’´_def)
qed 

theorem thmD9:
  assumes induct: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k u) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u))"
  assumes induct_tokens: "ğ’¯ k u = ğ’µ k u"
  assumes k: "k â‰¤ length Doc"
  shows "items_le k (ğ’¥ k (Suc u)) âŠ† Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k (Suc u)))"
proof -
  have t1: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k (Suc u)) = items_le k (Ï€ k (ğ’¯ k (Suc u)) (ğ’¥ k u))"
    by auto
  have t2: "items_le k (Ï€ k (ğ’¯ k (Suc u)) (ğ’¥ k u)) = 
    Ï€ k (empty_tokens (ğ’¯ k (Suc u))) (items_le k (ğ’¥ k u))"
    apply (subst items_le_Ï€_swap)
    apply (simp add: wellformed_items_ğ’¥)
    using TokensAt_subset_ğ’³ ğ’¯_subset_TokensAt apply blast
    by blast
  have t3: "Ï€ k (empty_tokens (ğ’¯ k (Suc u))) (items_le k (ğ’¥ k u)) =
    Ï€ k (empty_tokens (ğ’¯ k (Suc u))) (Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u)))"
    using induct by auto
  have ğ’«_subset: "ğ’« k u âŠ† ğ’« k (Suc u)" using subset_ğ’«Suc by blast
  then have "paths_le k (ğ’« k u) âŠ† paths_le k (ğ’« k (Suc u))"
    by (simp add: mono_subset_elem paths_le_mono subsetI)
  with mono_Gen have "Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u)) âŠ† Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k (Suc u)))"
    by (simp add: mono_subset_elem subsetI)
  then have t4: "Ï€ k (empty_tokens (ğ’¯ k (Suc u))) (Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u))) âŠ†
    Ï€ k (empty_tokens (ğ’¯ k (Suc u))) (Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k (Suc u))))"
    by (rule monoD[OF mono_Ï€]) 
  have ğ’¯_eq_ğ’µ: "ğ’¯ k (Suc u) = ğ’µ k (Suc u)"
    using ğ’¯_equals_ğ’µ_induct_step assms(1) induct_tokens by blast  
  have t5: "Ï€ k (empty_tokens (ğ’¯ k (Suc u))) (Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k (Suc u)))) âŠ† 
    Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k (Suc u)))"
    apply (rule_tac remove_paths_le_in_subset_Gen)
    apply (subst items_le_Ï€_swap)
    using wellformed_items_Gen apply blast
    using ğ’¯_eq_ğ’µ ğ’µ_subset_ğ’³ empty_tokens_is_filter apply blast    
    apply (simp only: empty_tokens_idempotent paths_le_idempotent items_le_paths_le)
    apply (rule_tac thmD5)
    using items_le_is_filter items_le_paths_le apply blast
    apply (rule k)
    using ğ’¯_eq_ğ’µ empty_tokens_is_filter by blast
  from t1 t2 t3 t4 t5 show ?thesis using subset_trans by blast
qed      
  
end

end

Theory Ladder

theory Ladder
imports TheoremD9
begin

context LocalLexing begin

definition LeftDerivationFix :: "sentence â‡’ nat â‡’ derivation â‡’ nat â‡’ sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "LeftDerivationFix Î± i D j Î² = (is_sentence Î± âˆ§ is_sentence Î² 
     âˆ§ LeftDerivation Î± D Î² âˆ§ i < length Î± âˆ§ j < length Î²
     âˆ§ Î± ! i = Î² ! j âˆ§ (âˆƒ E F. D = E@(derivation_shift F 0 (Suc j)) âˆ§ 
       LeftDerivation (take i Î±) E (take j Î²) âˆ§
       LeftDerivation (drop (Suc i) Î±) F (drop (Suc j) Î²)))" 

definition LeftDerivationIntro :: 
  "sentence â‡’ nat â‡’ rule â‡’ nat â‡’ derivation â‡’ nat â‡’ sentence â‡’ bool"
where
  "LeftDerivationIntro Î± i r ix D j Î³ = (âˆƒ Î². LeftDerives1 Î± i r Î² âˆ§  
     ix < length (snd r) âˆ§ (snd r) ! ix = Î³ ! j âˆ§
     LeftDerivationFix Î² (i + ix) D j Î³)"

lemma LeftDerivationFix_empty[simp]: "is_sentence Î± âŸ¹ i < length Î± âŸ¹ LeftDerivationFix Î± i [] i Î±"
  apply (auto simp add: LeftDerivationFix_def)
  apply (rule_tac x="[]" in exI)
  apply auto
  done

lemma Derive_empty[simp]: "Derive a [] = a"
  by (auto simp add: Derive_def)

lemma LeftDerivation_append1: "LeftDerivation a (D@[(i, r)]) c âŸ¹ âˆƒ b. LeftDerivation a D b 
  âˆ§ LeftDerives1 b i r c"
by (simp add: LeftDerivation_append)

lemma Derivation_append1: "Derivation a (D@[(i, r)]) c âŸ¹ âˆƒ b. Derivation a D b 
  âˆ§ Derives1 b i r c"
by (simp add: Derivation_append)

lemma  Derivation_take_derive:
  assumes "Derivation a D b"
  shows "Derivation a (take n D) (Derive a (take n D))"
by (metis Derivation_append Derive append_take_drop_id assms)

lemma  LeftDerivation_take_derive:
  assumes "LeftDerivation a D b"
  shows "LeftDerivation a (take n D) (Derive a (take n D))"
by (metis Derive LeftDerivation_append LeftDerivation_implies_Derivation append_take_drop_id assms)

lemma Derivation_Derive_take_Derives1:
  assumes "N â‰  0"
  assumes "N â‰¤ length D"
  assumes "Derivation a D b"
  assumes Î±: "Î± = Derive a (take (N - 1) D)"
  assumes "Î² = Derive a (take N D)"
  shows "Derives1 Î± (fst (D ! (N - 1))) (snd (D ! (N - 1))) Î²"
proof -
  let ?D1 = "take (N - 1) D"
  let ?D2 = "take N D"
  from assms have app: "?D2 = ?D1 @ [D ! (N - 1)]"
    apply auto
    by (metis Suc_less_eq Suc_pred le_imp_less_Suc take_Suc_conv_app_nth)
  from assms have "Derivation a ?D2 Î²"
    using Derivation_take_derive by blast
  with app show ?thesis
    using Derivation.simps Derivation_append Derive Î± by auto   
qed    

lemma LeftDerivation_Derive_take_LeftDerives1:
  assumes "N â‰  0"
  assumes "N â‰¤ length D"
  assumes "LeftDerivation a D b"
  assumes Î±: "Î± = Derive a (take (N - 1) D)"
  assumes "Î² = Derive a (take N D)"
  shows "LeftDerives1 Î± (fst (D ! (N - 1))) (snd (D ! (N - 1))) Î²"
proof -
  let ?D1 = "take (N - 1) D"
  let ?D2 = "take N D"
  from assms have app: "?D2 = ?D1 @ [D ! (N - 1)]"
    apply auto
    by (metis Suc_less_eq Suc_pred le_imp_less_Suc take_Suc_conv_app_nth)
  from assms have "LeftDerivation a ?D2 Î²"
    using LeftDerivation_take_derive by blast
  with app show ?thesis
    by (metis Derive LeftDerivation_append1 LeftDerivation_implies_Derivation Î± prod.collapse)
qed

lemma LeftDerives1_skip_prefix:
  "length a â‰¤ i âŸ¹ LeftDerives1 (a@b) i r (a@c) âŸ¹ LeftDerives1 b (i - length a) r c"
apply (auto simp add: LeftDerives1_def)
using leftmost_skip_prefix apply blast
by (simp add: Derives1_skip_prefix)

lemma LeftDerives1_skip_suffix:
  assumes i: "i < length a"
  assumes D: "LeftDerives1 (a@c) i r (b@c)"
  shows "LeftDerives1 a i r b"
proof -
  note Derives1_def[where u="a@c" and v="b@c" and i=i and r=r]
  then have "âˆƒx y N Î±.
    a @ c = x @ [N] @ y âˆ§
    b @ c = x @ Î± @ y âˆ§ is_sentence x âˆ§ is_sentence y âˆ§ (N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ âˆ§ r = (N, Î±) âˆ§ i = length x"
    using D LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 by auto 
  then obtain x y N Î± where split:
    "a @ c = x @ [N] @ y âˆ§
     b @ c = x @ Î± @ y âˆ§ is_sentence x âˆ§ is_sentence y âˆ§ (N, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ âˆ§ r = (N, Î±) âˆ§ i = length x"
     by blast
  from split have "length (a@c) = length (x @ [N] @ y)" by auto
  then have "length a + length c = length x + length y + 1" by simp
  with split have "length a + length c = i + length y + 1" by simp
  with i have len_c_y: "length c â‰¤ length y" by arith
  let ?y = "take (length y - length c) y"
  from split have ac: "a @ c = (x @ [N]) @ y" by auto
  note cancel_suffix[where a=a and c = c and b = "x@[N]" and d = "y", OF ac len_c_y]
  then have a: "a = x @ [N] @ ?y" by auto
  from split have bc: "b @ c = (x @ Î±) @ y" by auto
  note cancel_suffix[where a=b and c = c and b = "x@Î±" and d = "y", OF bc len_c_y]
  then have b: "b = x @ Î± @ ?y" by auto
  from split len_c_y a b show ?thesis
    apply (simp only: LeftDerives1_def Derives1_def)
    apply (rule_tac conjI)
    using D LeftDerives1_def i leftmost_cons_less apply blast    
    apply (rule_tac x=x in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="?y" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="N" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="Î±" in exI)
    apply auto
    by (rule is_sentence_take)
qed

lemma LeftDerives1_X_is_part_of_rule[consumes 2, case_names Suffix Prefix]:
  assumes aXb: "LeftDerives1 Î´ i r (a@[X]@b)"
  assumes split: "splits_at Î´ i Î± N Î²"
  assumes prefix: "â‹€ Î². Î´ = a @ [X] @ Î² âŸ¹ length a < i âŸ¹ is_word (a @ [X]) âŸ¹
                     LeftDerives1 Î² (i - length a - 1) r b âŸ¹ False"
  assumes suffix: "â‹€ Î±. Î´ = Î± @ [X] @ b âŸ¹ LeftDerives1 Î± i r a âŸ¹ False" 
  shows "âˆƒ u v. a = Î± @ u âˆ§ b = v @ Î² âˆ§ (snd r) = u@[X]@v"
proof -
  have aXb_old: "Derives1 Î´ i r (a@[X]@b)"
    using LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 aXb by blast
  have prefix_or: "is_prefix Î± a âˆ¨ is_proper_prefix a Î±"
    by (metis Derives1_prefix split aXb_old is_prefix_eq_proper_prefix)
  have is_word_Î±: "is_word Î±"
    using LeftDerives1_splits_at_is_word aXb assms(2) by blast 
  have "is_proper_prefix a Î± âŸ¹ False"
  proof -
    assume proper:"is_proper_prefix a Î±"
    then have "âˆƒ u. u â‰  [] âˆ§ Î± = a@u" by (metis is_proper_prefix_def)
    then obtain u where u: "u â‰  [] âˆ§ Î± = a@u" by blast
    note splits_at = splits_at_Î±[OF aXb_old split] splits_at_combine[OF split]
    from splits_at have Î±1: "Î± = take i Î´" by blast
    from splits_at have Î±2: "Î± = take i (a@[X]@b)" by blast
    from splits_at have lenÎ±: "length Î± = i" by blast
    with proper have lena: "length a < i"
      using append_eq_conv_conj drop_eq_Nil leI u by auto 
    with is_word_Î± Î±2 have is_word_aX: "is_word (a@[X])"
      by (simp add: is_word_terminals not_less take_Cons' u)
    from u Î±2 have "a@u = take i (a@[X]@b)" by auto
    with lena have "u = take (i - length a) ([X]@b)" by (simp add: less_or_eq_imp_le) 
    with lena have uX: "u = [X]@(take (i - length a - 1) b)" by (simp add: not_less take_Cons')
    let ?Î² = "(take (i - length a - 1) b) @ [N] @ Î²"
    from splits_at have f1: "Î´ = Î± @ [N] @ Î²" by blast
    with u uX have f2: "Î´ = a @ [X] @ ?Î²" by simp
    note skip = LeftDerives1_skip_prefix[where a = "a @ [X]" and b = "?Î²" and 
      r = r and i = i and c = b]
    then have D: "LeftDerives1 ?Î² (i - length a - 1) r b"
      using One_nat_def Suc_leI aXb append_assoc diff_diff_left f2 lena length_Cons 
        length_append length_append_singleton list.size(3) by fastforce
    note prefix[OF f2 lena is_word_aX D]
    then show "False" .
  qed
  with prefix_or have is_prefix: "is_prefix Î± a" by blast

  from aXb have aXb': "LeftDerives1 Î´ i r ((a@[X])@b)" by auto
  then have aXb'_old: "Derives1 Î´ i r ((a@[X])@b)" by (simp add: LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1)  
  note Derives1_suffix[OF aXb'_old split]
  then have suffix_or: "is_suffix Î² b âˆ¨ is_proper_suffix b Î²"
    by (metis is_suffix_eq_proper_suffix)
  have "is_proper_suffix b Î² âŸ¹ False"
  proof -
    assume proper: "is_proper_suffix b Î²"
    then have "âˆƒ u. u â‰  [] âˆ§ Î² = u@b" by (metis is_proper_suffix_def)
    then obtain u where u: "u â‰  [] âˆ§ Î² = u@b" by blast
    note splits_at = splits_at_Î²[OF aXb_old split] splits_at_combine[OF split]
    from splits_at have Î²1: "Î² = drop (Suc i) Î´" by blast
    from splits_at have Î²2: "Î² = drop (i + length (snd r)) (a @ [X] @ b)" by blast
    from splits_at have lenÎ²: "length Î² = length Î´ - i - 1" by blast
    with proper have lenb: "length b < length Î²" by (metis is_proper_suffix_length_cmp) 
    from u Î²2 have "u@b = drop (i + length (snd r)) ((a @ [X]) @ b)" by auto
    hence "u = drop (i + length (snd r)) (a @ [X])" 
      by (metis drop_cancel_suffix)
    hence uX: "u = drop (i + length (snd r)) a @ [X]" by (metis drop_keep_last u)
    let ?Î± = "Î± @ [N] @ (drop (i + length (snd r)) a)"
    from splits_at have f1: "Î´ = Î± @ [N] @ Î²" by blast
    with u uX have f2: "Î´ = ?Î± @ [X] @ b" by simp
    note skip = LeftDerives1_skip_suffix[where a = "?Î±" and c = "[X]@b" and b="a" and
      r = r and i = i]
    have f3: "i < length (Î± @ [N] @ drop (i + length (snd r)) a)"
    proof -
      have f1: "1 + i + length b = length [X] + length b + i"
        by (metis Groups.add_ac(2) Suc_eq_plus1_left length_Cons list.size(3) list.size(4) semiring_normalization_rules(22))
      have f2: "length Î´ - i - 1 = length ((Î± @ [N] @ drop (i + length (snd r)) a) @ [X] @ b) - Suc i"
        by (metis f2 length_drop splits_at(1))
      have "length ([]::symbol list) â‰  length Î´ - i - 1 - length b"
        by (metis add_diff_cancel_right' append_Nil2 append_eq_append_conv lenÎ² length_append u)
      then have "length ([]::symbol list) â‰  length Î± + length ([N] @ drop (i + length (snd r)) a) - i"
        using f2 f1 by (metis Suc_eq_plus1_left add_diff_cancel_right' diff_diff_left length_append)
      then show ?thesis
        by auto
    qed
    from aXb f2 have D: "LeftDerives1 (?Î± @ [X] @ b) i r (a@[X]@b)" by auto
    note skip[OF f3 D]
    note suffix[OF f2  skip[OF f3 D]]
    then show "False" .
  qed
  with suffix_or have is_suffix: "is_suffix Î² b" by blast

  from is_prefix have "âˆƒ u. a = Î± @ u" by (auto simp add: is_prefix_def)
  then obtain u where u: "a = Î± @ u" by blast
  from is_suffix have "âˆƒ v. b = v @ Î²" by (auto simp add: is_suffix_def)
  then obtain v where v: "b = v @ Î²" by blast
  
  from u v splits_at_combine[OF split] aXb have D:"LeftDerives1 (Î±@[N]@Î²) i r (Î±@(u@[X]@v)@Î²)"
    by simp
  from splits_at_Î±[OF aXb_old split] have i: "length Î± = i" by blast
  from i have i1: "length Î± â‰¤ i" and i2: "i â‰¤ length Î±" by auto
  note LeftDerives1_skip_suffix[OF _ LeftDerives1_skip_prefix[OF i1 D], simplified, OF i2]
  then have "LeftDerives1 [N] 0 r (u @ [X] @ v)" by auto
  then have "Derives1 [N] 0 r (u @ [X] @ v)"
    using LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 by auto 
  then have r: "snd r = u @ [X] @ v"  
    by (metis Derives1_split append_Cons append_Nil length_0_conv list.inject self_append_conv) 
  show ?thesis using u v r by auto
qed   

lemma LeftDerivationFix_grow_suffix:
  assumes LDF: "LeftDerivationFix (b1@[X]@b2) (length b1) D j c"
  assumes suffix_b2: "LeftDerives1 suffix e r b2"
  assumes is_word_b1X: "is_word (b1@[X])"
  shows "LeftDerivationFix (b1@[X]@suffix) (length b1) ((e + length (b1@[X]), r)#D) j c"
proof -
  from LDF have LDF': "is_sentence (b1@[X]@b2) âˆ§ is_sentence c âˆ§ 
    LeftDerivation (b1 @ [X] @ b2) D c âˆ§ length b1 < length (b1 @ [X] @ b2) âˆ§
    j < length c âˆ§
    (b1 @ [X] @ b2) ! length b1 = c ! j âˆ§
    (âˆƒE F. D = E @ derivation_shift F 0 (Suc j) âˆ§
        LeftDerivation (take (length b1) (b1 @ [X] @ b2)) E (take j c) âˆ§
        LeftDerivation (drop (Suc (length b1)) (b1 @ [X] @ b2)) F (drop (Suc j) c))"
    using LeftDerivationFix_def by blast
  then obtain E F where EF: "D = E @ derivation_shift F 0 (Suc j) âˆ§
        LeftDerivation (take (length b1) (b1 @ [X] @ b2)) E (take j c) âˆ§
        LeftDerivation (drop (Suc (length b1)) (b1 @ [X] @ b2)) F (drop (Suc j) c)" by blast
  then have LD_b1_c: "LeftDerivation b1 E (take j c)" by simp 
  with is_word_b1X have E: "E = []"
    using LeftDerivation_implies_Derivation is_word_Derivation is_word_append by blast 
  then have b1_def: "b1 = take j c" using LD_b1_c by auto
  then have b1_len: "j = length b1"
    by (simp add: LDF' dual_order.strict_implies_order min.absorb2) 
  have D: "D = derivation_shift F 0 (Suc j)" using EF E by simp  
  have step: "LeftDerives1 (b1 @ [X] @ suffix) (Suc (e + length b1)) r (b1 @ [X] @ b2) âˆ§ 
    LeftDerivation  (b1 @ [X] @ b2) D c"
    by (metis LDF' LeftDerives1_append_prefix add_Suc_right append_assoc assms(2) is_word_b1X 
      length_append_singleton)
  then have is_sentence_b1Xsuffix: "is_sentence (b1 @ [X] @ suffix)"
    using Derives1_sentence1 LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 by blast
  have X_eq_cj: "X = c ! j" using LDF' by auto    
  show ?thesis
    apply (simp add: LeftDerivationFix_def)
    apply (rule conjI)
    using is_sentence_b1Xsuffix apply simp
    apply (rule conjI)
    using LDF' apply simp
    apply (rule conjI)
    using step apply force
    apply (rule conjI)
    using LDF' apply simp
    apply (rule conjI)
    apply (rule X_eq_cj)
    apply (rule_tac x="[]" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="(e, r)#F" in exI)
    apply auto
    apply (rule b1_len[symmetric])
    apply (rule D)
    apply (rule b1_def)
    apply (rule_tac x="b2" in exI)
    apply (simp add: suffix_b2)
    using EF by auto
qed

lemma Derives1_append_suffix: 
  assumes Derives1: "Derives1 v i r w"
  assumes u: "is_sentence u"
  shows "Derives1 (v@u) i r (w@u)"
proof -
  have "âˆƒ Î± N Î². splits_at v i Î± N Î²" using assms splits_at_ex by auto
  then obtain Î± N Î² where split_v: "splits_at v i Î± N Î²" by blast
  have split_w: "w = Î±@(snd r)@Î²" using assms split_v splits_at_combine_dest by blast 
  have split_uv: "splits_at (v@u) i Î± N (Î²@u)"   
    by (simp add: split_v splits_at_append)
  have is_sentence_uv: "is_sentence (v@u)"
    using Derives1 Derives1_sentence1 is_sentence_concat u by blast 
  show ?thesis
    by (metis Derives1 Derives1_nonterminal Derives1_rule append_assoc is_sentence_uv 
        split_uv split_v split_w splits_at_implies_Derives1)
qed

lemma leftmost_append_suffix: "leftmost i v âŸ¹ leftmost i (v@u)"
by (simp add: leftmost_def nth_append)

lemma LeftDerives1_append_suffix: 
  assumes Derives1: "LeftDerives1 v i r w"
  assumes u: "is_sentence u"
  shows "LeftDerives1 (v@u) i r (w@u)"
proof -
  have 1: "Derives1 v i r w"
    by (simp add: Derives1 LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1) 
  have 2: "leftmost i v"
    using Derives1 LeftDerives1_def by blast  
  have 3: "is_sentence u" using u by fastforce 
  have 4: "Derives1 (v@u) i r (w@u)"
    by (simp add: "1" "3" Derives1_append_suffix) 
  have 5: "leftmost i (v@u)"
    by (simp add: "2" leftmost_append_suffix u) 
  show ?thesis
    by (simp add: "4" "5" LeftDerives1_def)
qed     

lemma LeftDerivationFix_is_sentence: 
  "LeftDerivationFix a i D j b âŸ¹ is_sentence a âˆ§ is_sentence b"
  using LeftDerivationFix_def by blast
  
lemma LeftDerivationIntro_is_sentence:
  "LeftDerivationIntro Î± i r ix D j Î³ âŸ¹ is_sentence Î± âˆ§ is_sentence Î³"
  by (meson Derives1_sentence1 LeftDerivationFix_is_sentence LeftDerivationIntro_def 
    LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1)

lemma LeftDerivationFix_grow_prefix:
  assumes LDF: "LeftDerivationFix (b1@[X]@b2) (length b1) D j c"
  assumes prefix_b1: "LeftDerives1 prefix e r b1"
  shows "LeftDerivationFix (prefix@[X]@b2) (length prefix) ((e, r)#D) j c"
proof -
  from LDF have LDF': "LeftDerivation (b1 @ [X] @ b2) D c âˆ§
    length b1 < length (b1 @ [X] @ b2) âˆ§
    j < length c âˆ§
    (b1 @ [X] @ b2) ! length b1 = c ! j âˆ§
    (âˆƒE F. D = E @ derivation_shift F 0 (Suc j) âˆ§
        LeftDerivation (take (length b1) (b1 @ [X] @ b2)) E (take j c) âˆ§
        LeftDerivation (drop (Suc (length b1)) (b1 @ [X] @ b2)) F (drop (Suc j) c))"
    using LeftDerivationFix_def by blast
  then obtain E F where EF: "D = E @ derivation_shift F 0 (Suc j) âˆ§
        LeftDerivation (take (length b1) (b1 @ [X] @ b2)) E (take j c) âˆ§
        LeftDerivation (drop (Suc (length b1)) (b1 @ [X] @ b2)) F (drop (Suc j) c)" by blast
  then have E_b1_c: "LeftDerivation b1 E (take j c)" by simp 
  with EF have F_b2_c: "LeftDerivation b2 F (drop (Suc j) c)" by simp
  have step: "LeftDerives1 (prefix @ [X] @ b2) e r (b1 @ [X] @ b2)"
    using LDF LeftDerivationFix_is_sentence LeftDerives1_append_suffix 
      is_sentence_concat prefix_b1 by blast   
  show ?thesis
    apply (simp add: LeftDerivationFix_def)
    apply (rule conjI)
    apply (metis Derives1_sentence1 LDF LeftDerivationFix_def LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 
      is_sentence_concat is_sentence_cons prefix_b1)
    apply (rule conjI)
    using LDF LeftDerivationFix_is_sentence apply blast
    apply (rule conjI)
    apply (rule_tac x="b1@[X]@b2" in exI)
    using step apply simp
    using LDF' apply auto[1]
    apply (rule conjI)
    using LDF' apply simp
    apply (rule conjI)
    using LDF' apply auto[1]
    apply (rule_tac x="(e,r)#E" in exI)
    apply (rule_tac x="F" in exI)
    apply (auto simp add: EF F_b2_c)
    apply (rule_tac x="b1" in exI)
    apply (simp add: prefix_b1 E_b1_c)
    done
qed

lemma LeftDerivationFixOrIntro: 
  "LeftDerivation a D Î³ âŸ¹ is_sentence Î³ âŸ¹ j < length Î³ âŸ¹
  (âˆƒ i. LeftDerivationFix a i D j Î³) âˆ¨ 
  (âˆƒ d Î± ix. d < length D âˆ§ LeftDerivation a (take d D) Î± âˆ§ 
    LeftDerivationIntro Î± (fst (D ! d)) (snd (D ! d)) ix (drop (Suc d) D) j Î³)" 
proof (induct "length D" arbitrary: a D Î³ j rule: less_induct) 
  (* The induction here is unnecessary, but we use it anyway for context reasons *)
  case less
  have "length D = 0 âˆ¨ length D â‰  0" by blast
  then show ?case
  proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
    case 1 
    then have D: "D = []" by auto
    with less have "âˆƒi. LeftDerivationFix a i D j Î³" 
      apply (rule_tac x=j in exI)
      by auto
    then show ?case by blast
  next
    case 2
    note less2 = 2
    have "âˆƒ n Î² i. n â‰¤ length D âˆ§ Î² = Derive a (take n D) âˆ§ LeftDerivationFix Î² i (drop n D) j Î³"  
      apply (rule_tac x="length D" in exI)
      apply auto
      using Derive LeftDerivationFix_empty LeftDerivation_implies_Derivation less by blast
    then show ?case
    proof (induct rule: ex_minimal_witness)
      case (Minimal N)
      then obtain Î² i where Minimal_N:
        "N â‰¤ length D âˆ§ Î² = Derive a (take N D) âˆ§ LeftDerivationFix Î² i (drop N D) j Î³" by blast 
      have "N = 0 âˆ¨ N â‰  0" by blast
      then show ?case
      proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
        case 1
        with Minimal_N have "Î² = a" by auto
        with 1 Minimal_N show ?case
          apply (rule_tac disjI1)
          by auto
      next
        case 2
        let ?Î´ = "Derive a (take (N - 1) D)"
        have LeftDerives1_Î´: "LeftDerives1 ?Î´ (fst (D ! (N - 1))) (snd (D ! (N - 1))) Î²"
          using "2.hyps" LeftDerivation_Derive_take_LeftDerives1 Minimal_N less.prems(1) by blast
        then have Derives1_Î´: "Derives1 ?Î´ (fst (D ! (N - 1))) (snd (D ! (N - 1))) Î²"
          using LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 by blast   
        have i_len: "i < length Î²" using Minimal_N 
          by (auto simp add: LeftDerivationFix_def)
        then have "âˆƒ X Î²_1 Î²_2. splits_at Î² i Î²_1 X Î²_2"
          using splits_at_def by blast
        then obtain X Î²_1 Î²_2 where Î²_split: "splits_at Î² i Î²_1 X Î²_2" by blast
        then have Î²_combine: "Î² = Î²_1 @ [X] @ Î²_2" using splits_at_combine by blast 
        then have LeftDerives1_Î´_hyp: 
          "LeftDerives1 ?Î´ (fst (D ! (N - 1))) (snd (D ! (N - 1))) (Î²_1 @ [X] @ Î²_2)"
          using LeftDerives1_Î´ by blast 
        from Î²_split have i_def: "i = length Î²_1"
          by (simp add: dual_order.strict_implies_order  min.absorb2 splits_at_def)  
        have "âˆƒ Y Î´_1 Î´_2. splits_at ?Î´ (fst (D ! (N - 1))) Î´_1 Y Î´_2"
          using Derives1_Î´ splits_at_ex by blast
        then obtain Y Î´_1 Î´_2 where Î´_split: "splits_at ?Î´ (fst (D ! (N - 1))) Î´_1 Y Î´_2" by blast 
        have NFix: "LeftDerivationFix (Î²_1 @ [X] @ Î²_2) (length Î²_1) (drop N D) j Î³"              
          using Minimal_N Î²_combine i_def by auto      
        from LeftDerives1_Î´_hyp Î´_split 
        have "âˆƒu v. Î²_1 = Î´_1 @ u âˆ§ Î²_2 = v @ Î´_2 âˆ§ snd (snd (D ! (N - 1))) = u @ [X] @ v"
        proof (induct rule: LeftDerives1_X_is_part_of_rule)
          case (Suffix suffix)
            let ?k = "N - 1"
            let ?Î² = "Derive a (take ?k D)"
            let ?i = "length Î²_1"
