          apply (subst x_via_z)
          apply (rule_tac thmD6[OF wellformed_z item_Î²_z item_end_z])
          using decompose b2 by blast  
        have "Ï€ k' {} {?z} âŠ† Ï€ k' {} (Scan T k (Gen(Prefixes p)))"
          apply (rule_tac monoD[OF mono_Ï€])
          using z_in_Scan_Gen using empty_subsetI insert_subset by blast 
        then have x_in_Scan_Gen: "x âˆˆ Ï€ k' {} (Scan T k (Gen(Prefixes p)))"
          using x_in_z by blast
        have "item_end x = k'" by (simp add: item_end_x_def)
        with x_in_Scan_Gen show ?case
          using items_le_def less.prems(12) mem_Collect_eq nat_le_linear by blast
    next
      case 2
        obtain i where i: "i = ladder_i L 0" by blast
        obtain i' where i': "i' = ladder_j L 0" by blast
        obtain Î±' where Î±': "Î±' = ladder_Î³ Î± D L 0" by blast
        obtain n where n: "n = ladder_n L 0" by blast
        have ldfix: "LeftDerivationFix Î± i (take n D)  i' Î±'"
          using LeftDerivationLadder_def Î±' i i' n less.prems(8) by blast 
        have Î±'_alt: "Î±' = ladder_Î± Î± D L 1" using 2 by (simp add: Î±' ladder_Î±_def) 
        have i'_alt: "i' = ladder_i L 1" using 2 by (simp add: i' ladder_i_def)
        obtain e where e: "e = D ! n" by blast
        obtain ix where ix: "ix = ladder_ix L 1" by blast
        obtain m where m: "m = ladder_n L 1" by blast
        obtain E where E: "E = drop (Suc n) (take m D)" by blast
        have ldintro: "LeftDerivationIntro Î±' i' (snd e) ix E (ladder_j L 1) (ladder_Î³ Î± D L 1)"
          by (metis "2.hyps" LeftDerivationIntrosAt_def LeftDerivationIntros_def 
            LeftDerivationLadder_def One_nat_def Î±'_alt E diff_Suc_1 e i'_alt ix leI 
            less.prems(8) m n not_less_eq zero_less_one)
        have is_nonterminal_Î±'_at_i': "is_nonterminal (Î±' ! i')"
          using LeftDerivationIntro_implies_nonterminal ldintro by blast   
        then have is_nonterminal_Î±_at_i: "is_nonterminal (Î± ! i)" 
          using LeftDerivationFix_def ldfix by auto
        then have "âˆƒ A a1 a2 a1'. splits_at Î± i a1 A a2 âˆ§ splits_at Î±' i' a1' A a2 âˆ§
          LeftDerivation a1 (take n D) a1'"
          using LeftDerivationFix_splits_at_nonterminal ldfix by auto
        then obtain A a1 a2 a1' where A: "splits_at Î± i a1 A a2 âˆ§ splits_at Î±' i' a1' A a2 âˆ§
          LeftDerivation a1 (take n D) a1'" by blast
        have A_def: "A = Î±' ! i'" using A splits_at_def by blast 
        have is_nonterminal_A: "is_nonterminal A" using A_def is_nonterminal_Î±'_at_i' by blast
        have "âˆƒ rule. e = (i', rule)"
          by (metis e "2.hyps" LeftDerivationIntrosAt_def LeftDerivationIntros_def 
            LeftDerivationLadder_def One_nat_def Suc_leI diff_Suc_1 i'_alt less.prems(8) 
            n prod.collapse zero_less_one) 
        then obtain rule where rule: "e = (i', rule)" by blast
        obtain w where w: "w = snd rule" by blast
        obtain Î±'' where Î±'': "Î±'' = a1' @ w @ a2" by blast
        have Î±'_Î±'': "LeftDerives1 Î±' i' rule Î±''"
          by (metis A w LeftDerivationFix_is_sentence LeftDerivationIntro_def 
            LeftDerivationIntro_examine_rule LeftDerives1_def Î±'' ldfix ldintro prod.collapse 
            rule snd_conv splits_at_implies_Derives1) 
        then have is_word_a1': "is_word a1'" using LeftDerives1_splits_at_is_word A by blast
        have A_eq_fst_rule: "A = fst rule"
          using A LeftDerivationIntro_examine_rule ldintro rule by fastforce 
        have ix_bound: "ix < length w" using ix w rule ldintro LeftDerivationIntro_def snd_conv 
          by auto      
        then have "âˆƒ w1 W w2. splits_at w ix w1 W w2" using splits_at_def by blast 
        then obtain w1 W w2 where W: "splits_at w ix w1 W w2" by blast
        have a1'_w_a2: "a1'@w@a2 = ladder_stepdown_Î±_0 Î± D L" 
          using ladder_stepdown_Î±_0_altdef "2.hyps" A Î±'_alt e i'_alt less.prems(8) n rule 
          snd_conv w by force 
        from LeftDerivationLadder_stepdown[OF less.prems(8) 2] obtain L' where L':
          "LeftDerivationLadder (a1'@(w@a2)) (drop (ladder_stepdown_diff L) D) L'
           (terminals (drop r p @ [X])) âˆ§
           length L' = length L - 1 âˆ§
           ladder_i L' 0 = ladder_i L 1 + ladder_ix L 1 âˆ§ ladder_last_j L' = ladder_last_j L"
          using a1'_w_a2 by auto
        have ladder_i_L'_0: "ladder_i L' 0 = i' + ix" using L' i'_alt ix by auto
        have ladder_last_j_L': "ladder_last_j L' = length (drop r p)" using L' less.prems by auto
        from L' have this1: "LeftDerivationLadder (a1'@(w@a2)) (drop (ladder_stepdown_diff L) D) L'
           (terminals (drop r p @ [X]))" by blast
        have this2: "length a1' â‰¤ ladder_i L' 0" using A ladder_i_L'_0 splits_at_def by auto     
        from LeftDerivationLadder_cut_prefix[OF this1 is_word_a1' this2]
        obtain D' L'' Î³' where L'':
          "terminals (drop r p @ [X]) = a1' @ Î³' âˆ§
            LeftDerivationLadder (w @ a2) D' L'' Î³' âˆ§
            D' = derivation_shift (drop (ladder_stepdown_diff L) D) (length a1') 0 âˆ§
            length L'' = length L' âˆ§
            ladder_i L'' 0 + length a1' = ladder_i L' 0 âˆ§ 
            ladder_last_j L'' + length a1' = ladder_last_j L'" by blast
        have length_a1'_bound: "length a1' â‰¤ length (drop r p)" using L'' ladder_last_j_L' 
          by linarith
        then have is_prefix_a1'_drop_r_p: "is_prefix a1' (terminals (drop r p))"
        proof -
          have f1: "âˆ€ss ssa ssb. Â¬ is_prefix (ss::symbol list) (ssa @ ssb) âˆ¨ is_prefix ss ssa âˆ¨ (âˆƒssc. ssc â‰  [] âˆ§ is_prefix ssc ssb âˆ§ ss = ssa @ ssc)"
            by (simp add: is_prefix_of_append)
          have f2: "â‹€ss ssa. is_prefix ((ss::symbol list) @ ssa) ss âˆ¨ Â¬ is_prefix ssa []"
            by (metis (no_types) append_Nil2 is_prefix_cancel)
          have f3: "â‹€ss. is_prefix ss [] âˆ¨ Â¬ is_prefix (terminals (drop r p) @ ss) a1'"
            by (metis (no_types) drop_eq_Nil is_prefix_append length_a1'_bound length_terminals)
          have "is_prefix a1' (a1' @ Î³') âˆ§ is_prefix a1' a1'"
            by (metis (no_types) append_Nil2 is_prefix_cancel is_prefix_empty)
          then show ?thesis
            using f3 f2 f1 by (metis L'' terminals_append)
        qed 
        obtain r' where r': "r' = r + i'" by blast
        have length_a1'_eq_i': "length a1' = i'"
          using A less_or_eq_imp_le min.absorb2 splits_at_def by auto      
        have a1'_r': "r â‰¤ r' âˆ§ r' â‰¤ length p âˆ§ 
          terminals (drop r p) = a1' @ (terminals (drop r' p))"
          using is_prefix_a1'_drop_r_p r'
        proof -
          have "âˆƒ q. terminals (drop r p) = a1' @ q"
            using is_prefix_a1'_drop_r_p by (metis is_prefix_unsplit)
          then obtain q where q: "terminals (drop r p) = a1' @ q" by blast
          have "q = drop i' (terminals (drop r p))"
            using length_a1'_eq_i' q by (simp add: append_eq_conv_conj)
          then have "q = terminals (drop i' (drop r p))" by simp
          then have "q = terminals (drop r' p)" by (simp add: r' add.commute)
          with q show ?thesis
            using add.commute diff_add_inverse le_Suc_ex le_add1 le_diff_conv length_a1'_bound 
              length_a1'_eq_i' length_drop r r' by auto
        qed    
        have ladder_i_L'': "ladder_i L'' 0 = ix" using L'' ladder_i_L'_0 length_a1'_eq_i' 
          add.commute add_left_cancel by linarith 
        have L''_ladder: "LeftDerivationLadder (w @ a2) D' L'' Î³'" using L'' by blast
        have "ladder_i L'' 0 < length w" using ladder_i_L'' ix_bound by blast 
        from LeftDerivationLadder_cut_appendix[OF L''_ladder this] 
        obtain E' F' Î³1' Î³2' L''' where L''':
          "D' = E' @ F' âˆ§
           Î³' = Î³1' @ Î³2' âˆ§
           LeftDerivationLadder w E' L''' Î³1' âˆ§
           derivation_ge F' (length Î³1') âˆ§
           LeftDerivation a2 (derivation_shift F' (length Î³1') 0) Î³2' âˆ§
           length L''' = length L'' âˆ§ ladder_i L''' 0 = ladder_i L'' 0 âˆ§ 
           ladder_last_j L''' = ladder_last_j L''"
          by blast
        obtain z where z: "z = Item (A, w) (length w) (charslength (take r' p)) k'" by blast       
        have z1: "length L''' < length L" using "2.hyps" L' L'' L''' by linarith
        have z2: "p âˆˆ ğ”“" by (simp add: p_dom) 
        have z3: "charslength p = k" using p_charslength by auto 
        have z4: "X âˆˆ T" by (simp add: X_dom) 
        have z5: "T âŠ† ğ’³ k" by (simp add: less.prems(4)) 
        have "rule âˆˆ â„œ"
          using Derives1_rule LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 Î±'_Î±'' by blast 
        then have z6: "(A, w @ []) âˆˆ â„œ" using w A_eq_fst_rule by auto
        have z7: "r' â‰¤ length p" using a1'_r' by linarith
        have "leftderives [ğ”–] ((terminals (take r p))@[N]@Î³)"
          using leftderives_start by blast 
        then have "leftderives [ğ”–] ((terminals (take r p))@(Î±@Î²)@Î³)"
          by (metis ğ”“_wellformed is_derivation_def is_derivation_is_sentence is_sentence_concat 
            is_word_terminals_take leftderives_implies_derives leftderives_rule_step p_dom rule_dom)
        then have "leftderives [ğ”–] ((terminals (take r p))@a1@([A]@a2@Î²)@Î³)"
          using A splits_at_combine append_assoc by fastforce 
        then have z8_helper: "leftderives [ğ”–] ((terminals (take r p))@a1'@([A]@a2@Î²)@Î³)"
          by (meson A LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives ğ”“_wellformed is_derivation_def 
            is_derivation_is_sentence is_sentence_concat is_word_terminals_take 
            leftderives_implies_derives leftderives_trans_step p_dom)
        have join_terminals: "(terminals (take r p))@a1' = terminals (take r' p)"
          by (metis is_prefix_a1'_drop_r_p length_a1'_eq_i' r' take_add take_prefix 
            terminals_drop terminals_take)  
        from z8_helper join_terminals have z8: 
          "leftderives [ğ”–] (terminals (take r' p) @ [A] @ a2 @ Î² @ Î³)"
          by (metis append_assoc) 
        have Î³'_altdef: "Î³' = terminals (drop r' p @ [X])"
          using L'' a1'_r' by auto
        have "ladder_last_j L''' + length a1' = length (drop r p)"
          using L'' L''' ladder_last_j_L' by linarith 
        then have ladder_last_j_L'''_Î³': "ladder_last_j L''' = length Î³' - 1"
          by (simp add: Î³'_altdef length_a1'_eq_i' r')
        then have "length Î³' - 1 < length Î³1'"
          using L''' ladder_last_j_bound by fastforce 
        then have "length Î³1' + length Î³2' - 1 < length Î³1'" 
          using L''' by simp
        then have "length Î³2' = 0" by arith
        then have Î³2': "Î³2' = []" by simp
        then have Î³1': "Î³1' = terminals (drop r' p @ [X])" using Î³'_altdef L''' by auto   
        then have z9: "LeftDerivationLadder w E' L''' (terminals (drop r' p @ [X]))"
          using L''' by blast
        have z10: "ladder_last_j L''' = length (drop r' p)" 
          using Î³'_altdef ladder_last_j_L'''_Î³' by auto
        note z11 = k'
        have z12: "z = Item (A, w @ []) (length w) (charslength (take r' p)) k'"
          using z by simp
        note z13 = less.prems(12)
        note induct = less.hyps(1)[of L''' A w "[]" r' "a2@Î²@Î³" E' z]
        note z_in_I = induct[OF z1 z2 z3 z4 z5 z6 z7 z8 z9 z10 z11 z12 z13]
        have a2_derives_empty: "derives a2 []" using L''' Î³2'
          using LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives leftderives_implies_derives by blast 
        obtain x1 where x1: "x1 = Item (N, Î±@Î²) (length a1) 
          (charslength (take r p)) (charslength (take r' p))" by blast
        obtain q where q: "q = take r' p" by blast
        then have is_prefix_q_p: "is_prefix q p" by simp 
        then have q_in_Prefixes: "q âˆˆ Prefixes p" using Prefixes_is_prefix by blast
        then have wellformed_q: "wellformed_tokens q"
          using p_dom is_prefix_q_p prefixes_are_paths' ğ”“_wellformed by blast   
        have item_rule_x1: "item_rule x1 = (N, Î±@Î²)" 
          using x1 by simp
        have is_prefix_r_r': "is_prefix (take r p) (take r' p)"
          by (metis append_eq_conv_conj is_prefix_take r' take_add)          
        then have charslength_le_r_r': "charslength (take r p) â‰¤ charslength (take r' p)"
          using charslength_of_prefix by blast
        have "is_prefix (take r' p) p" by auto
        then have charslength_r'_p: "charslength (take r' p) â‰¤ charslength p"
          using charslength_of_prefix by blast
        have "charslength p â‰¤ length Doc"
          using less.prems(1) add_leE k' k'_upperbound z3 by blast
        with charslength_r'_p have charslength_r'_Doc: 
          "charslength (take r' p) â‰¤ length Doc" by arith
        have Î±_decompose: "Î± = a1 @ [A] @ a2" using A splits_at_combine by blast 
        have wellformed_x1: "wellformed_item x1"
          apply (auto simp add: wellformed_item_def)
          using item_rule_x1 less.prems apply auto[1]
          using charslength_le_r_r' x1 apply auto[1]
          using charslength_r'_Doc x1 apply auto[1]
          using x1 Î±_decompose by simp
        have item_nonterminal_x1: "item_nonterminal x1 = N"
          by (simp add: x1 item_nonterminal_def)
        have r_q_p: "take r (terminals q) = terminals (take r p)"
          by (metis q is_prefix_r_r' length_take min.absorb2 r take_prefix terminals_take) 
        have item_Î±_x1: "item_Î± x1 = a1" by (simp add: Î±_decompose item_Î±_def x1)
        have a1': "a1' = drop r (terminals q)"
          by (metis append_eq_conv_conj join_terminals length_take length_terminals min.absorb2 q r)         
        have pvalid_q_x1: "pvalid q x1"
          apply (simp add: pvalid_def wellformed_q wellformed_x1 item_nonterminal_x1)
          apply (rule_tac x=r in exI)
          apply auto
          apply (simp add: a1'_r' min.absorb2 q)
          apply (simp add: q x1)
          apply (simp add: q x1 r')
          using r_q_p less.prems(7) append_Cons is_leftderivation_def 
            leftderivation_implies_derivation apply fastforce 
          apply (simp add: item_Î±_x1)
          using a1' A LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives leftderives_implies_derives by blast 
        have item_end_x1_le_k': "item_end x1 â‰¤ k'"
          using charslength_r'_p
          apply (simp add: x1)
          using less.prems by auto
        have x1_in_I: "x1 âˆˆ I"
          apply (subst less.prems(12))
          apply (auto simp add: items_le_def item_end_x1_le_k')
          apply (rule Ï€_apply_setmonotone)
          apply (rule Scan_apply_setmonotone)
          apply (simp add: Gen_def)
          apply (rule_tac x=q in exI)
          by (simp add: pvalid_q_x1 paths_le_def q_in_Prefixes)
        obtain x2 where x2: "x2 = inc_item x1 k'" by blast
        have x1_in_bin: "x1 âˆˆ bin I (item_origin z)"
          using bin_def x1 x1_in_I z12 by auto           
        have x2_in_Complete: "x2 âˆˆ Complete k' I"
          apply (simp add: Complete_def)
          apply (rule disjI2)
          apply (rule_tac x=x1 in exI)
          apply (simp add: x2)
          apply (rule_tac x=z in exI)
          apply auto
          using x1_in_bin apply blast
          using bin_def z12 z_in_I apply auto[1]
          apply (simp add: is_complete_def z12)
          by (simp add: Î±_decompose is_complete_def item_nonterminal_def next_symbol_def x1 z12)
        have wf_I': "wellformed_items (Ï€ k' {} (Scan T k (Gen (Prefixes p))))"
          by (simp add: wellformed_items_Gen wellformed_items_Scan wellformed_items_Ï€ z5)
        from items_le_Complete[OF this] x2_in_Complete
        have x2_in_I: "x2 âˆˆ I" by (metis Complete_Ï€_fix z13) 
        have "wellformed_items I"
          using wf_I' items_le_is_filter wellformed_items_def z13 by auto
        with x2_in_I have wellformed_x2: "wellformed_item x2" 
          by (simp add: wellformed_items_def)
        have item_dot_x2: "item_dot x2 = Suc (length a1)"
          by (simp add: x2 x1)
        have item_Î²_x2: "item_Î² x2 = a2 @ Î²"
          apply (simp add: item_Î²_def item_dot_x2)
          apply (simp add: item_rhs_def x2 x1 Î±_decompose)
          done  
        have item_end_x2: "item_end x2 = k'" by (simp add: x2)
        note inc_dot_x2_by_a2 = thmD6[OF wellformed_x2 item_Î²_x2 item_end_x2 a2_derives_empty]
        have "x = inc_dot (length a2) x2"
          by (simp add: Î±_decompose inc_dot_def less.prems(11) x1 x2)
        with inc_dot_x2_by_a2 have "x âˆˆ Ï€ k' {} {x2}" by auto
        then have "x âˆˆ Ï€ k' {} I" using x2_in_I
          by (meson contra_subsetD empty_subsetI insert_subset monoD mono_Ï€)
        then show "x âˆˆ I"
          by (metis (no_types, lifting) Ï€_subset_elem_trans dual_order.refl item_end_x_def 
            items_le_def items_le_is_filter mem_Collect_eq z13) 
    qed
qed       

theorem thmD10:
  assumes p_dom: "p âˆˆ ğ”“"
  assumes p_charslength: "charslength p = k"
  assumes X_dom: "X âˆˆ T"
  assumes T_dom: "T âŠ† ğ’³ k"
  assumes rule_dom: "(N, Î±@Î²) âˆˆ â„œ"
  assumes r: "r â‰¤ length p"
  assumes leftderives_start: "leftderives [ğ”–] ((terminals (take r p))@[N]@Î³)"
  assumes leftderives_Î±: "leftderives Î± (terminals ((drop r p)@[X]))"
  assumes k': "k' = k + length (chars_of_token X)"
  assumes item_def: "x = Item (N, Î±@Î²) (length Î±) (charslength (take r p)) k'"
  assumes I: "I = items_le k' (Ï€ k' {} (Scan T k (Gen (Prefixes p))))"
  shows "x âˆˆ I"
proof -
  have "âˆƒ D. LeftDerivation Î± D (terminals ((drop r p)@[X]))"
    using leftderives_Î± leftderives_implies_LeftDerivation by blast
  then obtain D where D: "LeftDerivation Î± D (terminals ((drop r p)@[X]))" by blast
  have is_sentence: "is_sentence (terminals (drop r p @ [X]))"
    using derives_is_sentence is_sentence_concat leftderives_Î± leftderives_implies_derives 
      rule_Î±_type rule_dom by blast
  have "âˆƒ L. LeftDerivationLadder Î± D L  (terminals ((drop r p)@[X])) âˆ§
         ladder_last_j L = length (drop r p)"
    apply (rule LeftDerivationLadder_exists)
    apply (rule D)
    apply (rule is_sentence)
    by auto
  then obtain L where L: "LeftDerivationLadder Î± D L  (terminals ((drop r p)@[X]))" and
    L_ladder_last_j: "ladder_last_j L = length (drop r p)" by blast
  from thmD10_ladder[OF assms(1) assms(2) assms(3) assms(4) assms(5) assms(6) assms(7)
    L L_ladder_last_j k' item_def I]
  show ?thesis .
qed

end

end

Theory TheoremD11

theory TheoremD11
imports TheoremD10
begin

context LocalLexing begin

lemma LeftDerivationLadder_length_1:
  assumes ladder: "LeftDerivationLadder Î± D L Î³"
  assumes singleton_L: "length L = 1"
  shows "LeftDerivationFix Î± (ladder_i L 0) D (ladder_last_j L) Î³"
proof -
  have ldfix: "LeftDerivationFix Î± (ladder_i L 0) (take (ladder_n L 0) D) (ladder_j L 0) 
    (ladder_Î³ Î± D L 0)"
    using ladder LeftDerivationLadder_def by blast
  have ladder_n_0: "ladder_n L 0 = length D"
    using ladder singleton_L
    by (metis LeftDerivationLadder_def One_nat_def diff_Suc_1 is_ladder_def ladder_last_n_intro) 
  from ldfix ladder_n_0 ladder singleton_L show ?thesis
    by (metis Derivation_unique_dest LeftDerivationLadder_def 
      LeftDerivationLadder_implies_LeftDerivation_at_index LeftDerivationLadder_ladder_n_bound 
      LeftDerivation_implies_Derivation One_nat_def diff_Suc_1 ladder_last_j_def take_all 
      zero_less_one)
qed 

lemma LeftDerivationFix_from_singleton_helper:
  assumes "LeftDerivationFix [A] 0 D (length u) (u @ [B] @ v)"
  shows "D = []"
proof -
  from iffD1[OF LeftDerivationFix_def assms] obtain E F where EF:
    "is_sentence [A] âˆ§
     is_sentence (u @ [B] @ v) âˆ§
     LeftDerivation [A] D (u @ [B] @ v) âˆ§
     0 < length [A] âˆ§
     length u < length (u @ [B] @ v) âˆ§
     [A] ! 0 = (u @ [B] @ v) ! length u âˆ§
     D = E @ derivation_shift F 0 (Suc (length u)) âˆ§
     LeftDerivation (take 0 [A]) E (take (length u) (u @ [B] @ v)) âˆ§
     LeftDerivation (drop (Suc 0) [A]) F (drop (Suc (length u)) (u @ [B] @ v))"
    by blast
  from EF have E: "E = []"
    by (metis Derivation.elims(2) Derives1_split LeftDerivation_implies_Derivation 
      Nil_is_append_conv list.distinct(1) take_0) 
  from EF have F: "F = []"
    by (metis E LeftDerivation.simps(1) LeftDerivation_ge_take LeftDerivation_implies_Derivation 
      append_eq_conv_conj derivation_ge_shift is_word_Derivation length_Cons length_derivation_shift 
      list.size(3) nth_Cons_0 nth_append self_append_conv2 take_0)
  from EF E F show "D = []"  by auto  
qed

lemma LeftDerivationFix_from_singleton:
  assumes "LeftDerivationFix [A] i D j Î³"
  shows "D = []"
proof -
  have "âˆƒ u B v. splits_at Î³ j u B v"  using assms
    using LeftDerivationFix_splits_at_derives by blast
  then obtain u B v where s: "splits_at Î³ j u B v" by blast
  from s have s1: "Î³ = u @ [B] @ v" using splits_at_combine by blast
  from s have s2: "j = length u" using splits_at_def by auto
  from assms s1 s2 LeftDerivationFix_from_singleton_helper 
  show ?thesis by (metis LeftDerivationFix_def length_Cons less_Suc0 list.size(3))
qed

lemma LeftDerivationLadder_ladder_Î³_last:
  assumes "LeftDerivationLadder Î± D L Î³"
  shows "Î³ = ladder_Î³ Î± D L (length L - 1)"
by (metis Derive LeftDerivationLadder_def LeftDerivation_implies_Derivation One_nat_def assms 
  is_ladder_def last_ladder_Î³)

theorem thmD11_helper:
  "p âˆˆ ğ”“ âŸ¹
   charslength p = k âŸ¹ 
   X âˆˆ T âŸ¹
   T âŠ† ğ’³ k âŸ¹
   q = p @ [X] âŸ¹
   (N, Î±@Î²) âˆˆ â„œ âŸ¹
   r â‰¤ length q âŸ¹
   LeftDerivation [ğ”–] D ((terminals (take r q))@[N]@Î³) âŸ¹
   leftderives Î± (terminals (drop r q)) âŸ¹
   k' = k + length (chars_of_token X) âŸ¹
   x = Item (N, Î±@Î²) (length Î±) (charslength (take r q)) k' âŸ¹
   I = items_le k' (Ï€ k' {} (Scan T k (Gen (Prefixes p)))) âŸ¹
   x âˆˆ I"
proof (induct "length D" arbitrary: D r N Î³ Î± Î² x rule: less_induct)
  case less
    have "D = [] âˆ¨ D â‰  []" by blast
    then show ?case 
    proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
      case 1
        then have r: "r = 0"
          by (metis LeftDerivation.simps(1) diff_add_0 diff_add_inverse2 le_0_eq length_0_conv 
            length_append length_terminals less.prems(7) less.prems(8) list.size(4) take_eq_Nil)
        with 1 have Î³: "Î³ = []"
          using LeftDerivation.simps(1) append_Cons append_self_conv2 less.prems(8) list.inject 
            take_eq_Nil terminals_empty by auto 
        from r Î³ 1 have start_is_N: "ğ”– = N"
          using LeftDerivation.simps(1) append_eq_Cons_conv less.prems(8) list.inject take_eq_Nil 
            terminals_empty by auto   
        have h1: "r â‰¤ length p" using r by auto
        have h2: "leftderives [ğ”–] (terminals (take r p) @ [N] @ Î³)" 
          by (simp add: r Î³ start_is_N)
        have h3: "leftderives Î± (terminals (drop r p @ [X]))"
          using "less.prems" by (simp add: r "less.prems")
        have h4: "x = Item (N, Î± @ Î²) (length Î±) (charslength (take r p)) k'"
          using "less.prems" by (simp add: r "less.prems") 
        from thmD10[OF "less.prems"(1, 2, 3, 4, 6) h1 h2 h3 "less.prems"(10) h4  "less.prems"(12)]
        show ?case .
    next 
      case 2
        note D_non_empty = 2
        have "r < length q âˆ¨ r = length q" using less by arith
        then show ?case
        proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
          case 1
            have h1: "r â‰¤ length p" using less.prems 1 by auto
            have take_q_p: "take r q = take r p"
              using 1 less.prems
              by (simp add: drop_keep_last le_neq_implies_less nat_le_linear not_less_eq not_less_eq_eq) 
            have h2: "leftderives [ğ”–] (terminals (take r p) @ [N] @ Î³)"
              apply (simp only: take_q_p[symmetric])
              using less.prems LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives by blast
            have h3: "leftderives Î± (terminals (drop r p @ [X]))"
              using less.prems(5, 9) h1 by simp
            have h4: "k' = k + length (chars_of_token X)" using less.prems by blast
            have h5: "x = Item (N, Î± @ Î²) (length Î±) (charslength (take r p)) k'"
            using less.prems take_q_p by simp
            from thmD10[OF "less.prems"(1, 2, 3, 4, 6) h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 less.prems(12)] show ?case .
        next
          case 2
            from 2 have ld: "LeftDerivation [ğ”–] D (terminals q @ [N] @ Î³)"
              using less.prems(8) by auto
            from 2 have Î±_derives_empty: "derives Î± []"
              using less.prems(9) by auto
            have is_sentence_p: "is_sentence (terminals p)"
              using less.prems(1) â„’â‡©P_derives ğ”“_are_admissible admissible_def is_derivation_def 
                is_derivation_is_sentence is_sentence_concat by blast
            have is_symbol_X: "is_symbol (terminal_of_token X)"
              using less.prems(3, 4) ğ’³_are_terminals is_symbol_def rev_subsetD by blast      
            have is_sentence_q: "is_sentence (terminals q)" using is_sentence_p is_symbol_X 
              less.prems LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives is_derivation_def 
              is_derivation_is_sentence is_sentence_concat ld leftderives_implies_derives by blast
            have is_symbol_N: "is_symbol N" 
              using less.prems(6) is_symbol_def rule_nonterminal_type by blast 
            have is_sentence_Î³: "is_sentence Î³"
              by (meson LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives is_derivation_def is_derivation_is_sentence 
                is_sentence_concat ld leftderives_implies_derives) 
            have ld_exists_h1: "is_sentence (terminals q @ [N] @ Î³)"
              using is_sentence_q is_sentence_Î³ is_symbol_N is_sentence_concat 
                LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives is_derivation_def is_derivation_is_sentence ld 
                leftderives_implies_derives by blast
            have ld_exists_h2: "length q < length (terminals q @ [N] @ Î³)" by simp
            from LeftDerivationLadder_exists[OF ld ld_exists_h1 ld_exists_h2] obtain L where 
              L: "LeftDerivationLadder [ğ”–] D L (terminals q @ [N] @ Î³)" and 
              L_last_j: "ladder_last_j L = length q" by blast
            note r_eq_length_q = 2
            have ladder_i_0_eq_0: "ladder_i L 0 = 0" using L append_Nil ladder_i_0_bound 
              length_append_singleton less_Suc0 list.size(3) by fastforce          
            have "length L = 1 âˆ¨ length L > 1" using L
              by (metis LeftDerivationLadder_def Suc_eq_plus1 Suc_eq_plus1_left butlast_conv_take 
                butlast_snoc diff_add_inverse2 is_ladder_def le_add1 le_neq_implies_less 
                length_append_singleton old.nat.exhaust take_0)
            then show ?case
            proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
              case 1
                from LeftDerivationLadder_length_1[OF L 1] ladder_i_0_eq_0 
                have ldfix: "LeftDerivationFix [ğ”–] 0 D (ladder_last_j L) (terminals q @ [N] @ Î³)"
                  by auto
                with LeftDerivationFix_from_singleton have "D = []" by blast
                with D_non_empty have "False" by auto
                then show ?case by blast
            next
              case 2
                obtain a where a: "a = ladder_Î± [ğ”–] D L (length L - 1)" by blast
                then have a_as_Î³: "a = ladder_Î³ [ğ”–] D L (length L - 2)" using 2 ladder_Î±_def
                  by (metis diff_diff_left diff_is_0_eq not_le one_add_one)
                have introsAt: "LeftDerivationIntrosAt [ğ”–] D L (length L - 1)" using L
                  by (metis "2.hyps" LeftDerivationIntros_def LeftDerivationLadder_def One_nat_def 
                    Suc_leI Suc_lessD diff_less less_not_refl not_less_eq zero_less_diff)
                obtain i where i: "i = ladder_i L (length L - 1)" by blast
                obtain j where j: "j = ladder_j L (length L - 1)" by blast
                obtain ix where ix: "ix = ladder_ix L (length L - 1)" by blast
                obtain c where c: "c = ladder_Î³ [ğ”–] D L (length L - 1)" by blast
                obtain n where n: "n = ladder_n L (length L - 1 - 1)" by blast
                obtain m where m: "m = ladder_n L (length L - 1)" by blast
                obtain e where e: "e = D ! n" by blast
                obtain E where E: "E = drop (Suc n) (take m D)" by blast
                from iffD1[OF LeftDerivationIntrosAt_def introsAt]  
                have "i = fst e âˆ§ LeftDerivationIntro a i (snd e) ix E j c"
                  by (metis E a c e i ix j m n)
                then have i_eq_fst_e: "i = fst e" and 
                  ldintro: "LeftDerivationIntro a i (snd e) ix E j c" by auto
                have c_def: "c = terminals q @ [N] @ Î³" 
                  using c L LeftDerivationLadder_ladder_Î³_last by simp            
                from iffD1[OF LeftDerivationIntro_def ldintro] obtain b where b:
                  "LeftDerives1 a i (snd e) b âˆ§ ix < length (snd (snd e)) âˆ§ 
                   snd (snd e) ! ix = c ! j âˆ§ LeftDerivationFix b (i + ix) E j c" by blast
                obtain M Ï‰ where MÏ‰: "(M, Ï‰) = snd e" using prod.collapse by blast 
                have j_q: "j = length q" using L_last_j j ladder_last_j_def by auto
                with c_def have c_at_j: "c ! j = N"
                  by (metis append_Cons length_terminals nth_append_length)  
                with b MÏ‰ have Ï‰_at_ix: "Ï‰ ! ix = N" by (metis snd_conv)
                obtain Î¼1 Î¼2 where split_Ï‰: "splits_at Ï‰ ix Î¼1 N Î¼2"
                  by (metis MÏ‰ Ï‰_at_ix b snd_conv splits_at_def)
                obtain a1 a2 where split_a: "splits_at a i a1 M a2" using b
                  by (metis LeftDerivationIntro_bounds_ij LeftDerivationIntro_examine_rule MÏ‰ 
                   fst_conv ldintro splits_at_def)
                then have is_word_a1: "is_word a1"
                  using LeftDerives1_splits_at_is_word b by blast 
                have "b = a1 @ Ï‰ @ a2" using split_a b MÏ‰
                  by (metis LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 snd_conv splits_at_combine_dest) 
                then have b_def: "b = a1 @ Î¼1 @ [N] @ Î¼2 @ a2" using split_Ï‰ splits_at_combine 
                  by simp
                have is_nonterminal_N: "is_nonterminal N"
                  using less.prems(6) rule_nonterminal_type by blast 
                with LeftDerivationFix_splits_at_nonterminal split_a b 
                have "âˆƒ U b1 b2 c1. splits_at b (i + ix) b1 U b2 âˆ§ splits_at c j c1 U b2 âˆ§
                  LeftDerivation b1 E c1" by (simp add: LeftDerivationFix_def c_at_j)
                then obtain b1 b2 c1 where b1b2c1:
                  "splits_at b (i + ix) b1 N b2 âˆ§ splits_at c j c1 N b2 âˆ§
                   LeftDerivation b1 E c1" using c_at_j splits_at_def by auto 
                then have c1_q: "c1 = terminals q" using c_def j_q
                  by (simp add: append_eq_conv_conj splits_at_def) 
                have length_a1_eq_i: "length a1 = i" using split_a splits_at_def by auto 
                have length_Î¼1_eq_ix: "length Î¼1 = ix" using split_Ï‰ splits_at_def by auto
                have "b1 = take (i + ix) b" using b1b2c1 splits_at_def by blast 
                then have b1_eq_a1_Î¼1: "b1 = a1 @ Î¼1" using b_def length_a1_eq_i length_Î¼1_eq_ix
                  by (simp add: append_eq_conv_conj take_add)
                have "LeftDerivation (a1 @ Î¼1) E c1" using b1b2c1 b1_eq_a1_Î¼1 by blast
                from LeftDerivation_skip_prefixword_ex[OF this is_word_a1]
                obtain w where w: "c1 = a1 @ w âˆ§ 
                  LeftDerivation Î¼1 (derivation_shift E (length a1) 0) w" by blast
                have a1_eq_take_i: "a1 = take i (terminals q)"
                  using w c1_q split_a append_eq_conv_conj length_a1_eq_i by blast 
                have Î¼1_leftderives: "leftderives Î¼1 (terminals (drop i q))" using w c1_q split_a 
                  LeftDerivation_implies_leftderives append_eq_conv_conj length_a1_eq_i by auto
                have "LeftDerivation [ğ”–] (take n D) a"
                  by (metis "2.hyps" L LeftDerivationLadder_implies_LeftDerivation_at_index 
                    One_nat_def Suc_lessD a_as_Î³ diff_Suc_eq_diff_pred diff_Suc_less n numeral_2_eq_2) 
                then have LD_to_M: "LeftDerivation [ğ”–] (take n D) ((terminals (take i q))@[M]@a2)"
                  using split_a splits_at_combine a1_eq_take_i terminals_take by auto
                have is_ladder: "is_ladder D L" using L by (simp add: LeftDerivationLadder_def)
                then have n_less_m: "n < m" using n m is_ladder_def
                  by (metis (no_types, lifting) "2.hyps" One_nat_def diff_Suc_less 
                    length_greater_0_conv zero_less_diff) 
                have m_le_D: "m â‰¤ length D" using m is_ladder_def is_ladder dual_order.refl 
                  ladder_n_last_is_length by auto 
                have "length (take n D) = n" using  n_less_m m_le_D
                  using length_take less_irrefl less_le_trans linear min.absorb2 by auto 
                then have length_take_n_D: "length (take n D) < length D" 
                  using n_less_m m_le_D less_le_trans by linarith 
                have Ï‰_decompose: "Ï‰ = Î¼1@(N#Î¼2)" using split_Ï‰ splits_at_combine by simp
                have "(M, Ï‰) âˆˆ â„œ" by (metis Derives1_rule LeftDerives1_implies_Derives1 MÏ‰ b) 
                with Ï‰_decompose have M_rule: "(M, Î¼1@(N#Î¼2)) âˆˆ â„œ" by simp
                have i_le_q: "i â‰¤ length q" using a1_eq_take_i length_a1_eq_i by auto 
                obtain y where 
                  y: "y = Item (M, Î¼1 @ N # Î¼2) (length Î¼1) (charslength (take i q)) k'" by blast
                from less.hyps[OF length_take_n_D less.prems(1, 2, 3, 4, 5) M_rule i_le_q LD_to_M
                   Î¼1_leftderives less.prems(10) y less.prems(12)]
                have y_in_I: "y âˆˆ I" by blast
                obtain z where z: "z = Item (N, Î±@Î²) 0 k' k'" by blast
                then have z_is_init_item: "z = init_item (N, Î±@Î²) k'" by (simp add: init_item_def) 
                have "z âˆˆ Predict k' {y}"
                  apply (simp add: z_is_init_item)
                  apply (rule next_symbol_predicts)
                  apply (simp add: is_complete_def next_symbol_def y)
                  apply (simp add: less.prems(6))
                  apply (simp add: y item_end_def)
                  done
                then have "z âˆˆ Predict k' I" using Predict_def bin_def y_in_I by auto
                then have z_in_I: "z âˆˆ I" by (metis Predict_Ï€_fix items_le_Predict less.prems(12)) 
                have length_chars_q: "length (chars q) = k'" using less.prems by simp
                have x_is_inc_dot: "x = inc_dot (length Î±) z"
                  by (simp add: less.prems(11) r_eq_length_q length_chars_q z inc_dot_def)
                have wellformed_items_I: "wellformed_items I"
                  apply (subst less.prems(12))
                  by (meson LocalLexing.items_le_is_filter LocalLexing.wellformed_items_Gen 
                    LocalLexing_axioms empty_subsetI less.prems(4) subsetCE wellformed_items_Scan 
                    wellformed_items_Ï€ wellformed_items_def)
                with z_in_I have wellformed_z: "wellformed_item z" 
                  using wellformed_items_def by blast   
                have item_Î²_z: "item_Î² z = Î±@Î²" by (simp add: z_is_init_item) 
                have item_end_z: "item_end z = k'" by (simp add: z_is_init_item)               
                have "x âˆˆ Ï€ k' {} {z}"
                  apply (simp add: x_is_inc_dot)
                  apply (rule thmD6)
                  apply (rule wellformed_z)
                  apply (rule item_Î²_z)
                  apply (rule item_end_z)
                  by (simp add: Î±_derives_empty) 
                then have "x âˆˆ Ï€ k' {} I" using z_in_I
                  by (meson contra_subsetD empty_subsetI insert_subset monoD mono_Ï€) 
                then show ?case
                  by (metis (no_types, lifting) LocalLexing.wellformed_item_def LocalLexing_axioms 
                    Ï€_subset_elem_trans item.sel(3) item.sel(4) items_le_def items_le_is_filter 
                    less.prems(11) less.prems(12) mem_Collect_eq wellformed_z z)
            qed
        qed
    qed    
qed

theorem thmD11:
  assumes p_dom: "p âˆˆ ğ”“"
  assumes p_charslength: "charslength p = k"
  assumes X_dom: "X âˆˆ T"
  assumes T_dom: "T âŠ† ğ’³ k"
  assumes q_def: "q = p @ [X]"
  assumes rule_dom: "(N, Î±@Î²) âˆˆ â„œ"
  assumes r: "r â‰¤ length q"
  assumes leftderives_start: "leftderives [ğ”–] ((terminals (take r q))@[N]@Î³)"
  assumes leftderives_Î±: "leftderives Î± (terminals (drop r q))"
  assumes k': "k' = k + length (chars_of_token X)"
  assumes item_def: "x = Item (N, Î±@Î²) (length Î±) (charslength (take r q)) k'"
  assumes I: "I = items_le k' (Ï€ k' {} (Scan T k (Gen (Prefixes p))))"
  shows "x âˆˆ I"
proof -
  have "âˆƒ D. LeftDerivation  [ğ”–] D ((terminals (take r q))@[N]@Î³)"
    using leftderives_start leftderives_implies_LeftDerivation by blast 
  then obtain D where D: "LeftDerivation  [ğ”–] D ((terminals (take r q))@[N]@Î³)" by blast
  from thmD11_helper[OF assms(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7) D assms(9, 10, 11, 12)]
  show ?thesis .
qed

end

end

Theory TheoremD12

theory TheoremD12
imports TheoremD11
begin

context LocalLexing begin

lemma charslength_appendix_is_empty:
  "charslength (p@ts) = charslength p âŸ¹ (â‹€ t. t âˆˆ set ts âŸ¹ chars_of_token t = [])"
proof (induct ts)
  case Nil then show ?case by auto
next
  case (Cons s ts)
    have "charslength (p @ s # ts) = charslength (p @ ts) + length (chars_of_token s)"
      by simp
    then have "charslength (p @ s # ts) = charslength p + charslength ts + length (chars_of_token s)"
      by simp
    with Cons.prems(1) have "charslength ts + length (chars_of_token s) = 0" by arith
    then show ?case using Cons.prems(2) charslength_0 by auto
qed        

lemma empty_tokens_have_charslength_0:
  "(â‹€ t. t âˆˆ set ts âŸ¹ chars_of_token t = []) âŸ¹ charslength ts = 0"
proof (induct ts)
  case Nil then show ?case by simp
next
  case (Cons t ts)
    then show ?case by auto
qed

lemma Ï€_idempotent': "Ï€ k {} (Ï€ k T I) = Ï€ k T I"
  apply (simp add: Ï€_no_tokens)
  by (simp add: Complete_Ï€_fix Predict_Ï€_fix fix_is_fix_of_limit)

theorem thmD12:
  assumes induct: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k u) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u))"
  assumes induct_tokens: "ğ’¯ k u = ğ’µ k u"
  shows "items_le k (ğ’¥ k (Suc u)) âŠ‡ Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k (Suc u)))"
proof -
  {
    fix x :: item
    assume x_dom: "x âˆˆ Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k (Suc u)))" 
    have "âˆƒ q. pvalid q x âˆ§ q âˆˆ ğ’« k (Suc u) âˆ§ charslength q â‰¤ k"
    proof -
      have "â‹€i I n. i âˆˆ I âˆ¨ i âˆ‰ items_le n I"
        by (meson items_le_is_filter subsetCE)
      then show ?thesis
        by (metis Gen_implies_pvalid x_dom items_le_fix_D items_le_idempotent items_le_paths_le 
          pvalid_item_end)
    qed
    then obtain q where q: "pvalid q x âˆ§ q âˆˆ ğ’« k (Suc u) âˆ§ charslength q â‰¤ k" by blast
    have "q âˆˆ ğ’« k u âˆ¨ q âˆ‰ ğ’« k u" by blast
    then have "x âˆˆ items_le k (ğ’¥ k (Suc u))"
    proof (induct rule: disjCases2) 
      case 1
        with q have "x âˆˆ Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u))"
          apply (auto simp add: Gen_def)
          apply (rule_tac x=q in exI)
          by (simp add: paths_le_def)
        with induct have "x âˆˆ items_le k (ğ’¥ k u)" by simp
        then show ?case
          using LocalLexing.items_le_def LocalLexing_axioms ğ’¥_subset_Suc_u by fastforce
    next
      case 2
        have q_is_limit: "q âˆˆ limit (Append (ğ’´ (ğ’µ k u) (ğ’« k u) k) k) (ğ’« k u)" using q by auto
        from limit_Append_path_nonelem_split[OF q_is_limit 2] obtain p ts where p_ts:
          "q = p @ ts âˆ§
           p âˆˆ ğ’« k u âˆ§
           charslength p = k âˆ§
           admissible (p @ ts) âˆ§
           (âˆ€tâˆˆset ts. t âˆˆ ğ’´ (ğ’µ k u) (ğ’« k u) k) âˆ§ (âˆ€tâˆˆset (butlast ts). chars_of_token t = [])"
           by blast
        then have ts_nonempty: "ts â‰  []" using 2 using self_append_conv by auto
        obtain T where T: "T = ğ’´ (ğ’µ k u) (ğ’« k u) k" by blast
        obtain J where J: "J = Ï€ k T (Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u)))" by blast
        from q p_ts have chars_of_token_is_empty: "â‹€ t. tâˆˆset ts âŸ¹ chars_of_token t = []"
          using charslength_appendix_is_empty chars_append charslength.simps le_add1 le_imp_less_Suc 
            le_neq_implies_less length_append not_less_eq by auto        
        {
          fix sss :: "token list"
          have "is_prefix sss ts âŸ¹ pvalid (p @ sss) x âŸ¹ x âˆˆ J"
          proof (induct "length sss" arbitrary: sss x rule: less_induct)
            case less
              have "sss = [] âˆ¨ sss â‰  []" by blast
              then show ?case
              proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
                case 1                
                  with less have pvalid_p_x: "pvalid p x" by auto
                  have charslength_p: "charslength p â‰¤ k" using p_ts by blast 
                  with p_ts have "p âˆˆ paths_le k (ğ’« k u)"
                    by (simp add: paths_le_def)
                  with pvalid_p_x have "x âˆˆ Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u))" 
                    using Gen_def mem_Collect_eq by blast 
                  then have "x âˆˆ Ï€ k T (Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u)))" using Ï€_apply_setmonotone 
                    by blast
                  then show "x âˆˆ J" using pvalid_item_end q J LocalLexing.items_le_def 
                    LocalLexing_axioms charslength_p mem_Collect_eq pvalid_p_x by auto 
              next
                case 2
                  then have "âˆƒ a ss. sss = ss@[a]" using rev_exhaust by blast 
                  then obtain a ss where snoc: "sss = ss@[a]" by blast
                  obtain p' where p': "p' = p @ ss" by auto
                  then have "pvalid_left (p'@[a]) x" using snoc less pvalid_left by simp
                  from iffD1[OF pvalid_left_def this] obtain r Ï‰ where pvalid:
                    "wellformed_tokens (p' @ [a]) âˆ§
                     wellformed_item x âˆ§
                     r â‰¤ length (p' @ [a]) âˆ§
                     charslength (p' @ [a]) = item_end x âˆ§
                     charslength (take r (p' @ [a])) = item_origin x âˆ§
                     is_leftderivation (terminals (take r (p' @ [a])) @ [item_nonterminal x] @ Ï‰) âˆ§
                     leftderives (item_Î± x) (terminals (drop r (p' @ [a])))" by blast
                  obtain q' where q': "q' = p'@[a]" by blast
                  have is_prefix_ss_ts: "is_prefix ss ts" using snoc less 
                    by (simp add: is_prefix_append) 
                  then have "is_prefix (p@ss) q" using p' snoc p_ts by simp
                  then have "is_prefix p' q" using p' by simp
                  then have h1: "p' âˆˆ ğ”“" using q ğ”“_covers_ğ’« prefixes_are_paths' subsetCE by blast 
                  have charslength_ss: "charslength ss = 0" 
                    apply (rule empty_tokens_have_charslength_0)
                    by (metis is_prefix_ss_ts append_is_Nil_conv chars_append chars_of_token_is_empty 
                      charslength.simps charslength_0 is_prefix_def length_greater_0_conv list.size(3))
                  then have h2: "charslength p' = k" using p' p_ts by auto  
                  have a_in_ts: "a âˆˆ set ts"
                    by (metis in_set_dropD is_prefix_append is_prefix_cons list.set_intros(1) 
                      snoc less(2)) 
                  then have h3: "a âˆˆ T" using T p_ts by blast 
                  have h4: "T âŠ† ğ’³ k"
                    using LocalLexing.ğ’µ.simps(2) LocalLexing_axioms T ğ’µ_subset_ğ’³ by blast
                  note h5 = q'
                  obtain N where N: "N = item_nonterminal x" by blast
                  obtain Î± where Î±: "Î± = item_Î± x" by blast
                  obtain Î² where Î²: "Î² = item_Î² x" by blast
                  have item_rule_x: "item_rule x = (N, Î± @ Î²)"
                    using N Î± Î² item_nonterminal_def item_rhs_def item_rhs_split by auto 
                  have "wellformed_item x" using pvalid by blast
                  then have h6: "(N, Î±@Î²) âˆˆ â„œ" using item_rule_x
                    by (simp add: wellformed_item_def) 
                  have h7: "r â‰¤ length q'" using pvalid q' by blast 
                  have h8: "leftderives [ğ”–] (terminals (take r q') @ [N] @ Ï‰)"
                    using N is_leftderivation_def pvalid q' by blast
                  have h9: "leftderives Î± (terminals (drop r q'))" using Î± pvalid q' by blast
                  have h10: "k = k + length (chars_of_token a)"
                    by (simp add: a_in_ts chars_of_token_is_empty)
                  have h11: "x = Item (N, Î± @ Î²) (length Î±) (charslength (take r q')) k"
                    by (metis Î± charslength_ss a_in_ts append_Nil2 chars.simps(2) chars_append 
                      chars_of_token_is_empty charslength.simps h2 item.collapse item_dot_is_Î±_length 
                      item_rule_x length_greater_0_conv list.size(3) pvalid q')
                  have x_dom: "x âˆˆ items_le k (Ï€ k {} (Scan T k (Gen (Prefixes p'))))"  
                    using thmD11[OF h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6 h7 h8 h9 h10 h11] by auto
                  {
                    fix y :: item
                    fix toks :: "token list"
                    assume pvalid_toks_y: "pvalid toks y"
                    assume is_prefix_toks_p': "is_prefix toks p'"
                    then have charslength_toks: "charslength toks â‰¤ k"
                      using charslength_of_prefix h2 by blast 
                    then have item_end_y: "item_end y â‰¤ k" using pvalid_item_end pvalid_toks_y 
                      by auto 
                    have "is_prefix toks p âˆ¨ (âˆƒ ss'. is_prefix ss' ss âˆ§ toks = p@ss')"
                      using is_prefix_of_append is_prefix_toks_p' p' by auto
                    then have "y âˆˆ J"
                    proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
                      case 1  
                        then have "toks âˆˆ ğ’« k u" using p_ts prefixes_are_paths by blast 
                        with charslength_toks have "toks âˆˆ paths_le k (ğ’« k u)"
                          by (simp add: paths_le_def)
                        then have "y âˆˆ Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u))" using pvalid_toks_y
                          Gen_def mem_Collect_eq by blast 
                        then have "y âˆˆ Ï€ k T (Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u)))" using Ï€_apply_setmonotone 
                          by blast
                        then show "y âˆˆ J" by (simp add: J items_le_def item_end_y)
                    next
                      case 2
                        then obtain ss' where ss': "is_prefix ss' ss âˆ§ toks = p@ss'" by blast
                        then have l1: "length ss' < length sss"
                          using append_eq_conv_conj append_self_conv is_prefix_length length_append 
                            less_le_trans nat_neq_iff not_Cons_self2 not_add_less1 snoc by fastforce
                        have l2: "is_prefix ss' ts" using ss' is_prefix_ss_ts
                          by (metis append_dropped_prefix is_prefix_append) 
                        have l3: "pvalid (p @ ss') y" using ss' pvalid_toks_y by simp 
                        show ?case using less.hyps[OF l1 l2 l3] by blast
                    qed
                  }
                  then have "Gen (Prefixes p') âŠ† J"
                    by (meson Gen_implies_pvalid Prefixes_is_prefix subsetI) 
                  with x_dom have r0: "x âˆˆ items_le k (Ï€ k {} (Scan T k J))"
                    by (metis (no_types, lifting) LocalLexing.items_le_def LocalLexing_axioms 
                      mem_Collect_eq mono_Scan mono_Ï€ mono_subset_elem subsetI)
                  then have x_in_Ï€: "x âˆˆ Ï€ k {} (Scan T k J)"
                    using LocalLexing.items_le_is_filter LocalLexing_axioms subsetCE by blast 
                  have r1: "Scan T k J = J"
                    by (simp add: J Scan_Ï€_fix)
                  have r2: "Ï€ k {} J = J" using Ï€_idempotent' using J by blast
                  from x_in_Ï€ r1 r2 show "x âˆˆ J" by auto
              qed
          qed    
        }
        note th = this
        have x_in_J: "x âˆˆ J"
          apply (rule th[of ts])
          apply (simp add: is_prefix_eq_proper_prefix)
          using p_ts q by blast
        have ğ’¯_eq_ğ’µ: "ğ’¯ k (Suc u) = ğ’µ k (Suc u)"
          using induct induct_tokens ğ’¯_equals_ğ’µ_induct_step by blast
        have T_alt: "T = ğ’¯ k (Suc u)" using ğ’¯_eq_ğ’µ T by simp
        have "J = Ï€ k T (items_le k (ğ’¥ k u))" using induct J by simp
        then have "J âŠ† Ï€ k T (ğ’¥ k u)" by (simp add: items_le_is_filter monoD mono_Ï€) 
        with T_alt have "J âŠ† ğ’¥ k (Suc u)" using ğ’¥.simps(2) by blast
        with x_in_J have "x âˆˆ ğ’¥ k (Suc u)" by blast
        then show ?case
          using LocalLexing.items_le_def LocalLexing_axioms pvalid_item_end q by auto
    qed
  }
  then show ?thesis by auto
qed
    
end

end

Theory TheoremD13

theory TheoremD13
imports TheoremD12
begin

context LocalLexing begin

lemma pointwise_natUnion_swap:
  assumes pointwise_f: "pointwise f"
  shows "f (natUnion G) = natUnion (Î» u. f (G u))"
proof -
  note f_simp = pointwise_simp[OF pointwise_f]
  have h1: "f (natUnion G) = â‹ƒ {f {x} |x. x âˆˆ (natUnion G)}" using f_simp by blast
  have h2: "â‹€ x. f (G x) =  â‹ƒ {f {y} |y. y âˆˆ G x}" using f_simp by metis
  show ?thesis
    apply (subst h1)
    apply (subst h2)
    apply (simp add: natUnion_def)
    by blast
qed    

lemma pointwise_Gen: "pointwise Gen"
  by (simp add: pointwise_def Gen_def, blast)
    
lemma thmD13_part1:
  assumes start: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k 0) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k 0))"
  assumes valid_k: "k â‰¤ length Doc"
  shows "items_le k (ğ’¥ k u) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u)) âˆ§ ğ’¯ k u = ğ’µ k u"
proof (induct u)
  case 0 
    then show ?case using start by auto
next
  case (Suc u) 
    from Suc have sub: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k (Suc u)) âŠ† Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k (Suc u)))"
      using thmD9 valid_k by blast
    from Suc have sup: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k (Suc u)) âŠ‡ Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k (Suc u)))"
      using thmD12 by blast
    from Suc have tokens: "ğ’¯ k (Suc u) = ğ’µ k (Suc u)"
      using ğ’¯_equals_ğ’µ_induct_step by blast
    from sub sup tokens show ?case by blast
qed

lemma thmD13_part2:      
  assumes start: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k 0) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k 0))"
  assumes valid_k: "k â‰¤ length Doc"
  shows "items_le k (â„ k) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’¬ k))"
proof -
  note part1 = thmD13_part1[OF start valid_k]
  have e1: "items_le k (â„ k) = natUnion (Î» u. items_le k (ğ’¥ k u))"
    using items_le_pointwise pointwise_natUnion_swap by auto 
  have e2: "natUnion (Î» u. items_le k (ğ’¥ k u)) = natUnion  (Î» u. Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u)))"
    using part1 by auto
  have e3: "natUnion (Î» u. Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u))) = Gen (natUnion (Î» u. paths_le k (ğ’« k u)))"
    using pointwise_Gen pointwise_natUnion_swap by fastforce 
  have e4: "natUnion (Î» u. paths_le k (ğ’« k u)) = paths_le k (natUnion (Î» u. ğ’« k u))"
    using paths_le_pointwise pointwise_natUnion_swap by fastforce   
  from e1 e2 e3 e4 show ?thesis by simp
qed
    
theorem thmD13:      
  assumes start: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k 0) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k 0))"
  assumes valid_k: "k â‰¤ length Doc"
  shows "items_le k (ğ’¥ k u) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u)) âˆ§ ğ’¯ k u = ğ’µ k u 
    âˆ§ items_le k (â„ k) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’¬ k))"
using thmD13_part1[OF start valid_k] thmD13_part2[OF start valid_k] by blast

end

end

Theory TheoremD14

theory TheoremD14
imports TheoremD13
begin

context LocalLexing begin

lemma empty_tokens_of_empty[simp]: "empty_tokens {} = {}"
  using empty_tokens_is_filter by blast

lemma items_le_split_via_eq: "items_le (Suc k) J = items_le k J âˆª items_eq (Suc k) J"
  by (auto simp add: items_le_def items_eq_def)

lemma paths_le_split_via_eq: "paths_le (Suc k) P = paths_le k P âˆª paths_eq (Suc k) P"
  by (auto simp add: paths_le_def paths_eq_def)

lemma natUnion_superset:
  shows "g i âŠ† natUnion g"
by (meson natUnion_elem subset_eq)

definition indexle :: "nat â‡’ nat â‡’ nat â‡’ nat â‡’ bool" where
  "indexle k' u' k u = ((indexlt k' u' k u) âˆ¨ (k' = k âˆ§ u' = u))"

definition produced_by_scan_step :: "item â‡’ nat â‡’ nat â‡’ bool" where
  "produced_by_scan_step x k u = (âˆƒ k' u' y X. indexle k' u' k u âˆ§ y âˆˆ ğ’¥ k' u' âˆ§ 
   item_end y = k' âˆ§ X âˆˆ (ğ’¯ k' u') âˆ§ x = inc_item y (k' + length (chars_of_token X)) âˆ§ 
   next_symbol y = Some (terminal_of_token X))"

lemma indexle_trans: "indexle k'' u'' k' u' âŸ¹ indexle k' u' k u âŸ¹ indexle k'' u'' k u"
  using indexle_def indexlt_trans
proof -
  assume a1: "indexle k'' u'' k' u'"
  assume a2: "indexle k' u' k u"
  then have f3: "â‹€n na. u' = u âˆ¨ indexlt n na k u âˆ¨ Â¬ indexlt n na k' u'"
    by (meson indexle_def indexlt_trans)
  have "â‹€n na. k' = k âˆ¨ indexlt n na k u âˆ¨ Â¬ indexlt n na k' u'"
    using a2 by (meson indexle_def indexlt_trans)
  then show ?thesis
    using f3 a2 a1 indexle_def by auto
qed 

lemma produced_by_scan_step_trans:
  assumes "indexle k' u' k u"
  assumes "produced_by_scan_step x k' u'"
  shows "produced_by_scan_step x k u"
proof -
  from iffD1[OF produced_by_scan_step_def assms(2)] obtain k'a u'a y X where produced_k'_u':
    "indexle k'a u'a k' u' âˆ§
     y âˆˆ ğ’¥ k'a u'a âˆ§
     item_end y = k'a âˆ§
     X âˆˆ ğ’¯ k'a u'a âˆ§
     x = inc_item y (k'a + length (chars_of_token X)) âˆ§ next_symbol y = Some (terminal_of_token X)"
     by blast
  then show ?thesis using indexle_trans assms(1) produced_by_scan_step_def by blast 
qed

lemma ğ’¥_induct[consumes 1, case_names Induct]:
  assumes "x âˆˆ ğ’¥ k u"
  assumes induct: "â‹€ x k u . (â‹€ x' k' u'. x' âˆˆ ğ’¥ k' u' âŸ¹ indexlt k' u' k u âŸ¹ P x' k' u') 
                     âŸ¹ x âˆˆ ğ’¥ k u âŸ¹ P x k u"
  shows "P x k u"
proof -
  let ?R = "indexlt_rel <*lex*> {}"
  have wf_R: "wf ?R" by (auto simp add: wf_indexlt_rel)
  let ?P = "Î» a. snd a âˆˆ ğ’¥ (fst (fst a)) (snd (fst a)) âŸ¶ P (snd a) (fst (fst a)) (snd (fst a))"
  have "x âˆˆ ğ’¥ k u âŸ¶ P x k u"
    apply (rule wf_induct[OF wf_R, where P = ?P and a = "((k, u), x)", simplified])
    apply (auto simp add: indexlt_def[symmetric])
    apply (rule_tac x=ba and k=a and u=b in induct)
    by auto
  thus ?thesis using assms by auto 
qed

lemma Ï€_no_tokens_item_end: 
  assumes x_in_Ï€: "x âˆˆ Ï€ k {} I"
  shows "item_end x = k âˆ¨ x âˆˆ I"
proof -
  have x_in_limit: "x âˆˆ limit (Î»I. Complete k (Predict k I)) I"
    using x_in_Ï€ Ï€_no_tokens by auto  
  then show ?thesis
  proof (induct rule: limit_induct)
    case (Init x) then show ?case by auto
  next
    case (Iterate x J)
      from Iterate(2) have "item_end x = k âˆ¨ x âˆˆ Predict k J"
        using Complete_item_end by auto
      then show ?case 
      proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
        case 1 then show ?case by blast
      next
        case 2 
          then have "item_end x = k âˆ¨ x âˆˆ J" 
            using Predict_item_end by auto
          then show ?case
          proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
            case 1 then show ?case by blast
          next
            case 2 then show ?case using Iterate(1)[OF 2] by blast
          qed
      qed 
  qed
qed 

lemma natUnion_ex: "x âˆˆ natUnion f âŸ¹ âˆƒ i. x âˆˆ f i"
  by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) mk_disjoint_insert natUnion_superset natUnion_upperbound 
    subsetCE subset_insert)

lemma locate_in_limit:
  assumes x_in_limit: "x âˆˆ limit f X"
  assumes x_notin_X: "x âˆ‰ X"
  shows "âˆƒ n. x âˆˆ funpower f (Suc n) X âˆ§ x âˆ‰ funpower f n X"
proof -
  have "âˆƒ N. x âˆˆ funpower f N X" using x_in_limit limit_def natUnion_ex by fastforce
  then obtain N where N: "x âˆˆ funpower f N X" by blast
  {
    fix n :: nat
    have "x âˆˆ funpower f n X âŸ¹ âˆƒ m < n. x âˆˆ funpower f (Suc m) X âˆ§ x âˆ‰ funpower f m X"
    proof (induct n)
      case 0 
        with x_notin_X show ?case by auto
    next
      case (Suc n)
        have "x âˆ‰ funpower f n X âˆ¨ x âˆˆ funpower f n X" by blast
        then show ?case
        proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
          case 1     
            then show ?case using Suc by fastforce
        next
          case 2
            from Suc(1)[OF 2] show ?case using less_SucI by blast 
        qed 
    qed
  }
  with N show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma produced_by_scan_step: 
  "x âˆˆ ğ’¥ k u âŸ¹ item_end x > k âŸ¹ produced_by_scan_step x k u"
proof (induct rule: ğ’¥_induct)
  case (Induct x k u)
    have "(k = 0 âˆ§ u = 0) âˆ¨ (k > 0 âˆ§ u = 0) âˆ¨ (u > 0)" by arith
    then show ?case
    proof (induct rule: disjCases3)
      case 1
        with Induct have "item_end x = 0" using ğ’¥_0_0_item_end by blast  
        with Induct have "False" by arith
        then show ?case by  blast
    next
      case 2
        then obtain k' where k': "k = Suc k'" using Suc_pred' by blast 
        with Induct 2 have "x âˆˆ ğ’¥ (Suc k') 0" by auto
        then have "x âˆˆ Ï€ k {} (â„ k')" by (simp add: k') 
        then have "item_end x = k âˆ¨ x âˆˆ â„ k'" using Ï€_no_tokens_item_end by blast
        then show ?case
        proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
          case 1
            with Induct have "False" by auto
            then show ?case by blast
        next
          case 2
            then have "âˆƒ u'. x âˆˆ ğ’¥ k' u'" using â„.simps natUnion_ex by fastforce
            then obtain u' where u': "x âˆˆ ğ’¥ k' u'" by blast
            have k'_bound: "k' < item_end x" using k' Induct by arith
            have indexlt: "indexlt k' u' k u" by (simp add: indexlt_simp k') 
            from Induct(1)[OF u' this k'_bound] 
            have pred_produced: "produced_by_scan_step x k' u'" .
            then show ?case using indexlt produced_by_scan_step_trans indexle_def by blast 
        qed
    next
      case 3
        then have ex_u': "âˆƒ u'. u = Suc u'" by arith
        then obtain u' where u': "u = Suc u'" by blast
        with Induct have "x âˆˆ ğ’¥ k (Suc u')" by metis
        then have x_in_Ï€: "x âˆˆ Ï€ k (ğ’¯ k u) (ğ’¥ k u')" using u' ğ’¥.simps by metis
        have "x âˆˆ ğ’¥ k u' âˆ¨ x âˆ‰ ğ’¥ k u'" by blast
        then show ?case
        proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
          case 1
            have indexlt: "indexlt k u' k u" by (simp add: indexlt_simp u')             
            with Induct(1)[OF 1 indexlt Induct(3)] show ?case
              using indexle_def produced_by_scan_step_trans by blast
        next
          case 2
            have item_end_x: "k < item_end x" using Induct by auto
            obtain f where f: "f = Scan (ğ’¯ k u) k âˆ˜ Complete k âˆ˜ Predict k" by blast
            have "x âˆˆ limit f (ğ’¥ k u')"
              using x_in_Ï€ Ï€_functional f by simp
            from locate_in_limit[OF this 2] obtain n where n:
              "x âˆˆ funpower f (Suc n) (ğ’¥ k u') âˆ§
               x âˆ‰ funpower f n (ğ’¥ k u')" by blast
            obtain Y where Y: "Y = funpower f n (ğ’¥ k u')"
              by blast
            have x_f_Y: "x âˆˆ f Y âˆ§ x âˆ‰ Y" using Y n by auto
            then have "x âˆˆ Scan (ğ’¯ k u) k (Complete k (Predict k Y))" using comp_apply f by simp
            then have "x âˆˆ (Complete k (Predict k Y)) âˆ¨
              x âˆˆ { inc_item x' (k + length c) | x' t c. x' âˆˆ bin (Complete k (Predict k Y)) k âˆ§ 
                    (t, c) âˆˆ (ğ’¯ k u) âˆ§ next_symbol x' = Some t }" using Scan_def by simp
            then show ?case
            proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
              case 1
                then have "False" using item_end_x x_f_Y Complete_item_end Predict_item_end
                  using less_not_refl3 by blast
                then show ?case by auto
            next
              case 2
                have "Y âŠ† limit f (ğ’¥ k u')" using Y limit_def natUnion_superset by fastforce
                then have "Y âŠ† Ï€ k (ğ’¯ k u) (ğ’¥ k u')" using f by (simp add: Ï€_functional)  
                then have Y_in_ğ’¥: "Y âŠ† ğ’¥ k u" using u' by simp
                then have in_ğ’¥: "Complete k (Predict k Y) âŠ† ğ’¥ k u"
                proof - (* automatically generated *)
                  have f1: "âˆ€f I Ia i. (Â¬ mono f âˆ¨ Â¬ (I::item set) âŠ† Ia âˆ¨ (i::item) âˆ‰ f I) âˆ¨ i âˆˆ f Ia"
                    by (meson mono_subset_elem)
                  obtain ii :: "item set â‡’ item set â‡’ item" where
                    "âˆ€x0 x1. (âˆƒv2. v2 âˆˆ x1 âˆ§ v2 âˆ‰ x0) = (ii x0 x1 âˆˆ x1 âˆ§ ii x0 x1 âˆ‰ x0)"
                    by moura
                  then have f2: "âˆ€I Ia. ii Ia I âˆˆ I âˆ§ ii Ia I âˆ‰ Ia âˆ¨ I âŠ† Ia"
                    by blast
                  obtain nn :: nat where
                    f3: "u = Suc nn"
                    using ex_u' by presburger
                  moreover
                  { assume "ii (ğ’¥ k u) (Complete k (Predict k Y)) âˆˆ Complete k (Ï€ k (ğ’¯ k (Suc nn)) (ğ’¥ k nn))"
                    then have ?thesis
                      using f3 f2 Complete_Ï€_fix by auto }
                  ultimately show ?thesis
                    using f2 f1 by (metis (full_types) Complete_regular Predict_Ï€_fix Predict_regular 
                      ğ’¥.simps(2) Y_in_ğ’¥ regular_implies_mono)
                qed 
                from 2 obtain  x' t c where x'_t_c:
                  "x = inc_item x' (k + length c) âˆ§ x' âˆˆ bin (Complete k (Predict k Y)) k âˆ§ 
                    (t, c) âˆˆ ğ’¯ k u âˆ§ next_symbol x' = Some t" by blast
                show ?case
                  apply (simp add: produced_by_scan_step_def)
                  apply (rule_tac x=k in exI)
                  apply (rule_tac x=u in exI)
                  apply (simp add: indexle_def)
                  apply (rule_tac x=x' in exI)
                  apply auto
                  using x'_t_c bin_def in_ğ’¥ apply auto[1]
                  using x'_t_c bin_def apply blast
                  apply (rule_tac x=t in exI)
                  apply (rule_tac x=c in exI)
                  using x'_t_c by auto
            qed      
        qed
    qed  
qed

lemma limit_single_step:
  assumes "x âˆˆ f X"
  shows "x âˆˆ limit f X"
by (metis assms elem_limit_simp funpower.simps(1) funpower.simps(2))

lemma Gen_union: "Gen (A âˆª B) = Gen A âˆª Gen B"
  by (simp add: Gen_def, blast)

lemma is_prefix_Prefixes_subset:
  assumes "is_prefix q p"
  shows "Prefixes q âŠ† Prefixes p"
proof -
  show ?thesis
    apply (auto simp add: Prefixes_def)
    using assms by (metis is_prefix_append is_prefix_def) 
qed

lemma Prefixes_subset_ğ’«:
  assumes "p âˆˆ ğ’« k u"
  shows "Prefixes p âŠ† ğ’« k u"
using Prefixes_is_prefix assms prefixes_are_paths by blast

lemma Prefixes_subset_paths_le:
  assumes "Prefixes p âŠ† P"
  shows "Prefixes p âŠ† paths_le (charslength p) P"
using Prefixes_is_prefix assms charslength_of_prefix paths_le_def by auto

lemma Scan_ğ’¥_subset_ğ’¥:
  "Scan (ğ’¯ k (Suc u)) k (ğ’¥ k u) âŠ† ğ’¥ k (Suc u)"
by (metis (no_types, lifting) Scan_Ï€_fix ğ’¥.simps(2) ğ’¥_subset_Suc_u monoD mono_Scan)

lemma subset_ğ’¥k: "u â‰¤ v âŸ¹ ğ’¥ k u âŠ† ğ’¥ k v"
  thm ğ’¥_subset_Suc_u
  by (rule subset_fSuc, rule ğ’¥_subset_Suc_u) 

lemma subset_ğ’¥â„k: "ğ’¥ k u âŠ† â„ k" by (auto simp add: natUnion_def)

lemma subset_â„ğ’¥Suc: "â„ k âŠ† ğ’¥ (Suc k) u" 
proof -
  have a: "â„ k âŠ† ğ’¥ (Suc k) 0" 
    apply (simp only: ğ’¥.simps)
    using Ï€_apply_setmonotone by blast    
  show ?thesis 
    apply (case_tac "u = 0")
    apply (simp only: a)
    apply (rule subset_trans[OF a subset_ğ’¥k])
    by auto
qed

lemma subset_â„Suc: "â„ k âŠ† â„ (Suc k)"
  by (rule subset_trans[OF subset_â„ğ’¥Suc subset_ğ’¥â„k])

lemma subset_â„: "i â‰¤ j âŸ¹ â„ i âŠ† â„ j"
  by (rule subset_fSuc[where u=i and v=j and f = â„, OF subset_â„Suc])

lemma subset_ğ’¥ :
  assumes leq: "k' < k âˆ¨ (k' = k âˆ§ u' â‰¤ u)"
  shows "ğ’¥ k' u' âŠ† ğ’¥ k u"
proof -
  from leq show ?thesis
  proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
    case 1
    have s1: "ğ’¥ k' u' âŠ† â„ k'" by (rule_tac subset_ğ’¥â„k) 
    have s2: "â„ k' âŠ† â„ (k - 1)" 
      apply (rule_tac subset_â„)
      using 1 by arith
    from subset_â„ğ’¥Suc[where k="k - 1"] 1 have s3: "â„ (k - 1) âŠ† ğ’¥ k 0"
      by simp
    have s4: "ğ’¥ k 0 âŠ† ğ’¥ k u" by (rule_tac subset_ğ’¥k, simp)
    from s1 s2 s3 s4 subset_trans show ?case by blast
  next
    case 2 thus ?case by (simp add : subset_ğ’¥k)
  qed
qed  

lemma ğ’¥_subset:
  assumes "indexle k' u' k u"
  shows "ğ’¥ k' u' âŠ† ğ’¥ k u"
using subset_ğ’¥ indexle_def indexlt_simp
by (metis assms less_imp_le_nat order_refl) 

lemma Scan_items_le:
  assumes bounded_T: "â‹€ t . t âˆˆ T âŸ¹ length (chars_of_token t) â‰¤ l"
  shows "Scan T k (items_le k P) âŠ† items_le (k + l) (Scan T k P)"
proof -
  {
    fix x :: item
    assume x_dom: "x âˆˆ Scan T k (items_le k P)"
    then have x_dom': "x âˆˆ Scan T k P"
      by (meson items_le_is_filter mono_Scan mono_subset_elem)
    from x_dom have "x âˆˆ items_le k P âˆ¨ 
      (âˆƒ y t c. x = inc_item y (k + length c) âˆ§ y âˆˆ bin (items_le k P) k âˆ§ (t, c) âˆˆ T
       âˆ§ next_symbol y = Some t)" 
      using Scan_def using UnE mem_Collect_eq by auto 
    then have "item_end x â‰¤ k + l"
    proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
      case 1 then show ?case
        by (meson items_le_fix_D items_le_idempotent trans_le_add1)
    next
      case 2 
        then obtain y t c where y: "x = inc_item y (k + length c) âˆ§ y âˆˆ bin (items_le k P) k âˆ§ 
          (t, c) âˆˆ T âˆ§ next_symbol y = Some t" by blast
        then have item_end_x: "item_end x = (k + length c)" by simp
        from bounded_T y have "length c â‰¤ l"
          using chars_of_token_simp by auto 
        with item_end_x show ?case by arith
    qed
    with x_dom' have "x âˆˆ items_le (k + l) (Scan T k P)"
      using items_le_def mem_Collect_eq by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis by blast      
qed

lemma Scan_mono_tokens:
  "P âŠ† Q âŸ¹ Scan P k I âŠ† Scan Q k I"
by (auto simp add: Scan_def)

theorem thmD14: "k â‰¤ length Doc âŸ¹ items_le k (ğ’¥ k u) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k u)) âˆ§ ğ’¯ k u = ğ’µ k u 
    âˆ§ items_le k (â„ k) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’¬ k))"
proof (induct k arbitrary: u rule: less_induct)
  case (less k)
    have "k = 0 âˆ¨ k â‰  0" by arith
    then show ?case 
    proof (induct rule: disjCases2)
      case 1
        have ğ’¥_eq_ğ’«: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k 0) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k 0))" 
          by (simp only: 1 thmD8 items_le_paths_le)
        show ?case using thmD13[OF ğ’¥_eq_ğ’« less.prems] by blast
    next
      case 2
        have "âˆƒ k'. k = Suc k'" using 2 by arith
        then obtain k' where k': "k = Suc k'" by blast
        have k'_less_k: "k' < k" using k' by arith
        have "items_le k (ğ’¥ k 0) = Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k 0))"          
        proof -
          have simp_left: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k 0) = Ï€ k {} (items_le k (â„ k'))"
            using items_le_Ï€_swap k' wellformed_items_â„ by auto 
          have simp_right: "Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k 0)) = natUnion (Î» v. Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k' v)))"
            by (simp add: k' paths_le_pointwise pointwise_Gen pointwise_natUnion_swap)            
          {
            fix v :: nat
            have split_ğ’¥: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k' v) = items_le k' (ğ’¥ k' v) âˆª items_eq k (ğ’¥ k' v)" 
              using k'  items_le_split_via_eq by blast
            have sub1: "items_le k' (ğ’¥ k' v) âŠ† natUnion (Î» v. Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k' v)))"
            proof -
              have h: "items_le k' (ğ’¥ k' v) âŠ† Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k' v))"
              proof - (* automatically generated *)
                have f1: "items_le k' (Gen (ğ’« k' v)) âˆª items_eq (Suc k') (Gen (ğ’« k' v)) = 
                  Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k' v))"
                  using LocalLexing.items_le_split_via_eq LocalLexing_axioms items_le_paths_le k' 
                  by blast
                have "k' â‰¤ length Doc"
                  by (metis (no_types) dual_order.trans k' less.prems lessI less_imp_le_nat)
                then have "items_le k' (ğ’¥ k' v) = items_le k' (Gen (ğ’« k' v))"
                  by (simp add: items_le_paths_le k' less.hyps)
                then show ?thesis
                  using f1 by blast
              qed
              have "Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k' v)) âŠ† natUnion (Î» v. Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k' v)))"
                using natUnion_superset by fastforce
              then show ?thesis using h by blast
            qed
            {
              fix x :: item
              assume x_dom: "x âˆˆ items_eq k (ğ’¥ k' v)"
              have x_in_ğ’¥: "x âˆˆ ğ’¥ k' v" using x_dom items_eq_def by auto
              have item_end_x: "item_end x = k" using x_dom items_eq_def by auto
              then have k'_bound: "k' < item_end x" using k' by arith
              from produced_by_scan_step[OF x_in_ğ’¥ k'_bound]
              have "produced_by_scan_step x k' v" .
              from iffD1[OF produced_by_scan_step_def this] obtain k'' v'' y X where scan_step:
                "indexle k'' v'' k' v âˆ§ y âˆˆ ğ’¥ k'' v'' âˆ§ item_end y = k'' âˆ§ X âˆˆ ğ’¯ k'' v'' âˆ§
                 x = inc_item y (k'' + length (chars_of_token X)) âˆ§ 
                 next_symbol y = Some (terminal_of_token X)" by blast
              then have y_in_items_le: "y âˆˆ items_le k'' (ğ’¥ k'' v'')"
                using items_le_def LocalLexing_axioms le_refl mem_Collect_eq by blast 
              have y_in_Gen: "y âˆˆ Gen(paths_le k'' (ğ’« k'' v''))"
              proof - (* automatically generated *)
                have f1: "â‹€n. k' < n âˆ¨ Â¬ k < n"
                  using Suc_lessD k' by blast
                have f2: "k'' = k' âˆ¨ k'' < k'"
                  using indexle_def indexlt_simp scan_step by force
                have f3: "k' < k"
                  using k' by blast
                have f4: "k' â‰¤ length Doc"
                  using f1 by (meson less.prems less_Suc_eq_le)
                have "k'' â‰¤ length Doc âˆ¨ k' = k''"
                  using f2 f1 by (meson Suc_lessD less.prems less_Suc_eq_le less_trans_Suc)
                then show ?thesis
                  using f4 f3 f2 Suc_lessD y_in_items_le less.hyps less_trans_Suc by blast
              qed
              then have "âˆƒ p. p âˆˆ ğ’« k'' v'' âˆ§ pvalid p y"
                by (meson Gen_implies_pvalid paths_le_is_filter rev_subsetD)
              then obtain p where p: "p âˆˆ ğ’« k'' v'' âˆ§ pvalid p y" by blast
              then have charslength_p: "charslength p = k''" using pvalid_item_end scan_step by auto 
              have pvalid_p_y: "pvalid p y" using p by blast
              have "admissible (p@[(fst X, snd X)])"
                apply (rule pvalid_next_terminal_admissible)
                apply (rule pvalid_p_y)
                using scan_step apply (simp add: terminal_of_token_def) 
                using scan_step by (metis TokensAt_subset_ğ’³ ğ’¯_subset_TokensAt ğ’³_are_terminals 
                  rev_subsetD terminal_of_token_def) 
              then have admissible_p_X: "admissible (p@[X])" by simp
              have X_in_ğ’µ: "X âˆˆ ğ’µ k'' (Suc v'')" by (metis (no_types, lifting) Suc_lessD ğ’µ_subset_Suc 
                k'_bound dual_order.trans indexle_def indexlt_simp item_end_of_inc_item item_end_x 
                le_add1 le_neq_implies_less less.hyps less.prems not_less_eq scan_step subsetCE) 
              have pX_in_ğ’«_k''_v'': "p@[X] âˆˆ ğ’« k'' (Suc v'')"   
                apply (simp only: ğ’«.simps)
                apply (rule limit_single_step)
                apply (auto simp only: Append_def)
                apply (rule_tac x=p in exI)
                apply (rule_tac x=X in exI)
                apply (simp only: admissible_p_X X_in_ğ’µ)
                using charslength_p p by auto
              have "indexle k'' v'' k' v" using scan_step by simp
              then have "indexle k'' (Suc v'') k' (Suc v)"
                by (simp add: indexle_def indexlt_simp)               
              then have "ğ’« k'' (Suc v'') âŠ† ğ’« k' (Suc v)"
                by (metis indexle_def indexlt_simp less_or_eq_imp_le subset_ğ’«) 
              with pX_in_ğ’«_k''_v'' have pX_in_ğ’«_k': "p@[X] âˆˆ ğ’« k' (Suc v)" by blast
              have "charslength (p@[X]) = k'' +  length (chars_of_token X)"
                using charslength_p by auto
              then have "charslength (p@[X]) = item_end x" using scan_step by simp
              then have charslength_p_X: "charslength (p@[X]) = k" using item_end_x by simp
              then have pX_dom: "p@[X] âˆˆ paths_le k (ğ’« k' (Suc v))"
                using lessI less_Suc_eq_le mem_Collect_eq pX_in_ğ’«_k' paths_le_def by auto
              have wellformed_x: "wellformed_item x"
                using item_end_x less.prems scan_step wellformed_inc_item wellformed_items_ğ’¥ 
                  wellformed_items_def by auto
              have wellformed_p_X: "wellformed_tokens (p@[X])"
                using ğ’«_wellformed pX_in_ğ’«_k''_v'' by blast
              from iffD1[OF pvalid_def pvalid_p_y] obtain r Î³ where r_Î³:
                "wellformed_tokens p âˆ§
                 wellformed_item y âˆ§
                 r â‰¤ length p âˆ§
                 charslength p = item_end y âˆ§
                 charslength (take r p) = item_origin y âˆ§
                 is_derivation (terminals (take r p) @ [item_nonterminal y] @ Î³) âˆ§
                 derives (item_Î± y) (terminals (drop r p))" by blast
              have r_le_p: "r â‰¤ length p" by (simp add: r_Î³)
              have item_nonterminal_x: "item_nonterminal x = item_nonterminal y" 
                by (simp add: scan_step)
              have item_Î±_x: "item_Î± x = (item_Î± y) @ [terminal_of_token X]"
                by (simp add: item_Î±_of_inc_item r_Î³ scan_step)              
              have pvalid_x: "pvalid (p@[X]) x"                
                apply (auto simp add: pvalid_def wellformed_x wellformed_p_X)
                apply (rule_tac x=r in exI)
                apply auto
                apply (simp add: le_SucI r_Î³)
                using r_Î³ scan_step apply auto[1]
                using r_Î³ scan_step apply auto[1]
                apply (rule_tac x=Î³ in exI)
                apply (simp add: r_le_p item_nonterminal_x)
                using r_Î³ apply simp
                apply (simp add: r_le_p item_Î±_x)
                by (metis terminals_singleton append_Nil2 
                  derives_implies_leftderives derives_is_sentence is_sentence_concat 
                  is_sentence_cons is_symbol_def is_word_append is_word_cons is_word_terminals 
                  is_word_terminals_drop leftderives_implies_derives leftderives_padback 
                  leftderives_refl r_Î³ terminals_append terminals_drop wellformed_p_X)
              then have "x âˆˆ Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k' (Suc v)))" using pX_dom Gen_def 
                LocalLexing_axioms mem_Collect_eq by auto 
            }
            then have sub2: "items_eq k (ğ’¥ k' v) âŠ† natUnion (Î» v. Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k' v)))"
              by (meson dual_order.trans natUnion_superset subsetI)                                       
            have suffices3: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k' v) âŠ† natUnion (Î» v. Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k' v)))"
              using split_ğ’¥ sub1 sub2 by blast
            have "items_le k (ğ’¥ k' v) âŠ† Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k 0))"
              using suffices3 simp_right by blast
          }
          note suffices2 = this
          have items_le_natUnion_swap: "items_le k (â„ k') = natUnion(Î» v. items_le k (ğ’¥ k' v))"
            by (simp add: items_le_pointwise pointwise_natUnion_swap)            
          then have suffices1: "items_le k (â„ k') âŠ† Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k 0))"
            using suffices2 natUnion_upperbound by metis    
          have sub_lemma: "items_le k (ğ’¥ k 0) âŠ† Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k 0))"
          proof -
            have "items_le k (ğ’¥ k 0) âŠ† Gen (ğ’« k 0)"
              apply (subst simp_left)
              apply (rule thmD5)
              apply (auto simp only: less)
              using suffices1 items_le_is_filter items_le_paths_le subsetCE by blast 
            then show ?thesis
              by (simp add: items_le_idempotent remove_paths_le_in_subset_Gen)
          qed          
          have eq1: "Ï€ k {} (items_le k (â„ k')) = Ï€ k {} (items_le k (natUnion (ğ’¥ k')))" by simp
          then have eq2: "Ï€ k {} (items_le k (natUnion (ğ’¥ k'))) = 
            Ï€ k {} (natUnion (Î» v. items_le k (ğ’¥ k' v)))"
            using items_le_natUnion_swap by auto
          from simp_left eq1 eq2 
          have simp_left': "items_le k (ğ’¥ k 0) = Ï€ k {} (natUnion (Î» v. items_le k (ğ’¥ k' v)))"
            by metis
          {
            fix v :: nat
            fix q :: "token list"
            fix x :: item
            assume q_dom: "q âˆˆ paths_eq k (ğ’« k' v)"
            assume pvalid_q_x: "pvalid q x"
            have q_in_ğ’«: "q âˆˆ ğ’« k' v" using q_dom paths_eq_def by auto
            have charslength_q: "charslength q = k" using q_dom paths_eq_def by auto
            with k'_less_k have q_nonempty: "q â‰  []"
              using "2.hyps" chars.simps(1) charslength.simps list.size(3) by auto 
            then have "âˆƒ p X. q = p @ [X]" by (metis append_butlast_last_id) 
            then obtain p X where pX: "q = p @ [X]" by blast
            from last_step_of_path[OF q_in_ğ’« pX] obtain k'' v'' where k'':
              "indexlt k'' v'' k' v âˆ§ q âˆˆ ğ’« k'' (Suc v'') âˆ§ charslength p = k'' âˆ§ 
               X âˆˆ ğ’µ k'' (Suc v'')" by blast
            have h1: "p âˆˆ ğ”“"
              by (metis (no_types, lifting) LocalLexing.ğ”“_covers_ğ’« LocalLexing_axioms 
                append_Nil2 is_prefix_cancel is_prefix_empty pX prefixes_are_paths q_in_ğ’« subsetCE) 
            have h2: "charslength p = k''" using k'' by blast
            obtain T where T: "T = {X}" by blast
            have h3: "X âˆˆ T" using T by blast
            have h4: "T âŠ† ğ’³ k''" using ğ’µ_subset_ğ’³ T k'' by blast 
            obtain N where N: "N = item_nonterminal x" by blast
            obtain Î± where Î±: "Î± = item_Î± x" by blast
            obtain Î² where Î²: "Î² = item_Î² x" by blast
            have wellformed_x: "wellformed_item x" using pvalid_def pvalid_q_x by blast 
            then have h5: "(N, Î± @ Î²) âˆˆ â„œ"
              using N Î± Î² item_nonterminal_def item_rhs_def item_rhs_split prod.collapse 
                wellformed_item_def by auto 
            have pvalid_left_q_x: "pvalid_left q x" using pvalid_q_x by (simp add: pvalid_left) 
            from iffD1[OF pvalid_left_def pvalid_left_q_x] obtain r Î³ where r_Î³: 
              "wellformed_tokens q âˆ§
               wellformed_item x âˆ§
               r â‰¤ length q âˆ§
               charslength q = item_end x âˆ§
               charslength (take r q) = item_origin x âˆ§
               is_leftderivation (terminals (take r q) @ [item_nonterminal x] @ Î³) âˆ§
               leftderives (item_Î± x) (terminals (drop r q))" by blast
            have h6: "r â‰¤ length q" using r_Î³ by blast
            have h7: "leftderives [ğ”–] (terminals (take r q) @ [N] @ Î³)"
              using r_Î³ N is_leftderivation_def by blast 
            have h8: "leftderives Î± (terminals (drop r q))" using r_Î³ Î± by metis
            have h9: "k = k'' + length (chars_of_token X)" using r_Î³
              using charslength_q h2 pX by auto 
            have h10: "x = Item (N, Î± @ Î²) (length Î±) (charslength (take r q)) k"
              by (metis N Î± Î² charslength_q item.collapse item_dot_is_Î±_length item_nonterminal_def 
                item_rhs_def item_rhs_split prod.collapse r_Î³)             
            from thmD11[OF h1 h2 h3 h4 pX h5 h6 h7 h8 h9 h10] 
            have "x âˆˆ items_le k (Ï€ k {} (Scan T k'' (Gen (Prefixes p))))" 
              by blast
            then have x_in: "x âˆˆ Ï€ k {} (Scan T k'' (Gen (Prefixes p)))"
              using items_le_is_filter by blast             
            have subset1: "Prefixes p âŠ† Prefixes q"
              apply (rule is_prefix_Prefixes_subset)
              by (simp add: pX is_prefix_def)
            have subset2: "Prefixes q âŠ† ğ’« k'' (Suc v'')"
