              apply (rule Prefixes_subset_ğ’«)
              using k'' by blast
            from subset1 subset2 have "Prefixes p âŠ† ğ’« k'' (Suc v'')" by blast
            then have "Prefixes p âŠ† paths_le k'' (ğ’« k'' (Suc v''))" 
              using k'' Prefixes_subset_paths_le by blast            
            then have subset3: "Gen (Prefixes p) âŠ† Gen (paths_le k'' (ğ’« k'' (Suc v'')))"
              using Gen_def LocalLexing_axioms by auto
            have k''_less_k: "k'' < k" using k'' k' using indexlt_simp less_Suc_eq by auto 
            then have k''_Doc_bound: "k'' â‰¤ length Doc" using less by auto
            from less(1)[OF k''_less_k k''_Doc_bound, of "Suc v''"]
            have induct1: "items_le k'' (ğ’¥ k'' (Suc v'')) = Gen (paths_le k'' (ğ’« k'' (Suc v'')))"
              by blast
            from less(1)[OF k''_less_k k''_Doc_bound, of "Suc(Suc v'')"]
            have induct2: "ğ’¯ k'' (Suc (Suc v'')) = ğ’µ k'' (Suc (Suc v''))" by blast
            have subset4: "Gen (Prefixes p) âŠ† items_le k'' (ğ’¥ k'' (Suc v''))"
              using subset3 induct1 by auto
            from induct1 subset4
            have subset6: "Scan T k'' (Gen (Prefixes p)) âŠ† 
              Scan T k'' (items_le k'' (ğ’¥ k'' (Suc v'')))"
              apply (rule_tac monoD[OF mono_Scan])
              by blast
            have "k'' + length (chars_of_token X) = k"
              by (simp add: h9)
            have "â‹€ t. t âˆˆ T âŸ¹ length (chars_of_token t) â‰¤ length (chars_of_token X)"
              using T by auto
            from Scan_items_le[of T, OF this, simplified, of k'' "ğ’¥ k'' (Suc v'')"] h9
            have subset7: "Scan T k'' (items_le k'' (ğ’¥ k'' (Suc v'')))
              âŠ† items_le k (Scan T k'' (ğ’¥ k'' (Suc v'')))" by simp
            have "T âŠ† ğ’µ k'' (Suc (Suc v''))" using T k''
              using ğ’µ_subset_Suc rev_subsetD singletonD subsetI by blast 
            then have T_subset_ğ’¯: "T âŠ† ğ’¯ k'' (Suc (Suc v''))" using induct2 by auto
            have subset8: "Scan T k'' (ğ’¥ k'' (Suc v'')) âŠ†
              Scan (ğ’¯ k'' (Suc (Suc v''))) k'' (ğ’¥ k'' (Suc v''))" 
              using T_subset_ğ’¯ Scan_mono_tokens by blast
            have subset9: "Scan (ğ’¯ k'' (Suc (Suc v''))) k'' (ğ’¥ k'' (Suc v'')) âŠ† ğ’¥ k'' (Suc (Suc v''))"
              by (rule Scan_ğ’¥_subset_ğ’¥)
            have subset10: "(Scan T k'' (ğ’¥ k'' (Suc v''))) âŠ† ğ’¥ k'' (Suc (Suc v''))"
              using subset8 subset9 by blast
            have "k'' â‰¤ k'" using k'' indexlt_simp by auto
            then have "indexle k'' (Suc (Suc v'')) k' (Suc (Suc v''))" using indexlt_simp
              using indexle_def le_neq_implies_less by auto
            then have subset11: "ğ’¥ k'' (Suc (Suc v'')) âŠ† ğ’¥ k' (Suc (Suc v''))"
              using ğ’¥_subset by blast
            have subset12: "Scan T k'' (ğ’¥ k'' (Suc v'')) âŠ† ğ’¥ k' (Suc (Suc v''))"
              using subset8 subset9 subset10 subset11 by blast
            then have subset13: "items_le k (Scan T k'' (ğ’¥ k'' (Suc v''))) âŠ†
              items_le k (ğ’¥ k' (Suc (Suc v'')))"
              using items_le_def mem_Collect_eq rev_subsetD subsetI by auto 
            have subset14: "Scan T k'' (Gen (Prefixes p)) âŠ† items_le k (ğ’¥ k' (Suc (Suc v'')))"
              using subset6 subset7 subset13 by blast
            then have x_in': "x âˆˆ Ï€ k {} (items_le k (ğ’¥ k' (Suc (Suc v''))))"
              using x_in
              by (meson Ï€_apply_setmonotone Ï€_subset_elem_trans subsetCE subsetI)
            from x_in' have "x âˆˆ Ï€ k {} (natUnion (Î» v. items_le k (ğ’¥ k' v)))"
              by (meson k' mono_Ï€ mono_subset_elem natUnion_superset)
          }
          note suffices6 = this
          {
            fix v :: nat
            have "Gen (paths_eq k (ğ’« k' v)) âŠ† Ï€ k {} (natUnion (Î» v. items_le k (ğ’¥ k' v)))"
              using suffices6 by (meson Gen_implies_pvalid subsetI) 
          }
          note suffices5 = this
          {
            fix v :: nat
            have "paths_le k (ğ’« k' v) = paths_le k' (ğ’« k' v) âˆª paths_eq k (ğ’« k' v)"
              using  paths_le_split_via_eq k' by metis
            then have Gen_split: "Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k' v)) = 
              Gen (paths_le k' (ğ’« k' v)) âˆª Gen(paths_eq k (ğ’« k' v))" using Gen_union by metis
            have case_le: "Gen (paths_le k' (ğ’« k' v)) âŠ†  Ï€ k {} (natUnion (Î» v. items_le k (ğ’¥ k' v)))"
            proof -
              from less k'_less_k have "k' â‰¤ length Doc" by arith
              from less(1)[OF k'_less_k this]
              have "items_le k' (ğ’¥ k' v) = Gen (paths_le k' (ğ’« k' v))" by blast
              then have "Gen (paths_le k' (ğ’« k' v)) âŠ† natUnion (Î» v. items_le k (ğ’¥ k' v))"
                using items_le_def LocalLexing_axioms k'_less_k natUnion_superset by fastforce
              then show ?thesis using Ï€_apply_setmonotone by blast
            qed
            have "Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k' v)) âŠ† Ï€ k {} (natUnion (Î» v. items_le k (ğ’¥ k' v)))"
              using Gen_split case_le suffices5 UnE rev_subsetD subsetI by blast 
          }
          note suffices4 = this
          have super_lemma: "Gen (paths_le k (ğ’« k 0)) âŠ† items_le k (ğ’¥ k 0)"
            apply (subst simp_right)
            apply (subst simp_left')
            using suffices4 by (meson natUnion_ex rev_subsetD subsetI) 
          from super_lemma sub_lemma show ?thesis by blast
        qed             
        then show ?case using thmD13 less.prems by blast   
    qed
qed

end

end

Theory PathLemmas

theory PathLemmas
imports TheoremD14
begin

context LocalLexing begin

lemma characterize_ğ’«:
  "(âˆ€ i < length p. âˆƒu. p ! i âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take i p)) u) âŸ¹ admissible p âŸ¹
  âˆƒ u. p âˆˆ ğ’« (charslength p) u"
proof (induct p rule: rev_induct)
  case Nil
    show ?case by simp
next
  case (snoc a p)
    from snoc.prems have admissible_p: "admissible p"
      by (metis append_Nil2 is_prefix_admissible is_prefix_cancel is_prefix_empty) 
    {
      fix i :: nat
      assume ilen: "i < length p"
      then have "i < length (p@[a])"
        by (simp add: Suc_leI Suc_le_lessD trans_le_add1) 
      with snoc have "âˆƒu. (p @ [a]) ! i âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take i (p @ [a]))) u"
        by blast
      then obtain u where u: "(p @ [a]) ! i âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take i (p @ [a]))) u" by blast
      from ilen have p_at: "(p @ [a]) ! i = p ! i" by (simp add: nth_append)  
      from ilen have p_take: "take i (p @ [a]) = take i p" by (simp add: less_or_eq_imp_le) 
      from u p_at p_take have p_i: "p ! i âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take i p)) u" by simp 
      then have "âˆƒ u. p ! i âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take i p)) u" by blast
    }
    then have "âˆ€ i < length p. âˆƒu. p ! i âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take i p)) u" by auto
    with admissible_p snoc.hyps obtain u where u: "p âˆˆ ğ’« (charslength p) u" by blast
    have "âˆƒu. (p @ [a]) ! (length p) âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take (length p) (p @ [a]))) u"
      using snoc
      by (metis (no_types, hide_lams) add_Suc_right append_Nil2 length_Cons length_append 
        less_Suc_eq_le less_or_eq_imp_le) 
    then obtain v where "(p @ [a]) ! (length p) âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take (length p) (p @ [a]))) v"
      by blast
    then have v: "a âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength p) v" by simp
    {
      assume v_leq_u: "v â‰¤ u"
      then have "a âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength p) (Suc u)" using v
        by (meson LocalLexing.subset_fSuc LocalLexing_axioms ğ’µ_subset_Suc subsetCE) 
      from path_append_token[OF u this snoc.prems(2)] 
      have "p @ [a] âˆˆ ğ’« (charslength p) (Suc u)" by blast
      then have ?case using in_ğ’«_charslength by blast 
    }
    note case_v_leq_u = this
    {
      assume u_less_v: "u < v"
      then obtain w where w: "v = Suc w" using less_imp_Suc_add by blast 
      with u_less_v have "u â‰¤ w" by arith
      with u have "p âˆˆ ğ’« (charslength p) w" by (meson subsetCE subset_ğ’«k) 
      from v w path_append_token[OF this _ snoc.prems(2)] 
      have "p @ [a] âˆˆ ğ’« (charslength p) (Suc w)" by blast
      then have ?case using in_ğ’«_charslength by blast 
    }
    note case_u_less_v = this
    
    show ?case using case_v_leq_u case_u_less_v not_le by blast 
qed

lemma drop_empty_tokens: 
  assumes p: "p âˆˆ ğ”“"
  assumes r: "r â‰¤ length p"
  assumes empty: "charslength (take r p) = 0"
  assumes admissible: "admissible (drop r p)"
  shows "drop r p âˆˆ ğ”“"
proof -
  have p_ğ’µ: "âˆ€i<length p. âˆƒu. p ! i âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take i p)) u" using p
    using tokens_nth_in_ğ’µ by blast 
  obtain q where q: "q = drop r p" by blast
  {
    fix j :: nat
    assume j : "j < length q"
    have length_p_q_r: "length p = length q + r"
      using r q add.commute diff_add_inverse le_Suc_ex length_drop by simp
    have j_plus_r_bound: "j + r < length p" by (simp add: j length_p_q_r) 
    with p_ğ’µ have "âˆƒu. p ! (j + r) âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take (j + r) p)) u" by blast
    then obtain u where u: "p ! (j + r) âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take (j + r) p)) u" by blast
    have p_at_is_q_at: "p ! (j + r) = q ! j" by (simp add: add.commute q r) 
    have "take (j + r) p = (take r p) @ (take j q)" by (metis add.commute q take_add)
    with empty have "charslength (take (j + r) p) = charslength (take j q)" by auto
    with u p_at_is_q_at have "q ! j âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take j q)) u" by simp
    then have "âˆƒ u. q ! j âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take j q)) u" by auto
  }
  then have "âˆ€i<length q. âˆƒu. q ! i âˆˆ ğ’µ (charslength (take i q)) u" by blast
  from characterize_ğ’«[OF this] have "âˆƒu. q âˆˆ ğ’« (charslength q) u" using admissible q by auto
  then show ?thesis using ğ”“_covers_ğ’« q by blast 
qed
  
end

end

Theory MainTheorems

theory MainTheorems
imports PathLemmas
begin

context LocalLexing begin

theorem â„‘_is_generated_by_ğ”“: "â„‘ = Gen ğ”“"
proof -
  have "wellformed_items (â„ (length Doc))"
    using wellformed_items_â„ by auto
  then have "â‹€ x. x âˆˆ â„ (length Doc) âŸ¹ item_end x â‰¤ length Doc"
    using wellformed_item_def wellformed_items_def by blast
  then have "â„ (length Doc) âŠ† items_le (length Doc) (â„ (length Doc))"
    by (auto simp only: items_le_def)  
  then have "â„ (length Doc) = items_le (length Doc) (â„ (length Doc))"
    using items_le_is_filter by blast
  then have â„‘_altdef: "â„‘ = items_le (length Doc) (â„ (length Doc))" using â„‘_def by auto
  have "â‹€ p. p âˆˆ (ğ’¬ (length Doc)) âŸ¹ charslength p â‰¤ length Doc"
    using ğ”“_are_doc_tokens ğ”“_def doc_tokens_length by auto
  then have "ğ’¬ (length Doc) âŠ† paths_le (length Doc) (ğ’¬ (length Doc))"
    by (auto simp only: paths_le_def)
  then have "ğ’¬ (length Doc) = paths_le (length Doc) (ğ’¬ (length Doc))"
    using paths_le_is_filter by blast
  then have ğ”“_altdef: "ğ”“ = paths_le (length Doc) (ğ’¬ (length Doc))" using ğ”“_def by auto
  show ?thesis using â„‘_altdef ğ”“_altdef thmD14 by auto
qed

definition finished_item :: "symbol list â‡’ item"
where
  "finished_item Î± = Item (ğ”–, Î±) (length Î±) 0 (length Doc)"

lemma item_rule_finished_item[simp]: "item_rule (finished_item Î±) = (ğ”–, Î±)"
  by (simp add: finished_item_def)

lemma item_origin_finished_item[simp]: "item_origin (finished_item Î±) = 0"
  by (simp add: finished_item_def)

lemma item_end_finished_item[simp]: "item_end (finished_item Î±) = length Doc"
  by (simp add: finished_item_def)

lemma item_dot_finished_item[simp]: "item_dot (finished_item Î±) = length Î±"
  by (simp add: finished_item_def)

lemma item_rhs_finished_item[simp]: "item_rhs (finished_item Î±) = Î±"
  by (simp add: finished_item_def)

lemma item_Î±_finished_item[simp]: "item_Î± (finished_item Î±) = Î±"
  by (simp add: finished_item_def item_Î±_def)

lemma item_nonterminal_finished_item[simp]: "item_nonterminal (finished_item Î±) = ğ”–"
  by (simp add: finished_item_def item_nonterminal_def)
  
lemma Derives1_of_singleton:
  assumes "Derives1 [N] i r Î±"
  shows "i = 0 âˆ§ r = (N, Î±)"
proof -
  from assms have "i = 0" using Derives1_bound
    using length_Cons less_Suc0 list.size(3) by fastforce 
  then show ?thesis using assms
    using Derives1_def append_Cons append_self_conv append_self_conv2 length_0_conv 
      list.inject by auto
qed    

definition pvalid_with :: "tokens â‡’ item â‡’ nat â‡’ symbol list â‡’ bool"
where
  "pvalid_with p x u Î³ = 
     (wellformed_tokens p âˆ§
     wellformed_item x âˆ§
     u â‰¤ length p âˆ§
     charslength p = item_end x âˆ§
     charslength (take u p) = item_origin x âˆ§
     is_derivation (terminals (take u p) @ [item_nonterminal x] @ Î³) âˆ§
     derives (item_Î± x) (terminals (drop u p)))"

lemma pvalid_with: "pvalid p x = (âˆƒ u Î³. pvalid_with p x u Î³)"
  using pvalid_def pvalid_with_def by blast

theorem Completeness:
  assumes p_in_ll: "p âˆˆ ll"
  shows "âˆƒ Î±. pvalid_with p (finished_item Î±) 0 [] âˆ§ finished_item Î± âˆˆ â„‘"
proof -
  have p: "p âˆˆ ğ”“ âˆ§ charslength p = length Doc âˆ§ terminals p âˆˆ â„’"
    using p_in_ll ll_def by auto
  then have derives_p: "derives [ğ”–] (terminals p)"
    using â„’_def is_derivation_def mem_Collect_eq by blast
  then have "âˆƒ D. Derivation [ğ”–] D (terminals p)"
    by (simp add: derives_implies_Derivation)   
  then obtain D where D: "Derivation [ğ”–] D (terminals p)" by blast
  have is_word_p: "is_word (terminals p)"  using leftlang p by blast
  have not_is_word_ğ”–: "Â¬ (is_word [ğ”–])" using is_nonterminal_startsymbol is_terminal_nonterminal 
    is_word_cons by blast  
  have "D â‰  []" using D is_word_p not_is_word_ğ”– using Derivation.simps(1) by force
  then have "âˆƒ d D'. D = d#D'" using D Derivation.elims(2) by blast 
  then obtain d D' where d: "D = d#D'" by blast
  have "âˆƒ Î±. Derives1 [ğ”–] (fst d) (snd d) Î± âˆ§ derives Î± (terminals p)"
    using d D Derivation.simps(2) Derivation_implies_derives by blast 
  then obtain Î± where Î±: "Derives1 [ğ”–] (fst d) (snd d) Î± âˆ§ derives Î± (terminals p)" by blast
  then have snd_d_in_â„œ: "snd d âˆˆ â„œ" using Derives1_rule by blast 
  with Î± have snd_d: "snd d = (ğ”–, Î±)" using Derives1_of_singleton by blast
  have wellformed_p: "wellformed_tokens p" by (simp add: ğ”“_wellformed p)
  have wellformed_finished_item: "wellformed_item (finished_item Î±)"  
    apply (auto simp add: wellformed_item_def)
    using snd_d snd_d_in_â„œ by metis    
  have pvalid_with: "pvalid_with p (finished_item Î±) 0 []" 
    apply (auto simp add: pvalid_with_def)
    using wellformed_p apply blast
    using wellformed_finished_item apply blast
    using p apply (simp add: finished_item_def)
    apply (simp add: is_derivation_def)
    by (simp add: Î±)
  then have "pvalid p (finished_item Î±)" using pvalid_def pvalid_with_def by blast 
  then have "finished_item Î± âˆˆ Gen ğ”“" using Gen_def mem_Collect_eq p by blast
  then have "finished_item Î± âˆˆ â„‘" using â„‘_is_generated_by_ğ”“ by blast 
  with pvalid_with show ?thesis by blast
qed
  
theorem Soundness:
  assumes finished_item_Î±: "finished_item Î± âˆˆ â„‘"
  shows "âˆƒ p. pvalid_with p (finished_item Î±) 0 [] âˆ§ p âˆˆ ll"
proof -
  have "finished_item Î± âˆˆ Gen ğ”“"
    using â„‘_is_generated_by_ğ”“ finished_item_Î± by auto 
  then obtain p where p: "p âˆˆ ğ”“ âˆ§ pvalid p (finished_item Î±)"
    using Gen_implies_pvalid by blast 
  have pvalid_p_finished_item: "pvalid  p (finished_item Î±)" using p by blast
  from iffD1[OF pvalid_def this, simplified] obtain r Î³ where pvalid:
    "wellformed_tokens p âˆ§
     wellformed_item (finished_item Î±) âˆ§
     r â‰¤ length p âˆ§
     length (chars p) = length Doc âˆ§
     chars (take r p) = [] âˆ§
     is_derivation (take r (terminals p) @ ğ”– # Î³) âˆ§ derives Î± (drop r (terminals p))"
     by  blast
  have "item_rule (finished_item Î±) âˆˆ â„œ" using pvalid
    using wellformed_item_def by blast
  then have "(ğ”–, Î±) âˆˆ â„œ" by simp 
  then have is_derivation_Î±: "is_derivation Î±" by (simp add: is_derivation_def leftderives_rule)
  have drop_r_p_in_ğ”“: "drop r p âˆˆ ğ”“"
    apply (rule drop_empty_tokens)
    using p apply blast
    using pvalid apply blast
    using pvalid apply simp
    by (metis append_Nil2 derives_trans is_derivation_Î± is_derivation_def 
      is_derivation_implies_admissible is_word_terminals_drop pvalid terminals_drop)
  then have in_ll: "drop r p âˆˆ ll"
    apply (auto simp add: ll_def) 
    apply (metis append_Nil append_take_drop_id chars_append pvalid) 
    using is_derivation_Î± pvalid
    by (metis (no_types, lifting) â„’_def derives_trans is_derivation_def 
      is_word_terminals_drop mem_Collect_eq terminals_drop)
  have "pvalid_with (drop r p) (finished_item Î±) 0 []"
    apply (auto simp add: pvalid_with_def)
    using ğ”“_wellformed drop_r_p_in_ğ”“ apply blast 
    using pvalid apply blast
    apply (metis append_Nil append_take_drop_id chars_append pvalid)
    apply (simp add: is_derivation_def)
    using pvalid by blast
  with in_ll show ?thesis by auto
qed

lemma is_finished_and_finished_item:
  assumes wellformed_x: "wellformed_item x"
  shows "is_finished x = (âˆƒ Î±. x = finished_item Î±)"
proof -
  {
    assume is_finished_x: "is_finished x"
    obtain Î± where Î±: "Î± = item_rhs x" by blast
    have "x = finished_item Î±"
      apply (rule item.expand)
      apply auto
      using Î± is_finished_def is_finished_x item_nonterminal_def item_rhs_def apply auto[1]
      using Î± assms is_complete_def is_finished_def is_finished_x wellformed_item_def apply auto[1]
      using is_finished_def is_finished_x apply blast
      using is_finished_def is_finished_x by auto
    then have "âˆƒ Î±. x = finished_item Î±" by blast
  }
  note left_implies_right = this
  {
    assume "âˆƒ Î±. x = finished_item Î±"
    then obtain Î± where Î±: "x = finished_item Î±" by blast
    have "is_finished x" by (simp add: Î± is_finished_def is_complete_def)
  }
  note right_implies_left = this
  show ?thesis using left_implies_right right_implies_left by blast
qed 

theorem Correctness:
  shows "(ll â‰  {}) = earley_recognised"
proof -
  have 1: "(ll â‰  {}) = (âˆƒ Î±. finished_item Î± âˆˆ â„‘)"
    using Soundness Completeness ex_in_conv by fastforce
  have 2: "(âˆƒ Î±. finished_item Î± âˆˆ â„‘) = (âˆƒ x âˆˆ â„‘. is_finished x)"
    using â„‘_def is_finished_and_finished_item wellformed_items_â„ wellformed_items_def by auto
  show ?thesis using earley_recognised_def 1 2 by blast
qed 

end

end
